Other wireless systems require painstakingly connecting each individual sensor to the command center one by one, after navigating through a long and confusing directory tree on the keypad / control.  The SimpliSafe system sensors are already linked to the command center out of the box.  I had 12 sensors so this feature was a blessing.  To name each sensor on other systems you have to work through the directory tree on the control panel. It took a very long time and was very frustrating. For the SimpliSafe system you just log into your account on your computer and type in a name for each sensor.  I wholeheartedly recommend this system for both the novice and the experienced user.  The instructions and the set up videos are extremely easy to understand.  Finally, a bonus feature is the built in cellular connection at no cost, factory ready.  No calling a cell provider.  Not to mention the free smartphone app for monitoring the system.  Fully monitored with cellular connection, I pay $25 per month.

Reviews.Title: IT is what it says {simple &safe;]
Reviews.Author: Eugene Romah
Reviews.Content: it took me about 30 min. to install  I now have peace of mind when I leave my home. I can leave my home and not worry about some one breaking in and stealing my things.Thank you for a fine system that works and is affordable. Eugene Romah

Reviews.Title: Extremely easy to install and configure
Reviews.Author: Ron Tang
Reviews.Content: I liked the design philosophy behind this alarm system, that is user-friendly, simple enough to understand, and cost effective.Thanks.Ron

Reviews.Title: Purchased through their website
Reviews.Author: GM
Reviews.Content: Very easy and intuitive to install. If you can handle putting up a command strip you can install this system. One of my sensors wasn't working, their customer service was very response and mailed one out immediately. I'm very happy with this system so far.

Reviews.Title: Good System
Reviews.Author: Pearl
Reviews.Content: This system was easy to install and use. I hope that I will never have to  use the monitoring except to test the system monthly.

Reviews.Title: Fast set up!
Reviews.Author: c ledoux
Reviews.Content: Super easy to install. I did a stand alone system and feel its perfect for my area. Operation is simple, key fob is very nice and siren is loud loud loud, quality components too. Worth the time and money for an quick alarm system!

Reviews.Title: Excellent decision for cabin security
Reviews.Author: James A. Lockwood
Reviews.Content: Easy installation and testing verified functioning sensors. Adding the external siren alarm was easy following the enclosed instructions. Online update after activating system verifying test mode and contact with the monitoring service was accurate and reassuring. Very pleased thus far.

Reviews.Title: Little to pay for piece of mind.
Reviews.Author: Melinda Lull
Reviews.Content: So far I have loved this system.  It was very easy and quick to install.  Within 30 minutes everything was installed and tested.  I had one entry sensor that wouldn't connect with the system, so I emailed customer service.  I had a response with troubleshooting techniques within 15 minutes.  When none of those worked, I responded, and they sent a new one right away at no cost to me.  I had it with 3 days.  Now my system is up and running perfectly.  I bought a starter package, and am planning on buying additional pieces to add, including the smoke detector, glass break sensor and extra entry sensors.  It is very worth the money, and so far is equal in quality to much more expensive systems.

Reviews.Title: Simpli easy
Reviews.Author: Dolores H.
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and operate. I'm 74 years old and had no trouble I'm still in test mode,but so far so good

Reviews.Title: The Perfect Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: I heard about this alarm system on KFI radio.  I bought it and installed it last week.  Super easy right out of the box!  Customer support very fast at responding to my questions.  I have already expanded my system two times.  Very pleased.  Word of caution, the siren is very, very  loud....  wear ear plugs when testing the system.

Reviews.Title: Good System.  Descent service.
Reviews.Author: Ruben Wyles
Reviews.Content: Their customer service hours are not impressive.  M-F: 7am- 3pm pst. The system is affordable & easy to install.  Easy to use.  The app is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: AOK, so far!
Reviews.Author: Dick4001
Reviews.Content: Our purchase and installation of this package was straight forward.I wanted a system that had wireless sensors and a cell phone connection to the alarm company Central Station, with reasonable purchase and monthly costs.  I learned of SimpliSafe via Angies List and found a statement about something expiring on that site a bit confusing, but SimpliSafe clarified it and all was good to go.  I wanted the system activated before the normal three day test interval was over, and that was easily done.  The sensors behave as intended, so I'm expecting no problems.  Thanks SimpliSafe!We've only had it a few days, so it's a little early to give it 5 stars, but I expect we will after several months use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, well designed system.
Reviews.Author: Alan L. Macrae
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on systems before choosing Simplisafe.  I admit I was a bit skeptical however, I'm totally impressed with the system and it's capabilities.  I live in a rural area and the original cellular carrier had poor coverage, so the link was sketchy.  I contacted Simplisafe and they shipped a transceiver for another carrier that was easy to install, replacing the original module and the problem was solved.  They've obviously done their homework.One of the many great things about this system, in addition to it being easy to install, is the lack of need to engage in a long term contract and, a variety of monitoring options to suit individual needs.  Well done!

Reviews.Title: Easy as they say!
Reviews.Author: Luth
Reviews.Content: First heard about SimpliSafe on the radio. After I submitted for my 10% discount I must say they did send some follow up emails that were to me written to create fear instead of bolstering about the fact they have a top notch system and what it will provide. I don't respond well to hard sell techniques however, it didn't deter us from proceeding. I did my due diligence and did some online research of which did include Amazon. I did find them to be the best fit for our home due to the wireless setup and self install. Additionally the base monitoring package of $14.99 per month with no contracts. Their advertising didn't indicate there would be any initial investment on the different hardware packages however, neither did their competitors. Once we ordered our kit everything has been spot on to what they have promised they would deliver in both hardware and service. The system was as easy to install as had hoped. Once the system was activated they have a 72 hour test period. This to me is well thought out so you don't have to worry about if you set your sensors in the correct location that may be set off falsely. One thing to do is check with your local government to see if you need a permit. We did this a little after we purchased the system however, took less than a day to be approved.Been about a week now and things are going very well. It gives my family peace of mind when we are away that our personal items will be better protected.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Darryl Ross
Reviews.Content: I wanted an alarm system without monitoring.  I wanted a system to protect the perimeter of my house. I have no need for indoor motion detection the reason being, if the perimeter has been preached then the system is a failure.I found the SimpliSafe wireless system very easy to install and configure.  I have had it for about a month and have not had any issues.I highly recommend this system to anyone wanting home security system without costly monitoring service.

Reviews.Title: Great system, easy setup & great customer service
Reviews.Author: Bradley A Thomas
Reviews.Content: Took less than an hour to set up. Mobile app compliments system quite well.  Very happy with new system.  Good experience with customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Randall Sloan
Reviews.Content: I installed this in our fifth wheel RV in about 30 minutes. I have one sensor on each of the outside hatches and the entry door. We tested it and it works fantastic. I would recommend the system for anyone having an RV. I have it set so that when the outside hatches are opened the alarm goes off instantly. I have it set for 20 second delay at the entry door in order to have time to go in and hit the code.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, only one complaint
Reviews.Author: Alan A Costa "AC"
Reviews.Content: I installed the deluxe system (17 piece) and added a third motion sensor and two third party cameras. Everything was easy to install and ultimately, the cost of the system will be far less than ADT which I had previously. The only complaint I have is the control panel doesn't "beep" loud enough when it warns you to turn off the alarm. A couple times already I almost didn't notice the beeping and barely got the alarm turned off in time.

Reviews.Title: Good security system with NO CONTRACT!
Reviews.Author: Gandhi
Reviews.Content: Its been just a week and I am satisfied, no major complaints so far! I bought the additional 105 db alarm to scare off any intruders and mounted it a bit high in the wall so it is not easily reachable. My total ran to almost $400 since i bought extra smoke detector, 105 db alarm, motion sensor, key chain remote and door sensor. Have one remote key chain upstairs so i can disarm or trigger panic function.PROS:Very simple to setup.Works as advertised.NO ContractGives good eventlogs as when was the alrm armed, disarmed etc in the simplisafe iphone APP (to Arm and Disarm remotely, you need a higher subscription for this)Cons: These are suggested improvements, so not really CONSThe keypad can be slightly bigger with larger number keysMaybe the keypad should have the speaker ??Provide 2 decals to stick on the doors as the same size like the yard sign.Give 4 window decals, just 2 is not enough.Add wifi motion sensor night vision  camera  to the system. So, we can identify thieves who even tried to enter.

Reviews.Title: Simpliafe Install
Reviews.Author: Robert Palumbo
Reviews.Content: The installation of my Simplisafe alarm was quit basic and easy. I did install approx. 23 sensors of different types to suite my home needs in about half of a day. I have installed several home wired systems over the years and the wireless technology is superb, a great time saver. Simplisafe also provided fast and accurate install assistance and questions over the phone. The reaction time for a triggered real or tested alarm is quite rapid, a real plus. I suggest for a better and more professional install forget using the double back tape that is supplied on the back of most sensors and go with the supplied screws to mount the sensors. The double back tape does not stick too well and will degrade over time like all sticky tape. A sensor won't work if fall's off of the wall and is laying on the floor. Other than that it seems like a really good product.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Brian Holdsworth
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe lives up to its claim of being easy to install yourself and a relative bargain compared to comparable systems. The convenience of a fully wireless system that I own outright, and can move with me, were big plusses. The USB remote that you want to get with your system makes the setup pretty bullet-proof. I DO recommend affixing the sensors with screws instead of the provided adhesive wherever this is possible. My only knock on the setup process is their software requires Windows. As a Mac user, I found that to be annoying, but I overcame the problem with a borrowed laptop.

Reviews.Title: Works exactly like it says
Reviews.Author: Gno
Reviews.Content: System received as and when promised.  Simple to install and customer service quick and friendly with support.  Easy to operate in daily use.  Could not ask for more.  Tnx!

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: terri covello
Reviews.Content: I love this system.  This is the second home I've used them in, and they work great.  Customer service had been great, too.  With my newest system, i had some initial issues with the base unit contacting the dispatcher, but they fixed the problem right away.  The issue wasn't really even their fault....I live in an area where cell service can be sketchy at best, but they overnighted a new computer chip, fixed the issue right away.  The only " down" I have found is that the ceiling fan can sometimes trip the motion sensor, so I've started turning it off before I set the alarm.

Reviews.Title: Great system for the money.
Reviews.Author: Richard J Hoffman
Reviews.Content: Fast, easy setup.  Wish there was an adjustment to turn up the volume of door opening beeps.  Good selection of individual sensors.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Kathy Williams
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried about the wireless connection because we live out in the country.....but we have had no problem.  Very easy to install and works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dwight S. Davis
Reviews.Content: Easy installation and after one month no problems with the operation.  Would like to see one option so that it could be armed for home and still be able to leave since my wife is still in asleep when I leave.

Reviews.Title: Great new Security System!
Reviews.Author: TRAVIS KEETON
Reviews.Content: I was annoyed with my previous alarm company because they were trying to stick me with high costs to upgrade equipment and were charging me for a service that no longer monitored my residence.  I heard about Simplisafe on the Dave Ramsey show and did some research on their website.  This turned out to be a great switch.  I love the no contract, low monthly rate of $15.  I also like how the system is completely wireless, so it is easy to set-up and doesn't damage walls or require intense installation.  I am planning on moving soon, and I love that I will be able to move my system to my new home and expand the system as needed to protect my new home.  It was easy to install and activate.

Reviews.Title: A very LOUD NOISE at a very LOW PRICE...
Reviews.Author: Hippie Bob Hunter "Live well, be happy..."
Reviews.Content: I had wanted a good security system but was not willing to participate with the major companies that offered what I perceived as "bait & switch offers" leading to an expensive system. Then I read about Simplisafe and while doubtful decided to give it a try (good money back guarantee with a "Google backing").  The system exceeded my expectations and the service call I made for some help yielded another good impression: A wealth of knowledge (product) delivered by a customer friendly person...  Now I am telling my friends just like I am telling you.  Hippie Bob

Reviews.Title: Great system!
Reviews.Author: Wayne R. Gould
Reviews.Content: We installed the system about a week ago. The set up was easy and straigtforward. The use of command strips to mount everything made it easy and when I had to more a motion sensor it came off without damaging the wall. This was a very easy set up and I feel anyone could do it. We had 14 entry sensors, two motion sensors, the secorn alarm horn, panic button and a smoke detector.We have yet to have a problem with any false alarms and the system is easy to arm and disarm. Wish the inside alarm was a little louder and the system voice could be turned up but it is adequate.I would gladly recommend this system to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Motion Detector Ineffective
Reviews.Author: S. Crawford "S. Crawford"
Reviews.Content: We encouraged our daughter to install this unit based on the positive reviews.  Supposedly, the motion detectors would ignore small animals of 30lbs or less.  Initially, with my 25lb dog, the motion alarm sounded.  With the dog removed and just their 10lb cat remaining, it again alarmed.  I am now sorry I made the recommendation, especially since this was a rather expensive alarm system.  She should send the motion detectors back for a partial refund.  A real disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Best out of the box security system
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: This thing is as dumbed down as you can get.  It takes more time to open the individual packages that to set up the system.You have to spend the 25 a month to get full access to the phone app, but its worth it.  You can control the entire system from the phone and get event logs.  Its still a steal at 25 a month.

Reviews.Title: So Easy To Install Love It So Far!
Reviews.Author: TripletMum
Reviews.Content: I purchased the larger kit as I needed extra entry sensors and motion sensors, 2 key chains and the larger siren.  Installation was really simple but did take longer than 30 mins as one motion sensor was not working but customer service sent out a new one immediately but later I discovered when on the phone with a technician that they had put the wrong sensor code in place so I just went online and corrected this error so check the codes on each piece to make sure it matches with what's showing online.  I love this system so far and especially the 72 hour testing period so you can play around with it until you feel comfortable learning how to use it.  I did decide to go with the 24/7 security monitoring as my husband had passed away a few months ago and although my older Son lives with me at the moment I felt safer doing this and loved that there is no long contracts to sign but my city did require a permit which was easy to obtain and then you give the security company your permit number.  One thing I would love them to add to this is an outdoor camera which they don't offer so I purchased a higher end dummy camera and installed this outside the front area until I find one that is easy to install.  We have been using this for 4 days now and I love it plus once you register online you can have texts sent to your smartphone or iPad letting you know when the alarm has been turned on or off which lets me see if my Son forgot to turn it on when I'm away.  Love the panic buttons on the keypad and keychain but especially the wall mounted panic button for my bedside.  The larger siren is great and very loud, can't imagine anyone breaking in would hang around when this goes off.  Huge thumbs up and after lots of research on other companies I'm glad I went with the Simplisafe...so simple to use!

Reviews.Title: Wireless Home Security was easy to install.
Reviews.Author: John Thomsen
Reviews.Content: I have installed two security systems before. This was the easiest one to set-up. The instructions were clear and easy to follow.So far this is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Easy install, reliable monitoring, saved a bunch of money!
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Great option for a reliable alarm system. No contracts, no shady installation people upselling you, no lousy/ugly wiring. The system looks and sounds very sleek and you install it yourself.Its quite easy and user friendly, even for low tech people like myself. Plus the customer service is very good if you run into any hiccups. FYI, I had a reputable alarm person come out  to give me an estimate - referred by another client. I was quoted $900 to install a reasonably priced system, which is typical from my experience. I ordered the $279 plan from SS and it has more than covered our needs for a third of the cost. Any additional sensors can be ordered a la carte, which is a nice feature.You will be patting yourself on the back for this.

Reviews.Title: An excellent DIY security system with advanced features.
Reviews.Author: Harley Fan "RonCajun"
Reviews.Content: Very simple and easy setup. Works great so far. Did not activate monitoring service yet, waiting for family to get familiar with proper use of an alarm system; want to minimize false alarms.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: P. Vennam
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and pretty good customer service.No contracts was the best deal for me when compared to other systems.

Reviews.Title: Simllisafe deserves an A+
Reviews.Author: Herschel Riggan
Reviews.Content: Did my research on this company before  purchase and liked the high BB rating and other websites that rate security companies. I have had exceptional support from this company and the install was very easy. So far the equipment is functioning well and I expect it will continue to do so. All my questions were answered promptly with courtesy. The cost of the equipment was very reasonable so I was able to get more coverage. Highly recommend Simplisafe

Reviews.Title: a must have
Reviews.Author: grimlin
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing I ever bought for my home ... it was super easy to install and setup & the people at Simplisafe are friendly and helpful not to mention the price/coverage can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: The Name Says it All
Reviews.Author: kim harvey
Reviews.Content: I've recently purchased and installed the system and couldn't be happier.The purchase was made quick and easy and I was even given discounts for a couple of add on items that I decided to get a few days later. Customer service is great. And the free shipping had my system delivered to me in no time.My husband works many days out of town and happened to be gone when it arrived, so I did the install myself in about an hour. I probably could have had it in quicker but I was talking on the phone at the same time. By the way that's with 15 sensors in the system. The peel and stick is what made this possible. A few items I chose to use the screws that came with it on. The keypad was one. After all the hardware was installed I then quickly set up the online portion of the system. Tested it. And that was that. I cannot be happier with the way it went. Of course I cannot remark on the system monitoring portion of the product but if all else is any indication, I'm sure it will work like a champ if and when an alarm is ever triggered.Thank you so much Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Door Chime Feature
Reviews.Author: Leslie L.
Reviews.Content: We are replacing an older non-working security system.  The Simplisafe 2 security system has just as many functions as our older one did which is good.  The only item we wish could be purchased is something that would be located in the other end of our home that would allow the door chimes to be heard.  Having the door chime was a deciding factor in our purchase, and though there is that feature, it is not loud enough to hear at the opposite end of our home and we do not have a large home (1300 sw. feet).During installation, we noticed the ease of replacing our old system.  We would suggest though to use the screws especially the alarm as it is heavy.

Reviews.Title: great easy to use system
Reviews.Author: Bob Andolina
Reviews.Content: This is the second system I have purchased from Simplisafe. I have used them at two different houses and it has worked great. Easy to set up and has been very reliable.

Reviews.Title: True to its name--simple and safe!
Reviews.Author: EasternWater
Reviews.Content: The SImplisafe system is as simple as I can imagine. First, everything comes programmed so that all you need to do to install is to peel and stick. It would take about 20 minutes. Once done, you test it by pressing a couple of buttons. Viola--you now have your home protected! Second, you don't have to sign a contract but have the choice of having your home monitored without a contract If you do, the rate is very reasonable--$15 bucks for basic and $25 for a more elaborate service. I have yet to sign up and will try soon. Besides, due to the simplicity and the way the system is made, you could take it to your new home without hassle, as these units are just like your picture frames on the wall--on and off as you like it.I called Simplisafe for a couple of issues and every time I got very helpful and professional assistance. We all have the guts feeling about a company when we call and the my "guts" feeling about Simplisafe is that it is a serious company.I have checked quite a few such system on line and have talked with a DDT representative and found Simplisafe to be the best there is. I cannot imagine a more simple and yet functional system that charges reasonable rates for their service.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mr David L Robinson
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  The subscription is the cheapest I've found anywhere.Easy to set up; easy to use. Great customer support.  Couldn't be happier

Reviews.Title: Low-Cost Option for Home Security
Reviews.Author: Robert D Hopping
Reviews.Content: I was a customer of ADT for several decades and was satisfied, but not thrilled with their service.  When I moved recently I decided to look into SimpliSafe as a possible low cost replacement for my new home.  After ordering, receiving and installing the system I am completely happy with it.  Fortunately I have not had to opportunity to see it in action with a burglary or fire, but the equipment provided, although very lightweight, seems to be the equivalent of that provided by ADT in most cases.  Almost all of the system options associated with professionally installed systems are present and it cost me about 1/4 of what one of those systems would have.

Reviews.Title: Nice System
Reviews.Author: Scott Stewart
Reviews.Content: I've had a hard wired alarm for many years.  However, all an experienced thief had to do is disconnect the phone line on the outside of the house.  I am delighted with Simplisafe wireless system.  Very easy to install and I like getting text messages when I arm and disarm the system and of course if there is a break in.  I very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: The Faithful Prepper
Reviews.Content: We enjoy the safety that this systems provides and feel a little better each night since we have received it.  Easy to install and use.  Good Customer service

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is a great product.
Reviews.Author: David L. Chase
Reviews.Content: I'm no home repair expert by any means, but I installed all components with very little difficulty.  There were a couple of areas I needed to ask about and the staff at Simplisafe were very responsive and helpful.  I've only had the system a short time but from all indications, I would highly recommend it to you for safety, security and a really great price.

Reviews.Title: Good, honest value
Reviews.Author: Carol Hatler
Reviews.Content: I chose Simplisafe because of the cost and the flexibility of the system.  My package arrived within the stated timeframe and was easy to install and test.

Reviews.Title: I'm so happy I bought this system!
Reviews.Author: MarChar
Reviews.Content: I was paying $45/month to a different company for years. Now I am paying 14.99 for the same service only better!  I read in other reviews about poor customer support, but I had a couple to issues including a false alarm (which was my fault) and each time I had contact with them, they were nothing but helpful and pleasant.  And they do have 7 days per week support now, which was another issued mentioned by other reviewers.  The only reason I did not give them 5 stars is that the key pad numbers are not illuminated, so in the dark, you can't see them. I have to keep a flashlight handy in case I have to turn off the alarm at night. A small price to pay for such huge monthly savings!

Reviews.Title: East setup.
Reviews.Author: Edward Yonosik "Edbe"
Reviews.Content: Instructions were easy to follow and installing the sensors was simple.  Up and running in no time at all.  I would recommend this system to everyone looking for a security system.

Reviews.Title: Affordable peace of mind security system!
Reviews.Author: J from MI
Reviews.Content: Make sure you follow the directions and installation will be easy, the 72 hour hour period test period gives everyone in the household time to get accustomed to using the equipment. You can add more components as needed and best of all NO long term overpriced contracts! Only cost 14.99 per month for monitoring versus much more for other systems with alarm monitoring companies. You have to buy the equipment outright but it should pay for itself within a year compared to other companies like ADT and others. My only complaint is the alarm on the base is not very loud, if activated it can only be heard within your house, I got the 105 decibels alarm siren add on and now if the alarm goes off the whole neighborhood can hear it. I spent just over 400 dollars for everything and so far so good but it's only been a little over 3 weeks, will see after a year the durability of it.

Reviews.Title: The security system I always wanted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe delivers on both fronts. Easy to install, simple to configure, and their monitoring provides nearly instantaneous alerts. I strongly recommend this to anyone looking for a simple security system.

Reviews.Title: simple to install
Reviews.Author: andy miller
Reviews.Content: I wish the warning beeps were louder, and the warnings from the base station are very quiet,  I have to stand next to it to hear it.  it would be nice to be able to assign a ser number to a location,  but no big deal  I just wrote them down,  all and all a good simple system,  I may have missed it  but where do you get  and how much are the batteries

Reviews.Title: Try it
Reviews.Author: Burdetta Cunningham
Reviews.Content: I chose the system because it was wirless and I could install it.  Easy installaton and set-up.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Super happy
Reviews.Author: michael j bellizzi
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the product and service. A question I had regarding signs was promptly answered within a few hours. I would recommend this system to anyone looking to save BIG in the long run. Keep up the good work.Sincerely,Michael B.

Reviews.Title: A great choice
Reviews.Author: Dwight Berryman
Reviews.Content: It was time to replace our old Monotronics system and I was intrigued by the Simplisafe ads. The ordering was easy, the installation super easy and everything worked great when tested. I installed many extra sensors so my install was not small but everything worked great. I love the low monthly fee and not needing a home phone line. From ordering to the setup, everything is nicely described. The online event log is useful as well.I highly recommend the Simplisafe system.

Reviews.Title: Great Do it your self system
Reviews.Author: AlmostEverything84
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system because i wanted something that didn't need to be professionally installed linked with an outrageous monthly price. So far, a couple weeks, things have gone fine with the system. I have needed to buy an additional 3 entry sensors for windows but not a big deal. The best part about this unit is that you can keep adding to it at your own leisure.Pros:-do it yourself-no wires-cheap monthly serviceCons:-very basic-you are at the company's will for pricing. They can up the service fee tomorrow or next year and it would ruin the savings. It makes you think if they are trying to get you in with low hardware and than raise the service later on.-service plans are annoying laid out--i can't use the app unless i pay $10 more a month...

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: jim cagle
Reviews.Content: Had my system for a week now I feel secure leaving my home un-attended now, I was always worried while gone on business and away for work, my new system gives me piece of mind at a affordable rate, I know when my kids or housekeeper comes and go with their personal entry code, so far I give this system a 5 star rating.................

Reviews.Title: Super Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: EAM
Reviews.Content: System came pre-configured for all the components I purchased.  Very simple installation--peel and stick.  As long as I can remove it without damage to the walls (as SimpliSafe claims), I'll be very happy.  Unfortunately, won't know that for a few years.Works right out of the box.  Easy to program, and the most cost-efficient system out there that I could find.  No problems so far.4-stars because the entry sensors are bulky--no way to easily hide/conceal them.  When we bought our home, it had ADT sensors which are embedded in the door frame.  Fortunately, wife doesn't mind the looks as long as the home is secured.

Reviews.Title: recent problems
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R Smart
Reviews.Content: The siren went off silently and called police without calling me first.One entry sensor status has been in open state for >24hours

Reviews.Title: So so...
Reviews.Author: assaf nachshon
Reviews.Content: The concept is wonderful... simple...stick on sensors that are really easy to install.i have a few issues with the system:1. the base needs to be installed in an open area that has good cell reception. a traditional adt or brinks system can be hidden away in a closet. ... out of sight. this might pose a problem to some.2. if i understand this correctly, with the base package, you cannot track which sensors are open. for example: when the alarm is off and doors or sensors are open, the system simply says "1 sensor open"... but you don't know which one. if you have a small house, or only have 3 or 4 sensors, that's not a problem. If you have 20 sensors, it's a pain to run around the house and see which sensor is open.3. support. this is a problem. it's not 24/7. it's 9-6 EST. for people living out west, good luck racing home by 3 to get customer service.4. cost. often overlooked, but should be considered. most companies, like adt or brinks, will do anything to get you to buy their systems just to get you on the hook for the monthly fee forever. i've installed those systems in two other homes for less than half of what this system costs. yes, the monthly with simplisafe is significantly less, but i spent $700+ to buy the components...and i still had to install it myself.would love to hear how other people like/dislike this system.

Reviews.Title: My review.
Reviews.Author: Edna Higginbotham
Reviews.Content: The first night it wanted to connect with tec. all night. I finally disarmed it and called the next morn. After rebooting it , it seems to be working fine. so glad to have it. Edna Higginbotham

Reviews.Title: I like this home alarm system
Reviews.Author: Joseph Burzynski
Reviews.Content: This home alarm system is a great product. It does a great job of protecting  my apartment. I would recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Our new Simlisafe Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: V. Marshall
Reviews.Content: So far, so good! The  system was easy to order, easy to install, and easy to use.  We feel better now that the house is secured.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Booklvr
Reviews.Content: I ordered our alarm system from Simplisafe direct. The package came with in four days as stated. I had the system set up in about twenty minutes. Everything ran great except it would not make connection with the alsrm company. One phone call and it was fully up and running with in minutes. The customer service was fast, friendly and resolved the issue right away. We have been using the alarm system now for about two weeks and no problems.The moble app works great and we have had no problems. We did shut off the blue light and voice promts on the base unit. We work differnt hours and kept waking up to the voice prompt. This was easily done on the simplisafe web site.Hopefully we never have to find out how good it will work but it does give my wife peace of mind. Now if only my 84 Yogo would work as good.

Reviews.Title: It works fine, but it’s best to have a computer handy for custom settings
Reviews.Author: Armin A. Wolff "arminw"
Reviews.Content: I chose this wireless alarm system primarily for its ease of installation and the fact that it does not have to be permanently built into the house, but can be uninstalled easily and taken to another residence. Since we are planning to move soon, I have not yet activated the central monitoring service. We are using to the system right now in local mode. I have tested it and it is definitely plenty loud just with the sound emanating from its central base station unit. Unless you are known to have Fort Knox like treasure or the Hope diamond in your house, any burglar is likely to leave very quickly and go and try their trade in a quieter location. I have two extra sirens on order to regale the neighbors in case a potential intruder is crazy enough to endure that sound.  The neighbors will hopefully call the police if for nothing more than two shut up that noisy alarm.The original system I purchased came with an extra door sensor which I have not activated, but somehow the central control unit thought it should be there. Therefore it flashed an error on the keypad module. It took me a while to figure out why that was the case. The key-fob USB plugged into my Mac running OS 10.9.2 did NOT work at all,(that is why only four stars) but it did work just fine when that same Mac was booted on a HD with OS 10.6.8. It also worked on a Windows XP virtual machine running under OS 10.9.2 on that same Mac which is how I eventually ended up programming the system to eliminate the error and change some other settings. After any change in programming is made using the USB key-fob, it is VERY important to synchronize those changes with the central unit by plugging the USB key-fob into the main unit. Programming the system with the keypad entry module is awkward and difficult, but it can be done with  patience. Using a computer is orders of magnitude easier.

Reviews.Title: what are you waiting for?
Reviews.Author: E. Kiernan
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and use. Can't beat it for the price, not like some of the junk you find on the net. So far very reliable and provides great peace of mind. Would recommend this system to anyone looking for an affordable and reliable security system.

Reviews.Title: Simple and grrrreate!
Reviews.Author: jinsoo kim
Reviews.Content: I have a small shop and I keep some very precious stuffs in there.  They are not like money but you know...Since I set up simplisafe with mobile service, even though it's the basic basic one, I feel peaceof mind sooo much!I would love this device.

Reviews.Title: SimpliAwsome
Reviews.Author: James Dillingham
Reviews.Content: Timely delivery, masterly intuitive, quick & easy install, unobtrusive, no contracts or hidden fees, we love it!!! Provides real peace of mind.  Call back from monitoring center prompt and courteous.

Reviews.Title: alarm system
Reviews.Author: Michael O'Connor
Reviews.Content: this was an awesome purchase.  i recently purchased simplisafe for my brand new home, which was not prewired for an alarm system.  the installation and system setup were easy to do, and simplisafe had a great video for me to watch.  The sensor adhesives made it easy to play a sensor and have the ability to move the sensor without leaving holes in the wall or door.  i would highly recommend this system to anyone

Reviews.Title: Simply wonderful.
Reviews.Author: Ed Healey
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery, easy setup, support was there  when I needed it. easy to use coming in or going out. Good product would highly recommend. Perfect for us with no monthly fees.

Reviews.Title: Home Security made easy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was able to install and test this wireless home security system in about 1 hour. It took that long because I carefully unwrapped and studied the components and install procedure first, then did the actual install. Once I started actually installing the components, I was able to install each unit and test them as I progressed. After logging in on line to my Simplisafe account, I enrolled in the active monitoring service and received confirmation that I was registered in under 2 hours! Quick, easy, and secure! One nice feature is that the monitoring service does not become active for 72 hours after registering. That way, we were able to test and trigger alarms without concern before going LIVE!

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with your alarm
Reviews.Author: Donna Lish-Brown
Reviews.Content: I think it is the best deal for an alarm system, we all want to feel safe in our homes and protect our selves and our property, Kudos!

Reviews.Title: Simpli- fantastic
Reviews.Author: Raymond Kobliski
Reviews.Content: this is the best system on the market for home use bar none.  Try and find a system that lets you the end-user configure your system the way you want it.  Self install it the best install..  Had one of the other systems and spent twice as must for only 1/3 the coverage.....

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Simply Good!!
Reviews.Author: Vito22
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  We wanted a simple system, and SimpliSafe appears to be the ticket.  The staff is informed, knowledgeable, and very helpful.  The product arrived quickly, came with good instructions, and was easily installed.  I installed 11 sensors, a siren, and the control pad in about 30 minutes.  I am very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: Cost Effective
Reviews.Author: J. Davis "jwd"
Reviews.Content: Installed 2 systems in my homes. I have found the quality to be good out of the box and long term. 1 tower wireless transmitter had to be exchanged - S/Safe helped me determine this as I knew my original system (traded in upgrade) had performed without problems for a year.Other:The monitoring service has been very satisfactory and the on-line alarm "history" is great on trips to see who has entered  (those with unique pass codes) and any power outages while away from the area.Very good motion detector which cover large areas of the interior. The low priced Water Detector is a must for a below grade basement or upstairs water heater or washer catch pans! The 41 degree F low temp sensor is also essential if away from home in cold Wx.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Scores 100
Reviews.Author: Ralph Matile
Reviews.Content: The easiest, most well thought out, customizable wireless security system I've seen....thanks....Perfect for our needs.Totally happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Simple and Helps Keep You Safe
Reviews.Author: usaca01
Reviews.Content: User friendly installation and operation and a reasonable monthly monitoring fee without the burden of a contract. Portable Kit can be expanded as needed!  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Super Easy
Reviews.Author: Michael Basner
Reviews.Content: Best and cheapest alarm system I have ever purchased, blows ADT garbage and sales tactics out of the water. Took twenty minutes to install and set up and works like a champ.

Reviews.Title: Got the Best Security System with SImpliSafe!
Reviews.Author: samuel sims
Reviews.Content: I needed a dependable yet affordable security system with monitoring for a building that's keeps getting vandalized and broken into. So I began searching online and I could not believe SimpliSafe could be as good as it sounded, I kept going back reviewing their site and decided to purchase it. I have been 100% satisfied and its just so easy to do it yourself! My Dads health is not good and he likes to go work around the building by himself and I constantly worried. Now thank you SimpliSafe !! He has a panic button and the alarm which keeps me posted by internet on when he gets there and leaves and if there is a problem I receive a text and immediately security calls me! Thank You so much for a peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Harveyvicky2006
Reviews.Content: After many months looking for a DIY system I chose SimpliSafe. I ordered it on Thursday and received it Friday afternoon. Set up took me about one hour, the only problem I had I could not get the extra alarm to pair with the system. I called customer service and in a couple of minutes the alarm was working. Since I didn't want the monitoring  service I had them down load the software to eliminate the flashing blue light and the voice prompt, it's done right over the phone.So far customer service was excellent. I will update in the future after I have more time using the system

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe up and Running.
Reviews.Author: Elaine Ferguson
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe is simply the best home security system out there. Great customer service, easy installation and a tech service even on Sunday if you have a question. Many packages to choose from or add items to fit your personal needs of your home. Great buy, I am very happy with mine.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: stevedp86
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to install. I have sensors on all my doors and most of my windows. Like not being in a 3 year contract.I have a 30 lb dog and I tested the motion sensor while I was at work using the "no alarm, text message only" feature. So if he set it off I would just get a text message. Eventually I had to turn the motion detector upside down for him not to trigger the sensor.Few things missing:1. Camera (assuming that is in the pipeline)...this is a must2. On the Key Ring...You can disable the "Panic" button, or disable all the buttons...however I would like to disable the "Off" button. Seems like if someone steals your keys you could be in trouble. You don't need to enter the code when pressing off.3. On the iPhone/iPad app you should be able to control everything like you can on the website...changing alarm settings etc...I have an iPad mounted on my wall to control other things in my house. Also, I would like to use the app as another Key Pad, however, you don't have to enter your pin code EVERY time you enter the app...just the first time. So someone could walk in and go to simplisafe (which is already open in the background) and press "Off".I get a little nervous that the sensors might fall because they're only using command strips...but you do have the option of drilling them in...which I haven't gotten around too.All around very good value...just needs some security updates (key ring....steal keys...press off with no code, iPhone/iPad app only input pin code once) and cameras.But you can't beat $25 a month for live monitoring.

Reviews.Title: A great alarm system and easy to install
Reviews.Author: KenLR
Reviews.Content: The Simplisafe alarm system is exactly what we needed.  I followed the directions on the usb drive, and installation was completed in about 2 hours.  There were a couple of locations where I chose to use the provided screws. I have a shed about 60 feet from the house and did not think the Command strips would last due to temps.  The great thing was the sensor worked that far away.  I called the customer service on a Saturday, and they answered my question.  Everyone I have dealt with at Simplisafe has been polite and courteous.  I have been referring my friends to Simplisafe, not for the free monitoring, but to help them save money each month on their current alarm system.  I will be buying another system for my daughter's house soon.

Reviews.Title: Piece of mind
Reviews.Author: Gonzo
Reviews.Content: Awaome got one for my daughter because she got burgerized  She feels safe and I feel better I like  it eazy and reasonable for the monthly fee.  I realy like it just got one for me I didn't want the 24 hour monatoring so I use it as an alarm bought the extra siren which is so dam loud.  Good stuff

Reviews.Title: Easy to customize, install, use
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Dave Ramsey endorses this security provider - that says allot about the quality and value of the company and service.If you are in the market for a self-install pay-as-you-go monitoring security system, this is the best on the market.I'd like to see the website give more advice/guidance on how to create a home security system tailored to your specific needs.But it really is as simple as ordering your system, installing it yourself in a very short period of time, and moving on with your life with greater peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: James L. Sturgeon
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 17 piece Ultimate Security System. It arrived promptly and with easy to understand instructions. I was able to install the system in less than an hour. I did call customer service with a question concerning the removal of one of the sensors from the system, they were very helpful. I would recommend this system to everyone.

Reviews.Title: The best Alarm System self-managed (monitored as an option) in the market!
Reviews.Author: Filipe T. Miranda "fmiranda"
Reviews.Content: Every component works wireless, very easy to install, setup, extend, and use.I would always have redundant components to secure you house, like motion sensors, glass break sensors, windows sensors, doors sensors and an extra siren!Monitoring (Police and Firefighters) can be activated anytime easily through Simplisafe website.The only drawback is the size of the sensors, nowdays we have technology to make sensors small and accurate, but they still bulky and dont care about its look.

Reviews.Title: New to home security systems
Reviews.Author: Mary Borland
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with Simplisafe and the system seems to be working just as it should be. Customer service is great but it is easier to e mail them and they get right back to you versus calling and leaving a message. We did have to contact them to get a different chip for the cellular service as they sent T mobile and only verizon works in our area but they were prompt in sending this and it is working just great now!

Reviews.Title: The company name says it all!
Reviews.Author: captain crunch
Reviews.Content: Like other posts and videos, set up is a breeze.  I had to contact tech support with issues getting a cell connection with the T-mobil cell that is shipped installed in the base station.  The support was excellent.  No wait, very professional.  Tech needed to swap out the cell for a verizon, which theyfed x to me at no cost.  Swap out instructions was easy.  Overall, i'm very satisfied.  I deducted one star for having this technical issue occurr.  They should provide the customer options at order, not to wait for failures due to poor T-mobil coverage areas.I ordered this direct instead of AMazon and it took approx 8 days for delivery.  I'm spoiled with my "Prime" service of 2 days!Simpisafe also added 2wks. Free monitoring due to my technical delay.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Dan Goodman
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly. Even I could set the system up in an hour after watching videos. Support personnel are wonderful. I was shorted a motion sensor in the original box I received and they sent another one right away, no questions! Come to find out they had included an extra door/window sensor in the original box by error. I would strongly recommend this security system. The only problem I have is remembering to turn it off and on.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mike Whorton
Reviews.Content: I choose this system because of a need, but the review and those indorsing it was very impressive as well. The set up and support was easy and very helpful. I would defiantly suggest this to family and friends. I'm also looking to purchase more systems for other locations. Thank you Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Great system!
Reviews.Author: Susan R. Braverman "Herstorian"
Reviews.Content: I love the way that you can customize your system and control the settings online (if you subscribe to the online monitoring)..

Reviews.Title: Easy and manageable!
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I got the basic package since I live in an apartment. It arrived very quickly after I ordered it and it was very easy to install and it's simple to manage. I will probably add a smoke detector and carbon monoxide detector for extra security but just the basic package makes me feel safer, especially when my pets are home alone. I'd definitely recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: EASY TO INSTALL!!!
Reviews.Author: DARRYL
Reviews.Content: Likes: Easy to install, simple to armed. No monthly contractsDislike: Wish all sounds came from key pad and not the base unit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent alarm system
Reviews.Author: W. Hoover
Reviews.Content: This system is flexible and simple to install and setup.  It is well made and provides an extra layer of security for home or apartment at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: M Morgan
Reviews.Content: It's been a week, everything works as promised.  Phone support was excellent for a quick question.  They even followed up to make sure everything was okay.  The system status email notifications are great. Installation was as easy as peel and stick.

Reviews.Title: Definitely a smooth and easy installation ....
Reviews.Author: Warren Carnell
Reviews.Content: Everything worked out as promised ... It is easy after you take the time to consider where, in your home, will be the best location for the assorted components ...You CAN do this....5 stars

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Security
Reviews.Author: Silverlady
Reviews.Content: I heard it as recommended on Rush Limbaugh's radio show.  Noticed other approvals by noted companies so tried it.  Easy to install and great price.  Works well since installing it and feel more confident when leaving the home with security.  Customer service has been excellent.  Would recommend it especially to home owners not wanting to spend high dollars on a security system and a choice of having or not having a monthly contract fee with the company.

Reviews.Title: I feel very secure.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Punchello
Reviews.Content: My children bought this for me after the death of my husband. They installed and set it up in one afternoon.  I have successfully used it without a problem.  It is easy to use and remember.  The system talks, uses sound as a reminder and shows words on a screen. When I open a door, there is a sound to remind me to turn off or reset the level of protection in the system. I can turn off the system outside with a remote attached to my house key.  With keypads at all the outside doors, I can turn it on or off easily. There is plenty of time to set the alarm for "away" mode and close the door without risking setting off the alarm.  I would recommend and have recommended the Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System.  Barbara

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: Chris Bolduc
Reviews.Content: Simple to set upWorks as advertisedall product arrived in tact and in ordergood priceonly negative, could be louder siren, but am satisfied enough to purchase additional louder siren that they also sell.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dave SKiles
Reviews.Content: This is the easiest thing I have ever done! This system is simple to install and there was no running of wires! No contract or pushy salesman! Instructions are easy to read and understand! Great product! Can set or unset my system with my iPhone from anywhere! Get text messages when system is set or unset! This is the perfect security system!

Reviews.Title: So happy with my first I bought a second.
Reviews.Author: George Tucker Gwaltney
Reviews.Content: This is my second Simpli Safe system. I installed the first in a second residence a couple of years ago and have been very satisfied. I have an ADT system in my primary residence (for 6 years) and have been happy with that as well. By switching to Simpli Safe at my primary residence, I can eliminate my land line and reduce my monthly monitoring fee from $34. to $15. I will recoup the cost of the Simpli Safe system in less than 5 months.  No issues with false alarms and in the few instances I inadvertantly triggered the alarm, I received a call immediately. The cell response is definitely quicker than the land line.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is the bomb!
Reviews.Author: Leslie S. Lovelace
Reviews.Content: After suffering a nasty break-in, we knew it was time to invest in a home security system.  I researched a number of systems, but kept coming back to SimpliSafe.  Wasted time looking around that could have been saved by purchasing the SimpliSafe system the first time I heard Rush Limbaugh talking about it.  Had I done that, there would never have been a break-in.I installed all the components for two floors and had the system up and running in under an hour.  Ordered additional components that were overlooked on the original order, and we are feeling better and better about keeping our property and ourselves completely safe.Went to add a component to the system the other day and less than a minute after putting the system into "test" mode, I received a call from the monitoring center letting me know they received our test signal.  What a deal!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Guruprasad Narayanaswamy
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and happy with the customer support and their constant follow ups.Only downside is, it does not allow you to rename the sensors with basic monitoring service.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Wanda Martin
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  10 miles from the nearest city but the system got us into coverage with local fire/police department.  Much cheaper in the long run.

Reviews.Title: Simplsafe2 Wireless Home Security System (8-piece Plus Package)
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Pros:It's VERY easy to setup and learn to use. I had it up and going in less than an hour.I like that components can be added as my budget allows and I don't have to wait for a technician to come and install them for me.I like that you have the choice to pay for the monitoring service and the levels of service can be increased or decreased at any time. I'd consider upgrading for a month while I was on vacation to have the interactive monitoring while the house sitter was staying at my place. The SMS alerts and remote control via a smartphone could come in handy for someone not used to dealing with an alarm system. And for the paranoid types - the secret alerts would let you know if they were snooping around the house and opening drawers or closets that they have no reason to be in. ;)I like the key chain fob with the off/away/panic buttons. It's great to be able to disarm the system when your hands are full instead of trying to rush to the panel and enter your pin number. The key chain fob would also be great with anyone with health/mobility issues. It is extremely light to keep on your person in case of an emergency at home.Cons:Motion sensors picked up my 2 cats even though they are under 30 pounds (combined) and more than 5 feet away from the sensor so I had to move it to an less effective area.Included alarm is very, very weak. I'm going to have to add the extra loud siren if I want anyone outside my apartment to even notice.I live on the 2nd floor so the included window sensors are fine for my needs. 1st floor windows definitely would need the glass break sensors since thieves are more likely to smash a window than spending the time to pry it open.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install & setup & works great with the phone app
Reviews.Author: Lou G.
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this system to anyone as it's easy to configure or change, works exactly as described and hoped and customer service was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Simplsafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package
Reviews.Author: Keith Moore
Reviews.Content: This system is everything as advertised and recommended by a friend.  I also checked on-line reviews and found other excellent comments, plus one video showing the ease of installation and great results.  The cost was very reasonable, and the monthly monitoring fee is also very reasonable for the coverage provided.  With a monthly credit on my homeowner insurance premium, the net monitoring cost is less than $10/month.  I like the wireless system and the battery back-up.  I can't think of a more simple and effective way to make a residence secure.  Another positive feature of the system is that no contract is required.  My system has only been in operation for 10 days, but it has been very easy adjusting to it.  No false alarms so far!  Hats off to Simplisafe!

Reviews.Title: Great value and monitoring
Reviews.Author: Rev James Pierce
Reviews.Content: All the components came in one box, and we easily installed them ourselves. Whenever we put the system on test, there was a phone call from someone monitoring us to tell us they received the notification. When I added a unit (for glass breakage) and didn't list it correctly online, the next time I put the system on for the night, I received an error message and was able to change it myself. Great value, fast monitoring, and easy self-installation, too!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Tony Haberman
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with the home security system we purchased. It was very simple to install, and we feel good to have our home monitored at such a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Best investment yet!
Reviews.Author: Douglas Brace
Reviews.Content: After owning simplisafe security system for a couple weeks I am hard-pressed to find anything I don't like about it. One of many things I love about simplisafe is it is wireless; meaning you can take it with you if you move since it is wireless and not hard-wired. My favorite feature is that 24/7 monitoring is a third of the price of competitors and is optional instead of compulsory like ADT. For a DIY such as myself installation and setup was a breeze. I also love that the system can be expanded with up to 41 sensors depending on your needs.  I can rest easy knowing that simplisafe is on the job at home and away!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with my system. It was easy to install and test all of the equipment. I plan to expand my system with additional add units in the near future.

Reviews.Title: We are very pleased
Reviews.Author: Sue Hartman
Reviews.Content: At first we were overwhelmed as we are not tech savvy and that is just us but every time we needed help, everyone was patient, supportive and explained things well and they were a phone call away. We did this at a time when we were overwhelmed by many other things. It really is a simple system to install and we are very happy with how easy it is to use. One big factor for the two of us , is that the emergency dispatcher tries to get in touch with us before sending out fire or police. We are both firemen and the false calls get tiresome eevn though understandable. But we really appreciate this feature.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: JJbad "JJbad"
Reviews.Content: I have had my Simplisafe alarm system for a month or so now and I really, really love this thing. We have placed panic buttons throughout the house and set up "text only" motion sensors so we can tell when the kids are in places they shouldn't be ;o) I had seen the review of this system on CNET but I didn't end up buying it until two of our friends bought it and said they loved it. Since then I have passed the information on to two of my friends who both bought a system. I just ordered three of the glass breakage sensors today and an extra panic button. My wife thought it would be nice to have a panic button by the shower ;o) We have not yet accidentally set off the alarm yet so I can't say how well it is being monitored but from all the reviews I have read I don't think it will be a problem. The setup is super, super easy. Love being able to monitor the system via the app. Would definitely buy again. Also saved $81 a year off our homeowners insurance. That's like getting 3 free months of monitoring itself at the $24.99 monitored price we chose.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Albert E Porter
Reviews.Content: Very Easy to Install.  Flexibility available for monitoring responses. Due to our difficulty in taking calls the call center can call me instead of authorities leaving the decision to call the authorities up to me and leave a message in any given circumstance removing false alarms and that is sufficient for my needs.  Good Range.

Reviews.Title: So far very happy
Reviews.Author: Maile Hemm
Reviews.Content: I purchased part of the system here and the other half on their website; to find the best cost for us. Our house isn't very big and this is also our first "home security" system. I like that we can expand the system like adding smoke and CO  detectors etc. The sticky back does stick moderately well, and if you use the screws make sure you have a Size #1 Philip screwdriver or even smaller. Google it. Out of the box everything worked even the used system I purchased. Note: make sure you have a laptop or PC with a USB port, at first I was pissed because there was no paper manual... Well the first thing to do new buyers is plug in the keychain to your computer... They will guide you step by step. I didnt know that at first. Both of us use the phone app to arm and disarm the system but note... You need to set up a $26 monthly to have all features; you can pay less for less features... And there is no annual contract and startup fees; just yet. Overall I've been telling everyone about this system and now with a newborn I feel better knowing our family has some monitoring system in case of an emergency.

Reviews.Title: Best value in home security !
Reviews.Author: Firestation 6
Reviews.Content: After considering other systems,I chose Simplisafe  and have been satisfied so far.Easy to set up and customize for your home.Customer service is top notch.I would recommend this system to others.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic, flexible and easy to setup
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I have always been skeptical of security products but I took a chance on this one due to the good reviews and customer support in the forums.  The system is easy to setup and very flexible.  I have since expanded my system several times (adding sensors is addictive!).  I have had my system for 6 months so far.  The only issue I have had is motion sensors that were a bit too sensitive.  Fortunately the sensors have several sensitivity settings so I was able to configure them appropriately.  Please read all the directions as they have great advice and where to setup each sensor.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Review
Reviews.Author: Rosalie Redard
Reviews.Content: Just installed the product.  Even though it looks like you get 2 keychain remote (one free), you only get one.  The door sensors are rather large and bulky and the keypad buttons are small and there is no backlight or light that stays on the keypad when it is armed.  The small buttons are a problem as I live with a vision impaired person who won't be able to use it.  I put Velcro on the keychain button to identify the off button, because those buttons are very small too. Installation was easy and everything seem to work the first time.  Have not had any false alarms and haven't had to talk to tech. help yet, though I know their hours are EST and not available to me after 6pm.

Reviews.Title: easy set up, easy control, easy monitoring
Reviews.Author: M. Williams
Reviews.Content: all other security services require installation by technician.  This security service not only provides a do-it-yourself way but is cheaper, has mobile control, and is modular.  That is it can be expanded at any time.  I am truly impressed.

Reviews.Title: Greatest home security system
Reviews.Author: N/a
Reviews.Content: Easy to  install , easy to operate , very fare monthly price, I think this is no. 1  security system for home

Reviews.Title: The best and easiest alarm setup ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Vivi
Reviews.Content: It was pretty easy to set up and call them to activate it. The company is very professional and always very helpful. I spoke to a few different agents and got great help!!! I would recommend them to everyone! We ordered several more parts to add to the alarm and it all came programmed together. Wonderful. We feel safe!

Reviews.Title: get this one
Reviews.Author: kevin mccarthy
Reviews.Content: extremely easy to set up, works well, no contract, affordable, what more can you ask for  Best deal going IMO

Reviews.Title: Great system and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Gray Miller
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to switch security systems after having our monthly fees keep going up with the security company that we had been with for almost 20 years.  They offered to lower our monthly fee, but it was too little too late.  I heard Simplisafe advertised on the radio and checked them out on the web.  I called them and they answered all my questions and assured me there were no hidden fees.  We purchased the Master plan and installed it ourselves.  It was just as easy as they say it is to install.  We now have better security and lower our monthly costs by $33.00  One of the great benefits of the system is that if you move you simply take all the components with you and install it at your new home.  Very satisfied so far. Highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Evaluation of SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Amazon shopper
Reviews.Content: Initially we had a problem with the base transmitter.  We called Support and within minutes, they analyzed the problem and determined that we needed a new card to access excellent 24/7 wireless transmission in our area..  Perfect transmission ever since. Great technical Support Service.  Quick telephone response to our questions.  Very friendly Customer Service.  Quick response via text/email whenever system is armed in the away or home mode.  Would highly recommend SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Just what the doctor ordered.
Reviews.Author: John Paul Zavacki
Reviews.Content: Complete, easy to install, easier still to program, it does EXACTLY what is say it'll do and the price is the best I could find, and I comparison shop obsessively.just a fantastic deal in every way. I highly recommend SimpliSafe.-JPZ

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Super easy to install and I figured out how to operate the system easily...  the informational materials are all very clear and I have received many offers for additional assistance from customer service (fortunately, though, I really don't need anything because it is that straightforward).  Provides lots of peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: safe in the Boonies
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Meadows
Reviews.Content: We live in the country eleven miles from the sheriff.  There have been break-ins in our area.  I sleep with a .38 Colt revolver at my elbow, but we wanted certain warning of a break-in.  Our son has a huge house in Indianapolis and loves his Simplisafe system, so we decided to get one too.  We love it.  It is affordable and self-installed very simply.  We have a shop and barn also with valuable tools and saddles in them.  The Simplisafe system in the house is powerful enough to encompass both barn and shop.  The monthly monitoring charge is extremely reasonable.  We are very happy with our system and feel much safer because of it.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Jay D. Mcclellan
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two systems so far and installed the first one in my daughters new home last weekend.  It couldn't have been much easier and within a very short time we had all the doors, windows and motion detectors, sensors and siren mounted.  The remote key fob was also quickly programmed and we were done! It's nice when something is as advertised and so far I couldn't be happier or more impressed.  This weekend I will install the second system. SimpliSafe is simply easy and I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: works perfectly
Reviews.Author: robin turner
Reviews.Content: We installed our simplisafe effortlessly - very skeptical it would work - been working flawlessly since installed. So glad we found simplisafe! The APP for your smartphone is great for checking your system wherever you may be.

Reviews.Title: Finally, someone gets it
Reviews.Author: Ted Wachholz
Reviews.Content: We couldn't be more pleased with our SimpliSafe Home Security System. It was a snap to install and config the system, and it was at a price point that was reasonable. We also like the ability to add different alarms as our needs require. The strength of the wireless system is good, too, as we have our water alert installed in our crawl yet it talks perfectly to the base station on our main level. No wires, we love it!

Reviews.Title: Great security, great value
Reviews.Author: FuLl Of $waG ®©
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a home security system for some time, but didn't want to be locked into a contract. Simplisafe provided the product I wanted at a lower monthly rate than the other guys, AND no contract!  Perfect!  Ordering, installation and start up were easy as pie and the system has worked perfectly. I am totally satisfied and I tell everyone I meet about Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Perfect simple system!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Joliet
Reviews.Content: Simple, fast and easy. No contract. Exactly what I needed and no extra BS. Great decision! I wish I wouldn't have waited so long.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to fulfil my order
Reviews.Author: pengolfhunt
Reviews.Content: Determining requirements was easier than we thought and shipment came quickly.  everything went in easily and it is all working.  we feel quite secure now -- thanks paul and anna

Reviews.Title: Great system!
Reviews.Author: gadget guy "gadget guy"
Reviews.Content: Just installed it several weeks ago. Had another security system for 25yrs. This one is easier to use, easy to self-install, and can be accessed by your smart phone, and easily armed and disarmed with a supplied key fob. And, more reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: C R Griffin
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my purchase of the Simplisafe alarm system.The sensors seem to be of good quality and installation and testing was a breeze.I would have given a 5 star rating if not for the fact that the glass break sensors were not listed on the web site order sheet. I had to call Simplisafe and complete my order by phone. this delayed my installation by 3 days.I would recommend this system for anyone in the market for a self-installed alarm system.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy it but our house already has it...
Reviews.Author: Fijibound
Reviews.Content: Buying a house that has one of these installed. Showed up for the inspection, and the back door was wide open so went inside. Motion sensor triggered the alarm, police showed up 10 minutes later.We will be keeping, and expanding, our Simplisafe system.10 stars.

Reviews.Title: Lost connectivity several times.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Martz
Reviews.Content: System was easy to install. I would have given it 5 stars but seems to loose connectivity a lot for no reason.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine
Reviews.Author: Robert Thoma
Reviews.Content: Only have had it for a short time but it seems to be working fine. Easy to install and setup.Do not subscribe to service but will probably get it soon. Only problem is with keychainremote. The USB cover keeps coming off when you have it in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kelsey
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is a wonderful system! Easy to install . Simple straightforward directions and works great. Very happy with our purchase

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: PastChief
Reviews.Content: Just got started with our new security system. Installation of components fairly went smoothly. I like the cellular connection idea of the base. It took about an hour and a half to get all sensors mounted and tested with the base. Hoping that the central monitoring service works out as well, as the system components so far.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Marion Strong
Reviews.Content: I have some questions which I will explore later. I am well satisfied with performance so far. I experienced a motion censorepisode which I can't determine the source. I have the motion censers as high or higher than recommended but my smallSchnauser (18lbs) apparently tripped it. I plan to install the censor higher (7 ft.) to avoid  the dog setting it off.

Reviews.Title: Why I like it
Reviews.Author: Wayne Reeves
Reviews.Content: The system is what I wanted and will serve my purpose. it was wireless and similar to a previous one I owned which become out dated. I would rate it a four.Easy to install.Easy to use menu.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Abbott
Reviews.Content: I own a rental property management company and had been looking for a security solution for the properties I manage.  The ease of set-up, the ability to move the systems from one site to another, the friendly customer support and sales staff, and the quality of the equipment are all excellent.  I definitely recommend this company and it's products to anyone looking for a good security system.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up price competitive
Reviews.Author: Amir Beganovic
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to set up up and use.  Don't see any downside when compared to higher priced products.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: kenneth nowak
Reviews.Content: Excellent alarm system! Easy to install and no contract!  Would recommend this alarm system to anyone. 100 percent satisfied with customer service.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2
Reviews.Author: JTWJR
Reviews.Content: I would recommend Simplisafe2 very easy to install and set up. I have some problem with the app on my Samsung phone but that mite be the phone. I like the wireless in home and to the monitoring service. I have had some small glitches but not to bad. I have only had it for a mouth. My dog or cat set off the motion sensor and the alarm company called me so I know it works but I can't used the motion sensor with the pets loose. I also like the price of the monitoring service and that there is no contract (2-3YRS ).

Reviews.Title: Love SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is super easy to set up and works just as it says! The best part is monitoring cost and no contract! My wife and I love it! This is a great product! Customer service is also great!

Reviews.Title: Feel safe and comfortable
Reviews.Author: norque
Reviews.Content: easy to install,: like the wireless basis for the system: like the $24.99 monthly monitoring fee with no contract or further  obligation.: like the quality of the individual components: like the ability to use my smart phone for remote access.: like the email and /or sms contact from from the home system regarding various states of monitoring.: like the purchase prices of various packages and/or accessories: like the idea that by purchasing  Simplisafe, I'm not going to be overwhelmed with all kinds of "extras," sales pitches and  pressures to do  this or that!had an occasion to call customer service and found them to be VERY professional and willing and able to assist

Reviews.Title: THIS IS REALLY GOOD
Reviews.Author: RLJPE
