Reviews.Content: EASY TO INSTALL AND SETUP. THE FIRST TIME COST FOR EQUIPMENT ANDTHE MONTHLY RATE ARE VERY REASONABLE. WE ARE MONITORING TWO OUT BUILDINGS AND THE HOUSE WITH THIS PLUS PACKAGE. BY THE WAY, IF YOU LEAVE A STANDARD POODLE (50#) YOU WILL GET A CALL BECAUSE OF THE ULTRASONIC ALARM...

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: AP21
Reviews.Content: To date, the system performs as expected.  Setup was extremely fast and easy.  There were, however, two minor issues that I am working through now.  The base of my system had a pre-installed T-Mobile card (meaning it uses T-Mobile cell towers to communicate).  Unfortunately T-Mobile's coverage in my area is practically non-existent.  I called Simplisafe's customer service which promptly overnight a new Verizon card for me to install.The second issue is the pulsating blue light on the base.  When the alarm is armed for the night, the base pulses a bright blue light....it looks like club night in Ibiza.  I would have expected the base light to not be as conspicuous as it is.  My solution so far has been to put the base in a closet with a closed door.

Reviews.Title: Excellent home security system
Reviews.Author: Chet Jarman
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe2 was easy to install and the parts I did not understand were easily taken care of by customer service.  This is the first home security system I have ever owned and so far I have been very pleased with the quality and ease of use.  I have recommended this system to a friend and he will be purchasing one soon.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Bret
Reviews.Content: The system was very easy to install and seems to work very well when in the testing mode.  Also, being able to remotely set with a smart phone is a huge bonus.

Reviews.Title: so easy and so far so good
Reviews.Author: jennefer rossi
Reviews.Content: just installed and we are so pleased easy to install less that 20 min. instruction lead you through easy steps and you are done. will recommend

Reviews.Title: Easy home alarm setup
Reviews.Author: Deborah Hall
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to install and works great. We are disappointed that the alarm is not loud. We can stand next to it and it is not ear-piercing like another system we had. Don't think the alarm would scare off an intruder.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: I love my life "RDH"
Reviews.Content: Peel, stick and activate....it's as easy as that. As a single mom it allows me to have an added sense of security for me while at home and away. I highly recommend Simplisafe 2.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Duffy
Reviews.Content: Don't let the word "simple" make you think this is cheaply made.  The technology is right on, customer service is great.  Fully customizable to fit your needs.  All for much less of a monthly fee than anywhere else.  No contract required.  Had to swap out the T-mobile chip for Verizon to get a better signal.  Even that was simple.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: William Fortier
Reviews.Content: Arrived quick was all there simple install exceeded my expectation I will recommend to friends. The quality of the components surprised me.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe for Safety
Reviews.Author: Sandra Scholl
Reviews.Content: We have only had this system for approximately 2 weeks and find it to be very assuring.  We have spoken to the main headquarters for some answers to questions that we have had and they walked us right through the situations.  The keychain is very sensitive and we chose not to use it on our person.  We are afraid to set it off unintentionally, of course!  But we do feel very secure since we installed it.  It was very easy to install and can't understand why others do not get a self installing system instead of paying more for the installation.  That blows our mind!  We are planning on buying each of our children these systems for their Christmas gift or possibly earlier.  If you have any doubt about purchasing this, I wouldn't hesitate.  After all, if you are not pleased, you will be refunded.  What do you have to lose?

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and easy to install
Reviews.Author: IT Guru
Reviews.Content: It really didn't take long to install the sensors.  It does take 72 hours for the system to become active though.  Also, the yard sign doesn't come with a stick to put it on.  We had to go to costco to pick up a metal stick so we could stick it in the ground.  That should have been included.  Otherwise, everything worked well and was well packaged.It took a minute to figure out that I needed to put the system into test mode in order to see if the sensors all were working.  That should probably be on a piece of paper included in the box.I am very happy with the system and the service.  You can't beat the price.  We compared against 5 other companies and Simplisafe made the most sense of all of them.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Den Morris
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Seems very efficient. Hope we never have to face ultimate test. We feel secure with the system.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing
Reviews.Author: Scott Brown
Reviews.Content: I love my Simplisafe alarm system.  When I first installed the unit, the base center was not communicating with the keypad.  I called customer service, and the associate tried several trouble shooting options.  When nothing worked, she sent me a base center with a Verizon cell signal.  The alarm system is now working great!  I love that you can customize the system by using the usb on the keychain.  I have wanted an alarm system for years, but did not want to sign a contract.  This is exactly what I was looking for.  I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Still looking for a safe protection for your property? Done. Here you found ...
Reviews.Author: Carlos G. Bruno
Reviews.Content: BY FAR the best Customer Service EVER!THIS has no price ... and I'm not even start to talk about the items - that make the whole experience to install it yourself, flawlessly!No "BSs" as their competitors or even hidden charges under "AMAZING DISCOUNTS".They even have refurbished products (with 3yrs of warranty!) if you want save even more.Do you need to move (like I do in less than a year)? NO PROBLEM! You carry your purchase items with you without need to buy new "package/installation" for the new location!And the best of the best: NO TIED CONTRACTS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Upgrades? Down? Cancel account and return the products within 60 days (what I BET you won't!)?NO PROBLEM! NO QUESTIONS ASK!Probably, of course, the ones to improve their services.I still feeling as a dumb to wait a week to decided! It's a NO BRAIN choice!Did I say about their response to any "problem" ... even being a test????SimpliSafe. Period.

Reviews.Title: Glad I switched from ADT
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Serpe
Reviews.Content: Simple to install. Great interface. Inexpensive for equipment and monthly service. Way better than ADT. I saved $250/year switching from ADT.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: Robin H.
Reviews.Content: We choose this system because it looked easy to install and was a great price. So far we love the system. it was very easy to install and easy use. we feel safe and would highly recommend this system

Reviews.Title: Most excellent!
Reviews.Author: HunterJumpergrl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this directly from Simplisafe site. I've had it for almost 2 weeks and love it. I did purchase additional entry sensors, glass detectors, and sirens. I had an alarm go off because I was fiddling around with a sensor and was very happy how quickly the monitoring service called. Still have my Remington 870 as back up, but very pleased with this product line.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I rated this product five stars because... Its A Great Product... It's  Has Great Service... And It's Low Monthly Fees...!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe alarm systems for home
Reviews.Author: Carl Porcelli
Reviews.Content: I have  used  the  simplisafe  alarm systems  for a few weeks  and  so far  I am  very happy with the  system.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Rick N
Reviews.Content: Installation was effortless. Easy to follow instructions as the system controller 'talks' you through the setup. During activation, Simplisafe monitoring contacted me several times to verify and see if we needed any assistance

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: J. Charles Gomez
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the SimpliSafe security system. received it very quickly after ordering it and had no trouble installing it. So easy to use and get use to, my wife and i haven't even had an accidental false alarm. The software is very user friendly and understandable. Best of all, it is much more affordable than other home security systems.

Reviews.Title: Not Up to Par
Reviews.Author: Bayside Buyer
Reviews.Content: Simple system, but doesn't work well. Some sensors received were defective. The keyfob with software was corrupted and had to be replaced. Did not work on a Mac, but they never gave indication in advance. The extra siren is not really loud enough for outside installation. When it goes off in the house, neighbors can't even hear it.Overpriced for what it is.

Reviews.Title: It's everything I hoped it would be.
Reviews.Author: Danny P. Hurles
Reviews.Content: As many reviewers have said, it's an easy install. I ordered from the Simplisafe site, so my sensors were all pre-programmed. But if you want to add, or delete a sensor, it truly is easy to do. Plug in your USB/keychain unit into your PC, and it automatically brings up the Simplisafe screen. Make your changes, save it, then plug the keychain into your base's USB port, and it automatically installs the changes in seconds. I turned off the siren on the base, and the lights, and maxed out the voice, and chimes.  I ordered two siren's, I didn't want the base location to be easy to locate.  After a couple weeks of use, it's worked perfect.  When I triggered the alarm to test it, I got the voice message that said I'm not connected to the cellular monitoring. I called Simplisafe support, he provided the download to kill that message, and now no more message. At this time I have no plans to connect to the monthly charge monitoring. At some point in the future I may change my mind. These sirens are very loud. It's a well thought out system.

Reviews.Title: A suggestion
Reviews.Author: Albert Bertin
Reviews.Content: The frequency of the warning beeps is to high.  Older people , such as myself, suffer hearing loss in these frequency areas.  If the beep frequency could be lowered to about 2 hundred hertz it could be a big help.  I have to put my ear right up next to the keypad to hear the warning beeps.  Other than that I think it is a great system.A E Bertin

Reviews.Title: Great product for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Dh2534
Reviews.Content: I initially had a quote from ADT and was shocked by the amount for the product and also by the $57.99 per month monitoring fee for a minimum of three years.  I then started researching and came across a number of systems available.  I went with SimpliSafe as there is no contract.  The way this works, I could even put this on my boat for the summer. Set up is easy.  Mine wasn't synced, therefore I needed to call support as the keypad kept saying out of range.  I was slightly irritated as they weren't available at 8p central time.  I called in the morning and after a short conversation, I was up and running.As I have dogs and cats, I am going to purchase the glass break sensors and disable the Motion detectors.I deducted a star as I would like to be able to add a camera and the door entrance keypad.  I can do that separately also and not have to be obligated to a long term contract.

Reviews.Title: simply safe
Reviews.Author: shirley
Reviews.Content: i chose the system after much research and discovered that Simplisave had excellent reviews. I have installed my system and it was an easy installation as advertised. the system so far has worked very good. I am very happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: W. Sciacca
Reviews.Content: An awesome and easy to set up system. It let's me know if there are any issues including loss of power. The peace of mind is invaluable.

Reviews.Title: new customer
Reviews.Author: Dave Sorenson
Reviews.Content: I just finished up installing my new security system, which was easy.  I did not install all the door/window sensor at the same time, one was to go in later.  The key pad was looking for it but could not be found.  I called the 888 number and the mystery was quickly solved by a nice young man.The only small thing was the included alarm the base was not very loud when set off.  Could not hear it from the out side of the house, and will probably buy the extra loud siren so the neighbors can hear it when it goes off.Over all I like itdave s

Reviews.Title: Simpli Safe, why would anyone pay more??? It is a great value..
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Easy intsall and works great as advertised........ordered 2 more entry sensors...Just follow the directions and it will work.  Read the book before you start...

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I am new....had this system about a week, impressed with the flexibility of the system...can tailor it to any requirement .very versatile . Good support when I called...3 times for setup( one call wasn't good)but I got the help I needed . In testing mode now and feel the system is going to be good for me. i like being able to make all adjustments to equipment on line....good instruction booklet and help is close by....I have no complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY.
Reviews.Author: EVE Lyn McBride
Reviews.Content: The system went together very easily.And the very fact that i did not have to run wires made it even better.My wife is so empresses d with the fact that she can come in and out using the remote.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Joe Freeman
Reviews.Content: Advertised acurately.  Shipped quickly.  Packaged well.  Easy installation and excellent functionality.  Very reasonalble cost.  We'll feel more comfortable when we are away from home now.

Reviews.Title: simply safe, simply great!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and set up. 30 minutes to hour depending on number of sensors and placement.  All components include two screws (which i used) for more secure mounting if want more than the included double side tape. Best value I could find! Great price for more peace of mind! They do have tiered pricing so be aware of that, but their lowest advertised rate was all we needed.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up, low cost, effective home security
Reviews.Author: Christopher Boulanger
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone looking at home security options such as ADT.  The set up is very easy, even for a beginner.  The fact that there is no contract lock-in and the optional monthly fee is only $14.99 make this system a no-brainer for me.

Reviews.Title: Purchased SimpliSafe Security System
Reviews.Author: Dianne Marchegiaani
Reviews.Content: I saw the Simplisafe system on this old house, and went on line to check it out. It is everything they say it is. Easy to install. You are able to make changes on your computer as to volume, which alarms you want to set for home or away, and you can add extra passwords at anytime. I like this feature - it enables you to give someone a password if they are staying with you and when they leave remove it. We have not started monitoring yet - getting used to system first. We had a security system when I worked night work and it was very expensive, and when we discontinued I had to pull wires and patch holes from the mounting places. This system is great I installed the whole thing in about an hour, no holes no wiring, no problems. The only thing I dislike is the system tells you if something is open or an alarm is going off, but it doesn't tell you which one like front door, back door, etc, Great system for the price and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: Rick H Chambon
Reviews.Content: This home security system is a great value and quite easy to use.  I love Simplisafe! Monitor fees are reasonable

Reviews.Title: Easy....but costly
Reviews.Author: G. Carter
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up but is costly compared to similar products. I'd recommend looking at all options. I chose this one for cost, but to get everything other systems offered, I ended up paying a lot more.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: Thomas I. Sheaffer
Reviews.Content: We were committed to purchasing a home security system and discovered tons of companies selling a product.  Among the many we studied and had references for, the few distinctive differences were the core processor/base model, the connection choice, i.e., cellular or phone line, and what you paid for monitoring.  There were various pricing models, but when costed out for 5 years, they were all pretty much the same.  We eventually decided cellular was what we wanted and then discovered SimpliSafe whose product is based on cellular, offers considered flexibility with sensors, does not need professional installers (it took me the short time they predicted to get it operational), and has a monthly monitoring fee that is lower than anything else I had seen.  The total cost is a fraction of other systems we were considering.  Plus, when I move in two years, I can take it all with me.I have confirmed the connection is in place, but have not had cause yet to accidentally prompt the monitoring service to take any action (i.e., their calling me or the police).  So another star will be in order when that happens as it is supposed to. At this point, I trust that it will.  I'm quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Thanks hope u like what I said
Reviews.Author: bigjohn
Reviews.Content: I have no complaint, your teck. people have been a great help and I appreciate that.  I would recommend your system to all my friends., The testing that I should do occ. Thanks John Hancock Spe. test.aking of the reg

Reviews.Title: Easy install, wireless is great
Reviews.Author: Jeff C. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Totally happy with SimpliSafe: Easy to install and wireless is great. My hard-wired alarm was too antiquated after 15 years of service and the firm wouldn't update it without big costs. Only suggestion: Suggest ordering the alarm first order.

Reviews.Title: Home security at it's best
Reviews.Author: Ken Dawson
Reviews.Content: Great product and easy to install.I have recommended this system to all my friends.Saved thousands of dollars on the install.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: richard failla
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I've been very resistant to installing a home security system, but my wife insisted. I did my research and with the help of Angie's List I found SimpliSafe. They were the the most pleasant people to work with and they were proactive to help me with my needs and requests. The installation was as advertised, so easy. When I signed up for the monitoring service Rich from SimpliSafe walked me through the entire process and stayed on line with me to make sure that everything was working properly. We also had ordered two keypads but later found out that we only needed one so I asked if I could send it back and order the 110db siren. Their comment was "No Problem we will even pay for the return shipping" Now this is how a company should operate! I not sure how the monitoring service will work but if the past experience is any indication of the future service I feel confident with this company. GOOD JOB SIMPLISAFE. Rich LasVegas NV

Reviews.Title: A+++ Professional Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Bissell
Reviews.Content: This alarm is fantastic!  I am a small business owner and it was super easy to install, configure, and get online.  It took me less than 15 minutes.All of the other quotes I got from other alarm companies were so high they made having an alarm system cost prohibitive.I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND this system to anyone in need of an alarm for their home or office.The keychain remote makes it super easy to turn on and off when you leave and return.I wish the online services were a little less expensive. But I don't really need them, so Im fine with the $15 per month option.  That would be my only criticism.Very Happy Customer!

Reviews.Title: Love our Simplisafe!
Reviews.Author: Grace Whorton
Reviews.Content: We give our Simplisafe a five star rating because it works just as well or maybe better than any of the other companies that require a contract. It honestly took my husband around twenty minutes to get it all installed. It probably would have taken less time if I could have made up my mind where to put the  motion sensors! We love the fact that we have no $49.00 payment every month with another company and no contract. That is a huge plus! I would absolutely recommend this product to all of my family and friends......and everyone else!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ashlee
Reviews.Content: I really like simply safeits a good alarm to haveI like that sticks on the wall good one

Reviews.Title: The System Is Great. The Motion Detectors Picked Up Our Cat Even ...
Reviews.Author: Shane Schuelke
Reviews.Content: The System Is Great.  The Motion Detectors Picked Up Our Cat Even At 5 Feet Up When Installed Per Installation Book.  I Had To Install Them Higher.  It Works In Test Mode.  Hopefully It Works If Someone Is Taking The TV.  Very Easy To Install And Great Price.

Reviews.Title: fast, simple, easy .
Reviews.Author: Elliot's Maine Mom
Reviews.Content: Bought this system for camp. Was super easy to set up, customer service was great. One phone call and I was set up. I live out in the sticks of maine and needed a different sim card to connect to their system.They sent me one in a pre paid package. Instructions and set up were simple,I would recommend to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great choice for home security
Reviews.Author: Christy Vincent
Reviews.Content: I love this system. It was easy to install, and it's easy to use. I appreciate that there are no contracts to be locked into. It's a great choice for someone who's looking for easy, affordable security for their home.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we were looking for.
Reviews.Author: Joel Young
Reviews.Content: We shopped around and priced about every company. Never heard of SimpliSafe until I heard radio ad on AM640. Visited site and saw Dave Ramsey endorses service. Two sources I have had excellent experience with products they endorse or advertise. We looked online and then called to order.Helpful, informative, and patient with me throughout the order.Put together exactly what we wantedNo hidden fees and excellent monitoring rateEasy as could be setup - Took an hour for entire setup including testing.We have done a few surprise tests and received calls from service within seconds.Has really lifted a burden of worry off of our shoulders when we leave house. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: I am very impressed
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Pierce
Reviews.Content: This system is a snap to install.  Screws are provided for all components as well as the attachment tape, which makes me feel more secure (no pun intended) with its installation.  Setup is so easy that you wonder if you are doing it right; it just seems like it should be more complicated.  I had one question during installation (I had opted not to install one of the sensors), but a call to support quickly provided the solution.The system was recommended to me by my son and I recommended it to my other son.  All of us now have the system in place.Because of my location I had to call both the sheriff's office and the local fire department to see if a permit was required (it was not), so I called SimpliSafe to inform them for any support others may need.

Reviews.Title: You;'ve Got To Try This:
Reviews.Author: Deborah G. Gile
Reviews.Content: We chose this product after researching it & discovered how much better a "DYI" system works for us!  We were able to customize this system to suit our own personal needs so much better than having a company come in & set up something we might not have been as satisfied with.The cost, well we figured SimpliSafe saved us 3x the cost of what we invested!  Not bad at all!!  In one afternoon we were all set up & ready to go!I would recommend this product to any one who can program a DVR, It's that simple!

Reviews.Title: simple and quick
Reviews.Author: Richard Davis
Reviews.Content: just worked right out of the box - great system, easy setup, much better then the old system it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great system for a budget and a quick salution to an alarm need.
Reviews.Author: BBGun
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe alarm system is great for a family or person on a budget or someone who moves around a lot, it's  easy to install and understand, good customer service and nice features. The only suggestion I would make is to include a surveillance camera and 24/7 tech support or tech support 7 days a week, especially for anyone who is tech challenged. The system has the potential to give the big names a run for the money. I bought it and installed it and would recommend it especially if you do not wish to be locked into a long drawn out contract or spend a ton of money for an alarm system they have different packages to choose from. The bottom line is you buy it and you own it and it's easy to install and uninstall if you want to move and there is no contract required or high monthly payments to make you choose your level of service and if you do not choose to pay for monitoring service it will serve as a stand alone alarm system that works locally, install it and enjoy peace of mind knowing your property is being monitored while you sleep and while your away from home.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed with Simplisafe2
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I saw this system on an episode of "This Old House" and decided to look into it. After some research, I ordered the 8-piece Plus Package along with some additional components. Shipping was fast and accurate. The installation and activation processes were easy. The instructions were clear and the support seems very good. I'm very pleased with the system.

Reviews.Title: Stupid easy to install and deploy!
Reviews.Author: Anywidget
Reviews.Content: This is the easiest security system I have ever installed. The customer service is superb. I initially had an issue with the cellular network because I live somewhat remotely, but they sent me a replacement card in a few days free of charge for a different network. I swapped it out with no problems and my system was up! The sensors and keypad installed in literally minutes with almost no drilling. (The keypad is a little heavy for using just the sticky tape provided, so I had to use screws as it fell off the wall when my wife used the keypad the first time...the unit is tough and survived the 4ft fall) My only wish is they could integrate video camera(s) into their system so they could take some snapshots of the bad guys.

Reviews.Title: simplisafe review
Reviews.Author: Dan Niemeyer
Reviews.Content: All in all -system is good for the money/ easy to install! Some window sensors had to be  jumpstarted (window had to be opened and closed a few times for the sensor to react. The only other issue is the alarm strength. I have an extra interior alarm and I activated it  w/me on the outside, and I dont believe it will do the job. So im considering buying another alarm for the outside of the house that will alert the neighbors!

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: K. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Since our home was broken into in February, we have been looking at security systems.  My son found Simplisafe and recommended it.  I looked into it also and liked what I saw.  It was easy to install and seems to be working well.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: G. Nichols
Reviews.Content: We chose this for the obvious reasons: wireless and you can take it with you if you ever move. Very reasonable monthly monitoring charge. And you can expand the system with its components to tailor it to whatever your needs are. If there are any negatives to SimpliSafe I am simply not aware of them. And now we have peace of mind if the house is unattended. I'll never forget the look of the kicked in door at my son's apartment and all the good stuff was taken. No longer a worry for us.

Reviews.Title: simpli simple
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is simple to install. Simple to understand. Simple to operate. I feel safe with the system. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, great system
Reviews.Author: dustin lassuy
Reviews.Content: Setup very easy, had a glitch with the software on the USB fob but that was quickly resolved by support.I would just prefer a slightly small door/window device.

Reviews.Title: priced right
Reviews.Author: DRB
Reviews.Content: this unit is as advertised, seems to be well built & is very easy to install and get up & running, for sure it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: JUDY BELANGER
Reviews.Content: I'm a first time user of Simplisafe and it was as easy to install as mentioned both on their site as well as on U Tube.  I found it to be most affordable, with several options to choose from.  The equipment seems to be of good quality and overall I'm very pleased.  Today is my first day of live monitoring (3 day test period over).  Their customer service people and tech. support are very nice and ready to answer any question you may have.  My overall experience has been great and I would recommend this system to anyone looking for a home security system.  Best value in my opinion!

Reviews.Title: #1 in my book
Reviews.Author: Marlon Simmons
Reviews.Content: Very very good security system.  Very easy to setup.  The smart phone app tells you everything you need to know.

Reviews.Title: Best ever
Reviews.Author: juan martinez
Reviews.Content: Best alarm ever, easy setup, easy to change after setup, reasonable monitoring charges and fast response to alarm tripping. Will recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is simply easy
Reviews.Author: David D Thomas
Reviews.Content: This system was so easy to install, it almost made me feel like I missed something!  Entry sensors were easy to install and there is no guess work on where they need to go.  Doors and windows with easy outside access are made more secure with a quick, easy to install entry sensor.  In my home, I have two slide-glass-doors.  Because this set does not come with glass breakage detection, I found that I needed to order an extra motion detector so that I could cover both rooms with the slide-glass-door with a secondary way to detect a break-in, should intrusion be by breaking the glass (and thus not breaking the entry sensor connection).  The toughest part of providing a more secure home was just thinking through how best to cover my home and determining the most convenient place for access to the key pad.  If you have a large home, and the front entrance is well spaced from the garage entrance, I would recommend getting a second key pad as well.As a post note, the second motion detector was ordered after I had installed my system.  Adding on to the system was easy.  If I had to list any nit, it would be to say that the PC GUI screen should have a field next to the serial number of each sensor so that the room in which they are located can be listed (i.e.  Living Room  ABC123).

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe - Simply Great
Reviews.Author: A6Driver
Reviews.Content: I ordered my unit directly from the Manufacturer.  It arrived in about 5 or 6 days.Setup -  The base unit was very simple to setup.  I placed it on a shelf inside a construction paper cone.  No one can tell what it is.  I mounted the keypad by the door and proceeded to do the rest of the sensors.The motion sensors mount typically in corners.  I suggest buying some spax screws from Home Depot to mount the holders.  The tiny screws provided do not work well in drywall and the adhesive strips don't work for corners.The Door sensors and water sensors mount easily.  The smoke detector was also easily mounted.  The extra 105db siren did not mate to the system and had to be reprogrammed with a quick call to tech support.  They were fast and helpful.I had 4 door, 4 motion, 2 glass-break, 2 water, and 1 smoke detector to install.  Whole thing took about an hour and was easy.Operationally the system is fantastic.  Can't beat the price or convenience.

Reviews.Title: Super easy setup, big savings
Reviews.Author: Tony Wedel
Reviews.Content: Compared to the other common alarm companies (ADT and Vivint), SimpliSafe is hands down better. NO CONTRACT. Monthly cost is WAY cheaper (Top level monitoring is $25/ month, but starts at $15). Alerts are almost instant, setup took me 30 minutes total, and the cost is icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for apartment living.
Reviews.Author: MEHRAN ZARRABI
Reviews.Content: Very simple to set up.It's great for apartments, also it has lots of program versatility.I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: So Easy
Reviews.Author: LE in Corpus "Linda"
Reviews.Content: My Boss bought one for work and really liked it so I bought one for my sister after her place was broken into. Very easy to install and use.  I highly recommend getting this from Amazon because of the timely delivery, easy installation and cost.

Reviews.Title: Don't get trapped in the '$14.99 monthly fee' misleading advertisement
Reviews.Author: jjddbg
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the basic (8-piece) home security system and activated the 24/7 monitoring by subscribing to the much hyped and advertised $14.99 plan.Pros:1. Very easy to install2. Hardware works as advertisedCons:1. The basic $14.99 plan will give you monitoring only, no smartphone app access2. The sensors amount in the 8-piece set is about half what I would need. The very important glass breaking sensor is not it the set. If you have a decent window and close it, the only way to get through it is to break the glass which makes the entry sensors obsolete (for windows).3. The advertising about 'Simplisafe' vs. 'Others' and 'Save thousands' is bluntly misleading. My neighbors recently installed a security system (different vendor) for no initial cost which has about three times more sensors that in the Simplisafe 8-piece set, loud siren and more. If you were to purchase this from Simplisafe, that would cost you at least $620 plus tax (that would be roughly $700 for CA residents). Again for the neighbors, the subscription is $30 per month with 3-years plan which includes the remote control and monitoring app and SMS. If you would to get the same from Simplisafe, that would be $25 monthly. So, that is $5 difference per month, $60 per year. To write off the initial Simplisafe cost, one would need 11-12 years subscription.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Sondra G.
Reviews.Content: I like the system because it's all I can afford.  First of all the keypad is small and not lighted.  I can hardly see the numbers.  I had ADT.  Lighted keypad and large numbers.Secondly the siren will not be heard by the neighbors unless you buy extras for outside.Thirdly, I have a key ring remote with a drive on the end of it and cap keeps coming off.  I spend more time looking for the cap.The concept is good and service works but the equipment is cheaply made.  With such a great product you'd think they'd make better quality equipment.

Reviews.Title: BEST BANG for the buck hands down
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: What a great alternative to the expensive systems out there.  I dont need all the fancy power door lock, cameras and other hi tech items.  Plans are 15-20-25 which even the 25 is a bargain and gives you full access to system on your ipad.  I simply needed a basic system for a beach property and this had it all.  Spent $600 on all sensors and add ons and have no contract to abide by, i can even change my monthly monitoring package whenever i want oh and you can even choose to have no monitoring.  The install could be completed by my 8 year old if need be.  The wireless systemAlso allowed me to protect my shed 50 ft from the house would reccomend to everyone who wants a basic system just for that little extra protection.

Reviews.Title: Monitoring is questionable
Reviews.Author: James K. Johnson
Reviews.Content: My alarm has actually been set off twice (accidentally) and i didn not hear from Simplisfae either time. Had it been a burglar, I guess they could have stolen anything they wanted.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe couldn't be simpler
Reviews.Author: Stephen D Barnhouse
Reviews.Content: Decided to try SimpliSafe when we moved to Chicago in January and we are pleased with getting more system for less money and a lower but better service than ADT with no contract.

Reviews.Title: Don't forget to hide the base unit
Reviews.Author: Randy M "RM"
Reviews.Content: Installation was easy but took the extra step of securely mounting sensors to prevent false alarms when the sticky lets go and it eventually will especially if heated over time. 2 issues since purchase the keypad keys are not backlit is a problem, so found myself memorizing where the keys are located in dimly lite room.Second issue after purchase, discovered base unit is a very weak link. If destroyed before end of countdown, the cell signal never gets sent. Burglars and other bad guys know this believe me, so not putting a sign of the security system installed is better than advertising. I suggest if a sign is used purchase an ADT or Brinks sign. Also make the base station hard to find and considering reducing the countdown timer from 30 seconds to 15-20 seconds. For those wondering the keypad can be left in plane sight, destroying it won't stop the cell signal from being sent.Other than these 2 issues, primarily the potential of grab and smash of main base unit I'm pleased. I believe its worth the cost with the no contract, but take the extra precaution and hide the base unit. This may mean adding the 105 decibel siren is also necessary so you can clearly hear the alarm throughout the home. I've also added extra motion sensors, glass breakage, smoke and the siren.I do like the ability to individually program each sensor with the USB key chain remote. For instance I programmed motion sensors to be on in a couple unused bedrooms while in the home mode. Normally motion sensors are off in home mode. I did this because the entry sensors won't go off if a window gets smashed and our bedroom is some distance away. Glass breakage sensors are an option but what if they don't break the window so opted for the motion detectors. I also armed the doors in those unused bedrooms so I may have overkill but have always felt if there ever is a breakin that's where it will be, because of the bedroom locations on the back side of the home.Cheers....

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Donald C.
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great product, and it is everything they claimed it was. It was very easy to install and set up and operate. The only problem I had, was I didn't have a cell phone signal, with their T Mobil module, but all I had to do was contact them with the problem, and they sent me a new module that ran on Verizion, which covers my area. The only thing I wish was better, is the volume on the tower. I suffer from hearing loss, and it is hard for me to hear what it is saying.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory So Far
Reviews.Author: David J. Denis
Reviews.Content: So far.....so good.  Although I did have a bad entry sensor, which made the initial installation a little more time consuming.  Customer support was good at figuring out which sensor was the bad one, and sent me a replacement sensor in a timely manner.  I do wish the key pad buttons were back lit and larger, it would make it much easier to use.  Also, the "Home" program needs to be updated so you can set it when you leave while someone is still in the house, for example, I leave for work before my wife does, so I want to set the alarm in the "Home" mode so the house is armed correctly while she is still there.  In order to set the alarm this way, I have to open the door, letting in the cold air, before setting the alarm.  You should be able to set the "Home" mode like normal while the alarm gives you 30 - 60 seconds to exit the house, the same way it works for setting the alarm in the "Away" mode.  I don't understand why it is set up so you have to open the door first.  It doesn't make sense to me, i guess because my old alarm did not require you to open the door first to set the "Home" mode when leaving.  I think addressing both of these issues would make the system much easier to use, benefiting the consumer, and therefore benefiting Simplisafe in the long run.  I would give it more stars if theses issues were indeed addressed.Dave D.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System review
Reviews.Author: Wesley J. Cobb
Reviews.Content: I bought my system directly through SimpliSafe.  Price, features, simplicity (self installed) and the "NO CONTRACT" monitoring option were the key features in my decision.The system arrived in 5 days.  The install was just as easy as the videos show.  I installed 15 entry sensors, keypad, extra siren, 2 motion sensors and a smoke detector in about two hours.I had to call Technical support when my keypad malfunctioned.  The Panic Button on the keypad stuck and would not allow me to enter my PIN.  I also had one faulty entry sensor.  Both keypad and sensor were replaced at no charge and shipping paid by SimpliSafe.I have called on Tech. Support three times in the past two weeks since installing my system.  Each time I had no trouble getting to talk to a tech person and solving my issue.  However, tech support is not available on weekends.In testing mode, the system has performed properly and the Monitoring service called to verify my test within a minute of activation.  A false alarm was also handled in the same way.I have been extremely pleased with this product and would recommend it to anyone considering a security system

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Jonathan M. Califf
Reviews.Content: This system is inexpensive and very easy to install.  You can't beat $25 a month for full access services that monitor fire, burglary, and CO2 both while away and home.  The customer support I received was excellent and they addressed and remedied my issues quickly and professionally

Reviews.Title: Happy nights with Simply Safe!
Reviews.Author: Sibyl Gordy
Reviews.Content: I have changed Insurance carriers on my house and they require customers to have monitored alarms.  I searched google and found Simply Safe.  I could not be happier with my system and the monitoring fee.  I never have felt a need for security system, but since I secured it I do feel more secure at night!  Love the ease of installation and recommend it to others.  By the way, first time I had it on I opened a door an set it off, oops!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I just installed my system. It was easy enough to setup. Instructions were clear and I am satisfied. When selecting the starter package, I did not notice that the basic package does not come with a siren so I will have to place another order if I decide I need it.

Reviews.Title: Had it installed in about 30 minutes
Reviews.Author: Lisa A Jost
Reviews.Content: This was recommended to me by my sister--in-law. Good price, user friendly.  Plus, get a credit on your homeowners policy for having a security system.

Reviews.Title: Hope they are not taken over by ADT!
Reviews.Author: Brown
Reviews.Content: I started out with a $13,000 security system about 17 years ago with a lifetime warranty for service and parts. Since then, that company got taken out by about four other companies, the last being ADT. The monitoring fees keep going higher and the service got worse. They refused to honor any of the previous agreements. I got fed up with them and their poor level of service.I heard about this company thru Angle's list and did quite a bit of research on their product and others. I was a little skeptical, but decided to buy the Simplisafe2 system. The system is easy to setup. I had it  for about a month now and so far I am pleased. The company was very responsive in answering my questions. They have great resources on their web site. I was surprise at their quick response to a question on their Facebook page. Yes, the system has room for improvement. I think these guys are on the ball and will hit it out of the ball park!I bought  thru Angie's list because they were offering this same system with 2 keypads for the same price paid thru Amazon. I am just hoping that this company will continue to keep cost down and don't get carried away once they start stealing customers away from the big players like ADT.

Reviews.Title: Feeling Safe is Simpli Priceless
Reviews.Author: FWG
Reviews.Content: Installation was easier than advertised and everything worked right out of the box. We could not be happier and would recommend this system to anyone who is looking for a reasonably priced security system.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled with this system, highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Ken G
Reviews.Content: I have been an ADT customer for many years. Upon building my new home, I had heard about Simplisafe. I decided to give it a try. I am so glad I did. The system itself is so easy to install. I did contact customer service on a couple of occasions with questions and they were professional, courteous, and knowledgeable. I upgraded to the higher end monitoring (which is still half the cost of ADT) and am able to completely control my security system remotely online. I am recommending this system to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, easy to customize--very happy!
Reviews.Author: Phatgirl
Reviews.Content: We have a big, old house with lots of doors and windows--many on the back of the house.  We wanted a system that would alert us of entries, whether we were home or away.  Also, we wanted a system that would send us notifications via text when our children came into and left the house whether we were home or not.  This system is easy to setup, easy to customize and works great.  We have not needed dispatched help yet (and hopefully never will!).

Reviews.Title: Very nice system & easy to set up!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Roels
Reviews.Content: This is fairly all-encompassing system that enables you to secure your home.  The peel & stick sensors are easy to use.  However, depending on the type of door frame trim you have, placement using the self stick could be problematic.  Yes, they furnish small screws to use, thus making the install far more permanent.  I would suggest purchasing additional foam self stick spacers to ensure adequate adhesion.  I feel the keypad is very minimal and the back light is poor.  The APP feature for smart phones is great and very responsive.  We use the upgraded monitoring service and the email, text alerts, and iPhone features are outstanding.  I like the computer functionality to customize all my sensors and settings.  I wish the smoke detectors would work in sympathy (if one goes off - then they communicate with each other and all alert).  I'm looking forward to a video monitor feature down stream - soon, I hope.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: We installed the system in our home.  It was very simple and easy to install.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Glad I chose SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Kristina Mackey
Reviews.Content: The product came quickly, ready for install, and was very easy to install.  I have been happy with this product so far.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Affordable, Efficient!
Reviews.Author: Tr186
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Set up is easy and intuitive and we really enjoy the interactive phone app. Worth the few extra dollars a month for the remote monitoring/maintenance ability.Love the fact that I am in complete control with all system settings and can easily change them by myself without having to contact the company or have a technition come out.It is also great that I can easily add more sensors as needs arise. Customer service so far has been outstanding.The ease of use, affordability (no contract), and efficiency get this sytem 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: It's everything as advertised and more!
Reviews.Author: Jim Grasley
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine bought a SimpliSafe Wireless Home Security but had not installed it, so I did the research. I checked the competition and there really isn't any. This security system was a cinch to install. I had already seen the videos and everything worked as expected. We were missing a component with our shipment and ordered a wrong item as well. All it took was a phone call and the problem was resolved immediately. The pricing is great and the options are numerous. The only thing that I would recommend is when installing the 105db alarm, use nails or screws to secure it. It's really too heavy to be held by the double back tape.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Security System
Reviews.Author: noname
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install.  We are quite satisfied with it.  It costs much less than hard wired systems.  The savings on Homeowners Insurance almost pays for the monthly monitoring fees for a year.  We have added one sensor since installing the system which is very easily done.  We would recommend this system.  We learned about the system on an episode of This Old House.  It is interactive and can be monitored with your cell phone when your away from home.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: william j bastek
Reviews.Content: After all the good things I read I decided to buy the system . We were an ADT customer for years but got tired of the contract requirements . I was especially intrigued by the wireless and do it yourself features . I got the package , opened it and completed the installation in no time flat . Just like you said ! I had a few questions about options which were answered promptly .All in all we are completely satisfied with the product , wife is happy I'm happy .

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Is The Best!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Neal
Reviews.Content: When researching for a security system, I looked at several services.  A friend had suggested I look into SimpliSafe.After researching for information on the internet, I decided it was the best system to meet my needs.It really is easy to install, and the customer service couldn't be better. I called once while installing the system, and the customer  service rep helped and answered all of my questions. The phone app is wonderful too! You can control your system and are notified via a text when you arm or disarm the system. It will also let you know if your house has been compromised!I have recommended this system to several of my friends!I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: So far this system is working great. It did require a different pc board in the base station in order to get reception where I live but they sent it out via NDA at no charge. After a quick install the system is up and running.

Reviews.Title: Super pleased!
Reviews.Author: dobyman100
Reviews.Content: So far I am totally satisfied with my system.  I am alerted by text every time it is armed or disarmed.  The keychain remote is a super easy and convenient part of the system.  I have 2 large dogs, and with the motion sensors turned upside down, they have never set them off yet.  I will be adding to the system as time goes on for my garage doors, and also a water sensor.Best bang for the buck as far as home security goes.  A+

Reviews.Title: So far it is everything as advertised....great product
Reviews.Author: The book analyser
Reviews.Content: I have only had this up and running for about a week, but so far it is everything it claims.  Easy installation and good customer service.

Reviews.Title: I could not beleive it was so easy.
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Beckman
Reviews.Content: I had an alarm system years ago and you would not believe the drilling in ceilings, door jams and the difficulty in the codes needed to set the alarm, not to mention the fact that the monthly charge was higher than what Simplisafe charges.  I am a single female age 59 and I installed the alarm, smoke detector and outdoor alarm myself.  The alarm monitors my home and workshop.  It was so easy to install and activate.  I could not believe it was so easy.  To set the alarm I just indicate if I am home  or away which includes the motion sensors.  I Love It.Bonnie

Reviews.Title: very happy so far
Reviews.Author: Ralph Mathison
Reviews.Content: I found the system very easy to install and simple to set up. the support has been very good other then waiting a long time on the phone but they make it where you can leave your phone number and have someone call back and they always have called back. one problem I have is the app does not show up on my i phone's notification center so there is no way to assign it a special ring tone or message tone. I think the cost per month for the monitoring is very reasonable considering other security systems. overall I find it a very good system at this time but I am only a month into it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent System
Reviews.Author: John David Oates
Reviews.Content: I looked at several companies before choosing the SimpliSafe System. Their customer service was able to answer all my questions plus their Monitoring Service is half the cost of others which lock you into a minimum 3 year contract. With SimpliSafe I have the option of moving this from home to home and there isn't a contract for any of the services.It is great to be able to track who is arming and disarming the system while I am not their and I have the freedom of arming and disarming the system from both internet and cell.After only 1 week, I am thankful I choose SimpliSafe!

Reviews.Title: Great system, easy installation
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Other than reading over the instructions, it took me all of about 15 minutes to install everything and get it working.This system exemplifies my principle of "keep it simple."  It does everything I want and it makes it simple.Thank you for a well thought out system.Larry Allen

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Alarm System
Reviews.Author: David J. Welch "Cougman"
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe Alarm System can be armed or disarmed from your smartphone.  That is a big bonus for me.  ADT couldn't even tell me if I had remembered to arm my system.Alerts/messages are sent to email and text messaging when the system is armed or disarmed, and it will let you know which door/window was opened.  I have noted the serial number for each sensor and have them noted on my smartphone.I like the fact it is its own cell phone and calls out with information that is then relayed to me.  It comes with a handy keychain remote to make arming and disarming the system a breeze.  As long as their monitoring service remains half of what ADT is (one of the reasons I took the hit and purchased the system) with the smartphone capability I will be very happy.I am happy with this system, and hope their response time is spot on if the system is ever activated by not-so-friendly folk.

Reviews.Title: This Is The Best Value In Home Security...By Far!
Reviews.Author: Colin C. Tawney
Reviews.Content: I got their deluxe package and added some extra sensors.  This system is unbelievably easy to set up and the instructions are really simple to follow.  You really don’t need any mechanical skills at all, just a Phillips screwdriver or you can use their adhesive mounting strips.I’m really amazed at how much thought went into this system.  The interactive monitoring via my smart phone is very nice to have so I can keep an eye on things when we are away.  If Amazon would allow it, I would give Simplisafe a six star rating.  You won’t find a better value in the equipment or monitoring.The best part is the price, you are cutting out profits and commissions for the middle man and their sales reps, plus there are no games in pricing with long-term contracts.

Reviews.Title: As advertised!
Reviews.Author: Wayne Walker
Reviews.Content: I never imagined I could install something as sophisticated as a home security system without help.  I did and it works beautifully!The instructions are clear,easy to follow and the product is easy to install.  I couldn't be happier with my system.

Reviews.Title: Great system and super easy to install!
Reviews.Author: Ben DePalo
Reviews.Content: I was. Having a hard time finding an alarm system that met my needs. I didn't want to pay the monthly fee of a monitored system so I was looking for a system that would make a lot of noise if something were to happen.  Well, with SimpliSafe, I was able to get everything I was looking for AND have the flexibility to add the monitoring system down the road if I change my mind!SimpliSafe was extremely easy to install and very easy to setup.  The entire installation took no more than 45 minutes.  I'm very happy with this product and would recommend it to anyone looking for a home security system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: Ronald R. Krueger
Reviews.Content: I chose SimpliSafe alarm system because the package they offered and I chose covered all the items I needed to secure.  The price was right and the monitoring was reasonable.  No contracts or anything of that nature.  Installation  was very easy and straight.  The most difficult part of the installation was to figuring out where to place the motion detectors to cover the most are area.  The system works great(though have not had any intruders as yet ), just forgetting about the alarm system and setting it off.

Reviews.Title: Three systems in one week
Reviews.Author: Douglas Rupp
Reviews.Content: I ordered three systems for different residences.  The components were fairly priced, easy to install without tools and were up and running in just minutes.  One of the base stations was defective but the support folks were very helpful and knowledgeable.  New parts were shipped quickly and all three systems are now working perfectly.  Not only are the support folks helpful, they speak English as a first language and are easy to understand.  Wait times on hold for phone support are reasonable and I understand that 7 day technical support is just around the corner.  The smart phone app is the best.  Nothing happens when I am away that I'm not notified of.  Peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: Good DIY Security System.
Reviews.Author: C Bradley
Reviews.Content: The system is very easy to install and operate.  In 30 minutes or less, the sensors were ready to use.We like the fact that monitoring is not required, but optional in varying levels of coverage.

Reviews.Title: Good System
Reviews.Author: Gerald Bamburg
Reviews.Content: This is a very good system for the money. It was easy to setup and activate. Support was also very helpful when contacted, and the best part is no contract and no pressure.

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: Edward Dunn
Reviews.Content: System is nice - easy to install and seems to work well.  We like the  simplicity and ability to set the home mode so we can move around the house without setting off the motion sensor.  It doesn't interfere with life!  Our only issue was some confusion for us non-techies with the instructions, particularly the test when all was done.  We ended up having to call to see if in fact we had tested the system.

Reviews.Title: WOW! What a great product!
Reviews.Author: Russ
Reviews.Content: Excellent price and obviously high quality.After a string of burglaries in our neighborhood - the last one ended up in a hostage situation - A quality home security system became an imperative. Finding one that didn't take me to the cleaners financially was the problem. The price for the up-front investment is extremely reasonable when you consider the total cost of ownership over time. The system came completely pre-configured. I installed two motion sensors, 13 entry sensors, the keypad and the base station in under an hour. No wires to run, no holes to drill, and a completely simple to follow instruction guide. Built-in cellular technology means no risk of having the phone lines cut. Key chain remotes make it so easy to turn on and off. Now my family sleeps safely at night and has a renewed sense of security in our home. THANK YOU SIMPLISAFE TEAM!!!!

Reviews.Title: simpli satisfied
Reviews.Author: Dawn Britcher
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Simpli Safe alarm system and so far I am completely satisfied with the product, the customer service and the quick response I receive on my emails. Have not had to experience the dispatch service and hope top not but expect that to be great also. Thank you simpli safe for making me feel comfortable again to leave my home.

Reviews.Title: The Best residecial alarm system
Reviews.Author: h20pigret
Reviews.Content: This unit is exactly as advertized. No gimmics or lies.  Easy to install as long as you can read.And, once it is installed, all you have to do is  remember when to turn it on and off.  That simple.

Reviews.Title: I am quite impressed
Reviews.Author: Alexander J Kosowski
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure how well everything would work wirelessly but even though I have a fairly large home (5000 Sq Ft) all the sensors connected quite easily.  I did order some extras that had to be manually added but the add/remove components feature is very simple.  I ended up adding an extra keypad and a few extra sensors.I am also impressed that everything is done through the cellular connection with no real need to connect to a router.Overall it was very simple to setup and I appreciate the use of double sided tape that is removeable to relocate sensors.The smartphone App is fairly simple but is definitely useful enough to justify paying a little more per month.

Reviews.Title: Simpliy safe is simple & safe
Reviews.Author: Janani Jayshankar
Reviews.Content: Love the no contract, low monthly customizable monitoring. The wireless installation is really simple, & is as simple as the instalaltion video on youtube. The system has a nice & easy test mode to ensure your sensors are working. We simply LOVE it

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: john murney
Reviews.Content: As a commercial contractor, I am very impressed with the equipment and the customer service. Would recommend this system to my clients.

Reviews.Title: Hat finder
Reviews.Author: Hat finder
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly.  Installed easily.  Had a glitch about selecting service plan - so the base station kept blinking.  Got step by step instructions from customer service to correct this.  Used stick on tape mounts and while they don't seem especially secure when pushed unto the wall, time will tell how well they continue to stick to the wall.  Far prefer the tape to putting holes in places to mount.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had this years ago
Reviews.Author: Brian Matthew
Reviews.Content: Since I had to install this myself I feel more in control of my home security.  I choose where the sensors and everything went.  I like that this product is upgradeable.  Saves money each month.

Reviews.Title: Simply Safe wireless home security
Reviews.Author: steve rizzo
Reviews.Content: Price is awesome.  This is the second system that I have in 2 of my rental units.  I only have one monitored now, but will be connecting both to live monitoring when tenants move in.  Would give 5th star if I knew how to have both accounts linked for easy management and password simplization

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Good & Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Karina Razo
Reviews.Content: This system seems pretty good. I've had it for a couple of weeks and it works as they say it does. Its VERY simple to install and works like any of the other well known companies but without the contracts and high monthly payments. The equipment does look a bit dated but it works well and honestly Im not paying for looks, Im paying for service and reliability, and this system offers that.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Cranford
Reviews.Content: System works great, easy installation and connection. I looked at several different security systems and decided on Simplesafe because there was no long term contract. In addition, system does not require a land line.

Reviews.Title: Qualty
Reviews.Author: Wayne H Jones
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a well built system for the home.  The siren that comes with the tower is not very loud, so I had to order an extra one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Terry Claessens
Reviews.Content: It was as easy to install as was advertised. The only negative is the few times I've called with questions I had to wait for them to call back and then sometimes I wasn't available when they called. But they did call back the same day.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe 2 Wireless Home security system
Reviews.Author: Julius Maros
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied so far with both your equipment and service. It was very easy t install and is working greay.

Reviews.Title: Product and service is as advertised!
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: I recently installed our system consisting of numerous entry and motion sensors and could not be more pleased. The install was easy and the sensors are of better quality than imagined. The command strips are very sturdy and will stick nearly anywhere you would need them to. The wireless service appears to be strong in our neighborhood so no worries there. One note, the base system's siren is only adequate if you are not looking for ear piercing sound. Consider purchasing the extra siren for this purpose. The sound is not important for us, wanted the police dispatch. Again, pleased so far. Product exceeding early expectations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Debra D Smith
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have is we did not receive panic button in our box or window decals. Customer Service told me they would send out panic button immediately. Thank-you for this system as it makes me feel better about my daughter living in a less then savory neighborhood. Still do not have decals, just yard sign.  Was very easy to install. Have ordered 2 more sensors.

Reviews.Title: So simple. Great feeling having someone watch the house when we are away.
Reviews.Author: schon st. clair
Reviews.Content: This system seems too easy to be real. Installation took minutes and everything tested properly upon completion. Anyone can hook this up. So far we are very happy with the system. Text alerts are another great feature

Reviews.Title: Simple and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect solution for our small 3 bedroom house.  I was able to have it completely installed and activated in under an hour!  Thanks for the great product.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for home security system
Reviews.Author: Tom Elkins
Reviews.Content: Took less than an hour to get it up and running. Pretty happy with it so far. I like the text option,

Reviews.Title: Affordable yet efficient
Reviews.Author: Vinoth
Reviews.Content: This is the only product that is affordable and yet delivers what is promised. Easy to install and setup and works without any issues till now.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Security System
Reviews.Author: John Milatz
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, No contracts, less expensive than other systems, quality product for the money. Tech help available any time.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLISAFE
Reviews.Author: Jim Gunsolley
Reviews.Content: I wanted a system that is wireless and not expensive.  Installation was fairly simple and straight forward.  The system seems to be operating just fine.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe alarm
Reviews.Author: Jerry w. Herald
Reviews.Content: Just purchased the Simplisafe alarm , I am well pleased with the ease of installation and the support you get from simplisafe. At this point it is everything they say it is. I would recommend this system too everyone looking for an alarm.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Security - Simple, Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: christopher birdsong
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, comprehensive solution to home security needs.  Rating would have been higher, but had difficulty getting monitoring service to begin working.  Technical support was able to assist, but more concise troubleshooting information would have been recommended.Overall satisfied with the purchase, hope I don't have to use it!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and so flexible!
Reviews.Author: LeZebra
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of security systems in my lifetime, but this one is as close to perfect as I've come.  No strangers in my house  to install it!  I did myself in less than a half hour.  And, the piece de resistance?  NO CONTRACT.  For someone who has paid on a contract for two years AFTER removing the security equipment,  this was a no-brainier.

Reviews.Title: Especially for DIYers
Reviews.Author: Ann Ellis "Trying Hard"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE our system.We didn't have to have a stranger come into our house to drill holes in the walls.We decided what we needed and built the system around OUR needs, not some salesman that came by the house.The people in the customer service are very nice! They are very helpful when you have questions.Do your homework. Make your decision based on your own needs.Don't be afraid to ask questions!You pay for THIS system up front, so you can take it with you if/when you move!

Reviews.Title: Great security system for the value.
Reviews.Author: Tinar
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Simplisafe online on a Sunday evening.  I was notified my full order was shipped on Monday morning!  I chose the ground shipping option and my system arrived intact with everything I ordered on Friday afternoon.  Installation was very easy, you do not need to be technical or even need any special tools.  Instructions provided were clear and activation was also a breeze.What I liked about Simplisafe:-there are no contracts or long term commitments for the monitoring service like the other big brand companies.- It is also so easy to install, and remove, I can take this system with me to my next home when my 1 year ease is up!- not having to bother with the annoying third party vendors and scheduling a person to come into your home to install your system.  Easy do it yourself guide.- low monitoring monthly fees.  for the price of 3 cups of coffee I can have that extra sense of peace that my home is protected.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Jenn Coyle
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my apartment after having used it in a house, so choosing to use SimpliSafe again was an easy decision. I never thought to have a security system in an apartment, but because it doesn't require a landline and can go with me to my next apartment easily.SimpliSafe helps me feel safe when I'm at home and while I'm away. The mobile app and text notifications are amazing features.The extra pin capability allows me to give a pin to my landlord (and whoever else) so I know if they enter.The monthly cost is low, especially when considering how important my safety and peace of mind is.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan14 "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: We've only had the system for a week, but we feel very secure. It was so easy to install. I love that we can pick our price and that we can add pieces over time. Great so far!

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: John D Gordon
Reviews.Content: I was recently burglarized, in spite of having a competing (traditional) alarm system... the company (who shall remain nameless, though their initials start with A) has called me on several occasions due to false alarms, but somehow managed not to call me when it really mattered...  they then offered me the chance to have my service charges increased "so they could maintain their "excellent" service.... needless to say it was time for a change...the SimpliSafe system was easily installed, and thus far I have nothing but the best to say about it, not to mention half the cost!

Reviews.Title: Great system at a reasonable cost
Reviews.Author: OleMsFan
Reviews.Content: This is a very easy to install system.  Only took about 30 minutes to set-up.  Additionally, it is considerably cheaper for not only the hardware itself but the monitoring as well relative to the other options available.  I couldn't be happier with our choice.

Reviews.Title: awesome alarm ADT has nothing on this
Reviews.Author: lugo
Reviews.Content: There nothing I could say but buy it that's all I have to say great heavy duty don't feel cheap at all great material I accidentally set alarm off by accident and recieve a call in less then 10sec and the customer support is great

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: brian buckner
Reviews.Content: I added 10 additional door switches, 4 additional motion detects along with additional sirens etc.. My house is 3500 sq.ft. The whole system is programmable and took 30 minutes to install. After working with the program 5 minutes, I can now change all the sensors around to when my grandchildren come over. I can honestly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Simple and safe
Reviews.Author: Ivan E. Peterson
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install -- no wires to run.  Wireless technology is a real plus.  Monthly monitoring is inexpensive but has flexibility if you want to spend more for additional services.  Initial cost is very low and there are several packages to meet anyone's needs and the availability of additional sensors to customize your own protection.

Reviews.Title: If you try anything else, you will have wished you'd tried SimpliSafe first.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Harris
Reviews.Content: I looked around and around before finally finding this company via Facebook. My initial draw was that they require NO CONTRACT! That's just one of the many positives I've experienced, here are some more...-Low monthly monitoring fee (I chose the $25, the highest monitoring package available)-Easy to install equipment (it seemed everything was already programmed which made setup a cinch, overall took me about 20 minutes for complete install)-Friendly & Helpful customer service-Quality & Reliable equipment-Option to add individual monitoring pieces-App for phone (or other devices) that gives you on the spot status update of your system with ability to arm and disarm remotely-Text and email alert ability-60 day money back guarantee-Endorsed by Dave Ramsey...(might sound silly as having been a selling point, but I trust this man's financial advice)My only hesitation was the initial upfront cost of the package. I purchased the Economy package. It was everything I needed. Just the cost was a lot for me. I quickly realized though...it was an investment and after crunching the numbers in comparison to other companies, I was still financially going to come out on top with this choice.I will say it again...If you try anything else, you will have wished you'd tried SimpliSafe first.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This system does exactly what we wanted it to do.  No wires, inexpensive monitoring, inexpensive components, easy installation.  The Smartphone App is great too - if the wife forgets to arm the system I can do it from my phone wherever I am - and we only need the one Key Chain remote, as my phone serves as my remote.  I actually used the SimpliSafe Web site to buy the system because I wanted to'tailor' the components in our system.  The Amazon site is awesome though because without the excellent range of reviews I might not have gotten enough detail to make a good decision.  A little feedback for SimpliSafe - a tiny thing figuratively and literally - the supplied 1/4 inch long entry alarm mounting screws aren't quite long enough to mount on door frames that have the decorative raised molding designs.  No problem - I invested another 96 cents or so at our local hardware to buy eight 1/2 inch screws that have sufficient length to bore into the recesses of the decorative door frame molding.  As I said, that's 'the biggest thing I have to warn any body about'.  Oh - one more thing - if like me you would like the temperature readout on the SmartPhone app to give a reading, spend the bucks for the Freeze Warning sensor.  I thought the Wireless Controller somehow did the sensing for temperature, but it does not - you need the Freeze Sensor.  Altogether an awesome system at any price, let alone at this very affordable price point.

Reviews.Title: The self-install security system that calls someone who can actually help...
Reviews.Author: Brandon D. Smith
Reviews.Content: With wireless home security systems, I am comfortable installing the newer ones myself. The key differentiator for SimpliSafe is the fact that they actually allow you to use a (responsive) 24/7 security monitoring service that will actually call and dispatch the police if you need help. If my security system goes off, a text message to my personal number isn't going to do me much good.  I want the police to respond, and SimpliSafe is one of the few, self-install systems that allows for this. Add the fact that software setup is clean and quick and cellular connectivity is standard, and this is the best system I could find.We've been Broadview/Brinks/ADT customers for over 10 years... and we've been fortunate that our monitoring rates haven't crept up as high as everyone else. However, we were still paying around $34/month for basic security monitoring on our system. As we've moved to a voice over IP (VOIP) home phone solution, we were seeing larger inconveniences in using ADT through our landline and became increasingly worried over a bad guy cutting our connectivity before breaking into the house.So, we did some digging and found great reviews of people using SimpliSafe.  We held off for a while because they didn't have a glass break sensor and it would cost us up front to switch to them, even if the monthly fees dropped by half. We also had some false assumptions about the system that was already installed in our house. It turns out, not every window was covered in the hard-wired system. Once we found that out and SimpliSafe added the glass break sensor, we jumped at the chance to switch.Setup was quick and easy. When we put the system into test mode, our sensors responded AND we received a test call from the security monitoring service before we could even reach the first sensor to test it.  The only downside we see is that the contact sensors for doors and windows are a little bulkier than some of the competitors.  This system doesn't connect via Z-wave and do home automation, but at the end of the day: I want our security system to work... don't really care if it's integrated with our lights at this point.

Reviews.Title: Excellent alarm system!
Reviews.Author: Robert B
