Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with the system. It’s reasonably priced, easy to install and works beautifully. This system is as good as any $1500 one out there. Love the interactive monitoring on my Smartphone.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Choice for Home Security
Reviews.Author: GJDiggins
Reviews.Content: Saw this advertised on a Kim Komando newsletter. Her recommendations are always accurate. This was a good purchase. I recommend SimpliSafe2.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is easy to set-up
Reviews.Author: Stephen Henry
Reviews.Content: I found to equipment easy to set-up. The customer service and help has been great! However, I did have trouble synchronizing the system and had to call SimpliSafe to clear an error signal. The computer instructions were hard for me to follow.

Reviews.Title: Could not be easier
Reviews.Author: Thomas Sudol
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe system is quality home protection at an affordable price. Received my system, followed the simple directions and was up and running within an hour. I researched a number of monitored alarm systems (ADT, Vivint among them) and decided on SimpliSafe. Count me as a very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: easy setup and great support
Reviews.Author: Mitch White
Reviews.Content: Set the system up in a very short time and I'm not the most technical type person. Anyone could do it. Call center responded very fast when I tested the system . I especially like that I choose how to arrange the sensors and can easily add sensors which I'm going to do.Also liked that it allows you to use an existing phone line and the cellular transmitter giving redundancy

Reviews.Title: Relieable and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Mary Tucker
Reviews.Content: Installation took about three hours with all the extra sensor I added. At first had a slight problem connecting to monitoring site, but a simple phone call: They showed me how to do a reset and we were A-OK. Response was fast and complete.  I hope they add a strobe light/horn siren unit later.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe makes it Simplieasy to make yourself Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: c
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed the Simplisafe's product and customer support. If you want an easy to install and use burglar/fire/water/CO2, monitored security system, try Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Super Easy installation
Reviews.Author: Saradhi B. Cheruvu "VSaradhi"
Reviews.Content: Though the initial equipment cost is a bit on the higher side, I really like it. Installation was easy and it worked without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Cmt
Reviews.Content: We researched a lot of companies and thought Simplisafe had the most to offer for the best pricing.  We went on line 5 days ago and already it has served us well.  We did not think we needed the water sensor, but yesterday our drains backed up while the washing machine was running.  I heard the alarm and before I could respond to it, we received a phone call letting us know there was a problem.  Wow.  saved our drywall.  Great Monitoring, easy to install and very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Great Security System
Reviews.Author: Raquel Santos
Reviews.Content: I love this system!  It was easy to install and a great value!  It works well and I haven't had any issues yet.  I would recommend this to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Save Money equipment and Insurance
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is a great way to protect your home. You choose what you want cover and you install it yourself. The install is easy. It will even walk you through it. Lowes offers move devices and services but you can't get a discount on your insurance with them. I think as time goes on Simplisafe will catch up. In the meantime it is a very good system to use.

Reviews.Title: works & easy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i have  had it for 2 weeks . it was  easy to install.  everything seems to be working well.  have tested it several time & had one actual alarm

Reviews.Title: Discreet security syystem
Reviews.Author: Jeannie
Reviews.Content: I just installed it and I like the arrangement without  wires, which an intruder can cut or otherwise disable...the bum will have to really LOOK to find this one!!  It might take a little practice for dinosaurs like us to get the knack of it, but test mode went well.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a "simple" security system.

Reviews.Title: Great system for the money
Reviews.Author: Edward Margarit
Reviews.Content: Great product - would buy again.  Only issue is that make sure you have good cell service... I don't so I have to place the base unit in a less than ideal location.

Reviews.Title: Good System
Reviews.Author: Chuck S.
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to set up.I like that it is wireless and don't require any holes in walls.Overall very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: All ok
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to installed as indicated in the documentation. So far there have been no issues with the system. I even tested the water and freeze sensor.

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: deb naylor
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Very easy to set up!  Great follow up to be sure we're happy as well!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Simpisafe Home Security Review
Reviews.Author: Jeff Boals
Reviews.Content: Love my new Simplisafe alarm system. Great prices, easy to install, no contracts!  I would recommend for anyone looking for a home alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Only way to go.
Reviews.Author: Howie
Reviews.Content: What a great ID! Took about one hour to install. Need a little help to activate the help line on the phone was great and was activated in five minutes. Spent some extra money to puts sensors on each window in the house. But that was just a fractional what ADT charges. Well worth the money would highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Well thought out system.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Jacques
Reviews.Content: Just put my SimpliSafe system into service. The installation was quite easy and the instructions on the USB key chain remote are well written and easy to understand.The "TEST" process goes well. I am impressed by the announcements from the base unit. I have had no glitches in either installation or implementation of the system. I recommend it highly for a condo such as mine.

Reviews.Title: Works 10 times better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Robert Lewis
Reviews.Content: I live in a townhouse right now and installed the $330 system from their site.  I'm pleasantly surprised with how well the system works.  Love the $25/month package that allows me to arm/disarm the system from my phone.  Took me about 30 mins to install.  I'd say at least give it a shot.  I'm pleased and would recommend it to anyone.  I definitely feel more secure.

Reviews.Title: Great product, excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Johnny Beans "vaboy118"
Reviews.Content: I had another DIY security service at another house. They charged considerably more for cel service. These guys are all wireless, including the sensors and the alarms.  Very easy to install including installing additional sensors after the fact. ( the ones you buy at the getgo are already programmed into the control unit.) I had 2 issues. First I can't get tmobile at my house. At first they replaced the cel unit. Still no luck. Than they switched to a verizon base and it works fine. I also had an issue with the smoke alarm.  It was eating the battery and it would start beeping in the night. Why do these things never beep during the day? Anyway they were very cooperative and all parts were replaced free under warranty with no bs about it. Highly recommended.Note the cel service is included in the monitoring fee. You don't pay more.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Kristi Harrison
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install and set-up. Very easy to use and we feel a lot more secure. Would recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Shocking Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Joshua Cantrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Simplisafe kit and additional sensors a few weeks ago.  After the kit arrived, I unpacked it and began my installation.  I know this may sound crazy, but it took me longer to unbox the product fully than it did to install the keypad, 14 window sensors, motion sensor and base station.The system activated with no issues, and the online control panel you get access to when you purchase monitoring is a nerd's dream.  You can customize virtually every facet of the system to your tastes.If you're looking for an affordable do it yourself alarm system, you've found it.

Reviews.Title: The Name Says It All
Reviews.Author: Steve Hanan
Reviews.Content: As advertized on the Glenn Beck (The Blaze) program, SimpliSafe was easy to install and now our home is safe and secure.  I initially had difficulty receiving a cell signal here in our more rurual area.  Their technical support team responded quickly and had an answer for that; they quickly sent me a new wireless communications circuit board to swap out in my base station.  This allowed me to connect to a different provider that had a stronger signal; problem solved.  Even that replacement board was easy to replace only took a few minutes.  I discovered after receiving and installing the 8 piece "Classic" package I had chosen to buy, there were three other entry points I originally hadn't considered necessary to protect that really should be secured.  So, it was so easy to order and add three more entry sensors to the system.  I would recommend SimpliSafe to anyone who's looking for their first security system, or, wanting to upgrade an older system.Thanks SimpliSafe!Steve & Jackie from Aurora, OR

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is a great alarm system for your home
Reviews.Author: Disapoined
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is a great alarm system for your home, there is no contracts or installation fees. I installed my in just minutes. From all my doors and windows to my shed next to the house. very easy to add on more sensors at a later time also. I added Smoke detectors that will protect my home from fire and intruders. Works great with my smart phone also, can turn the alarm on and off anywhere I am. Its great for letting someone in your home without giving them a code. I have no false alarms either. Over all I rate this system A+

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe 2 8-piece plus security system
Reviews.Author: harry
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this system. I was afraid to begin setting it up, but it went without a flaw. It is everything simplisafe says it is and I am 100% pleased.

Reviews.Title: best home alarm for DIY or from the big companies.
Reviews.Author: John Benckenstein
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research. This is the best system available at any price, and the price is reasonable. So far the alarm response and system performance (I pay for the top monitoring with android ap) has been more than expected. It worked right out of the box with clear instructions and very intuitive menus. The added capabilities of the most expensive $25 per month monitoring is equal to or better than other companies $35 versions with 36 month committments. I use the secret alarm feature to get texts of certain entry triggers that do not trigger the alarm,  like my doggie door.

Reviews.Title: who needs ADT / Slomin
Reviews.Author: Alan Haines
Reviews.Content: A step in the right direction for consumer choice. So easy to install. The towers cellphone reception did not work in our area and within days a replacement component was provided for an alternate carrier. Works perfectly now!

Reviews.Title: Great product...great company
Reviews.Author: G. Green "gresco"
Reviews.Content: Doing business with Simplisafe was very easy, their staff is very accomadating, and the systems are affordable. The system was neatly packaged, very user friendly to install, and easy to use. I'm very pleased with mine. I also like being able to monitor activity online while I'm away. ...puts me at ease.  My only complaint would be that some parts of the manual are very difficult to read without a magnifying glass and strong light. The symbols showing keypad buttons are poorly printed. Otherwise Simplisafe has done their homework and provided a great product. I will probably add a few more sensors when I return from this trip.

Reviews.Title: Overall satisfied so far
Reviews.Author: teresa
Reviews.Content: So far we like the system.  It was easy to install.  The only issue we have had so far was one false alarm.  There is one (of 2) motion sensors that has a very slow response time when I test the system.  I have to stand in front of the device and wave my arms and has taken as long as 45 seconds to respond and initiate the alarm count down.  Also for the money another sticker or two would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Great system with exceptional customer support!
Reviews.Author: Steven Rathbun
Reviews.Content: Extremely impressed with our recently installed SimpliSafe security system.  Experienced some cellular connectivity problems initially (we live in a very rural area), but SimpliSafe's customer support resolved the issue.  Probably the best customer support we've ever dealt with.  Quick to respond and lived up to their promises.  Even called to check on us when they hadn't received a test signal.  We spent the past 10 years with a contracted security monitoring company.  Sure the electronics and installation were "free" up front, but we paid for the system multiple times over through a contract obligation.  I can attest to the superior quality and service of the SimpliSafe system compared to our previous system.  Loved the fact that it's wireless, easy to install, has no monitoring contract requirement, and provides exceptional customer support.  Because we're in such a rural area, we don't have a landline telephone, so the cellular monitoring capability was the primary decision maker for us.  We intend to recommend this system to family and friends!

Reviews.Title: Great System !
Reviews.Author: ReidoP
Reviews.Content: Everything is as advertised - easy to install, easy to program & easy to use. I had a problem hooking up to the alarm service via cellular - talked to customer service (who are excellent and knowledgeable) - they sent me a new module and I was up and running 10 minutes after I received it.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Peter Bush
Reviews.Content: I am new to the simplisafe alarms, but so far everything has been great. Ease of installation, and fantastic support. I hope it remains the same.

Reviews.Title: Awesome System
Reviews.Author: Tom Albertsen
Reviews.Content: After much research and deliberation, I decided on SimpliSafe as my first home security system.  The features, monthly monitoring fees, and the reviews provided by current SS customers made for a reasonably easy decision.  The customer forum was also a bonus as many of the questions I was having were already asked and answered there.  And, the customer support has been great.  My emails and phone call were handled in a friendly and expedient manner.Once we got the replacement Verizon card in the base station, the system has worked flawlessly!  I also like the straight-forward installation procedure, and the new features which now include the glass break sensor which allowed me to easily have security for my garage.

Reviews.Title: excellent system at a very reasonable price
Reviews.Author: CHAR
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have discussed installing a security system but never pursued doing so.  However, after attempted break-ins at two of our neighbors' homes, we changed our minds!  On the evening before one of the burglary attempts, we were watching an episode of "Ask This Old House" and one of the features was the installation of a SimpliSafe system!  The next day, after the burglary attempt, we researched the system on-line and liked what we read and compared it to the promotion given on the TV program.  The product was delivered within 3 days and was a very simple installation, with easy to follow directions and hints. The system is easy to use and came with options that work well for our home and lifestyle.  We have since recommended the system to other neighbors and friends.  We also like that it is something we can take with us to another home.

Reviews.Title: Simpli Safe works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Dennis McCarthy
Reviews.Content: The system works exactly as it is advertised.  The installation was quick, simple and painless and so far so good.I do wish you could purchase ala carte right out of the gate, vs. having to start with a preconfigured system and then adding items.  While that really isn't a big deal, their web site makes going back and forth to add items to the cart kind of cumbersome.  But .. in the end, we got what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and operate - no contract!
Reviews.Author: Charles Hunsucker
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe  provides a great alternative for those who want to protect their homes without an expensive wired system and a long contract. Easy to self install and operate, very intuitive.  Monthly monitoring appears to be lowest cost in the industry. Also very easy to add components as needs arise.

Reviews.Title: Simple Security
Reviews.Author: Mr. D
Reviews.Content: I chose the SimpliSafe Security system after considering many of the competitors.  it was easy to install and set up.  There is no contract, and I can take it with me when/if I move.  The price of the sensors, base station, alarms, etc. was fair.  It does what it is supposed to do.  The monitoring is a reasonable and fair $14.99 per month with no hidden charges.  It is easy and convenient to use, and the bottom line is that my property is safe.  There is always help on call and/or online, and there is online data available showing the timeline of any and all activity (sensor activation, etc.) involving the security of my home 24/7.  It's a good deal.  If you have not checked it out and you want security without the tie-down commitment that many require, check out SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Malcolm S Colgate
Reviews.Content: This is the second unit I have purchased.  I left the previous unit in my former home forthe new owner.  For the price, it is a good value.  I like the fact I can change my monitoringsubscription as my needs change as there is no contract.  You can even run the systemwithout monitoring.

Reviews.Title: PEACE OF MIND
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: I HAVE TWO HOUSE ,BOTH WITH THESE UNITS..EASIEST SET UP AND INSTALL I HAVE EVER SEEN OR HEARD ABOUT.GIVES PEACE OF MIND AT HOME OR AWAY..THANKS ...GML,HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT

Reviews.Title: There really is someone waiting to answer your questions.
Reviews.Author: Keith Sadler
Reviews.Content: You get an A+ for customer support!!!  I was activating our new system and when it appeared that after 15 minutes the system was not completely activated, I called to get some tech. support.  The individual with whom I spoke was confident and did not need to check with anyone else before answering my questions and talking me through a series of steps which resolved my problem.  This is refreshing.  A HAPPY NEW CUSTOMER  Keith Sadler

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Pat Walke
Reviews.Content: We are loving our new Simplisafe system.  It was so easy to install, set up and use.  I would recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install - so far so good!
Reviews.Author: jodeg
Reviews.Content: We ordered the alarm system, plus 13 sensors and the extra loud alarm, after we saw it featured on This Old House.  We've only been using it about a week, but so far, we love it!  Very easy to install, practically idiot-proof!  Even though we're not using the monitoring service yet, the system still gives us a greater sense of security.  What's nice about this system, besides being so easy to install, is that additional components can be added any time.  The monitoring service can also be added at a later date, which I know will be comforting as we "age in place".  Thanks, SimpliSafe!

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: Chris Willis
Reviews.Content: So far so good.....about a month in....no issues. Seems to be a great product so far.....thanks simplisafe....no complaints here. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Even an old guy can install it!!!
Reviews.Author: EW LESHIKAR JR
Reviews.Content: Heard about the system from a friend.  He said the price was right and even I could install it.  He was correct. I am still in the 72 hour start up phase but ever thing is working as presented.  Just pray that it never has to be used as  designed.

Reviews.Title: Extremely pleased….
Reviews.Author: Jennifer K. Liles
Reviews.Content: It is hard to believe anything you hear or read these days without a personal reference so consider this an enthusiastic "thumbs-up"!We had an existing security system that was failing and needed a solution.After researching the big company offerings, I found SimpliSafe a wonderful alternative.We purchased 16 entry monitors, smoke alarm, motion sensors, panic button and high-decible alarm.  All was installed and up and running within an hour….honestly.It doesn't take a rocket-surgeon to install this system and there are so many references and videos to help along the way.Customer service is outstanding and we are glad to have made the investment.Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I was unsure about the system at first because I ran into several difficulties during installation (my base wasn't responding to the rest of the system). When I called the customer service line they were very helpful and informative. The sent me a new SIM card and when that didn't work they overnighted me a whole new base station. They even credited me a weeks worth of free service for the hassle. My system is now working great and I am very impressed!

Reviews.Title: A Really Great Home Security System
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: We are most pleased with our Simplisafe system.  It arrived as advertised and within an hour or so we had it installed and working perfectly. The instructions are clear and concise making the system very easy to install.  We love the keychain remotes.  We carry them with us all the time and when the occasional time comes when we need to turn off the system to open a door we can do it from wherever we are without needing to go to the keypad.Dave & Evelyn C

Reviews.Title: This is a no brainier, buy it
Reviews.Author: Robert Burk
Reviews.Content: Easy set up with great follow up. Cheap monthly fees. Works like a charm. Did the test and was called in less than 6 seconds

Reviews.Title: Save Money ya'll.
Reviews.Author: Fredric Slocum
Reviews.Content: It is a very simple system to install and did so in minutes. Mine came with the wrong command module, but the new one was overnighted and I am now protected with the same security at 1/4 the price I was paying with ADT. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Great product that Exceeds expectations.
Reviews.Author: Bryan H.
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Simplisafe2 Wireless System and first it was shipped promptly and when I received it I was little weary of how the installation was going to go.  Well much to my surprise it took much longer to watch the 2 minute video on their website on how to install the system than it did to actually install the system.  The next thing was I was wondering how well it was going to work and then I did encounter a Problem.  I only used three of the 4 door entry sensors so my system would not arm because the 4th door entry sensor was not installed.  I called tech support and it took me about a minute to take the 4th sensor off of the alarm system.  I called it a problem, but it really wasn't I was more than pleased with the system for the office so I bought one for my house and cancelled my current alarm and also my dad bought one.  This is not a gimmick product I am very glad I purchased the system.

Reviews.Title: Great Home System !!
Reviews.Author: Gary Benson
Reviews.Content: Great system !! Very easy to set up. I should have purchased this years ago. I can know have piece of mind that my home and family are safe while away or at home

Reviews.Title: It is easy!
Reviews.Author: Grandpa's Shop
Reviews.Content: I don't always believe what I hear on the radio but Simpli safe is what is advertised. It was easy to install and operate. The key chain fobs make it easy to activate or deactivate the alarm ad we come and go. Our house sits in the woods and cannot be seen by neighbors so it is comforting to have an alarm system. Hopefully we won't need to receive a call from monitoring but we are reassured that they are there if needed. I recommend this system to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: thetechguy
Reviews.Content: Pros - Easy to install, literally as easy as they say, peel and stick.  Installed the whole system (almost 40 items) in a 1/2 day in a 2500 sq foot house.  The keypads I decided to screw in to make it sturdy but even that was super easy.  Reception for the base was a little tricky on one side of the house, but no problems on the other side.  Awesome how it has CO2 and smoke detectors.  No wires to install - the old system required so much wiring in the attic - amazing!  Monitoring is cheaper.  Love the app, prob most used way to arm and disarm.  IOS and android and anywhere on the internet.Cons - keypad keys are not lighted, display is backlight.  Would like to see an armed LED or flashing light to see from afar system armed.  Also if zones open it will say 3 entry sensors open etc but won't show which ones, you have to go to the website and hit refresh under alarm settings - hopefully this functionality can be added to the app.  For a bigger house, you might want more sensors (limit is 41 or so now).  Generally plenty for avg size house!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Katrina Carlton
Reviews.Content: Very easy to put together. Easy to set alarm on or off. Thanks for making me and my family feel secure.

Reviews.Title: Like the unit.  Not sure how to test the monitoring service.
Reviews.Author: Scott M. Loftin
Reviews.Content: Manual says when the 24 hour monitoring is activated, I will get a phone call when I go into test mode and exit.  I tried this, but I did not receive any phone call  The use of test mode was reported in my online account, however.  Not sure how to test that they will call me without intentionally setting off the alarm.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe System
Reviews.Author: RiskStudent
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical since the price was so reasonable - but so far so good. Everything was packaged well and it works as advertised. The control center didn't work at first, but I removed and put the batteries back in which fixed the problem. I will buy some more equipment to expand coverage.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Clark
Reviews.Content: System doing what it advertised it would do, the only issue I had was connecting with dispatch through the system’s built-in T-Mobile cellular system.  It was an easy fix, just unplugged the system and removed the batteries then put the batteries back in and plug the system back in and I was connected. I suspect the problem was probably cause by me, I purchased the system and installed the initial sensors, then decided I wanted additional sensors. I the made three more purchases bringing the total sensor from the original 16 to 19 to 20 then to 24 (included adding an additional keypad). All the was done before I went live so I suspect the system may have got out of sync with all the changes/additions I made to sensors.

Reviews.Title: My initial thoughts on Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Richard Heimlich
Reviews.Content: I was using another wireless DIY system for the past 2 1/2 years. There became an issue with their contract with a certain cellular service provider. I live out in the country and do not have access to standard internet and have to use satellite. The cell provider they were using for my area was no longer an option since they lost the contract with them. I looked into Simplisafe and it was the same type of system as the one I had been using. The cell service they had available was one that happens to have excellent service in my area. The monitoring cost for the interactive monitoring was about half the cost ($42.98 with the old and $24.99 with Simplisafe). The features on the site are not as detailed as the other provider but acceptable. The system was just as easy to set up and the cost of the equipment was much cheaper. I liked the fact that I bought the equipment rather than using it for free and having to return everything when they cancelled my 3 year contarct (which Simplisafe has no contract). One thing that really bothered me with the old company is that they lost the contract at the end of December 2013. I called when my system wasn't working and they had their engineers look into it. I received an e-mail from them that there was an issue and they were sending me a new cellular gateway. 2 weeks later, I received teh new gateway and installed it. It worked for the first 3 days. I contacted them when it stopped working and, again, they said their engineers would look into it. 3 weeks went by and I heard nothing from them. It is now March and my system hasn't worked for over 2 months. When I called to find out waht was going on, they said they would have to call me back. I got the call about an hour later and was told they could no longer provide service to me an dI needed to ship back their equipment. They sent return labels and I had to box it up and send it back. I went online to get some information from my account and it had already been closed.So far there have not been any issues with Simplisafe and as long as it keeps going like it is now, I will be happy.

Reviews.Title: A+  Everything should be this simple.
Reviews.Author: Keith Barker
Reviews.Content: Amazing and simple system  It was installed in less than 30 minutes, and I love the ability to control and see status of the system through my smart phone.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "pntimm"
Reviews.Content: The ordering was all done online. Instructions were very clear. Installation of sensors on 7 windows, 3 doors and a smoke detector were all a  snap. System has been operational for 1 week with no issues. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: jay desalvo
Reviews.Content: Great system. Easy to install. Intuitive. They have thought of everything. I called customer service to ask a question about whether or not I could paint a sensor ( you can by the way). They answered right away and were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The greatest system and set up was so easy. Your support group was very helpful answering any questions. I have been with another security system for three years and they just kept going up in price. This is the system for me could not be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: What a DEAL.
Reviews.Author: CT Weber
Reviews.Content: I got a quote from a local security company, another from Time Warner and then I saw a review on CNET for this system. CNET gave it Editor's Choice so I tried it. Easy to install and at the right price....a third of what the others wanted.  You really need to consider this system.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Deborah M.
Reviews.Content: received my package promptly and had no problems with installation.  I will be adding additional equipment to our system and with information form our police department will sign up for your monitoring.  Someone tried braking into our second home in Georgia and after installing the system our first night with the system on "home" it gave my husband and I much needed comfort.  Thanksssss

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: It doesn't get any easier than Simplisafe. Exactly what i was wanting. A do it your self kit. My wife was not wanting this alarm now she doesn't want to be with out it. Simplisafe is up gradeable at anytime, You can change plans and dog proof. I Highly recommend this product.  another important thing  if the power goes out,cable is out or phone is out this still works.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLISAFE is AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Kimbro
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is AMAZING! The setup took 5 minutes.. we had ADT for 10 years and the dog or the wind from a window would set if off! 24.99 and every year the service stayed the same and the price kept going up.  In the end we were paying almost $50!  The monitoring fits our budget and I plan to order a system for my daughters apartment!  Our alarm went off this week (husbands fault) and I got a call and they were pleasent and concerned!  I will recommend this system to ANYONE!

Reviews.Title: Just like advertised
Reviews.Author: Alan J Bergstrom
Reviews.Content: When I heard about the Simplisafe approach I was suspicious but it set up as quick as could be and has performed as advertised.  I like that I can choose when the system is monitored and can have as much online access as I want.  I had to submit a permit for my city and the servicer people walked me through the process and even called the city office to clarify their submittal form.  I will be adding another system soon.

Reviews.Title: Home security
Reviews.Author: WBanko
Reviews.Content: I've found this system easy to install and easy to use. I contacted their support desk which was knowledgeable as well as helpful.  If you are looking for a home security system I would definitely recommend implicate.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: sujamel
Reviews.Content: I like SimpliSafe because I have full control over my system. I can add to it when I like. It does cost an arm and leg to get started.You can use your cell phone to keep tabs on the system and do any checks if you like. No high price contracts to deal with.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: PR TEXAS
Reviews.Content: the SimpliSafe home security system is just what we needed without the long-term contracts and expensive monitoring fees from the competition. Easy to install and program, but would have preferred more space on back plates for using wall anchors and screws in drywall mounts - the stick-em-ups just don't cut it for the heavier stuff. Overall, very satisfied. will update when we have an emergency.

Reviews.Title: Truly a Do It Yourself Wireless Intrusion Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Bob Jones
Reviews.Content: This Simplisafe2 System truly initializes automatically with all sensors right out of the box.  I've had other "DIY" Wireless Alarm systems and they were a big disappointment.  The Problem seemed to be that the base station would lose contact with the remote sensors.  Also, the technique you had to go through to sync up the remote sensors was cumbersome.  This Simplisafe2 is so easy because you can use a standard computer to set up your entire system so that each sensor when activated does exactly what you want it to do.  I initialized everything one time and the system has worked perfectly since then.  I even purchased some additional sensors, set them up with the PC software and first time on, they all worked.  I have already recommended the Simplisafe2 to my friends.  Great System.  Every claim made by the manufacturer has so far been right on.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST PRODUCT & CUSTOMER SERVICE ALL IN ONE
Reviews.Author: Adam Gilbert
Reviews.Content: I normally don't write reviews but for a product this well put together and the customer service behind the product they deserve a review.If you are looking for affordable, easy to use security than go with SimpliSafe. I looked at every security system out there and other than my gun you won't find a better way to go than SimpliSafe. Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Karen Prince
Reviews.Content: The price of they system is significantly less than the two other quotes that I had.  Both of those wanted to upcharge me for celluar based systems.  The installation was easy except for one door that had a particularly deep door jamb.  The base unit confirms the testing of each component so we were certain that everything was working properly.  There are about 3 different methods for insuring that you are setting up the system properly.  You can use the written instructions, go to the web site, or use the step by step program loaded onto the key fob.  The only thing that was a little confusing was the extra siren is programmed a little differenly than the other components, but I overlooked the written instruction in the box.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: Tom Snobarger
Reviews.Content: I ordered Simplisafe online and received my package in just a few days.  Installation was easy and quick as was the testing and activation.  I liked that the monitoring did not "go live" for 3 days after activation so we could get used to having an alarm system in the house.  I got online and ordered a couple of additional sensors and they were very easily added to the system.  So far we are very pleased with the system and would give it a high recommendation.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: Paul Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend SimpliSafe for those considering a home security system. I have found Simplisafe to be a professional company that delivers on their promise. They have a quality product that is a breeze to setup. Within a half hour I had my system setup and my family and I were testing the alarm. As promised, SimpliSafe notified me by email after the brief test mode period that my alarm monitoring system was active. SimpliSafe has made home security hassle-free and I must say enjoyable.Also, the city I live in requires a permit for a home alarm system and SimpliSafe notified me of this fact upon ordering the system. I was able to file a permit prior to receiving thesystem which had me ahead of the game. I appreciate a company that provides thorough service to assist their customers.

Reviews.Title: Easiest to install
Reviews.Author: GARY CARPENTER
Reviews.Content: Checked ADT and started hunting on Google for other systems. After reading your web site, decided to purchase the 8 piece plus 4 more entree sensors. Have since also purchased one more entree sensor plus smoke alarm. Very simply to install and directions were very well written. Love the web-site with the dashboard, history, monitoring, etc.My only complaint: I am 69 years old and my eyesight is not what it use to be and I do ware glasses, different ones for reading, driving, etc.: I wish the pad numbers and the screen vision numbers were larger. I almost have to put on my reading glasses to see the pad.My house was broken into a couple of months ago after 27 years here with no problems, thought it best to protect it now with your system. I would imagine a lot of your customers are up in age like myself, that's why I comment on the keypad.Thanks for a great product.Gary Carpenter

Reviews.Title: So easy and so efficient!!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: We have had our system connected for about 2 weeks.  Connected it up in about an hour (use the screws as the tape doesn't stick very well).  We are Very rural and had no problem connecting to the server.  The dash board feature is great and gives you a list of every time anything goes on with the alarm.  We are very impressed and happy that someone told us about this system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is everything that I heard Rush Limbaugh, Sean Hanity, and Glen Beck say that it was.
Reviews.Author: Wayne Schroader
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install.  The only problem that I had was that it came equipped with a T Mobile module, and we don't have any T Mobile coverage in our area.  However, after talking to a customer service guy, he informed me that he would send me a Verizion module to see if it would work.  He sent it at no charge to me, and it worked perfectly.  Again, I am very pleased with this system.  Very user friendly.  I', sixty and my wife is sixty three, and we find it very easy to use.  Thanks for all your help so far.  Wayne Schroader

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: Slade Shiflet
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and works like a charm.Great communication and support.Be smart and save some cash versus traditional alarm companies.

Reviews.Title: This was what I had been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: Kieth M.
Reviews.Content: No contract, a real quality system, expandable and monitoring for 15 bucks a month. How could a person go wrong on this deal. Well done.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up..works as advertised!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Jurca
Reviews.Content: After shopping on the internet for weeks, I deceided to go with SimpliSafe. The ease of a wireless system and the ability to change and or modify the system was unique.  The option to have the system monitored or remain a local alarm is a great idea.I am moving the sensors around the house and then testing the system to determine the best location for the motion sensors. The ability to do this is a plus.

Reviews.Title: As advertised, Straight forward install.
Reviews.Author: Paul Eric Patterson
Reviews.Content: choose - Recommendation by Dave Ramsey led me to review this productlike/dislike - Liked the prompt delivery, disliked my latency in submitting the orderrecommend - I have recommended this to all 3 of my adult children

Reviews.Title: Goood bacic system.
Reviews.Author: Stephen L Underwood
Reviews.Content: As a basic system with a low cost monitoring service it serves my needs well.  It is flexible & expandable.

Reviews.Title: East  to install and inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: We had the "other" system installed 3 years ago. Once it was installed and the salesman got our signature, we never heard from him again! The company sent us a letter every year informing us that they were raising the monthly fee. We we objected, they backed off. As soon as our contract was up, we cancelled and purchased the SimpliSafe system.The package arrived very quickly and the installation was a breeze! The customer service is excellent. We had a couple of questions when we were programming the system and the customer service phone was answered on the first ring. The problem was fixed immediately with simple instructions from the service rep.We are very pleased with our purchase and high recommend the SimpliSafe system.Oh yeah, the cost of monthly monitoring?...$15...3x cheaper than the "other guys"

Reviews.Title: easy setup
Reviews.Author: Randa J. Applegate
Reviews.Content: The instructions for setup were easy to follow.  The help desk answered all our questions.  I like the panic button next to my bed.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: John Q "rhemaguy"
Reviews.Content: I decided to go with Simpli Safe because of the price differential. It works just as well as the other more expensive companies for my needs. I have had other security companies before, and this does the same things the others do. It is easy to install yourself, and only takes a few minutes to do it. The extra alarm I purchased with my package would keep any intruders away once it goes off. No one could stick around once it goes off. It is a great product and I am well pleased with my purchase of Simpli Safe.

Reviews.Title: Safeguard Your House
Reviews.Author: Toni L. Ingram
Reviews.Content: After being in my home during a robbery, I knew it was time for a change.Your system was recommended to me by a true friend who already had Simplisafe. Both of us are very happy knowing we are far safer than before. I can sleep again!The system is beautifully designed, has options to fit your personal requirements,a great book of instructions, excellent customer reps,& the ability to refine things later if needed. Not having to commit to a 2 or 3 year contract was the final selling point! Another company (initials are like APD) was hard sell to a fault; your company has been first class all the way. I look forward to many years of the security that comes with Simplisafe.  Thanks for offering a better system!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be better!
Reviews.Author: BigMac
Reviews.Content: The system is all it was advertised to be.  We had it installed and operating on four entry doors in less than 20 minutes after we opened the box.  I can't think of any way it could be improved.

Reviews.Title: Flexible, Puts me in control
Reviews.Author: M. Elrod
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the system so far, but it has not been set off.  I like being able to change my settings on the computer or key pad and immediately activate them.  Installation was not hard - but I would like to make it known that the small part of the entrance sensors mate with the indented side of the larger piece.  The instructions were not clear about this point.  The USB remote softeware only works when I am logged in to the administrator account.  Customer Service is very available and willing to help.  I like that I can add more sensors etc when I want.  I also like the monitoring price.  Thanks, SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: I definitely feel safer.
Reviews.Author: M. Killoran
Reviews.Content: We have been using this system for 4 months and everything seems ok so far except for the motion sensor. We have 2 small cats and we had a false alarm once. Since then I disabled the motion sensor since I am paranoid it will set the alarm off again.The keypad started acting up after a few months but after replacing the batteries it seemed to resolve the issue.Other than that the service has been great. We are using the $25 service which includes text updates and the ability to control the system from your smartphone. My only complaint is that the system should have included the extra 105db siren. The siren on the base is ok but if youre' on a different floor, it's not very loud.

Reviews.Title: The best out there hands down
Reviews.Author: Kathy McLeod
Reviews.Content: I just love it and it is so easy to install, no strangers in my home just the bestThanks

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Dennis M Flynn
Reviews.Content: Works and installs exactly as described.  Couldn't be easier to install.  Not a single issue or problem yet.  Very economical peace of mind protection.

Reviews.Title: Good system once set up
Reviews.Author: RR Man
Reviews.Content: The system is easily installed by most users, however, ours wasn't programmed when it was received and 2 of the motion derectors were defective. To Simplisafe's  credit, both issues were addressed promptly.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLISAFE IS SIMPLIEASY
Reviews.Author: Richard Walker
Reviews.Content: took no more than 15 minutes to install and test.  great customer support.  compared the system to the one sold thru Lowes, and Simplisafe was the overall winner.Had a glitch with the carbon detector, and Simplisafe replaced it the next day!Product was reviewed in New York Times, and was also featured on 'This Old House' by Kevin who also gave the product his indorsement to a homeowner wanting to instal a wireless security system.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: jim walzak
Reviews.Content: I live alone and felt it would be a comfort to have an alarm system, but was a little hesitant about installing it myself. It was simple.The only negitive I have is that the sign to be placed outside the home does not come with any pole to stick in the ground, therefore you have to iimprovise or do without the sign.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe home security system
Reviews.Author: Don Ray Nelson
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as advertised and installation was easy and straightforward. I would recommend this to any other who asks about it.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Smyth
Reviews.Content: My husband and I installed the Simplisafe system in under10 minutes.  I like that it runs on a cellular system with no wires, I'm still protected if the electric goes out or someone cuts the phone or cable lines! Also, even though our original smoke detectors are hard wired into our electric lines, having a cellular one gives me more piece of mind.  And it's very easy to use.This is a wonderful system that I highly recommend to anyone considering home security.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Bob Dylan
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, easy to test and activate.I compared Simplisafe to ADT, read all the reviews and decided that Simplisafe was the best value for my money. I have not yet been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe what a great product
Reviews.Author: lin hill
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install and it is easy to use. I love the convenience of the key fobs.

Reviews.Title: DYI Security
Reviews.Author: Jason Khattar
Reviews.Content: SUPER easy to install both technically and physically.  From out of the box to installed in under 5 minutes.  2 very small issues.  One with Amazon and one with Simplisafe.Amazon-I went with the open box option to save a couple bucks...it was in great condition; however the device had actually been used and the default passcode was changed.  Simple fix, called Simplisafe and they reset in a matter of minutes great support.  1/2 star deduction here.Simplisafe-the 14.95 monthly monitoring is very basic.  If you want the bells and whistles, you will pay 24.95.  I normally wouldn't object to this, but for a company that's main advertising point is how other companies bait and switch, I felt they should be more obvious with their 3 tier pricing plan.  Again, not a big deal but worth mentioning.If I could rate 4 1/2 I would

Reviews.Title: Best choice in alarm systems
Reviews.Author: Michael Woolweaver
Reviews.Content: SimpiSafe is the 4th alarm system that I've had installed to protect my home and family and is the only one that I would honestly recommend it to anyone.  It is so simple to install and get up and running.  I did have a problem with the CO2 sensor and they sent me a new one without questions...  I love the fact that I can easily add additional components to my system.  The SimpliSafe application for my iPhone also is extremely easy to install and utilize - I use it almost every time I leave the house.  The final comment...I love not having a 2 or 3 year contract (as I did with ADT)...

Reviews.Title: excellent security system
Reviews.Author: Fred D. Smith
Reviews.Content: This system is very easy to install. I'm not a good handyman type guy, so if I can do it, almost anyone can. The support and customer service folks there have been great too. I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system!
Reviews.Author: Laura "DoodlesMama"
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Simpli safe a couple of weeks ago and it came rather quickly. It was easy to install and the customer service reps are great! They are patient and helpful. I like how you are able to buy extra sensors as you need them. You can customize your alarm system. I was able to print out a certificate to send to my insurance company to get a discount. Great system, highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Easy, effective, insurance discount
Reviews.Author: C M Currier
Reviews.Content: I live in rural colorado, with the history of wild fires the past few years, insurance has jumped dramatically.Simplisafe provides a cost effective solution to installing a home monitoring alarm very easily.additionally, the monitoring is just what you need, nothing more.Given the pets in the home, i feel much safer now if there is a fire, I have greater peace of mind that my animals will be saved quickly.highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic System
Reviews.Author: JIM E. JONES
Reviews.Content: The system I ordered arrived and was installed within 1 hour. The installation and testing went smooth, I only had to look at the instruction 1 time. The only thing I would recommend at the website would be advising that by paying for 1 year of the monitoring service, you will get 1 month free.

Reviews.Title: Simply and affordably Safe.
Reviews.Author: Don M. Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: The configuration of Simplisafe components I chose cost $300.00 with monthly monitoring at $15.  Compared to competing plans that offer free? equipment but with monthly fees of $50 to  $60, I am breakeven at 6 to 10 months with substantial savings going forward.  Installation was easy, but complicated by a base station battery that had to be pulled and re-inserted to establish contact.  I know that monitoring works by forgetting to turn off the system while stepping to the mail box which brought an immediate phone call wanting to know if all was well.  The alarm system has three settings off, home and away.  Off, completely disables the system.  Home ignores motion sensors allowing free movement through your home, but monitoring smoke, c02 and entry sensors.  The away setting monitors all sensors.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great
Reviews.Author: S. Parker "weekend baker"
Reviews.Content: It took less than 45 minutes to fully install. It works great. The ability to monitor the system remotely via my smart phone or laptop is a great feature. Initially I configured the system to send me text messages when the system was turned on or off. I quickly realized that this was eating up my monthly allotment of text messages. I now have the system send me emails instead.  I highly recommend Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Excellent wireless alarm system
Reviews.Author: R. Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: System installed with ease. Impressed with the wireless range and high tech design and function of the system. Additional benefit is the flexibility of adding and positioning alert sensors. The system alerts via email and/or cellphone of any activity and can be manipulated from your account online (with option selected). I had one issue during installation and customer support walked me thru it quickly. I would buy this system again and will be adding alarm sensors.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Sfilippi
Reviews.Content: This system is just what was advertised from Simplisafe....It was simple to install...Simple to to setup....And simple to activate....Also great monitoring prices!

Reviews.Title: Easy enough
Reviews.Author: Anne M. Roman
Reviews.Content: The installation seemed easy enough for my husband and the system is working well so far. We'll probably add a few more components now that we know it's going to work for us.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: David E Moen
Reviews.Content: Great system. Nice and simple to install and very affordable! Very much recommend it to anyone looking for a home security system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package
Reviews.Author: Stephen Borders
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe. It's simple and it's safe.  It's very simple to install. Directions are easy to follow. Testing and verification is very simple.Customer Service was Great. This is a Great system.One thing that could be better when ordering either on-line or over the phone - They need to ask what is the "best" cell phone service in your area and configure  the "base station" accordingly. My base station did not work very well due to the base station not being configured to the "best" cell phone carrier in my local area. It was fixed within two days. That said, this is a great system.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!
Reviews.Author: W Hathaway
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, easy to set-up and smart online.  I have zero complaints about it.  Very nice to check on your smart phone and see that all is well.  Great app.

Reviews.Title: Installation was a snap! Great System! Could use some functionality tweaks.
Reviews.Author: Robyn Watson
Reviews.Content: The Good.1. When it arrived, it was preprogrammed and activated easily.2. Installation was easy.3. I always have cell phone reception issues in my house, but haven't had any issues with the cell coverage on the base.4. I had a barn put up about 140' from the base and I put a motion sensor in the barn and now I get SMS alerts whenever anyone walks into the barn.The Bad.1. There was a problem with the rechargeable batteries, but tech support had them shipped to me and they arrived within 3 days.Functionality.The system needs some tweaks as follows and it would be a GREAT system.Entry Sensors.1. The alarm needs to say what sensor is being tripped in the house.  If the garage door opens instead of the doorbell noise, have it announce "Garage Door" or "Front Door" or "Rear Door" or "Patio Door".2. Same thing for windows.If this is not able to be done, have different selectable chimes for windows and doors that could be setup on the website.We can learn these different noises.  It only took my Golden Retriever about a day to figure out if the door sensor tripped that he needed to go to the door to greet someone coming into the house.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: JQ
Reviews.Content: Looks good and quite simple and easy to install, plug and play. Got it installed in 30 minutes, tested, all sensors, keypad, tower, panic  and keychain responded during the test. Now, the tricky part and it wasn't mention in the manual that it will not work on Macbook with mavericks, so I called customer service for help and I was told that it would work for older Macbook program, I tried my older one but so far no luck, still cannot read the system. So I was told again that the keychain remote is faulty.Still hoping that this alarm system will do good and by the way it's China made. Will update as soon as I can reconfigure the system.

Reviews.Title: Very happy so far
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Our daughter installed this for us and it is very simple to use and we really enjoy it.  As people in our 80's it makes us happy to feel more secure.  We have 4 panic buttons around our home and this makes us also feel secure if anything were to happen such as a heart attack or health issue.  Great system!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe 2
Reviews.Author: Victor Liu
Reviews.Content: So far I have had the Simplisafe 2 Wireless Security for about 1 month. So far the system works the way it should-when the connection is interrupted the alarm will go off within 30 seconds if a password is not entered into the keypad. It is very easy to install. The key fob works great as I am driving in and out of the house. My wife loves the key fob as it makes leaving and entering very easy.Issues:1. The central base station is too quiet. I am ordering the extra siren so people in the street can hear and so that if anyone is downstairs they can hear the alarm much better. I only have a two story home but it is longer than most. Also I wish the central base station can be turned up to indicate if an entry point is opened while the alarm is off. It is way too quiet.2. I would have liked the key fob to beep like a car alarm or indicate the alarm is set when the security system is turned off or on. The only way I know that the alarm was turned on while I leave is when I get a text message-and that comes after the 60 second count down to leave the house.3. The motion detectors have a 1-2 second delay when walking by it-not sure this is how other motion detectors work but I would assume that the motion detector should detect motion right away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: PapaT
Reviews.Content: While I have only had the system for a few weeks, I love it.  Installation was so simple and easy.  The instructions were very thorough.  Plus I have the added benefit on not being in a contract!  I am recommending Simplisafe to all of my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Effective
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed at how simple this system was to install. After moving into a new house, I was able to install a complete system in less than an hour.

Reviews.Title: Great Security Options for the Price
Reviews.Author: lawpnoy1
Reviews.Content: This system is excellent.  It is very easy to install and do it yourself, it took me about 2 hours to complete the installation in my home. Customer service is great as well, they forgot to ship an extra piece of equipment so I shot them an email.  They responded promptly and sent it over ASAP.  Great!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: Judith M Spakoski
Reviews.Content: Great self-install, easy to follow directions, everything worked right out of the box.  We've tested and practiced and no problems in our first week since install.  Signing up for monitoring was easy and the contact from both the security company and Simplisafe customer service has been excellent.  I feel we have a high level of support for our new security system.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Courtney "mikeretired"
Reviews.Content: So simple to install you have to wonder about the $900 installation charge that my local EMC was going to charge me.  Have had system less than a month but no problems so far.

Reviews.Title: So far, it is great
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: We are still learning how the system works and have had a few questions on the setup.  I have had great experience when I have called Simplisafe for help.  Everyone to whom I have spoken as been patient and informative.  They talk me through whatever issue I am experiencing and stay on the phone until the issue is solved.  I will certainly recommend SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Well Designed System
Reviews.Author: steven r
Reviews.Content: This system is easy to install and run.  I really like the design that sends a wireless alert that cannot be disrupted by an intruder.  The system has the included features of fire and panic.  Other items that can be added in the future.  When I am away, the designated neighbors can be called upon to help evaluate the situation before authorities are involved.A very good selling point was the reasonable cost of the communication center.We have always felt secure where we live, but gradual hearing loss, loss of physical ability, and uncertainties of the future have made getting a security system a good idea.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe2
Reviews.Author: Alvestus Williams
Reviews.Content: Received my SimpliSafe2 promptly and very easily installed in about an hour. Most items attached with 3m tape. I also havethe smoke detector and carbon monoxide sensor of which I used the included screws. Programming the package was easy andeverything works as advertised. So far, I am very happy with this alarm system and would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: An excellent system!
Reviews.Author: Philip
Reviews.Content: I rated Simplisafe 5 stars because of the economy of the system without sacrificing quality. I also experienced very helpful technical support. They spent time with me and helped me solve questions such as how to protect areas that I didn't think of until I installed the equipment.

Reviews.Title: This system is incredible
Reviews.Author: Gordon Schultz
Reviews.Content: I have always had professionally installed and monitored alarm systems in my business and homes.  I recently moved into this new house and have had this SimpliSafe alarm system for a couple of weeks.  It installed as easy as described.  Operates as easy as described.  We like the ease of adding or removing sensors.  We had to hang a little flashlight by one of the entry keypads because the foyer light is not very bright so I would like to see some sort of a little light offered.  I especially like being able to easily turn the system on or off from my cell so that I can let housekeepers and others in without relying on them to operate the alarm system properly.  Water leaks and resulting flood damage are a huge concern in Florida because we seldom have floor drains here.  We were able to easily add 3 water sensors to the system to catch any leak while it is still barely a trickle.  All of it can be monitored with our computers and most important our cell phones.  This SimpliSafe system has every type of sensor that I get with my other commercial systems at a fraction of the price and much easier modification and control.  I wish I could give it 7 stars!

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: JoeV. "JoeV."
Reviews.Content: My wife and I could not be happier with this alarm.Very easy to install, and it worked perfectly from the get go.It performs as well as the professional model we had in our other house at a fraction of the cost.We'll definitely suggest it to our friends.Joe V.

Reviews.Title: Bob N
Reviews.Author: Robert Netherton "flyboy bob"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the system.  I installed with screws and it was done in less than one hour.  Had problem with one panic button, called the help desk and had very friendly man help me. Re-seated the battery and all worked great.  I do not have monitoring at this time but plan to add it later.  I am very happy with quality of units and price.  Had 2 panic buttons,2 key pads, 6 door monitors, 1 ext siren 1 key fob and all works great.Thanks,Bob

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Craig T. Dedo
Reviews.Content: I ordered the SimpliSafe home security system after hearing about it on the Rush Limbaugh Show and reading the product literature on the SimpliSafe web site.  The product literature was very clear and did a very good job describing the system and all of its components.The setup of the system worked as advertised.  The instructions in the instruction booklet were very clear and straightforward.  The equipment works exactly as described.So far, I have noticed only one drawback.  The configuration program on the keychain remote does not work well with 64-bit Windows 7.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Cleve E. Dorsett
Reviews.Content: System was very easy to setup and very easy to set the alarm and turn it off.  When we set it to Home alarm we have a light blue light that acts like a night light. and lets us know we are secure.

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Wilhelm
Reviews.Content: I have just installed simplisafe security system in my business and it was so easy to install.  I am so pleased with the system.  It has lived up to all the hype.  I can give out different security codes to different staff members and even the cleaning crew.  Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Another successful install
Reviews.Author: Dennis Beavers
Reviews.Content: The system was as advertised and works well.  Very simple install, less than 1 hr and it was up and running.  I installed a door and motion sensor on my detached shop and there is no communication problem with the base unit.Dennis

Reviews.Title: Simply worked
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: There were issues with the delivery company, Fed-Ex, which after multiple repeat fails to deliver, ended up also delivering an additional package for an address on a different street.  The packaging was well thought out.  Installation was dead easy.  The adhesive held the pieces in place, which you could also use the provided screws to ensure everything stays in place.The test mode is cool and easy to use.  It seems everything was well thought out.  It was easy to generate the PDF certificate to email to my insurance company for the discount.  In my neighborhood, I see a lot of ADT and Xfinity home security signs in front yards.  I get to chuckle knowing that they are locked into 3 yr+ contracts with huge early termination penalties from the installations aside from their $40+ / month fees for monitoring.  The Simplisafe no-contract monitoring plan is reasonably priced and what it should be.  The sms / email feature is also nice to have.The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating was that the config software included on the USB key had issues running on my system.  In the end it turned out to be modern era web browser settings which prevent almost everything from running successfully. There was a single app crash, but this is only for custom config on the base station.  Most people can leave the system at default settings and be perfectly happy.  The pin codes and add / remove of sensor devices can all be done from the keypad without ever having to run the USB key config software.  Customer support was very responsive in helping me to get things working.The keypad keys might be too close together for my taste, but it is usable.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Dennis Hempler
Reviews.Content: Fast, simple and easy to setup. I love the fact that the only wire I had to use was the power cord for the base station. At $24/month with no commitment, this is a no-brainer, get it. The website makes it very easy to configure who gets what text notifications and the phone app is awesome when you need to arm/disarm the alarm remotely. It's not perfect, nothing is. I wish it would tell you which window/door sensor is open. Maybe that will be addressed in a future update. Adding more sensors after the fact is very simple to do, so you could start small and add more later.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Keith N Morris
Reviews.Content: Simply put. It works as advertised! In the future, I would like to see them add wireless video cameras but the wife feels safer now.

Reviews.Title: Simple Safe
Reviews.Author: Gerasimos alexandropoulos
Reviews.Content: Received my SimpliSafe 2 system the other day. Arrived timely and well packaged. Easy instructions as promised. Set up system quickly. Make sure you keep track of your serial numbers on each box if you decide to use their advance monitoring on line. Which sensor went where in the house to assign zones on line. But very happy with the remote and instant notifications that the online gives me. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe self install security system
Reviews.Author: D. Shaw
Reviews.Content: This system is very simple to install following the well written instructions. The price up front is higher than the big names, as they give you the system for a $99 installation charge, but hook you with $36.99/mo. monitoring fee locked in for 3 yrs.I prefer to buy my system, upgrade very easy as needed, and pay less than half the monitoring fee, and not be locked into a contract.

Reviews.Title: Great product.  Easy to install
Reviews.Author: George Chapman
Reviews.Content: After doing some research on different Alarm systems and comparing cost, SimplSafe had the overall best product offering. Although there is an investment up front in purchasing your system package, I believe it is still a value.  Monitoring is optional with different plans available. Adding additional sensors to your system seems to be straight forward and easy. Will know first hand in a few days when I receive an additional water sensor and glass breakage sensor. Customer service support seems eager to please yet no Saturday hours which I believe should be added.Overall very happy with the product and service.

Reviews.Title: Love our simplisafe security system
Reviews.Author: Judy Collins
Reviews.Content: We really love it. Now I feel safe in my home and I also don't worry when we are away from the house. I also like the idea that it was so affordable and that it was wireless and no one had to come to our home to install it. We also found out today that our insurance on our home went down because we have a security system.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Great people to deal with and the system is really easy to install, have only used it for two weeks, it replaced a wired system that needed a land line to connect. Installed 17 units in my home.

Reviews.Title: I love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Charles H. Wirth
Reviews.Content: The system is very easy to install and the tech support staff were very helpful and courteous. So far it has done everything I espected.  Chuck Wirth

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: charles brown
Reviews.Content: Talk about simple installation. No wires, video if you need for installation. The key pad lets you know if you have forgot to install a component you purchased with the system. The install was so easy I am sure my grandson could have did this. When running a test it walks you through the system. I hope I have have to use this but with a key pad or a remote my house is now alarmed. I also like the thought of an alarm system with a fire alarm. Great job.

Reviews.Title: Easy!
Reviews.Author: Brad G
Reviews.Content: I installed and programed my new system that had 3 door contacts and two motion sensors in less than 30 min!!

Reviews.Title: Affordablle, easy, love it
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: Had ADT for almost 20 years . disappointed with their customer service and with increasing monitoring cost.  Heard your add on Dave Ramsey show.  Very satisfied so far.  Installation was simple as well as set up.  Won't be the last system I purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive system
Reviews.Author: Carol Berger
Reviews.Content: So far all is well and we are very happy with the system.  Setting the alarm device to work without instruction was a little tricky.

Reviews.Title: Excellent system
Reviews.Author: David Marr
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use. I'm waiting for the glass breakage sensors to make the system complete. One word of warning, the sensors and keypad don't stick well on stucco walls. Be prepared to use the mounting screws that are included

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is a piece of cake to install
Reviews.Author: Down in Salt Lake
Reviews.Content: One of the simpleness system I have ever installed.  All the pieces came pre-configured, all I had to do is pull the battery tabs and stick them up.  Tested for three days and bam!  I have an alarm system. The only thing that I want to see as an update to the system is to have a remote speaker so I can hear the commands and chimes in other parts of my house.  I could see them doing this so I bet it will happen.

Reviews.Title: Great product - works as advertised and simple to setup
Reviews.Author: Vinaya Gopisetti
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setupWorks as advertisedGreat customer supportTook less than 1 hour to setupWish Amazon sells accessories too.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: M Stern
Reviews.Content: I saw this product recommended by Dave Ramsey.  I like the fact that you install it yourself.  Installation was fast and easy, with clear directions for adding components to the system.  I haven't activated the monitoring yet-I just completed the installation today and mailed in my required city registration.  I plan to activate tomorrow so it takes effect after the registration is received.  I'll feel much safer about my 17 year old son being here alone when I work night shift.  I appreciate the fact that it's wireless, so no wiring to string thru walls, and no relying on an intact landline to notify authorities of a problem.

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: andrew L
Reviews.Content: this products is easy to install and set up. customer service was also responsive and communicative to a level I expect.

Reviews.Title: Installed
Reviews.Author: CuriousGeorge "Rob"
Reviews.Content: The website was pretty comprehensive. I read about the alternative systems and the decision fell to SimpliSafe because all the reviews stressed the simple part. I wasn't really interested in video (though they are 'working on it') nor did I really want home automation. I ordered the kit and extras and it was shipped to me quickly.The install took about 2 hours one afternoon. Only one entry sensor (out of 15 or so) had a problem and the system clearly identified that sensor which I replaced.Installation was simple. Testing was simple. The alarms are loud.Starting up the service (I used my laptop and the USB pin on the remote) was simple.I still need to polish it up (supplying easy-to-ID labels to entry and motion sensors) and test it for a while to see if operation will be as straightforward as the installation. So far that appears to be the case and I am impressed with the cost and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I chose this system because I was able to install it easily myself. Also the price was right and I'm very satisfied with how it works. I did purchase an additional window monitor and the siren. It is much louder than the base station and I feel it is needed to make a sound loud enough to chase anyone away who tries to enter your home. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to install and set up
Reviews.Author: Brooke A. Stanley "Gilagoo"
Reviews.Content: I love that there is no contract. It took less than 45 minutes to install, and I only used a screwdriver for the smoke alarm. After installing I was speaking a someone at church who sells alarms systems part time and after explaining the price and ease of installation as well as the $25 monthly observation fee he was impressed. Says Simplisafe will put him out of business. I did not like the 72 hour waiting period before the alarm was active however.

Reviews.Title: It Works and the Web Site is Great
Reviews.Author: Hart Bopp
Reviews.Content: I just activated my SimpliSafe account and got the alarm system working.  It Works! the install was relatively simple, (according to my brother, I was out of town and he did this for me), and using the Web Site to activate and talking to my (in their late 70's) parents over our cell phones, we got the system activated and tested.I decided to pay the extra monthly fee so I could configure and monitor the system over the Web.  So far, I think that was a wise choice.Finally, the first shipment of my Simplisafe2 8-piece Plus Package went awry.  It was shown as delivered but not box was there.  SimpliSafe sent out another package as soon as I reported that I had not actually received the shipment.  No fuss, No hoops.  that is great customer service.

Reviews.Title: It's a great security system! After one simple replacement of the base station all worked perfectly.
Reviews.Author: John Wokurka
Reviews.Content: Overall I like the security system very much.  It was easy to install and the telephone support was excellent.  I also liked the fact that a system error message on the keypad indicates that an entry sensor is open when a door is left open.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Russell Henley
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, easy to configure, and a lot of flexibility. If you're looking for a security system, this is one I'd highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: System was VERY easy to install.  Step by step instructions downloaded from usb remote were very clear as well.  Will probably need to order a few more sensors soon.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: kellyho67
Reviews.Content: Don't go buy the typical contract security systems.  This system was simple and easy to install and setup.  In 3 days of testing it went live and it's been working perfect.  If your looking for simple setup, and no monthly contracts, iphone app for management and getting a text and alerts when things like entry ways open, this is a very cool system

Reviews.Title: Simpli easy to install !
Reviews.Author: T. Dague
Reviews.Content: My order was on time and complete. Easy to install and use. 3 day test period was great, to get used to the system.I had a loose cover on one sensor and the base system announced it, and told me to go to the keypad to tell me which sensor.
