Great !You may find you will have to re-think which sensors you will use where, after you install, but additions are easy.

Reviews.Title: Ah! Finally something easy for once!
Reviews.Author: Marie-France St-Pierre
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a security system to add to my house without having the need to bleed my wallet dry or commit to a 2 yr contract. SimpliSafe was the perfect solution for me. It is easy to install and to use. Now I feel my house is safe and I didn't break my budget doing it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent System!
Reviews.Author: Adam K
Reviews.Content: We are in a new home and were looking for a security system that would allow us to be notified in case of any burglar, fire or water leak alarm.  We had multiple companies come out and give us quotes in our "pre-wired" home that were incredibly expensive.  The most well known company quoted us $1,000 in start up costs, plus $49 a month for monitoring AND a 36 month contract!  My SimpliSafe system was less than $300 for the entire setup, took me less than 30 minutes to install and has been working perfectly since day one! Plus, no contract!The app is quick and excellent, the system texts me with status changes and alarms and the monitoring is half the price of the big company.  Yesterday the power went out in my neighborhood and I had a text immediately.  The system gives me piece of mind and I'm very happy with my purchase.Thank you SimpliSafe!

Reviews.Title: I love my new Simplisafe system
Reviews.Author: Jan Cannon
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing!  As a former police officer, I have seen all sorts of alarm systems but this one is BY FAR the best all around value.  Easy to install, easy to use and the customer service is "off the charts" good.  Having responded to all types of break-ins, burglaries, etc. while in uniform, I knew just what I needed to keep my family and property safe, however, I couldn't find anything that fit my budget AND my stringent security requirements.  Simplisafe fixed all that.  I'm as happy a customer as you will ever find.

Reviews.Title: Better than moving.
Reviews.Author: Jim Waterman
Reviews.Content: After seveal breakins in my area my wife convinced me we needed an alarm system or move. Not wanting to move I researched alarm systems and found Simplisafe. I liked what I saw and ordered what I needed. It was simple to install and seems to work fine. It's only been a few days but it makes us feel more secure. Follow up communication from the company has been impressive. I would recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: easy install, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Valerie Guier  Bailes
Reviews.Content: This was easy to install. I had a problem with a motion detector and they replaced it after trying a few things.

Reviews.Title: Great system so far.
Reviews.Author: Bernard  Kisner
Reviews.Content: I read all I could about the Simplisafe system and with confidence I ordered. Installation was pretty easy and everything worked as advertised. I look forward to having a protected home for many years.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation - Great Support
Reviews.Author: Skyeagle "Skyeagle"
Reviews.Content: The instructions were straight forward and easy to follow.  I had a problem connecting during the initial test and called the support center and they immediately resolved.  They recognized that my cell phone coverage for the service in my area was weak and sent a new phone card the next day.  Took more than 1/2 hour to install but I expected that.  All in all a great experience and we are very happy with the results.  Hopefully we won’t have to use test the system for real but I’m confident that if we do it will work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Security system looks good and tests out well
Reviews.Author: Alan Tomlin
Reviews.Content: Looks to be very simple to install and set up. I tested a couple of sensors to ensure system is working before installing it in another home

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfying!
Reviews.Author: Widok
Reviews.Content: The Simpli-Safe system was easy to set up and install.  Being able to adjust the volume of the door chimes was one of the best things, because one of my contacts is on a serving window.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Everyone Should Have
Reviews.Author: azon buyer
Reviews.Content: Not only did I have a great experience during the ordering process, fast shipping, easy install, but also during the test period. The base station, door and window contacts, panic buttons, smoke detector and motion control was easy to self-install and only took a few minutes. The cost of the unit and monthly service is well below other residential offers and the product is second to none. My wife sleeps better knowing she is protected. Thanks Simplisafe!!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe 2 --  So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Mary Blair
Reviews.Content: This security system has been everything that they said it would be.  My husband ordered it and then went on a business trip for 3 weeks.  He wanted it set up, so he asked me and my oldest son to set it up.  The instructions that came with it were great.  We had no problem setting it up.  I had a problem (that was my fault) with the alarm going off.  I realized that I put a motion sensor too close to a heat vent and the curtain would blow a little and it set it off.  After repositioning the sensor, I had no trouble.  I was able to email customer support with any minor questions that I had and they got right back to me with clear, concise answers.  I love looking at my online log to see that the alarm is still set or when the automatic test is run.  They have thought of everything.  I love the low cost with the high level of security.  Dave Ramsey is right!!!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: scufan
Reviews.Content: Have only recently installed but if it works as advertised, should be a great system.  Only issue I have had so far is with their customer support.  When I ordered an extra motion sensor, they sent the sensor without the sticky tabs for corner placement.  When I emailed the problem to support team, I was informed that most hardware stores carry them and I should purchase there.  They have since agreed to send me some strips for the corner sensors.  Just an fyi that if your order anything extra that requires these tabs, to request them up front.Ron H

Reviews.Title: Great system.....bought one for home and then another for my office.
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Installed my home system about a year ago.  It has been functioning flawlessly.  Even notified me via text alert when my power went out at home while I was in Europe.  it switches to back-up battery power then notifies you again when power is restored.I was so impressed that I bought a second system for my office which I am currently in the process of installing.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLY The Best
Reviews.Author: TCM
Reviews.Content: Installment was easier than I imagined.  Once installed, the system was operational with easy step by step directions within 10 minutes of install and I took my time.  I would highly recommend this system to all.  I only installed the door sensors and motion detector and probably will add other features in the future.

Reviews.Title: Fit the bill perfectly
Reviews.Author: Ed Rohm
Reviews.Content: I have been reviewing security systems for a couple of years and found most of the systems unacceptable for my needs.  I live in a rural area and when I found out about Simplisafe, I ordered it immediately.Installation of all sensors was a breeze and testing them was flawless.  I feel so much better knowing that my home is protected and that there were no long term contracts or exorbitant monitoring fees.Well done Simplisafe!

Reviews.Title: Easiest install ever!
Reviews.Author: Keith Kocher
Reviews.Content: The Simply Safe alarm system could not have been easier.  The video on the computer literally holds your hand while you walk through the install.  I would recommend this system to anyone needing an alarm.  There are so many extras you can add to your system.

Reviews.Title: Happy Camper
Reviews.Author: Mainer Forever
Reviews.Content: Learned about SimpliSafe from my neighbor, who is a satisfied SimpliSafe customer.  Did my research on SimpliSafe and other websites.  Could not get over how affordable, straight-forward, and customer-oriented this company is.  Ordered my system and installed it (included entry sensors, motion sensors, freeze (temperature) sensors, panic button, keychain remote and smoke sensor).  Had a few minor glitches, but nothing serious.  Used tech support one time and they were courteous and helpful in resolving my issues.  Whatever I need to install and use this system is extremely well thought out.  I have only been online for a couple days, but feel this was a very good choice.  This is a great product and the company aims to please.  Best of all, the equipment and monthly monitoring are affordable.  Monthly charge is $14.95 for bare-bones monitoring; $24.95 for full blown version, including web control/monitoring interface and email and/or text alerts.  Try it, you'll like it !

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is the real deal
Reviews.Author: Pat Brown
Reviews.Content: Great product and was as easy to install as the manufacturer claimed.  Installed the system at my weekend cabin as a test fit and was pleased wih the outcome.  Ready now to buy system for my home.  If you are looking for a security system you won't go wrong with the SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Great security system - easy self installation.
Reviews.Author: Robert Barcus
Reviews.Content: This wireless security system is fantastic!  All of the sensors and detectors are easy to install with double stick tape.  Screws are provided to secure them in place if desired (I chose to do so).  The interactive monitoring option is worth the cost to me since it gives me access and control of the system from any location.  The fact that the base unit communicates trough a cell connection rather than using phone lines adds to the security and ease of set up for the system.  Bottom line - I would highly recommend this to anyone that wants to install it themselves and save money on the monitoring options.

Reviews.Title: Top notch system for any size home
Reviews.Author: J. Moritz
Reviews.Content: I have recommended this system to several people now.Pros:  Reasonable cost of equipment and monitoring.  Hoping the equipment costs goes down and the monitoring does not go up!  Easy to install and set-up  Very good tech support  It just works right out of the box  NO CONTRACTSCons:  The supplied screws to mount the motion sensor's in a corner are way too small!  I had to go buy a screw drive that a jeweler would  use and ended up just buying larger mounting screws.  The pet safe motion sensors did not work.  We have a small dog 30 lbs and a cat.  First time we went out the alarm went off so we had  to disable the motion sensors.  We will only turn them on when we leave town for an extended time.  I have not way of knowing if the cell signal is getting through or not.  Sure wish the control panel had a button to turn on the back lighting.  Most panels are installed in areas that are probably not well  lighted and you simple can not read the panel !  This would be a huge improvement.  They could throw in some window decals with the kit at no extra charge.

Reviews.Title: Great system for the $$$
Reviews.Author: jefferson thomas
Reviews.Content: Order arrived on time and as described. Easy set up through computer. Easy to add-on components later. It will take you about an hour or so to do a good job with install...I used screw mounts where I could and heavy duty stick tape on inner brick walls. The tape that it will come with is OK for drywall its just not as good as heavy duty tape you can buy at hardware or Walmart. Monitoring service is excellent and provides real time data for all events such as arming and disarming... $15 month. Had been with ADT 3 years and cancelled for SimpliSafe. Was paying ADT $56/month for same service....No complaints. SimpliSafe is Simpli SMART!...No-brainer!

Reviews.Title: lacking in some areas
Reviews.Author: ron oleski
Reviews.Content: it's easy to install,seems to work well,but it's lacking in some areas, for instance the base station should announce what motion sensor or entry sensor was triggered instead of "motion sensor"---"entry sensor".  Hell I have 21 entry sensors,2 montion sensors, it should at least announce 1st. or 2nd. floor.

Reviews.Title: recommend this product to friends and family
Reviews.Author: iceman
Reviews.Content: I have not had this product too long but so far i am really satisfied with it , it was very easy installation and it makes me feel safe when i leave my home and safe when i am home alone.  and the price was very good

Reviews.Title: Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Mike Thompson
Reviews.Content: I have recently purchased, installed, and activated a SimliSafe system. I am impressed with the customer support, the ease of installation, and overall quality of this system. I have tested the monitoring system, and it works as promised. So far I have no complaints and would recommend this system to anybody. Service, quality, and value is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Excellent system
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: I was robbed, by the alarm companies, for thirty years @$45.00 a month...you do the math. I did my research, and I found this system, Simplisafe to be the best I could find. I am pleased, very pleased.I do have one comment, however, the window and door sensors are all the same. So those attached to a door have a 30 second delay, the windows do the same thing; a delay. I want my window sensors to trigger the alarm immediately. I have overcome this with an additional motion sensor and I feel comfortable. I also believe Simplisafe will devise their own fix shortly.In short: BUY THIS SYSTEM AND SAVE YOURSELF A GREAT DEAL OF MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Great Product + Customer Service
Reviews.Author: charles Levan
Reviews.Content: Highly suggest and recommend. Easy to install and customer service reps were very attentive. I bought the basic model and will slowly add additional layers of security later on. Thanks Simplisafe for making a great and affordable product.

Reviews.Title: simple to set up and very feature rich
Reviews.Author: Techie1234
Reviews.Content: wireless setup makes it easycustomer service is easy to contact if you need helpthe entry sensors are little big but they easily attach to the door frameI am excited about their new glass break sensorsonline setup is greatoverall excellent value - compared to all others

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is a good buy.
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Simon
Reviews.Content: I recieved the system when they said it would come, it had everything thing I ordered. The install went good. We left on vaction 3 days after so far everthing is good.

Reviews.Title: Hassle free shopping, easy install, works out of the box
Reviews.Author: Satish Kumar
Reviews.Content: The product worked right out of the box. The instructions were clear and installation was a cinch. Even my 10 year old installed a few of the sensors and wanted to do more.

Reviews.Title: It is easy, flexible, and it works
Reviews.Author: Mountain rider "MTN"
Reviews.Content: Installation was in a three story home - signal strength of the base was excellent an no dead spots.  Able to customize settings, use with or without monitoring service, and with various levels of monitoring if you choose it.  Excellent online and telephone support to help me out with a single dead sensor in the kit, replaced in less than 3 days with a paid return label for the dead senor.  Very easy install.  It was everything as advertised.  I ordered a total of three sirens to cover each floor, including one mounted outside under protection.

Reviews.Title: Love this system!!!
Reviews.Author: Gleason Malicote
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system for our vacation home and we love it. The first alarm we had was when my wife and I went out to eat and the dog got our remote and pushed the panic button. lol,  Simply Safe contacted me and I was able to return home to make sure there was no break-in. I would certainly recommend this system to anyone wanting to save money and yet have a great system!!

Reviews.Title: Great DIY home security system
Reviews.Author: kjmurphyntn
Reviews.Content: The Simplisafe system is easy to install and setup.  I am very pleased with the way it works.  I have the interactive monitoring and really like the phone app.  It makes it easy for the entire family to use when we have different schedules.  I'm really hoping they get video monitoring in the near future so the system will really be complete.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe, Beyond Expectations
Reviews.Author: Lawrence D Greer
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. Great customer service. Simple and easy installation. I find the interactive monitoring for the extra $10 per month is amazing. Can monitor and change settings from smart phone, computer or Ipad from anywhere, anytime.I have had A D T in three different locations for over 20 yrs. Worst customer service I have ever experienced. Was told it would take ten days to get a service call when the system wasn't working. Was paying $99 per month for monitoring. When I decided to cancel  I was charged hundreds in cancellation charges due to their three year contracts.BTW: this is the first review I have ever submitted, for anything.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Quick Security
Reviews.Author: Edwin L. Bradley
Reviews.Content: Items were shipped on time and arrived quickly. Installation was a breeze, but takes about 45 minutes for first time user.I would recommend only installing using remote/USB. You have more options and the directions are clearer.System is as good as any nationally monitored system, e.g. ADT. (Best protection is provided by a good locally run/monitored company, if you have access to one.)I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I replaced my old old system. I was kind of disappointed that the system didn't have a siren, and that when you disable the voice prompts you can't select which prompts you don't want to hear, also when the alarm is set the panel displays no connection to dispatch center. I did however post Simplisafe on my Tera Nova community web site.

Reviews.Title: Super easy set up and great for insurance savings!
Reviews.Author: ROGER R SONIA
Reviews.Content: Having an older home we did not want to have to have wiring run throughout it for an alarm and SImplisafe fit the bill.  We were able to place all the sensors needed and the set up was flawless and easy.  The savings from insurance was great and the monthly fee for monitoring can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Excellent System
Reviews.Author: Martin Every
Reviews.Content: When buying the system I felt the promotional materials explained, very well, just what level of security would be provided. The set up instructions were well done both with the computer aided video and the manual. Once the components were set up  all unitsfunctioned immediately as a complete system. The operational day to day user design is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I have bought for two different homes. I love it. Very easy to install and activate. I also moved one system from one house to another with ease and changed location on the computer. With it being wireless I was also able to put sensors in my unattached garage along with a second keypad. The dispatch service also is prompt. One system was set off by accident and the police were dispatched without incident. I bought enough additional sensors to do all windows and doors and now feel house is very secure when away.The monthly monitoring fee is far less than any national alarm company and no contract obligation. You'll be hard pressed to find one better than this.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe - SimpliEasy
Reviews.Author: Mike Anderson
Reviews.Content: System installs as simply as the manufacturer claims.  I installed the base station, keypad, panic button, and (12) entry stations in less than 20 minutes.  There really is no programing.  If you are looking for piece of mind and not wanting to sign a contract then this is the system.  Web page navigation is easy and creating an account for dispatch service...no problem.

Reviews.Title: Simpli Safe (pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Mary Barrett
Reviews.Content: Excellent system to set up. Easy to operate. The customer support staff has been super now that I know they don't work on Sundays. Reach them for assistance three says in a row. We're extremely helpful and kind.A word of caution though. I have a MacBook Pro with sufficient memory and running the latest operating system and The SimpliSafe keyFob does not recognize it. Had to go to a neighbor's home with a PC to set up. What a nuisance!!!The programmers need to have the system work with PCs and Macs. Sincerely, Mary Barrett

Reviews.Title: As Advertised...
Reviews.Author: M. Manning
Reviews.Content: I appreciate the ease of installation. The packaging indeeds proves the intelligent input applied to the system's design.I have yet to sign up for one of three service packages offered. The system user is allowed to decide if the system service is needed.Speaking for older folks, I'd suggest a few minor product changes.1.) The keypad would serve users better if the (keys) were lighted. Keypads are mounted in darker areas at times.2.) Make the scrolled, keypad screen information, such as "no link to dispatcher"... a user's option, so as not to alert an intruder.3.) Redesign the USB (CAP) on the key chain remote, so that it remains in place until positive removal. The cap falls off the remote easily. I did notice the replacement caps are available for sale.Interesting product and a package selection of inexpensive services and devices! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: LONG DELAY FOR AN ALARM CALL
Reviews.Author: Cathy Ingebrigtsen
Reviews.Content: Arrived as described, it was easy to install. I would have rated it higher except that I accidentally set off the alarm days later and they did not call for 10 MINUTES!!! A lot could walk out in that time!!!!

Reviews.Title: Basic fair priced security  - easy install
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: The system does what is says on the tin.Setup was very easy as was adding or removing components.I felt the door sensors were large, but they accommodate a decent battery.If you want others alerted to a break in you need the external siren.The whole idea is that the hardware is not subsidized by a 2 year monitoring contract and that is what I wanted.You can pay for monitoring at about  $15/$20 a month extra vs $30-$40 for ADT or the other big players.The downside is that the system is simply not as good or polished as an ADT type system. The system does not tell you "front door open" . In the event or an open door/window you are told an entry sensor is open and then you need to hunt around to find out where exactly the problem is. Not a problem for a small house.My advice - If you want basic security and no monitoring this system is GREAT. You get what you pay for. If you are honestly going to pay for monitoring for a couple of years then you may as well get something like ADT where they subsidize and maintain better hardware with the monitoring fees.

Reviews.Title: Good, simple system with good support
Reviews.Author: John Schmidt
Reviews.Content: The system was delivered quickly, as promised, and was simple to install.  I had a little trouble configuring it, but a call to customer service solved the issue quickly and in a friendly manner.  The stated three day test period passed and I was informed by email that the system was then "live".I've had no issues except for one time when my cats set off a motion detector by getting too close.  I relocated the motion detector and everything has been quiet since.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is "simply easy"
Reviews.Author: EVO
Reviews.Content: Was thinking about putting one of the popular alarm systems in our house until I saw the big box and all the wiring that it took to do it.  Of course professional installation was the only option. Someone saw on our local TV news station the discussion about Simplisafe and told me about it.  I researched online and saw how simple this looked AND that the features were exactly the same as the more popular systems.  Purchased it, installed and activated in about 15 minutes. Plug base unit in. Adhere sensors, activate and you are done.  I would like to see the option of an outside camera. Hopefully that will come soon.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Scott Harrison
Reviews.Content: I had my system installed in less than 45 minutes and I love the flexibility, the ease of making adjustments and the option to expand my system whenever I choose. I was also able to get a 10% discount through my State Farm Homeowners policy.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe was the perfect choice for our home system
Reviews.Author: sdadell
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I heard about SimpliSafe and was able to convert from our outdated wired system. We have so much more flexibility and functionality now and the installation couldn't have been easier. I have always worried about our sump pump flooding our finished basement so it is a relief to know that we have water sensors monitoring as well as smoke alarms, CO2 alarms and of course, the burglar alarm. The communication from the company is superb and I love the ability to view our system status and make changes on the web or on our iPhones. This system is perfect for any type of home environment.

Reviews.Title: Seemless, very easy to install
Reviews.Author: C. Simeon "C."
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with Simplisafe. From the initial order, through the install and afterwards, this has been a nice system. It works consistently and our family feels safer. I highly recommend Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Simply wow !!!!!
Reviews.Author: roco ono
Reviews.Content: Simplesecurereasonably pricedeasy to activateMY FAMILY AND I FEEL PROTECTED !!!!Long life batteries and everything you need to secure your home.

Reviews.Title: Great Refurbished Security System
Reviews.Author: Michael Dillard
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting a good alarm system for my home but didn't think I could afford one.  I live in a rural area that is growing and recently, some undesirables have moved into the area and I hated to ever leave home.  I have some valuable items in my home and detached garage that I wouldn't want stolen.  I am older now and have tennitis (ringing in my ears) and I sleep with a sound machine.  I have worried that if someone broke into my home in the middle of the night, I might not hear them.  So, I began to research security systems and came across SimpliSafe.  After reading various forums and favorable reviews regarding SimpliSafe, and seeing what I considered to be low cost for the initial set up and for the monitoring service (with no contract), I quickly realized that SimpliSafe was for me.  When I went to their site, I saw that they had refurbished units and I saw some good reviews on these.  I purchased one that had everything that I wanted and when it arrived, I was shocked!  Everything looked brand new and also performed brand new!  I honestly couldn't tell what was refurbished!  I had watched some good Youtubes on how to install the product so I was ready to go at it.  So easy...and I'm not a very handy person!  If I could figure it out and install it, anyone can!  I contacted the support center regarding some questions I had about my detached garage and the lady that I spoke too could not have been nicer and she was very knowledgeable.  I really liked the 72 hour testing period as it gave me time to install, move various sensors around, and play with it before the actual monitoring started.  I did not rely on the sticky tape, but chose to use the screws so the sensors wouldn't fall off.  I placed the motion sensors on shelves instead of sticking them on the wall.  They work great!  I have the additional alarm that I installed on the front porch and it sounds off!  My neighbors have no problem hearing it!  I love the app for my iPhone and I also like the key controls.  I called the Sheriff's Department and was happy to find out that my area doesn't require a permit.  I got notified after my 72 hour test period that I was officially on line and now I have such wonderful peace of mind!  So well worth it.  Now I sleep like a baby knowing that alarms will sound if someone tries to break into my home or garage and when I'm away, someone will be monitoring my house.  I really can't say enough good about this system.  I love it and I will be adding to it in time to come.  If you are considering this system, I say that you won't regret getting it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Suzanne S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this to install in a vacant home on the market. It proven worth every penny, both in peace of mind and because it went off the 2nd night it was activated. All worked as promised and the house was safe.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Is Great
Reviews.Author: Cyndi C. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Easy to Order, price was resonable and was a breeze to install. Since purchase to installation to activation, they have been in touch on a daily basis. One other feature I really like is the ability to expand as I see fit. I would highly recommend Simplisafe to anyone needing a security system!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is amazing!
Reviews.Author: G. Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: I heard of this system from Glenn Beck and The Blaze. Super easy to install. My 16 yr old grandson installed it with me. Another reason I chose SimpliSafe is because it is cellular and people who might break in cannot disable it before the signal goes out to the police. It is truly an inexpensive way to purchase a security system and the monthly fee is about half of what other security companies charge. I have had the opportunity to talk with customer service and they are all wonderful and extremely helpful.

Reviews.Title: Operational for 4 days now
Reviews.Author: Alan W. Andrews
Reviews.Content: 5 star rating for ease of installation and sense of security it provides.  Simplisafe describes the system perfectly... very simple to install and operate, and providing the sense of safety desired.

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong !!
Reviews.Author: Frank Gullotti
Reviews.Content: This system is very easy to set up and to add sensors too !! It seems that they have put good ole american ingenuity back into something, finally !! This unit worked so well that I started thinking to myself, " why not put sensors on the doors on both my outdoor sheds." It worked like a charm !! Now I have security in my home and my out buildings !! I haven't found one thing about this unit that I don't like ( except my wife forgetting to turn it off when she goes out the door )  One of the best purchases I've made in a long time !! Thank You Simplisafe, you make a great product !!!!

Reviews.Title: My house is simply safer
Reviews.Author: TWOPYS
Reviews.Content: I compared Simplisafe to other systems and found this to be the most economical. I really liked the ease of installation and excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great Security System
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: Our home was burglarized because we had the old, wired system that was here when we bought our house.  The thieves easily cut the line and entered in the middle of the day.  We immediately began looking into the new wireless systems and had several different sales people from different companies in.  After looking at what they had to offer and reading the contracts we would have been required to sign, we chose Simplisafe.  We got the works, including the glass break sensors.  The system was a breeze to install and we love it.  We have recommended it to several of our neighbors and they are in the process of ordering as well.  We like it so much, I am picking a system up for my mom.

Reviews.Title: Feels safe and secure
Reviews.Author: Obie Roach
Reviews.Content: I like all of the features and multilevel protections. It was very easy and quick to install. the test went smoothly. We especially like the keychain remotes.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Mark Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I choose simplisafe alarm system because it was affordable and it has so many good reviews.It was so easy to install, before i purchase the product i had so many questions and i did call customer service and e mail them and everytime the responses were good and quick. it arrived on time, i choose the economic package and as a right now the alarm went off once by mistake, they did call my celphone and follow the procedures. I believe this is a great product. Also you dont need a landline or a contract and it really works great. It is good to have protection for your family so i would recommend this product to anybody. i am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Very neat product!
Reviews.Author: Alan LaCross
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and install.  I like the wireless system...and the fact I can move the key pad anywhere, anytime I want, for privacy concerns.  The remote key chain is nice too...I can arm or disarm the system from outside the door.  Well worth the $$$.  I will be adding to the system soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent service, excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia A.  De Haven
Reviews.Content: This product is easy to install and easy to monitor.  I can do everything online and love that there is no contract.

Reviews.Title: Our experience with Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: David L. Robertson "Politically Incorrect"
Reviews.Content: We purchased the wireless home security system from Simplisafe and are very pleased with it.  It was, as they said, very easy to install.  We have called customer service several times with questions and everyone has been very friendly and very helpful.  We have been so pleased that we have encouraged other family members and friends to get a system as well.  This is an affordable way to secure your home.

Reviews.Title: simple
Reviews.Author: William Mcgovern "Billy"
Reviews.Content: Intimidating in the beginning, but very comfortable now...Really gives us piece of mind. Would recommend  it  and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Time delay
Reviews.Author: Deborah Lee Luoma
Reviews.Content: The thirty second delay after a door or window has been breached is too long  Our house is not that big, and in that time delay an intruder has time to find our bedroom and kill us before the alarm sounds.  So far this is our only complaint with the system.  It was super easy so set up/install.

Reviews.Title: great idea
Reviews.Author: Janet A. DiCicco
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to set up.  The keypad is very easy to use  and I like the idea that it is wireless.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Alarm
Reviews.Author: Bobby J. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Prompt delivery, easy to install and it works as advertised.  It took a total of 30 minutes to have the system installed.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Wireless System
Reviews.Author: RoadRunner
Reviews.Content: I recently got this system and have been using it for about 2 weeks. I bought the system after an attempted break in at my house. So far I like it real well. I bought a few extra components with the package, for a total of $350. I was surprised to find that the 105 decibel siren was not part of the package. I am glad they have a 72 hour "getting use to the system" before you really go online, because I set it off twice during that period...it does take a little time to get use to living with this!! One disappointment was that after the first few days, one of the keypads went dead, and after calling for help, we found that it had one or more dead batteries...and then about 2 days after that, the other keyboard also said "low batteries". I called and they said they will mail me replacement batteries. In the meantime, i am using my own AAs, and that works fine. So, other than the bad batteries, the system works well.I have already recommended it to a few people.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this system!!
Reviews.Author: Raymond Mullins
Reviews.Content: This is a great system. Installed easily and works great. The price cannot be beat and I recommend this system to all looking for a security system.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe alarm System
Reviews.Author: Rufus Mercer
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the SimpliSafe Alarm System. I installed the system easily. I have gotten it registered and set up to monitor my home while I am away. I have the monitoring people monitoring while I am gone. I am happy with everything so far. With this System, I will save over $100 for the first year over the monitoring with the former Alarm System. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: rose manion
Reviews.Content: I'm loving my Simplisafe security system.  It's was easy to install, easy to learn, and the monthly rate of $14.99 is in my budget.  My home insurance rate has been reduced $15 per month, so I'm coming out  even.  I feel so safe at night and have been sleeping better than I have for a long  time.  Thank you Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: No mistakes on your part
Reviews.Author: Louis Cimino
Reviews.Content: I tweaked the system today. The only problem was typical: The computer.You guys listened to any concerns that I had and gave me great solutions.Your printed directions and online help are pretty easy.

Reviews.Title: So Far
Reviews.Author: Bob Nelms
Reviews.Content: So far system is working as advertised. I will need to set it off on purpose, if a burglar doesn't, to see how phone calling works.

Reviews.Title: Awesome System, Great Company!
Reviews.Author: Colleen
Reviews.Content: Let me first say that a product or service has to be truly exceptional before I'll take the time to write a positive review, and the instances I've given a five-star rating is even more rare. My only regret about purchasing this system is that I didn't do it sooner. Two family members also have the system, one for commercial use and the other for residential, and they both love it as well.I purchased the 17-Piece Ultimate Package at $539.85, and later added a second keypad. For years I'd researched various security companies and systems, and I always walked away in disgust at the exorbitant rates, not to mention the blatant scare tactics. I'd received $1200 quotes on other installed security systems, both wireless and wired, but I just didn't feel good about doing business with these companies with their overpriced equipment, high monitoring fees and Gestapo-like contracts.At first, I was a bit intimidated at the prospect of setting up a security system on my own. But I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was. In the end, I liked having the freedom to set it up on my own time and pace, and consider the best placement of the components for my home and situation.This system really has brought me peace of mind, at a reasonable cost for both equipment and monitoring. The basic monitoring is only $15 - compared to the typical $30/$35 of most services. The add-on components are also much less than the typical price. For example, an extra door/window sensor is $15. Several of the other companies I researched charge up to $35. This was significant for me, as I live in a ranch home and so I needed a lot of sensors to cover every entry point.As with any system, there are additional features one would ideally like to have. In this case, it would be helpful if the keypad and keyfob had an indicator to show the status of the system (On-Home, On-Away, or Off). And when I last checked, the company had not yet developed and offered glass break sensors. But I also recognize that these "nice to have" features would likely increase the cost of what is an economical system.If you have pets, as I do, it may take a bit of experimenting to find the right placement for the motion sensors. I had to move one of the sensors higher than the recommended 5 feet from the floor. I discovered the Away setting was fine if it was only my cat walking through the house, but my dogs would trigger the motion sensor (likely when my little dog jumped up on a recliner near the sensor).SimpliSafe is a truly refreshing company in this age of greed and fine-print "gotcha" tactics. My experience is that what they claim on their site is not merely marketing spiel simply to reel you in - as is too often the case - but rather is a true reflection of their fair price products/services and customer-friendly policies.I've called SimpliSafe for support twice, and both times the service was excellent. The first time was when I attempted to activate the service after the installation and my components were not connecting with their system. A helpful, knowledgeable CSR walked me through a few steps and I was connected within minutes. The second time was after I bought a second keypad for the back door. I wasn't sure I actually needed it after I discovered I could set Home from the keyfob by holding down the Off and Away buttons at the same time. (The keyfob has three buttons: Away, Off, and Panic.) The CSR said it was not a problem to return the keypad at a full refund. In the end, I decided to keep it, but it was nice to know I had the option of a return without a hassle. I can't count the number of people I've told about SimpliSafe. I highly recommend this security system.

Reviews.Title: The system fits our requirements.
Reviews.Author: Jim England
Reviews.Content: We liked the price and prompt delivery. The system was very easy and simple to install. I would recommend SimpliSafe for anyone in need of a home security system.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Safe
Reviews.Author: Cherie Brantner
Reviews.Content: So easy to install, great website setup.  Ordered more keychain remotes for family members.  Can't use the motion sensors because we have a Great Dane....even if you turn it upside down, if he jumps up it's going to react.  But that is the only drawback.

Reviews.Title: Deceptive Marketing
Reviews.Author: Bill Roquemore
Reviews.Content: First, let me say I like the system, easy to install and works very well.  What I do not like is SimpliSafe's advertising a low price for monitoring and delivering part of a system, and aggressively trying to up-sale!!!  The $14.99/month only covers basic monitoring.  You have to upgrade to $25.99/month to be able to easily program the system on a computer (easiest way)  and have remote access.  AND, every step on their Website is constantly trying to push you up to the $25.99/month price point.  It is like here is the system, but it will cost you an extra $10/month to take advantage of all the benefits.  SIMPLISAFE, just charge everyone the same for the basic components and have upgrades for remote access.  I switched from a more costly ADT system , but SimpliSafe outperforms ADT.To be fair, I had a problem with my system not being delivered properly, thanks to the United Postal Service mistake, but SimpliSafe's Customers Service was great.  Shipped another system overnight at their expense.  First system showed up a few days later and everyone was happy.  I purchased the second system for a Friend and She likes it!Just read the fine print and visit SimpliSafe Website to research pricing.I still recommend SimpliSafe, but wish they would be more forthcoming with pricing.

Reviews.Title: Set up and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: jt
Reviews.Content: I recently purchase the security system. The set up was very simple. I contacted customer service twice and each time they were thorough and very helpful. I have managed in a call center for customer service and sales and was very impressed. I will recommend Simplisafe to family and friend.

Reviews.Title: Great system!
Reviews.Author: cobalt954
Reviews.Content: After my home was recently broken into, I decided to put in a security system but could not afford a system that's costs $50 or more a month to operate. Luckily I found Simplisafe, not only is it affordable on a monthly basis it was very easy to install, it only took about 15 mins, it's also easy to use. Installing the system is just as easy as the video on the web site shows. The other nice thing is you have a 3 day trial period where if the alarm is triggered the police wont be contacted, that way you can get used to setting it when you leave and turning it off when come home. I'm going to expand my system and add the extra loud siren, one of my friends at work told me that crooks still will break into homes with alarm systems because they know they have about 10 mins before police arrive, they get in, grab what they can find and get out. I would recommend this security system to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: As easy as it gets....
Reviews.Author: Kirk Linehan
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing system....super easy to set up and operate!  They have figured it out.  Would def recommend this security system to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Works very well!
Reviews.Author: lindsey
Reviews.Content: Very easy DIY kit.Good quality sensors that work well on windows and doors.System was tested with a large active cat living in the house.The trick is to install motion sensors upside down then cat doesn't trigger the alarm even when he jumps.Very happy with the purchase and the service.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Kenneth C Carter
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  Price is right.  Very good service, quick and fast. If I can install this system anybody can.KC Carter

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Rfs
Reviews.Content: I just purchased my second system for a home under construction. They are easy to install and they work. I get the text and email notifications so I always know the alarm is working. My first system is in my home and the cell system was my only option. The system I just bought is in a summer home that I have gutted at the moment but had a break in. I did replace a few batteries the first year. But I noticed my new system has some upgraded batteries in some of the devices. Also occasionally it will lose contact with the center and I have to reset the system. But I'm very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Best of its kind on the market.
Reviews.Author: John K.
Reviews.Content: After purchasing and installing Simplisafe all by myself with no need for technicians or appointments or contracts, I am more than happy to write positive reviews about this product.  It is worth every penny and no headache to start whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Ahlers
Reviews.Content: Simply put, this system is AWESOME!!! Very easy to setup, works as advertised. Esactly what I was looking for. I love it.

Reviews.Title: My Simplisafe2 Home Security System response.
Reviews.Author: Ken Redmond
Reviews.Content: This is my first security system but my evaluation stems from side by side comparisons with friends that has other systems.  So far my period of implementing the test mode has been smooth and trouble free and I have ran all checks.  I have encountered no problems and look forward to the full connection with headquarters.  I have on order some additional sensors to complete the fine tuning process for my personal needs. To summarize I like the ease of installation, simplicity, no long unnecessary contract, and of course the monthly fee which is around 1/3 of what my friends are paying.I do have a design issue however with the remote control.  While carrying it on my belt loop, the USB protective end cap keeps falling off even when lightly bumped.  I discarded the cap and placed an aftermarket 'slip on' USB protective cover over the terminal which stays in place until I remove it.  The remote is in need of a better design but this is a small thing which is the reason for 5 stars.  Overall it is a very neat system indeed....!

Reviews.Title: Seems to work alright, so far
Reviews.Author: Andrew B. Aames
Reviews.Content: I haven't yet had the system very long, so hesitate to give five stars.  One of the door sensors in the basement seems to have a weak battery, but that may be because the temperature down there is below freezing at this time [the heat in the house is not yet on].  In other words, the in-home control-tower-station seems to occasionally have trouble picking up the signal from deep in the basement [where the bitter-cold maybe has weakened the sensor's battery ... or sensor's batteries].Yet the motion detector works from the basement [that's where the house's 'valuable' copper piping and copper electrical wiring is mainly located, that thieves (junkies?) around this part of town might like to steal].

Reviews.Title: Great System!
Reviews.Author: Peter Mehl
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a security system for my home for a long time but the cost held me back. Plus the fact of having to have a contract. Then I saw an advertisement about Simplisafe. I studied up and bought and glad I did. It took me 30 minutes to install and it works great. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Casie
Reviews.Content: This product is Awesome!  I would recommend it to everyone.  It is soooo easy to set up.  I like you can pick and choose what you want to purchase, and add on at any time. Good customer service.  Great online and app features.  It all works wonderfully.  It makes me feel so much safer!

Reviews.Title: frustrated!
Reviews.Author: meredith guirguis
Reviews.Content: I requested to have 72 hours to set up the pin when I went to see my Mother in 3 days.  When I went to see her, no-one would answer the phone to try to help me set up the pin and the alarm sounded and the police came.  Three times I tried to call and finally the 4th call, they answered and helped me set it up.  I hope things get better, it's very frustrating when people don't do what they say they'll do.  I hope I don't get charge for a false alarm before I could set up the pin #.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dan Stanton
Reviews.Content: Prior to Simpisafe I had two expensive contract security services at my home and business.  Both were long contracts (3 and 5 years) I had to wait to get out of.  I have been very pleased with Simplisafe and even noticed their response time for alarm triggers to be quicker than my previous companies. Installation was very easy. I also like the scalability of the product, I can add on as many features as I choose at any time.I hope they add wireless cameras soon!DS

Reviews.Title: SimpiSafe Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Paul Hammond
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Master pkg with an additional 10 sensors.  I was happy to see all was in the box as ordered.  I began the install and was finished with 16 sensors and the rest of the pieces in about 90 min.  It took me a bit longer as i was removing the old wired system at the same time.  I showed my wife the easy control pad and the three options and she was happy it was easy to use.  I was impressed that I could crack open a window or two for air at night and still be secured within the system due to the 2inch threshold on the sensors.  It was so easy to setup... I was shocked it went as well as it did.  I thought i might lose a sensor or two on the entry doors with kids in and out.. but not so.  Runs perfectly.  My neighbors have already been over to check it out and are considering their own purchases.  The wireless and mobility piece of this solution is genius.  Hats off to the folks as SimpliSafe...Paul in Salt Lake City

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Setterlund
Reviews.Content: I chose this unit because it does note require a contract.  The unit was very simple to install and set up.  There been not problems with it and customer support rates an 11 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: Key Pad
Reviews.Author: Edward Rice
Reviews.Content: The only faulty I have with Simplisafe is the display on the key pad.It is not very bright and hard to read.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm
Reviews.Author: C. Morton
Reviews.Content: I was able to choose exactly the components I needed and install the alarm myself in a couple hours.  I have online monitoring and it was so simple and inexpensive to monitor.  I have no idea why anyone would go with one of those national alarm companies when SimpliSafe is so great.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is a great system !!
Reviews.Author: Jerald G Rising
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe Alarm system is easy to install. I installed it in a very short time. One of the things I like is you can reposition the sensors easily because their wireless. Everything worked seamlessly and exactly like the instructions said. The keypad to easy to use and the keycain remote is a great feature. And there a no contracts to sign up for. If I decide I don't like the system I can return it and  they will pay the return postage. Customer service is always there to help. I will defiantly recommend SimpiSafe to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: We are well pleased
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mauldin
Reviews.Content: System arrived promptly after order and was relatively easy to install.  Any difficulties we experienced were  handled quickly and smoothly by the tech support unit.  We feel much safer with our  Simply Safe system installed and are much more at ease.  We can highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: No brainer
Reviews.Author: Kathy Taylor
Reviews.Content: We inquired about installation and monitoring from other companies and found that the initial fee was a minimum of $99 up to $200+.  The monitoring fee was $45 per month locked in for 36 months.  We then checked with SimpliSafe and found that the monitoring fee started  at <than $15 a month and the highest fee was < than $25 per month.  With the purchase of the SimpliSafesystem we were saving over half of what we would have spent just in monitoring alone with the major alarm companies.Installation was such a breeze.  No tools required.  Entering the sensors, key pad, etc into the home PC was a breeze.  The 72 hour self training was very useful.I have recommended SimpliSafe to several friends and neighbors since we purchased and installed ours.SimpliSafe is simply a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is as the name states simple and safe
Reviews.Author: Timothy G. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I placed a security system in my home. I had some trepidations..like would the magnets fall off the doors ? Would it be error free of false alarms etc. Well in summary I was responsible for knowing what sensors to place and where. I did not need to share the decision with anyone. I know how the install went since I did it all. I know how the system works.I feel secure and at a very reasonable cost. Peace of mind now that I took the step to secure my home.Anytime I called to ask questions etc. I was greeted by a professional that had all the answers.I would recommend this system to anyone that would like security at a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and reliable
Reviews.Author: Bigg
Reviews.Content: My dad had this system a couple years and it successfully protected several investmenet properties that thieves tried to break into and steal the copper while they were under renovation.  He was able to easily move the system from property to property with ease and set it up.After hearing friends recent stories of break-ins, I decided to try SimpliSafe as well.  The system is extremely simple to set up and the instructions couldn't be clearer.  The base even gives voice prompts when testing the system or programming the key fob.  The sensors are simple to affix to any wall and door and they are sturdy.  The only issue I has was one exterior was inset too far into the frame for the sensor on the frame to detect the magnet affixed to the actual door.  So I had to superglue an extra cheap miniblind bracket that I had on the door to bring the magnet further out from the door.  Works perfect and looks good.  The fact that the battery in each sensor lasts 3-5 years is also  great.  I recently ordered the fire/smoke sensor because my insurance discount will pay for almost half the alarm system if I include that sensor.My only complaint would be that text/e-mail alerts should be included in the $14.99 plan, instead of charging an extra $5.00 for it.  It would see to be a simple and cheap addittional service to provide at no additional cost to the customer.  But having fire protection at no additional cost is a pretty good deal so I can't complain too much.  So far, we love the system for the ease of use and piece of mind it provides.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: David Carithers
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that thr system gives me plenty of time to exit my home once it is set.  I also like that when is set for home, it gives you a seperate signal on the unsuspected opening of the entries.  It gives you peace of mind.Dave

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: KATIE
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the system, Easy to install and although still new, is working perfectly.. During the installation I did not need to use two[2] of the window alarms and when the base began blinking I had to idea what to do . I rechecked all the system I had installed and all seemed in good order. During a call to  a very helpful women sales person at the number that was listed on the installation sheet we found out that the reason for the blinking was that the base unit was attempting to locate the 2 I had not used.She handled everything with a very professional attitude, took the units off the system, and during this time explained what she was doing and how she did it. Was very impressed with her attitude and handling of the problem. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Nice system
Reviews.Author: Juan castro
Reviews.Content: The install was easy. buttons on keypad are a bit crowded. Could use a little more space to avoid fat-fingering. I like it!

Reviews.Title: We are happy so far
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Baughman
Reviews.Content: This system so far has been what we needed and wanted. We are not technologically gifted, and we had it installed and running in maybe 4 hours. Only problem we had was...we have a French door in a six inch wall. We had to kind of jury rig a wood setup for the entry alarm for that door. We will have to fix it later so it is more esthetically pleasing but for now it works. The customer support people have been helpful and understanding. Have only had it installed about 10 days but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Szydlowski
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe alarm system was recommended by my son. Since he researches any product before buying to the n'th degree, I felt confident following his recommendation.  I personally found the system well packaged, components of high quality, installation and rationale of component placement fully explained, and, once installation completed, everything worked as advertised. Also, being a wireless system, installation was a breeze. I chose the basic alarm monitoring service ($14.95 / month) and hopefully we never have to use it. The provided sign and window decals should be enough to discourage the average criminal. Lastly, aside from the piece of my mind provided, I now receive a discount on my homeowners policy.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation
Reviews.Author: Ed Ritzmann
Reviews.Content: I installed the system in less time than I thought it would take.  The installation process was so simple I thought I was doing something wrong.  And my family members find it very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: rebecca zhao
Reviews.Content: I have this for my house and business.Easy to setup.Good price.Wish they have video or snap a photo when the motion sensor goes off.

Reviews.Title: Easy, easy, easy
Reviews.Author: rushgator
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, operate, and make changes to. Did the complete install and setup in a couple of hours after work.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: ucinn
Reviews.Content: I have had this for about a year now and absolutely love it. It was very easy to set up and use. For the door/window sensors, I used the screws as our woodwork around the doors and windows aren't flat. I set it off once and was called within 30 seconds. just make sure and figure out where you need sensors and what kind. I ordered extra motion sensors with mine to cover some areas that wouldn't have been with the base model.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Master Michael J. Tirado
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier with my choice of Simplisafe!Easy purchase, easy setup, excellent customer service, excellent product!Totally happy!AAAAAAAAAA++++++++++++++!!!

Reviews.Title: Priceless Peace of Mind in Home Security
Reviews.Author: David Sammons
Reviews.Content: Wow.  SimpliSafe is amazing!  After finally purchasing a system for our home I was able to install everything by myself one evening after work.  It took around an hour to mount all of the sensors and the system worked flawlessly from the start.  The peace of mind that it has brought to me and my family is priceless.  Thanks SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: So easy!
Reviews.Author: Robert and Linda Yanega
Reviews.Content: This is the easiest alarm system we've ever owned!  It arrived, we stuck the parts to the wall, and that was pretty much it.  One note - the base station instructions say to remove the battery thing but they already do that at the factory, so just plug the base station in.  Customer service apologized and promised they are correcting the instructions.It works great - we just hit the button on our key fob, voice prompts remind you that you're armed, you leave and that's it.  Rerverse when you come home.  We wanted to relocate some components, so we unstuck them from the wall and moved them.  We love it!

Reviews.Title: What a great product/support/service
Reviews.Author: Michael P Casey
Reviews.Content: I started out with their basic system and quickly upgraded big time. I had one serious product issue and they next day mailed me the critical part at no charge.

Reviews.Title: Great and Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: TX
Reviews.Content: I ordered this system rather than going through another company who will come to your house and will take 2-3 hours to install something.  This was less expensive than other companies and extremely easy to install myself--and I am not particularly handy.  It all works as it should and I have had great customer service thus far.

Reviews.Title: Simple and easy to install and set up
Reviews.Author: Love reading
Reviews.Content: This has to be the easiest and most simple, yet complete home security system anyone could ask for.  It only took me 90 minutes to install, set up and test my system. And the remote monitoring service (optional) is very inexpensive ($14.95/month) compared to other providers yet includes the same quality services.

Reviews.Title: simplisafe install
Reviews.Author: Carol in RI "Carol in RI"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this alarm system.  It was a simple installation and is very user friendly.  It is living up to my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, helpful staff
Reviews.Author: Leroy Fournier
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with our system and have already refered Simplisafe to two other home, which have been installed with ease.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be more satisfied
Reviews.Author: peter
Reviews.Content: This SimpliSafe system is everything it claims to be.  Easy to install with step-by-step instructions.  Great online support.  I especially like the text messsages I receive whenever the key pad or any sensor is activated.  I have a small dog and the system behaves just as it claims.  No false alarms/trips due to the movement of my pet in the house when the system is armed.  I could not be more satisfied with my SimpliSafe system.

Reviews.Title: Super Easy, and it works flawlessly
Reviews.Author: Joe W Cain
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this package with some extra sensors. Everything arrived on time and was packaged neatly. I opened the boxes and followed the simple instructions (I also watched a couple youtube videos prior to ordering) and in a few minutes had a working alarm system. I really like the wireless aspect. All the sensors came with 3M strips to adhere to the mounting locations. The base station automatically recognized the sensors. After installing, I ran through a couple tests and everything worked as described. I also downloaded the app. I can now operate my alarm system from anywhere in the world that I have internet access. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. You don't need to be an expert to install it, I promise. (Check out the you tube videos, and you'll see)

Reviews.Title: Great System, Easy To Install & Use
Reviews.Author: JoeS "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this system after doing on-line research and I could not be more pleased.  Kit was delivered in 3 days and took about an hour to fully install.  Very simple and on-line wizard was very helpful.I upgraded monthly monitoring to have the smart phone app and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Holahan
Reviews.Content: We started with a simple system, then upgradfed it ourselves.  The monthly monitoring fees are very reasonable, especially for cell montoring.  What impresses me most is the readily configurable system settings and components.  We were able to start small and add very reasonably and without service/installation fees.  Anyone who can use a PC, read the instructions, and master the ever challenging adhesive tape can install one o these themselves - I swear a kid could do it if they had a chair to stand on!  You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: From Installation to Operations and Monitoring, Very Happy
Reviews.Author: BO
Reviews.Content: For a self installed system, this is everything it should be.  Easy to install.  Voice instructions, with several other easy options to get installation instructions.  Each sensor gets tested during the installation process.  I have signed up for the full monitoring package.  I like that I can check, or set the alarm remotely from my phone or internet.  I called my insurance company and got a nice discount that offsets the premium monitoring package cost.  I chose this system rather that trying to repair my 20 year old system that had failed.  I have gotten fast replies to questions I've had about the system.  Wish I would have done this sooner.

Reviews.Title: Best Alarm System and Best Value
Reviews.Author: David C Rockey
Reviews.Content: Before ordering my SimpliSafe alarm system I did a lot of research as to alarm systems available, settings and flexibility, monitoring service cost, reliability and support/customer server.  I looked at A LOT of name brand alarm systems sold with monitoring service and a service contract.  Between the cost of the installation and the cost and commitment for the monitoring contract, I just couldn't justify the investment.Then I found SimpliSafe.  The cost for the equipment was very reasonable.  They had a wide range of the type of sensors they offered.  The support/customer service before (I had a lot of questions) and after the purchase was 2nd to none.  The cost for the SimpliSafe monitoring service was far less than others that I had found plus there is no contract requirement.  I really like the flexibility of how each sensor can be configured as to how to respond and it made notification to you of a detected problem.The hardest part of installing the SimpliSafe alarm system was deciding where to locate the alarm sensors so they would best monitor the security and activity of my home.I like having the ability to monitor my alarm system using my smart phone or tablet.  I waited a couple of weeks to write this review because I wanted to check the reliability of the system and my installation.  When I tested the system for accuracy, the system responded as it was supposed to and so far I have not gotten any false alarms.  I also like having a system that not only watches my home when I am away but it also monitors the home while I am at home.I definitely recommend the SimpliSafe alarm system.  I am very pleased with everything about the SimpliSafe alarm system, monitoring service and the company.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Hbshack
Reviews.Content: I ordered and installed SimpliSafe a few weeks ago, after a few months of reading reviews/recommendations.  The system was easy to install and set up.  I do recommend screwing in the keypad controller due to its weight (mine fell of the wall about 1/2 after being put on with the 3m tape).  The extra siren is screwed on as well, and makes a big difference in how loud the alarm is.  I ordered additional entry sensors as well, and everything installed and set up as instructed (easily).So far, the system has been working well. I have the $24.99/month service so I can get text alerts when its armed, disarmed, set off, or any error.  Its nice with kids, to know who has entered (based on their own private code).  In addition, with the full service, you can identify (by nickname) all of your sensors which is a great feature.  This way I know which sensor was set off.  The iphone application works great as well, allowing me to arm and disarm the system from anywhere.The only issues I have had with the system so far were: 1) My extra siren had to be synchronized to the system a couple times as it didn't go off when the alarm was tested/triggered. Its a very easy process to resync it (just press the button in the back and hold it while pressing the "off" button on either the keypad or keychain several times).  I had to resync it 2-3 times but now it seems to be working fine (although you never really know until the alarm is triggered). 2) A couple times, my keypad has said "keypad out of range", yet my keypad is in the same room as my base station (and our house is very small at 1,300 SF).  Not sure what caused it, but it only happened a few times and then went back in range (might be the placement of the base station). 3) the double A batteries included in the keypad and extra siren needed to be replaced within a couple weeks.  This wasn't really a big deal as it could have been sitting in the warehouse for months.Customer service was very friendly and helpful. For some reason, mine shipped without the yard sign. I called and they apologized and sent one out immediately.  They offered to send it next day as well, but I told them to save the money (not necessary).  Well it did come in 1-2 days anyway.The most difficult thing to determine, is whether or not you are being monitored correctly.  Our alarm went off a couple times (our fault), but we cancelled it quickly.  We never got a call from the monitoring service, but have read that they will not if you cancel it quickly with your code.  There is no reason to question whether or not it is being monitored correctly, but I do wonder, only because we have never tested the call center.  Might be worth it one of these days.Overall, I am very happy with the system.  I ordered it directly through SimpliSafe and it was less expensive than through Amazon.  In addition, I received a 10% discount by using the "Rush" coupon code.  It is a very affordable system that you can take with you if you ever leave, it installs easily, and I really like the features you have with it, if you sign up for the $25/month monitoring service.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Vincent A. Aliotta
Reviews.Content: Good basic system for the money.  Simple to set up and works well within my home. What kept me from rating of 5 starts was the order was shipped short from the packing list, however the issue was fixed by customer service.  Not having all the components meant I could not finish the set up the same day.  The self sticky things do not hold the key pad very well.  Suggest you use the screws.

Reviews.Title: Simple to install works well
Reviews.Author: Anthony Farley
Reviews.Content: I found the system simple to install. I took my time installing the system and tried to work out the most practical way to use it. My system is fairly large with 18 door and window sensors, 2 motion sensors and 2 panic buttons. There is no way to tell the system which sensor is at any given location in the house. I figured out that each sensor has a 5 digit ID code. I created an excel spreadsheet that identifies where each sensor is located by ID code. So I now have a quick look-up when the system does alarm. What would be really nice is if you could identify each sensor location on my computer when the USB remote is plugged into the computer. If that table in the computer could be printed it would serve the same purpose with less work on my part. I love the fact that the base station talks and tells me if there is a problem with a sensor, If there is a problem with monitoring and warns me to exit when I arm the system.. I have 2 cats and they do not cause the Motion Sensors to alarm. I did not order an additional alarm siren, but I may do so since the base station alarm is not quite as loud as I would like. Most of the time I probably will not have it 24/7 monitoring so I calculate that It will take between 12 and 18 months to break even. Since I'm not locked into a monitoring contract for 2 to 3 years. I expect that this system will save me a lot of money long term.

Reviews.Title: alarm system
Reviews.Author: Torrey
Reviews.Content: Good product and extremely user friendly. U can purchase a base system and add onto it as you go. Very happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is simply great!
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Guthrie
Reviews.Content: I have had a Simplisafe system in my home for about 1 1/2 years, and the service has been very dependable.  When I need to call customer service, they are unfailingly helpful.  I recently purchased a second system, but could not use it (no fault of Simplisafe).  They sent me a return label, and took the system back--no questions asked.  I have recommended them to many of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Fast and Easy to setup
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The system arrived quicker than it was promised, which is always a bonus.The setup was a breeze.  You put the remote keychain/memory stick into your computer and follow the step by step instructions.  All of the components came pre-configured, so all I had to do was stick them in place and pull the battery tab off to activate them.  After that, I setup some basic configuration parameters and it was done.I also like that for the first 72 hours, your alarms is in "test" mode, where they won't dispatch police or fire to alarm calls.  I figure that is long enough to get everyone used to the alarm.The Android app works great, it's way cool to see the status of the alarm.  And the fact that I can setup several different codes and see who is coming and going is excellent.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: Roxanne Simons
Reviews.Content: I found this system by visiting homes for sale by developers that rehab homes and resell.  I saw it over and over again and decided to look into the company.I just made the purchase and installed myself in about 30 minutes.I love it and would recommend to anyone looking for a great effective security system

Reviews.Title: Comments
Reviews.Author: lpgator
Reviews.Content: I have just concluded installing and activating my system . After a few hiccups everything seems to be working fine.. The SimliSafe people were very helpful  and patience in helping me and answers my questions.I have one suggestion. Provide  a user manual outlining the installation and use in detail. This would have answered most of my questions.Put in PDF format that could be downloaded from your web site.

Reviews.Title: It Just Works!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "hav fun"
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I would recommend this to everyone. Easy to install. Make sure command strip will stick to wall or sensor will fall off. In this case, screw sensors to wall. Components are easy to add and at your convenience depending on your financial situation. Setup the way you want it. Product just works!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Deborah Brown
Reviews.Content: We chose SimpliSafe for the simple fact no Contract involved.  We received the item promptly and it was easily installed by my husband. The personal contact I have had with their Customer Support team has been Amazing, very professional,

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Arlyn M Dean
Reviews.Content: Have only had it installed for a week but so far things are going well. Had a minor issue with setting the system up, the base station wasn't connecting. A quick call into customer service, who told me to restart the base station, and problem fixed. Website is easy to naviagate and like the remote on/off feature. Hopefully all goes smoothly from here.

Reviews.Title: So far it is GREAT
Reviews.Author: Matthew Krick
Reviews.Content: We have had the SimpliSafe system for about a week but so far it is GREAT.  The entry sensors and motion detectors seem to work perfectly and the smartphone app is a nice way to verify the system is set the way you want it to be.  We are extremely happy with our decision to leave the largest alarm company and start getting more for our money with SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Kelly Andrew
Reviews.Content: The order was not delivered in 2 days even though we paid the extra freight.  The installation was pretty easy but the batteries in the alarms needed to be replaced the day I installed the system.  Be prepared for at least a 5 minute wait for customer service.  Although everything seems negative the a system locally with same features was about 25% more money and the monthly service locally is about 33% more.  Having said this I would still buy the same system.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Vince Zmuzinski
Reviews.Content: Alarm system was everything it was advertised to be.Inexpensive - easy to install - versatile.I am very pleased with my purchase and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, and no problems so far!
Reviews.Author: Fahad Ahmad Bishara
Reviews.Content: We installed our simplisafe system yesterday, and we are pretty happy with it. It's very easy to install (it only took about a half hour or so) and the interface is pretty straight forward!

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised - wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: WJB
Reviews.Content: I have a garage/shop behind a house we own across town, and even though it had a basic (X-10) alarm, I was always nervous about it since there was no monitoring and only a siren. So I needed a system that could be monitored without a phone line for peace of mind about the stuff I had stored there. It needed to be reasonably priced and have no hidden fees/contracts etc. After some research I decided to try out the SimpliSafe system, and so far I couldn't be happier.The setup is a breeze, and the system was up and running in less than 10 minutes. My only complaint is that it was a little confusing that you had to set the system up online with the serial number BEFORE it would connect at all to the monitoring station.
