This was only a problem because I was at the garage site installing the unit and didn't have access to a computer to activate it. Most installations will be at a residence where you'll have your PC handy, so it's an issue that won't effect most people. I had to go back home, enter the info via the web, and go back to the shop to make sure that it had a connection to the monitoring station.The base unit talks you through the install, and it was actually why I knew there wasn't a connection to the monitoring station. When I tried to arm the unit and leave, it warned me that it wasn't connected to monitoring. Very cool feature and it provided me with additional peace of mind that the system makes you aware of problems if there are any.The online monitoring portal is really advanced, and shows events (i.e. "Armed by Keychain remote at 4:14pm", etc.) that are really useful. I have the mid-level plan ($19.99/month) that sends me alerts, and it's easy to see how the $24.99/month plan is worth the extra money if this was in a residential location. It lets you see the status of individual sensors and some other useful information.If all goes well over the next month, I'll probably purchase another (larger) system for my residence and will have the higher end monitoring plan for that location. This says a lot, since I have a top of the line Honeywell system already in place there. I hope there is some kind of discount for having multiple locations. If not (and if you are reading this SimpliSafe) then that would be a great selling point! I would also be willing to pay an annual contract price over a monthly fee if that was an option to save some money.The systems themselves can be a little pricey, but if you are comparing them to the long contracts and high monitoring cost of the local (ADT, etc.) systems then it's far cheaper. Seems like quality gear that will hold up over time.If I do end up with another unit installed in my home, I'll update the review accordingly. But if you are on the fence about this product don't worry - you'll be pleased with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: grock
Reviews.Content: As I looked through the installation manual, I had a few reservations but when I plugged in the USB on the key fob it stepped me through the installation incredibly easy and quick.  As promised, the system was in a "test" phase for about 3 days then went active notifying me that this had happened.  Email and text messages come through fine when the system is disarmed or made active.  My son used a cellular service that was not listed in the drop down menu but after a call to that provider and then to SimpliSafe, it was quickly added and works fine.  A suggestion to potential users - look through the packages and decide the minimum you need and then add those items you do want.  You may be happy with the packages but may have a need that is a bit different.  Another item that I did not see in the information before I purchased it - check with your police department and/or city clerk to see if you need a burglar alarm permit.  I ended up having to pay another $100 for the permit.  Am I happy with this?  Absolutely!  Would I recommend it to others?  Absolutely!

Reviews.Title: Simple installation.
Reviews.Author: Student R
Reviews.Content: Very simple to install; makes me feel like I accomplished something.Hopefully the alarm will never be tried by an actual bad guy! (but have confidence that it will perform properly if it does)

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: monkey
Reviews.Content: I set up this system in my home last weekend and it was smooth going and fun. The system walks you through each step and it was easy to test. I tested the motion sensor with my two 15 pound dogs and they set it off so I put it upside down as recommended and it worked perfectly. My 72 hour test period is up but I don't expect any issues with it going off unnecessarily. I love all the options you have with this system that I did not have with my other "BIG NAME" system.  The door chime is just right and not too loud or annoying.  Love the remote! This system is better quality than my previous one as well.  I will update my review once I've been using it a while.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: This is a great system.  Easy to install.  You can place the components wherever you want.  No installer has to come in your house.Quick response from Simplisafe.  Good quality equipment at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Simpli Great!
Reviews.Author: Perry Youngs
Reviews.Content: This system is very easy to install.  It took an afternoon, but only because I was intermittently transporting my daughter to and from a birthday party.  This time also included using the provided screws to attach the sensors and panels to walls, doors, etc.  Everything worked first time and I have not seen any problems with the system.  My 8 year old daughter is comfortable with activating and deactivating the alarm using the keypads, and we have had no "false" alarms.  I signed up for the full monitoring service and iPhone app configuration, allowing me to get notifications of when the system is activated and deactivated - and also allows me to activate it if I forget when leaving the house.  This is a very good and cost effective alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Wish we purchased a long time ago!
Reviews.Author: J. Churchill
Reviews.Content: This system was so easy to install!  We keep track of online police records in our neighborhood and notice an increasing number of theft and burglary.  Having this system in place has already made us feel much more comfortable in our home.  We have spoken with representatives a couple of times and have been impressed with their communication skills, understanding of the product and advice.  We live in Alaska and worried about cell reception.  Not a problem!  Have already recommended SimpliSafe to co-workers.  When calling other companies and they asked who we were comparing them to re: home security…the conversation got very quiet when we mentioned SimpliSafe as they knew they couldn't compete with this company.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Jamie L. Betts
Reviews.Content: This is a great system. I'd recommend  buying from the simplisafe website. Also, consider buying refurbished. Much better deals, and you still get the same warranty and guarantee. Also keep in mind if you have any pets you may want to avoid the motion sensors. They say less than 30 pounds will not be picked up.. However my dog likes to lay on top of the sofa and he would constantly set it off. Another thing to keep in mind is the coverage of T-Mobile in your area. If it's not very good coverage you may consider opting for a Verizon chip instead. In the end this is a very good product. Great customer support. Virtually no wait time. Amcest Alarm Center that SimpliSafe contracts for dispatching has also been very good with customer service so far.

Reviews.Title: Delivered what it promised
Reviews.Author: davcav
Reviews.Content: The Simplisafe system was delivered quicker than scheduled.  The equipment all seems to be high quality.  Setup was simple, but  did take longer than advertised for me.  After getting set up and enrolled in the monitoring, we had a motion detector go off while we were away, resulting in a call to the police.  When we arrived home, nothing was amiss, so I assumed that one of our (small) dogs set it off.  I turned the sensor upside down as suggested, and haven't had a problem since.  I do recommend disabling the panic button on the key chain remote, as we found it is very easy to accidentally set it off.  Other than that I would have rated it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install
Reviews.Author: R. Clemons
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, price was good.  Loved the fact that I can add more things to it as needed.  I started with 4 sensors, 2 motion detectors, a panic alarm, the siren, the smoke detector and of course the base unit,  I was able to use the sensors on three doors in my house and the fourth, I actually was able to use on my detached garage door!  My garage had never been alarmed before and had been broken into in broad daylight so this gives me extra piece of mind.  I will test it out for the next few weeks but I am sure that I will be ordering more sensors and possibly the water alarm and the freeze alarm (not sure what they called them specifically).  I chose to have the interactive monitoring ($24.99 a month) but it is still $18.00 cheaper a month that I am currently paying PLUS it is cellular, which my current alarm system is not.

Reviews.Title: Safe, not sorry.
Reviews.Author: R. Figueroa "dich"
Reviews.Content: This has to be the simplest system to install and set up. I just finished testing the system and I feel it provides everything those BIG company systems offer at a fraction of the price. The only con is that the packages offered are a little limited to the needs of a homeowner. I had to purchase several more entry, smoke and CO2 sensors to completely protect my home. Other than that, I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Gary Bateman
Reviews.Content: It took ten mins to set up and the online interface is simple and easy to use.  Will recommend this to everyone I know.

Reviews.Title: Very easy set up
Reviews.Author: Lisa Willett
Reviews.Content: I bought this system for my daughter and was able to get it up and running in about 15 mins.  Tested it and it worked great.I love the wireless system and the cellular connection.  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Sunset Caldwell
Reviews.Content: I have tried several of the home security systems and found them either lacking in security that I needed or was more expensive for the service that I felt was warranted.  After trying different systems, I opted for the SimpliSafe Home Security because it met all of my needs as well as the monitoring system was reasonably priced.  Indeed, there is no long term contract and there is three levels of service that you can select or none at all.  What was even more advantageous to me, is that I can move up or down on the monitoring levels that suit my needs.  For instance, when I am not traveling I can select the $19.95 per month monitoring which gives me text messaging of any alarms or changes to my system as well as it being monitored by a live person.  Or when I travel, I can select the $24.95 option which allows me to remotely control my system by computer or smart phone.  I can turn the system on or off, allow a person to enter my home and reactivate the system when they leave.  Another reason is the distance that the sensors reach.  I have two detached garages away from the house that are approximately 200-300 feet.  I wanted a system that would not only monitor my home but also my detached garages with one system.  SimpliSafe met all of my needs and I am completely satisfied and would recommend this system to anyone who wants a secure but simple to use home security system.

Reviews.Title: Simple to install!
Reviews.Author: Carol carls
Reviews.Content: Installed our system about a week ago. Easy to install, everything is wireless. Had to make a few adjustments to keep the motion sensors from picking up the cats movements.Everything is working fine now. Feel more secure now knowing that all windows and doors are monitored. Great system!

Reviews.Title: Home security package
Reviews.Author: John Watson
Reviews.Content: I ordered the standard package and added one additional entry sensor and keychain remote.  All of the equipment arrived  quickly and was preprogrammed into the base station.  All I had to do was plug in the keychain remote into a USB port on the computer and enter the pin numbers I wanted to use.  Installation was straightforward, had no problems installing the equipment.  There was double sided tape preinstalled on the sensors however due to the way my door frames were shaped I also used one screw to mount each sensor along with the tape.  The tape worked great on the magnets.  The instructions on the computer and in the manual were very good, had no questions that were not answered.  Tested everything and it worked the first time.  Hopefully won't have another break-in to need it.  I have had the system for a couple weeks now and am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gwenneth Price Picard
Reviews.Content: Good price, good response from the seller, no long term obligations, relatively simple installation and setup, and it really works!  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Installed mine last week and works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, no problems whatsoever.  Paid for my permit at the city and went on active monitoring a couple of days ago.  So far so good.  Still need to hide the base unit a little better.  My youngest son will be installing one in the not too distant future.  Even though we're still trying to figure out our best settings for entry etc. it is so easy to set up !!

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: ENcomix Productions
Reviews.Content: A friend told me about how well this system is. It is easy to install and user friendly. I may upgrade to the $25 a month fee. I am only paying $15  a month now.

Reviews.Title: Rgam8
Reviews.Author: Linda Gamet
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use. Delivery was quicker than I expected, and within 90 minutes of opening the box, we were up and running!

Reviews.Title: Easy Set up
Reviews.Author: MarkS
Reviews.Content: Installed the system last week and it took about two hours to complete mainly due to the 14 additional sensors that I ordered plus taking the advice of previous customers to screw the sensors in place vs. relying on the sticky tape.et up was easy and we quickly got used to using it. The additional key chain remotes make things really simple.The only complaint that I have is that the battery in the smoke detector gave out yesterday which, for a battery that is supposed to last 5 years is not a good start. I am waiting for customer service to respond to this issue.All in all I would recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: The very best
Reviews.Author: thrifty lady "Donna"
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised at what a great system for so little money.  It was very easy to install, just as advertised.  That shocked me the most.  I have done the "easy to install" things that were anything but easy, but this was just as simple as they said it was.  I am very happy with the system.

Reviews.Title: Fast install, good coverage
Reviews.Author: Timothy Upton
Reviews.Content: The hardest part of this system is figuring out what devices you want and where to put them.  Once you think you have that figured out, remember...you can always order additional pieces as you go.On the installation side...hardest part is opening the first box and putting it up.  After that, it's all downhill.  Piece of cake, just follow instructions.I have installed this on 2nd home and plan to terminate my contract with ADP on my primary residence in next week or 2.  Will order second system, as installation is so easy and monitoring is so inexpensive

Reviews.Title: Just What I Wanted
Reviews.Author: Earl G. Sturrock Jr
Reviews.Content: Easy setup. Works as desired.  Will be buying additional sensors. Well Pleased.  Would recommend to friends. I've not yet decided to activate monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to name!
Reviews.Author: Preston B. Ray III
Reviews.Content: Have had other security systems in other residences with free installs and long term contracts- simplisafe was very easy to install and to add just needed devices- intend to add dispatch services but initially only need alarm capabilities- works great- cust services and ease of programming is top notch and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: New "Ultimate" Home Security System (17 pcs + 4 added)
Reviews.Author: Becky W
Reviews.Content: After a year's thinking about it and researching home security system options, SimpliSafe equipment and monitoring service truly fit our needs as compared to their competitors in the purchase, delivery, install and testing phases.  Their website tutorials were super informative and helpful.  Ordering and adding additional devices was a snap, delivered timely and simply added to the system.The "30 minute install" for a comprehensive home installation is a little bit misleading as for an inexperienced person it takes about 2+ hours longer for a large home.  However, I called the customer service number and spoke with Mattie for 90 uninterrupted minutes who was wonderful, knew the products well and was as helpful as any rep I've ever spoken with.  She took the "bite" out of any inconvenience that I might have had without her patience, pleasant demeanor and tutelage.The only snafu that we experienced was the base station motherboard had a SIM card that was not as compatible with cell towers in our area.  A new one was promptly sent to us and I removed the existing board and replaced with the new one.  Ran a test and all went well.  We're now up and running.All told we are delighted with the system thus far and home security is no longer an issue for us.  Hope it never goes off because of an intruder or worse yet fire, CO2 presence, potential water damage or home heating system failure!Truly yours,Becky Weber

Reviews.Title: simplisafe2 security system
Reviews.Author: cheryl blakey
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install yourself. I love the home feature for one thing and the remote. I can shut the alarm off before I walk in the house especially if my hands are full.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase & quality of the system
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R Hamm Jr
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an easy to install system that is monitored by an outside group, not a self-monitoring system.  The initial cost is reasonable for my size of home requirements & the monthly monitoring fee is low.  For me, it is a win-win.  After a month, I am very happy with the whole package.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be easier!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe was very easy to install. Step by step instructions even a technophobe could handle. Save yourself money by choosing the monitoring option and ask your homeowners insurance to provide you a discount. My wife feels so much safer when home alone. A great investment!

Reviews.Title: Great easy to install system without the headaches, drama, or cost
Reviews.Author: Dwhit7
Reviews.Content: We researched this device for over a year.  We had a old Brinks system in our house that was not monitored.  Since it was not monitored, it beeped every 3-4 hours as it could not connect to the monitoring service.  We thought our only options were to go with another company and get locked into a contract or to pay to replace the computer and keypads in this system.When we found Simpli-Safe at first, we did not take it seriously.  We did not expect much out of a system that could be self installed and as this cheap, we were wrong.PROS;Up front pricing-  Pick a package and any options you want and it is yours.  No having to commit to a large package to get the features you want or getting a basic package because you can't figure the pricing structure.  If you want to add something late go online and purchase it, install it and have it.Simple pricing- They offer three packages of monitoring and all can be viewed on their site.  No extras for cellular monitoring, fire, flood, or anything else.  Pick the services you want (or none at all) and you get it.No Contract-  You can be monitored this month and not next month.  There is no $3000 3 year commitment.  You don't like the service? Turn it off. You can even return the whole system for up to 60 days.Easy to install-  Everyone says this system is incredibly easy to install and they are right.  I had my system going in under 30 minutes.  I did have a problem with the extra siren not being connected, but one call and 5 minutes later it was linked.Options - You can have smoke, CO2, flood, temperature monitoring adding by just adding the sensor.  Their is NO extra cost for the monitoring of these devices.Cellular monitoring- The system uses T-Mobile or Verizon (depending on your area) to send a cell call to there monitoring company.  Most companies charge extra for this, but this is the primary way the alerts are sent.  You can also hook it up to your broadband router or phone line as a back up (no charge).portability- I don't see this mentioned often, but this system will move with you.  Take it down, pack it up, and put it up at your new place.  I can' of many system where you can do this.CONS-The system looks less dated.  The keypad does not look current and the door sensors are huge.  Although the keypad looks dated it is pretty advanced.  Everything it in plain words and it is backlit.  It is also VERY simple to use.-Shipping is slow.  I know this is not their fault, but it is worth noting.  I paid extra for the 3-5 day FedEx Ground service and received it about a week later.  Simplisafe sent it out the next day, but FedEx days are business days (and Monday is not a business day)-Minimal options-  The system offers a lot (smoke, CO2, entry, motion, flood, and temperature monitoring), but could more farther to hit the advanced systems on the market (video, two way talk, etc).  They are working on this though.  When I purchased my system two weeks ago they were not offering glass break sensors stating they were still testing them.  They are now available and for only $35.

Reviews.Title: EASY TO INSTALL
Reviews.Author: Nancy Woods
Reviews.Content: My son was able to install this unit in about 1/2 hr.  Very easy instructions to follow.Looking forward to the security.

Reviews.Title: The system i always wanted
Reviews.Author: OC
Reviews.Content: I have had this system only a week or so but i am very pleased with the ease of use as well as installation. I have already added additional sensors. That was a breeze as well. Great bang for the buck.I really wished i could get cameras with this system. Any idea when that might occur?

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Anthony Syrowski
Reviews.Content: The Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System that I ordered arrived in a just a couple of days.  It took less than 30 minutes to install and is easy to operate.  I like the wireless system because I have a log home and it would be impossible to install a wired system.I did have a small problem with the wireless key ring/fob.  I called the company and they sent a replacement in two days.

Reviews.Title: Great wireless modular home security system!
Reviews.Author: David M Smith
Reviews.Content: Very simple to install, configure and customize your system as needed.Adding or subtracting sensors and alarms only takes a few clicks on your computer.The system arrived quickly, was well packaged and customer support was very responsive.It's nice to know my home is protected when I am away or out of town for any amount of time!I would recommend this product to any "do it yourselfer" who's interested in adding a security system to their home.

Reviews.Title: I Am Blown Away
Reviews.Author: T. Alexander "On the road in the RV"
Reviews.Content: I am blown away with how simple this system was to install.  When I bought it, I did not realize that every sensor in the box, was already configured with the main control system.  Just take the sensors out of the box, stick them where you want them, pull the tab to connect the battery and the sensor was instantly recognized by the main control.The phone app is incredible.  It texts and emails me every time my neighbor goes into the house to check it.  We are on the road in the RV for three months at a time, and I know exactly what is happening 1,500 miles away, in real time.And I bought a freeze sensor, a water detection sensor (for broken pipes), breaking glass sensors, etc.  What a cool product.

Reviews.Title: wow the install went great!
Reviews.Author: tom mccracken
Reviews.Content: wow the install went great!im just amassed how good it wks. when I only have marginal cell receptionPS thanks for all the help and how do buy stock in your co.tomA ++

Reviews.Title: Simple to use & install
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R.
Reviews.Content: I did a great deal of comparative shopping before deciding on SimpliSafe while it was not the highest rated among professionals it was a among consumers. I put more stock in those who use it and I attribute the other difference to the basic design of the componets, they do the job without a lot of bells and whistles. I don't say that to take away from the system, as it is they could have added those things, charged you more and it would not have been a better product. Now if I can teach my wife how to avoid setting the alarm off I'll be fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Michael A Pierce Jr
Reviews.Content: I installed the SimpliSafe System about a month ago.  It took less than 30 minutes to install and setup my preferences.  To date, we have not had any problems with the system.What I like:1.  Easy Install2.  Speedy Support response - I did have one question for support and they got back to me very quickly3.  It is very easy to add additional security, fire, water, temperature sensors at any time4.  There was no charge for shipping and I received it less than 48 hours after I ordered it.What I didn't like:1.  The manual could have been a little more detailed regarding some of the features.  I would ate the manual with 3 stars and the system in general with 5 stars.Mike PierceNew York

Reviews.Title: Cell Station Location
Reviews.Author: Thomas Howard
Reviews.Content: Simple to install.  I didn't get good cell reception until I moved the base station near a window which is not ideally where I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: The Best for Less
Reviews.Author: Carolyn J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I am so happy to finally purchase a security system that doesn't require a contract or impose high fees for monthly monitoring.  Thank you so much Simplisafe.The unit was easy to set up with great tech support when I had questions.  I will use this system and no other from now on.

Reviews.Title: So Happy!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Testa
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy I replaced my old alarm system with Simplisafe.  It was easy to install and is easy to use.I have recommended this product to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Justin Blais
Reviews.Content: I received my kit even before the estimated delivery date and all items were perfect. Set up was simple and it can be installed how ever you like in order to achieve security for your specific home and floor plan. Also the operation of your alarm is customizable with different settings for sensors. The biggest thing for me was being able to take it and re-install it at a new home as i move. Being active duty military this is important for me especially when i have to leave my family in a new home when i get sent away.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is easy to install
Reviews.Author: A. J. Champion
Reviews.Content: I am presently in the test mode for the allotted 72 hour play as you go. Everything appears to be in working order. I had a little problem with our little dog that loves to jump on the back of the couch, but with a little adjusting of the affected motion sensor all appears to be working nicely. I really like the interactive monitoring.

Reviews.Title: So Far, very well
Reviews.Author: Paul Moore
Reviews.Content: The installation was simple.  We have only had the system in operation for 1 week.  I had a error message on the key pad for a few day, but finally figured it out. All is working OK now.  Thanks for the online assistance.  My purchase was the expanded package with 19 pieces. I ordered extra window sensors, and extra smoke detector. So Far, very well. Paul M

Reviews.Title: Better than a wired system!
Reviews.Author: Bradley G Gump
Reviews.Content: For the price of this system, it would be stupid to pay for a wired system.From the start.The box came in the mail, not sure if it was UPS, Fedex, or USPS.  It came fast, and in a 12x12x6 box. I opened up the box and the first thing you see is the basic warnings about permits and regulations (there are none in Ft Wayne, IN), in my case I got the arm/disarm remote free, removed the remote and pulled the cardboard cover out of the box (be sure to flip that board over, there are some extra peal and stick strips in a little baggy), next you see the base station wedged between packaging paper. Pull out the paper and voila everything else is in the box and ready to go.After opening everything and planning out their locations, I pealed the strips and pressed them into place, and as per the instructions beginning with the base station being installed and plugged in I started pulling the battery strips, first the keypad, then every sensor thereafter. The instructions for installing are uber easy to follow, nothing extraordinarily hard about it.The next step involved is to press the buttons on the bottom of all the sensors, doing this will cause the base station to say the name of every sensor.  The primary issue I ran into is that some of the sensors were placed on different levels and being able to hear the base station name the sensor was hard, so have a extra body helping. Also, when placing the motion sensors or extra siren be sure to keep the ladder or stepping stool near by, when I installed this system I didn't foresee needing a ladder and had to stand on the window sill (not easy). Once everything was recognized, I activated the monitoring (set primary and secondary contacts, location [location can be changed so probably perfect for renters]) Then I changed the Pin and set the alarm.  In total I have about an hour from start to finish.  Comes with two window stickers and one large yard sign.  The thing I love the most, is that at any point if i want to buy more sensors, I can!My parents are using this system, when I need one, I will buy Simplisafe!  I highly HIGHLY recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great System, Easy to Install and Get Running
Reviews.Author: Thomas B.
Reviews.Content: We have a vacation home that we wanted to install an alarm system.  When it was being built, our builder quoted us $800 to pre-wire the alarm system from a local alarm company.  Mind you, this was just the wiring - this didnt include the sensors, the monitoring or any other aspect of the system.  Our final cost for the SimpliSafe system was under $500.A small nit.  If you do want to be able to use the system over a smartphone, this is not the $15.00 a month cost, rather it is $25 a month.  For our situation, even though this was a small surprise, it was worth it

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.
Reviews.Author: A. S.
Reviews.Content: The Simpli-safe alarm system was recommended to us by our son, who had one already operating in his home.  He was so pleased, he recommended it to us.  We went for it, and it was so simple to install!  In a few minutes it was done, and the Simpli-safe people have been great to help with support.  We travel a lot, and feel much more at peace having an alarm system up and running.  We highly recommend the Simpli-safe alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Great Product - Good Security
Reviews.Author: Harley H
Reviews.Content: I purchased my SimpliSafe system direct from the manufacturer and received it exactly as expected and on time. It was easy to install and set up - exactly as promised. The hardest part is remembering to turn it off when I let the pets out in the morning! Fortunately, the 30 second delay allows me to make it back to the keypad.I only have two problems. 1) When I ran setup, the base picked up a motion senser that was not responding. The only problem is that I had not even taken the senser out of the box! Evidently it picked up a sensor from somewhere else. I removed it from the system and set up my motion sensor. Problem solved. 2) I wish the keypad was lit. It is hard to see at night. I have placed a small flashlight near the keypad to help with this. Still, it is inconvenient to have to turn on the flashlight to see the numbers.Overall, I am very satisfied with the product and will probably expand it as time goes by. I definitely recommend it to anyone as an inexpensive and effective alternative to those high priced guys.

Reviews.Title: Great products
Reviews.Author: Moonriver
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and set up. Hopefully gives me a peace of mind . Will definitely recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Great self service alarm system
Reviews.Author: kiwi66
Reviews.Content: Cost was right, installed as advertised and was easy, received very good instructions with the package.  The only issue was that the packages did not allow for removal and replacement of Items not needed so I have items I did not need sitting around on a shelf.  The suggested go to the lower package and add what you need cost more ($120)then doing it this way.  I would suggest to the company a more flexible package to attract more customers.  I will be purchasing some additional items to complete the system.

Reviews.Title: Great protection - reasonable cost - super easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Beth A. Ramage "Beth"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful system - having the home, freeze, flood, fire and CO alarms all connected is great - really gives you peace of mind.  Being able to monitor everyone online and from my phone is great too.  I think my mom and dad are going to invest in a system as well.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe purchase
Reviews.Author: A. Riggin "Anna"
Reviews.Content: The unit arrived in a timely manner. We had some questions and the company was very knowledgeable and helpful.  We also had a false alarm go off and they responded immediately. We are very pleased with the system and would recommend it to anyone who wanted to purchase a security system.

Reviews.Title: Great situational awareness
Reviews.Author: Pilot222
Reviews.Content: We purchased this system and a few extra sensors a couple of weeks ago. Setup was as easy as advertised and within a few minutes the Home Security System was up and running. We really enjoy the different options (easily set using software designed for users, not engineers) and the way we can have an alert while home or a full-up system when away. We desired one change to the software that was not in the menu, but after an e-mail to SimpliSafe's customer service, Amy sent me a software download that did exactly what we needed.We're remote, and we are essentially our own fire/police/medical service, so having a bit of extra warning out here can mean a big difference. We haven't been in a situation yet where we needed such a security system, but if we ever are, this one looks like it will do exactly what we need, if not more. If that changes, I'll update this review, but I doubt it will. We're very happy with SimpliSafe. I'd recommend this system without reservation.

Reviews.Title: Delivers as promised
Reviews.Author: Dana Wyattt
Reviews.Content: Looked at almost every DIY alarm system out there and chose SimpliSafe based on reviews and CNET article.  Delivers as promised.  Install took all of 15 minutes, and when my wife didn't like the location of one of the motion detectors, took two minutes to relocate.Love the fact that the base unit tells me every time there is activity with the system.  I will be buying a 2nd system for my daughters home based on the ease of setup and use.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: John Alley
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install and I am very happy with the results. The only problem I had was adding and removing censors from the system.The instructions could go into a little more detail. Once I figured the procedure out ,it was simple. Great system.

Reviews.Title: Best value out there
Reviews.Author: John L Francis
Reviews.Content: Having heard the Simplisafe alarm system advertised many times on talk radio stations, we decided to take the plunge. The units arrived a few days later, and after reading the (not very long) manual and watching a few of the online videos, we set to work. About 40 minutes later we had installed 7 entry sensors, 2 motion detectors, key pad, additional siren, a panic alarm, a smoke detector and the base unit. A week later we added 3 more entry sensors, another motion detector and a second key pad. The whole thing was ridiculously easy. Our monitoring system went live after the 72 hour practice period and we could not be happier. Put it in test mode and we got a call from the monitoring station within a minute. I love being able to program all aspects of its operation through the web site, and being able to see the alarm status as well as arm/disarm it via my iPhone. Would love to see the glass break sensors and video cameras at some point.

Reviews.Title: I was so easy to set up!
Reviews.Author: James D. Lowen "55 Special"
Reviews.Content: We really do like our new Simplisafe Home Security System.It was just as easy to set up as advertised. I had planned to install it on a Saturday when I would a whole day to figure everything out, but once I began to look over the equipment and instructions, I ended up installing it Friday evening in about one hour! And you make it so easy to add extra equipment as I feel the need. I did add an additional keypad and everything worked perfectly from the very first time I started the system up.The price was quite reasonable and the Simplisafe really is a quality system.Thanks Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: One draw back.....
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Bragg
Reviews.Content: Over all, the product was as advertised easy to install. The only complaint is the location of the station. Instructions state to locate and close as possible to the center of the home.  I did and the speaker cannot be heard where I located.  Everything works with the exception of the low volume of the station.  I had to relocate it closer to the front door...

Reviews.Title: The Best Value Ever: Simpli-Fantastic System
Reviews.Author: Sam Medina
Reviews.Content: I used other alarm companies estimates and their system contact locations,to order the right SimpliSafe System. It took about an hour to install.SimpliSafe cost alot less up front and a lower monthly service fee. Would definitely recommend to all my friends. The 3day test period is cool and useful. WE ordered a secound remote for greater convenience. May also get a second Key Pad soon.It pays to check around and yours is the Best.

Reviews.Title: Easy / Fast / Great Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy and fast to install. First-rate customer service with speedy replies to e-mail.Base station comes with TMobile but they switched me to Verizon with overnight delivery replacement. East and fast again.Got mine with extra alarm siren for large home----MUCH louder than the siren I had from Time Warner Intelligent Home security service. Like that the system is easily customized for additional sensors, sirens, keypads, keychains, etc.Just one complaint: keypad does not identify by name which sensor / door is opened. I would like it to show "Front door open" or "cellar door open" etc. Instead of generic "1 sensor open" type message. This is something they could easily fix with a software modification.

Reviews.Title: Review of Simplisafe2 Wireless remote system
Reviews.Author: Jim McDonnell
Reviews.Content: I am extremely sarisfied with the product. It performs as advertised. It is easy to install; and, customer support was very helpful with the few questions I had. We do have a problem with our cell phone provider, but that is no fault of the product. I would recommend the product to anyone who is in need of a home security solutio.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Simply Easy.
Reviews.Author: Tyrone Mason
Reviews.Content: This is a Awesome system. Crazy easy to set up and the best feature is the voice prompts so you know exactly what's going on. This system works as advertised. Would suggest this to anyone's home or business.

Reviews.Title: 1st Class Security System
Reviews.Author: Barbara K. Stein
Reviews.Content: The  system was as specified, it was easy to install and worked like a charm.  We had a slight issue with the communication at first but were able to work everything out over the phone.  We had a hardwired alarm system previously with a monthly monitoring plan but monitoring costs kept increasing and service was also very expensive.  With this system the components and monitoring are very reasonable and installation is simple and do it yourself.

Reviews.Title: EZ EZ EZ
Reviews.Author: Erica Phillipson (Hawaii) "Erica Phillipson"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding system in terms of installation, setup and day and night use.Well thought out.GREAT value even at $24 per month package.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: James R. Crawford "RickC."
Reviews.Content: Did some research with several companies before I chose Simplisafe. This is the one for me. Staff was very patient with me during my question period which I did ask a lot of questions. Set up is very simple and the system works like a charm. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for and effective but inexpensive security system. Monthly fees are very reasonable as well compared to the other companies. My choice, hands down !

Reviews.Title: Very simple to install, use.  Customer Service was very helpful
Reviews.Author: Eric A Heiser
Reviews.Content: Bought this system about a week ago, had it up and running within an hour of receiving it.  It's very simple to install and program.  I did have to call customer service to inquire about a few questions and they answered them with ease and were very helpful.  I would highly recommend this service to anyone looking for peace of mind in regards to home security without getting suckered into a long-term contract.

Reviews.Title: things they don't tell u b4 u buy
Reviews.Author: paeton
Reviews.Content: 1. your area may require an alarm permit that you renew annually that is OUTSIDE of any fee you may choose to pay simplisafe to monitor. my responsibility to know, i guess, but they conveniently send this info along with a paid receipt.and 2) the base light will (annoyingly) flash an error msg if you don't have the system monitored. it's an easy fix, i called, they sent me a download to change this, and not once did he try to sell me a monitoring package. the other option is to turn the lite completely off (something you do without having to call in) but i like the blue, subtle light on- just not flashing!sidenote: i ordered a refurbished one directly from the company and i don't have it monitored by choice. it was super easy to install and adjust. i love that the doors chirp when they are opened while i'm at home, as i have a special needs daughter who likes to run in & out.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Review
Reviews.Author: Jeff Rawsky
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install and took me 30 minutes to complete the entire installation. The stock alarm is quiet so I would recommend getting the upgraded siren. The system's instructions could be more detailed for how to use the software for install without purchasing 24/7 monitoring. Overall good system and now that I know how to operate it, it's easy and exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe security system
Reviews.Author: bcp florida
Reviews.Content: Simple system to set up.  Liked the no contract system.  Monthly fee for monitoring is fair.  System can adapt to any home just increase  the number of monitors needed.  Got to fine a place in the home where the wireless cone can gain a signal to the monitoring center.  Once in place very easy to work with.  I would recommend this unit especially since many of us no longer have a land line but use are cells.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: john selzer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this system to replace another older system from ADT.  We are very pleased with its operation so far, it worked first time out of the box.  The system was easy to install and I used the last page of the instructions to fill in the location of each sensor and then updated the chart on the interactive screen with the name of each sensor.  I've added plenty of sensors to the system and there is still room for more.

Reviews.Title: Great way to safety and save $$$ over others and their contracts !!!!
Reviews.Author: Monty
Reviews.Content: Great system. Watched video first and installed from box to operational in 35 minutes. All questions I had after install were answered quickly and professionally. Ordered extra entry sensors and they came programmed for my system already. Made up my mind after looking at many other systems. Many friends have "free systems" only to find they're  locked in contracts or after contract is up find their systems can only be monitored by the company that installed it. Will be ordering another system when our vacation home is finished being built . Top it off Jim Rome now recommends this system now.

Reviews.Title: Simply easy
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Habib
Reviews.Content: The system arrived shortly after it was ordered.  Everything ordered came properly packaged and I had the system up and running within a couple of hours of its arrival.  Installation was easy and the instructions for the installation were easy to understand and complete. Every sensor ordered works flawlessly and setting up the monitoring portion of this system was a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Easy To Install
Reviews.Author: Jerad Barbot
Reviews.Content: I had it up and running in less then 30 minutes. Also activating and deactivating the system is quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: Wireless user friendly home alarm system
Reviews.Author: Anastasios Hatzakos
Reviews.Content: Great system period!  Affordable, efficient, expandable, user friendly, and will still works if there is a power outage.Best,Tas

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Wade
Reviews.Content: I received the system promptly after ordering. It required a grand total of 3 hours to install. The only issue I had was the cellular chip sent with the system did not have coverage in my area. Called SimpliSafe and they immediately shipped me a new one for a different carrier, now the system is up and running.No drilling holes all over my recently renovated home interior. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Simpli Great so far!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Hare
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Plus package with additional sensors to cover my 5000 sq. ft. home. The internet instructions for installation were step by step and very easy to follow. The monitoring of the system has been flawless to this point. I would recommend the smart phone app. We are notified each time the system is armed or disarmed along with any sensor information. One very small complaint would be that the motion sensors do not come with the adhesive strip installed for corner application. The system did come with additional strip that we applied.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected.
Reviews.Author: James Bond
Reviews.Content: When it comes to "technical stuff" I am truly a "six year old".  Even though the SimpiSafe video showed that the system was easy to set up, I had my doubts.  However, it was just that easy.  I had a few minor glitches which the SimpiSafe technical  staff successfully walked me through.My only problem is a metal door that in inserted into the wall and there is not enough clearance for the entry door sensor.  This will be solved when I cut a 1/8 inch deep hole in the door frame  and insert the sensor in it.I would strongly recommend this security system to anyone who wants to protect their home with a system that is affordable, easy to set up and gets the job done.Dave, Gardnerville, Nv.

Reviews.Title: The Bet Home Security Option Available
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Duffy
Reviews.Content: After having been an ADT customer for over 10 years I found SimpliSafe by an Internet search looking for a more reasonably priced alternative as ADT repeatedly increased monthly monitoring costs and offered no service improvements.  Although I was skeptical of self installation I decided it was worth trying.  I was pleasantly surprised with the ease of installation and the quality of the equipment which was comparable to ADT's.  anyone with an existing security system or looking to purchase one should definitely try SimpliSafe!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: GP2014
Reviews.Content: Just installed system today and it was quite easy. A friend recommended this system and said I would find it easy to install and he was right.

Reviews.Title: Best Security System On The Planet! Period
Reviews.Author: eFairDeal "eFairDeal"
Reviews.Content: We needed a security system to get insurance discount. I am really glad Dave Ramsey advertises this system and based on his recommendation I personally installed this after buying it online. It is very simple to install and works without a glitch 100% of the time. No drilling holes, no wires and no need for a home phone line, since it comes with inbuilt cell phone connection. This product is beyond amazing. You can easily add sensors later for a reasonable price and all the batteries last for 3-5 years. The best part is that the system will still work as a local alarm without the subscription if you choose to do that. Buy it and you will not regret it. AAA+++

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind at a Great Price with No Commitment
Reviews.Author: GS Kindig
Reviews.Content: We had been researching security systems to provide peace-of-mind while my husband is away on business trips.  We chose this product because it had received great reviews all over the web and it didn't lock us into a contract.  It was crazy easy to install, customer service has been very good and the computer-based interface is extremely user friendly.  We have not encountered any issues with connectivity.  We have recommended it to several friends.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Terrance Hunter
Reviews.Content: This is a great product so far and very easy to install.  So much better than having someone come in and drill holes in wall

Reviews.Title: Best telephone customer service ever.
Reviews.Author: Chris Kauffman
Reviews.Content: I put mine in an isolated cabin with limited cell phone reception.  So far, so good, but there is no tree canopy yet.Ease of installation was not overstated.  A minor electrical glitch was quickly cleared up with a phone call.  The woman who took my call and guided me through the trouble shooting steps was patient, articulate and clearly knew the product.

Reviews.Title: Easy install, good service, less expensive.
Reviews.Author: Margaret Creelman
Reviews.Content: I found SimplISafe easy to install. All components worked perfectly the first time I tested them. It is half the price of my old monitoring service. In addition, I was able to discontinue my home phone service for additional savings. Both my wife and I have cell phones and the only calls we received on our home phone were solicitors. We kept the old phone because the old security system used to to monitor our old hard wired security system. With SimpliSafe we are free to discontinue that unneeded service.

Reviews.Title: Protecting our house
Reviews.Author: bucky
Reviews.Content: Installed easily.  Disappointed that company would not look at my floor plan to help locate placement of devices, but, this was not a big problem for our house.  All items work as described, so far, after a week.  Sirens don't sound loud enough.  Did call in for help for some changes to the base station.  Directions for the changes were e-mailed to us immediately but were incorrect, called again and got correct directions and all is well.  Changes were easy to make. Cost was reasonable which was a factor.  Looking forward to having the system keep our property safe.  I'd recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: I Love It !!
Reviews.Author: Cathy McDaniel
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to install taking only a small amount of time.  The booklet they give you sets it out step by step,it is very easy to follow.  The system works great.

Reviews.Title: Thoughts thus far
Reviews.Author: GJS
Reviews.Content: This system is very easy to set up and has the flexibility to really customize it to fit your needs. Everything seems well-made thus far with no issues with the physical components.I did have issues originally getting a cell link to the servers but that was fixed by moving the base unit. The system has only been running for a few days but  so far I am very pleased with it. The price is fair and I would suggest this manufacturer for your security needs.

Reviews.Title: Excellent System and Value !
Reviews.Author: Peter Watkins
Reviews.Content: I have never had a security system but with the number of home-invasions skyrocketing, my wife and I decided to add one. My research showed this system was "State of the art" 21st century technology, and priced with great value. It works great, and was easy to install and activate. This is definitely the best system available today.

Reviews.Title: Value
Reviews.Author: Gerald H. Twombly
Reviews.Content: We had an interesting experience.We received a packet welcoming us and included in the packet was a "coupon" for ATF.  We called them and a sales person came while a contractor was in our home.  We got the sales pitch and after it was all over with all the "bells and whistles" the initial "free" set up required a supplemental payment of nearly $3,500 plus an annual monthly fee of $50+ dollars.  I noticed our contractor rolling his eyes so we dismissed him and said were not prepared to make that commitment.Our contractor looked at us after he left and told us about SimpliSafe.  We purchased all the equipment we need (our own "bells and whistles" package) save thousands and are getting the $19/month monitoring fee.  We're pretty happy!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to folllow instructions.
Reviews.Author: Steven H. Adams "buyer"
Reviews.Content: This is a very simple system to install. Works great . Able to operate from my phone or PC.  Well work the money.

Reviews.Title: Great System, Simple Setup
Reviews.Author: Slitho
Reviews.Content: I've had my system for 2 weeks now and am very happy with it.  I've even added additional sensors after I did my initial install.  Very easy to use and works great.  I'm a little disappointed when reading the history of "developers" working on add'l offerings, specifically glass break sensors.  It's supposedly been in the works a long time but not available yet.  All of the documentation that came with my system includes info about glass break sensors, compete with pictures.  Get them done and I'll add that 5th star to my rating.Great alternative to the big boy companies that take you for granted and take advantage of you with overpriced long term contracts.  I had three companies give me estimates to provide a system, all being about the same price plus 36 mo contract for monitoring at $50/mo.  No one stood out so I told my wife if just one of them would follow back up with me then I guess I'd go with them.  I'm still waiting for one one them to  call (or email).  Anyway, shortly after that I heard a radio advertisement for Simplisafe.  I visited the website, did my research and went for it.  No looking back.I bought the ultimate (17 piece) package and had it up and running within an hour after receiving it.  It's truly that simple.Give those that take advantage of you the boot and go with Simplisafe.  I have no regrets.  Customer service wins.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install - Works as Promised!
Reviews.Author: Missy Gardner
Reviews.Content: Having gotten one of the larger systems, it took about 1-1/2 hours to install once we decided to screw the units in rather than use just the sticky tape.  But in that time, we figured out how to install the motion detectors properly without our dog setting it off, set up the alarms on six windows/doors, installed the smoke and carbon monoxide detectors, and tested everything.  As a final test, my husband accidentally set it off the next morning at 5:19 am.  Luckily, there's a 3-day trial before the monthly monitoring becomes active, so we just turned it off and all was fine.Having had a much more expensive system in a previous home, with a far more expensive monthly monitoring fee, I'd recommend that anyone looking to purchase a home security system check out Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Excellent investment
Reviews.Author: Steve Hohenwarter
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe simply put... Affordable. Easy to use. Creates piece of mind.I originally purchased a basic system but we enjoy it so much we keep adding components. Our home is 6,000 square feet and we doubted this system would be robust enough, but it's proven us wrong. Just placed my second additional order for more sensors today!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered the SimpliSafe2 Wireless Home Security System after someone broke into my house on New Years Eve.  Because of the weather, the FedX delivery was delayed several days so that it was not going to arrive before I needed to leave town for a week. I called customer service and explained the urgency of me receiving my system before I left and they went above and beyond to help me out.  They arranged to have a new order shipped to me next-day Saturday delivery so that I could get it set up before I left. Needless to say, I was very pleased that they were willing to help me even though the delay by FedX on the original order was beyond their control.  The system is working great.  It is very easy to set up and the instructions for using it are very clear.  My friend bought the same system, and after doing it once before, I was able to get her system setup in less than a half hour.You can't go wrong with SimpliSafe and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a good security system with no contract and great customer support.

Reviews.Title: HAD A EASY TIME PUTTING IN SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: Alfred Lautenschlager
Reviews.Content: WE HAD A EASY TIME INSTALLING THE SYSTEM . HAD TO TURN ONE OF THE MOTION SENSOR,S UPSIDE DOWN THEN IT WORKED OK. I DO NOT KNOW WHAT THE RESPONSE TIME WILL BE WHEN THE SYSTEM GOES INTO ALARM? I WOULD TELL OTHER PEOPLE TO BUY THE SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased so far!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Cary
Reviews.Content: Neat, well thought out little system!  Easy set up, easy to add components and works as advertised.  Very smart "Smart Wizard".  For me, not having a 3 year contract and owning the system is important. Wireless is only way to go.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, affordable, good customer service
Reviews.Author: Duane K. Boldt "RoboRocketry"
Reviews.Content: I have had the system for about a month now. So far I really like the system.Cost: We added quite a bit of extra sensors to cover our house and a detached building with office and shop.SimpliSafe sales and customer support said that it may not be able to reach through our thick brick walls (that are also wood framed, insulated and sheet rocked internally).  They said we could try it out and would have 60 days to return it if it did not work.So far the sensors have reached through walls and all from one side of the main house to the other over 140 feet. It also reaches all the sensors in the detached building through more walls and brick. I was hoping not to have to add another whole system for the other building. I was skeptical and was pleasantly surprised by the range of the system.Base station: Made to sit on shelf or table. Works well and has good range as mentioned above. It doesn't look that bad either.  However, it would also be nice to have at least an option for a wall mounted version that you could attach to a wall.Most messages from the system come out of the base system.  I wish those voice prompt could also come out of the extra sirens. And it would also be nice to have the option to turn off the voice prompts from the base station and specified sirens.Entry Sensors: All our have worked great. I am used to smaller wired entry sensors from previous homes. It would be nice if the battery side of the SimplySafe entry sensors was slightly smaller, but they really are not that bad and we have basically forgotten they are there. They work very well and are easy to install.Water sensors: These are easy to hookup. Basically take the tape backing off and stick them where you need them.  they worked very well when I tested them. I wish I had water sensors installed in my previous home where twice we had large water damage claims within 5 years that led to a canceled home owners policy. Pretty cheap protection.Freeze sensors: I have three installed. By thermostat in main house, back porch and shop in detached building where my golden retrievers sleep.  These work good, but I wish they would be able to be refreshed instantly from the web page or the phone app.Also, the web page shows all the sensors and their individual temperatures, whereas the phone app, only shows an average of the temperatures. that isn't very useful when wanting to log into your phone to see the outside temperatures. I would rather see a list of all the temperature (freeze) sensors that I have connected to my system so I can see inside and outside temps. I did call support and they said that was a great idea and would let their developers know, so hopefully that will be in an upcoming software update.Bear in mind, you can currently see the individual temps from the web page, just not from the phone app where I would rather access them.Smoke sensors, very easy to install.CO sensors, very easy to install.Key chains: Easy to set to "Away", set off immediately "Panic" alarm or to turn off the armed system.Motion sensors: Easy to set up. Smaller would be better, but they are about the same size as motion sensors I have used before.These use infrared to calculate temperature fluctuations caused by moving heat signatures. They "see" the heat outline of your body. when that moves in its field of vision the sensor is tripped. These seem to work fairly well, but at times seem not to register movement as well as some other technologies such as microwave reflecting systems.  The infrared does use less energy and thus is better suited for these battery powered models.  It might be good to also offer another motion detector with dual technologies for places where a power adapter could be employed. Another not it that they come with only one adhesive "Command" strip pre-mounted in the middle of the bracket. However, I have ALL of my motion detectors mounted in corners because they cover 90 degrees field of view , left to right. They provide two places to mount adhesive strips in the corners of the brackets for mounting in corners. This worked great, but you have to remove the one in the center and threw it away and then apply to more command strips in the corners.  It would be much better for them to just include two strips for each motion detector and you choose either straight ahead or corner mount yourself when installing. I will test more for their accuracy later and update this review.Glass break sensors: These are not released yet, and so I have of course not tested them. However I am looking forward o their release, because our house has many windows including a number large picture windows. To avoid tripping any of the entry sensors, an intruder may decide to just break the glass and come in through the glass door or window. The glass break sensor would catch this. The other good thing about glass break sensors is that the "hear" around corners or through openings/cutouts in walls. Because of not having the requirement for line of sight like most inexpensive motion detector technologies, they can potentially cover multiple rooms. SimpliSafe said they hope to have these available to purchase within the next couple months.Cameras: Also not released, yet, but SimpliSafe said they have been developed and are in testing now. They plan to have these to work with existing systems that you purchase now with just maybe a firmware upgrade.For the price and performance so far, it would be hard to beat this system. My previous alarm company that I only paid $23 a month for basic burglary and fire protection for years wanted $45 in our new house to provide the same service as SimpliSafe.  They also wanted another $1100 for the system because of additional components I wanted.I bought my base package and all the sensors (Probably double the number of sensors I would have received with the other $1100 system (It was supposedly "free" still I started adding what I needed.) And I would have been stuck paying $45 a month with a three year contract.No thanks.  This has worked great so far.

Reviews.Title: Piece of cake to install
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Brook
Reviews.Content: After a few break-ins in my town, two of my neighbors had a security company install alarm systems.  Another researched the different options and concluded it would be much more economical to do it himself.  He sent me the information and just by reading the information on the website of SimpliSafe I decided I could do that myself.  The neighbors who had a security company install their systems paid more than $1,000 than I did.  On top of that I believe I have a slightly better system than theirs.  SimpliSafe system offer more features than the ones installed by the "experts".  SimpliSafe comes with a key chain for remote operation, a separate base station from the keypad and a siren of 105 decibels.  I have been recommending SimpliSafe system to my friends and know of others who will go the do-it-yourself route.

Reviews.Title: So easy and great product!
Reviews.Author: mrmrsatm
Reviews.Content: I don't think it could of been much easier than it was to set up. Took our time and followed step by step instructions online and had it all up and running in 15 minutes. Quick response from security team; one of our dogs jumped on the couch and set the motion sensor off. Got immediate call from simplisafe checking to see if everything ok. We moved the sensor to a higher place, they are little dogs but jumping on top of the couch was in the line of the sensor. I did lots of searching online for the best and economical system and Simplisafe wins it hands down. You will not be sorry.  It's also great to have a peace of mind when not at home.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Simply the BEST!
Reviews.Author: DA Johnson
Reviews.Content: Straight to the point: the advertising is exactly what this system delivers. Cutting edge technology customized to individual specifications, easy installation, professional service, no contract, no hidden costs. Customer service exceeds expectations.Don't be put off by 'wireless technology' and 'do-it-yourself' concept. This system makes It truly SIMPLE to be SAFE.

Reviews.Title: The BEST Home Security System you can buy...
Reviews.Author: Chicago Buckeye
Reviews.Content: I'll be honest, I had my doubts about the whole idea of a Home Security System that arrives in a box and you install yourself.  Somehow it didn't feel as "safe and efficient" as one of those more expensive systems you order from the usual suspects.I changed my mind when I saw it in action at my brother's house.  It 's simple to install, provides all the features of a more expensive "traditional" system and best of all does so at a fraction of the price you would expect to pay.To put it simply, Simplisafe is Simpliperfect when it comes to home security.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: db
Reviews.Content: I loved the ease of setting the system up and being able to take it with you should you move.  You can totally customize it depending on the size of your house. If you don't like the the voice notifications or the light that is on the base station you can put your key chain in an USB and change it to your liking. Also liked not having to have a land line like my previous monitoring system. It's economical, not only with the purchase price but the monitoring fee that has 3 levels of getting notifications.I would definitely recommend this to anyone....security without the price of a king's ransom.

Reviews.Title: Excellent system, excellent support!
Reviews.Author: Michigan
Reviews.Content: We purchased the 10 piece Classic System with 3 additional sensors (entry, motion and freeze). We also selected the interactive monitoring for $24.99/month. The system was very easy to install and worked as promised. The support from Simplisafe personnel was excellent, they responded to our requests immediately and professionally, we did not experience long wait times for phone calls to them. The features that we especially like come with the interactive monitoring. While we are away, we can view the status of all of our sensors, set the system to off, home or away and view the current house temperature (this gives us a lot of comfort with the cold temperatures in Michigan this winter). Not having to sign a monitoring contract and being able to change the level of monitoring from None to Standard, Alert or Interactive is a very important feature for us. Voice alerts given from the control console are also very good. System quality is excellent. We want to add the glass break detector when available. I normally do not give public reviews to items we have purchased, but, this system impressed me from the day we received it in terms of quality and function.

Reviews.Title: Easy & economical
Reviews.Author: Lanny D Newton
Reviews.Content: This security system is easy to install, easy to test, easy to arm.  I've looked at different others but Simplisafe is among the most economical and if and when I move, it goes with me.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 4 star
Reviews.Author: RALPH DURANTE
Reviews.Content: we are very happy with the equipment, the service and the operation.Simple but impressive. Give me everything they promised

Reviews.Title: SIMPLE, SUFFICIENT, ECONOMICAL AND WISE
Reviews.Author: Glenn Thoren
Reviews.Content: As with manythings in life, it took a bit longer to install than expected. It wasnt 15 minutes, it was 45. In all honesty that's pretty fast. Best of all it was EASY.The motion sensors worked perfectly as did the door and window entry sensors. In the New England winters (global warming and all) I would recommend the freeze sensor that triggers as soon as the temperature drops below 41 degrees. The owners manual was clear and illustrated, the computer interface was also simple and easy to turn on to adust some of the timing settings. The voice commands from the base station are loud and precise. "System on." "Please leave now" ...Best of all the basic $15 per month is very affordable. As an engineer, I like this system. When the video options come out I likly will add that. but for now.... peace of mind... that's wise.Now that it is installed and I mentioned it to colleagues, I find out that three of them already have chosen and installed similar Simplisafe systems. And these are technical physicists and engineers. One queston that I had for techncal suport was immediately answered. all in all a good deal.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLISAFE GREAT
Reviews.Author: 29406 mallory kit
Reviews.Content: I found the simplisafe system easy to install and works great.I also had one question and the repwas extremely nice and answered my question the 1st time.I have only had it a week however itseems to be a great system and easy to install.I purchased extra sensors and motion detectorsand made my garage and house secure.I have nothing but good things to say about this systemno longer than I have had it.R Ramsey.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a very good system.  I wish it also included video cameras.  Other than that it works very well.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: katie abbott
Reviews.Content: I have only had it a week or two but so far it seems like it is a great value. All of my sensors have been working, I haven't had any false alarms, and I feel so much more secure!

Reviews.Title: Extremely Supprised
Reviews.Author: Catherine Clemintone
Reviews.Content: The name says it all.  It was a simple system to install and the customer support is extremely helpful.  The response time from themonitoring company when I placed the system in test mode was less than a minute.  I received the call that let me know they had received the signal from the system and that is was working properly. Unlike another vendor that didn't know my system was not working for over a year because I change my phone provider.  With this system you don't need to have a land line and it is completely wireless.  I have recommended this system to several of my neighbors who have placed orders.

Reviews.Title: Great do-it-yourself option for home security
Reviews.Author: John Ryder
Reviews.Content: I waited to write this review until I had the system a few months just to see how it performed - I have not been disappointed.  I travel often, live by myself, and was concerned about my home's security in my absence.  I researched a number of options and found the Simplisafe system, it seemed reasonable and the monthly monitoring price was right compared to some of the larger companies.  I ordered the basic 8 piece system plus some additional motion sensors, smoke detector, CO2 monitor, and extra keypad.  All the equipment arrived in one shipment and it was neatly packaged.  The system was very easy to install - as one of the longer reviews mentions here - I used the small included screws to install the equipment vice the double-stick tape - just seemed more secure.  I had the system set up in about an hour and almost everything worked, I was getting a warning that one of the entry sensors that came with the system but I didn't install was open - that was easily solved by deleting that sensor on my computer through the company's website.  I love the ability to adjust my settings from anywhere using the internet.  At first I started with the basic monitoring plan until I wanted updates on my iPhone, that was more but I like it.  I did not order the freeze sensor, unfortunately - then my travels took me away for two weeks, my home's heater died and I didn't find out until I got home, and my pipes were frozen (thankfully they didn't burst).  I now own the freeze sensor and from my phone I can see that it is currently 60 degrees nearest my most susceptible pipes.I would recommend this system, it is really easy to install, customer service is great, you can adjust settings from anywhere and you get texts and emails to update you.  I would buy it again any day.

Reviews.Title: I compared 9 other systems (popular names) and I like the ease of installation and not have to sign a two or three year contract
Reviews.Author: David Pihl
Reviews.Content: The monthly rate is much lower than all the rest and you can change it at will.  I like the wireless part and the cell phone communication with the security people and to my cell so I can monitor while I'm away.  My son installed his a few years ago and I was impressed with how it worked.  So far I'm glad I went with your system, it's still pretty new.  I will give it a work out soon.  Thanks, Dave

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Michael L Hull
Reviews.Content: Everything was exactly as promised.  They were very professional and pleasant to deal with.  They have followed up with me several times to make sure everything is working and asked if i need any help with the set-up.The pricing for the product was good and their monthly monitoring charge is the best I've seen.

Reviews.Title: It actually IS simple to set up and use!
Reviews.Author: Randall K. Todd
Reviews.Content: We had been using a local security company for over 22 years, and decided it was time to update. It was going to cost us to upgrade our equipment and features, so I decided to shop around. Heard about SimpliSafe on the radio and checked them out. Now, we have keychain remotes, plus fire protection, plus cellular service, and we're paying a lower monthly fee than before.After a few days of tweaking the system, I think it's going to be great.

Reviews.Title: Simpli safe is a really good system
Reviews.Author: myrtle bailey
Reviews.Content: Great system. cheaper than adt, etc. no contract, easy to install.  I just put in entry door sensors on front and back because 80-90 % of break ins are through doors. I tried motion sensors but am afraid of them because the heat and a/c can set them off. You really dont need them, just install the entry sensors. That will do the job and is really, really easy to do. i also bought a freeze sensor so that I could find out the temp of the house online. even if you disable the alarm part it still tells you the temp which is what I wanted.  I recommend this system very highly. I have the 24.99 online monitoring so that I can check with my cell phone. I can also enable and disable the alarm with my cell or computer!!! All for 24.99 amonth and I dont have a contract ....

Reviews.Title: Great system; great value
Reviews.Author: revjas
Reviews.Content: It took a break-in to finally convince me that we do need a home security system.  I had always thought a full-featured system and the monthly monitoring fee would be way too expensive.  So I was delighted to find a state-of-the art wireless system that was surprisingly affordable and easy to install myself.  Simplisafe is definitely the way to go!

Reviews.Title: Super-easy and effective
Reviews.Author: Brandon Jennings
Reviews.Content: This was far cheaper than the other brands I'd considered, and if we move, we can just take it with us. I've seen a lot of reviews where people talk about smashing the base station so that it can't send out a signal. The main reason I got the system is to deter people from entering my home. If someone wants to break in to take something, they're going to do it. And it doesn't matter what security system you have. They can all be disabled if someone wants to disable them. I mean, if you live in an area where you are worried people are going to break in and harm you physically I guess you could build a moat and toss some crocs in there, maybe some pirañas? But this has done exactly what my wife and I had hoped it would. Had a couple false alarms with the motion sensor, but the dispatchers contacted us right away and were friendly and helpful. If you want something mobile, affordable, and are not looking for some kind of magical force field that will keep thieves who are determined to get your (insert valuable item here), then this is for you.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Truly Simple
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: So easy to install and even more easy to use.  The key chain remote is especially handy to arm and disarm the system.  I also like the text message when the system is armed or disarmed, that way I know who is coming and going.

Reviews.Title: great system !
Reviews.Author: Dusty Howard
Reviews.Content: This system is affordable, reliable and easy to install. I have found nothing that even compares to it anywhere. Thank you Simplisafe for peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Al Watson
Reviews.Content: It does what I want it to and I am in controlVery easy to installLots of featuresI did a lot of research and this is best you my needs

Reviews.Title: Preferred home alarm system
Reviews.Author: Gary Caughron
