Reviews.Content: After experiencing a near break-in I researched home alarm systems and discovered the Simplisafe system. When I compared Simplisafe alongside other home alarm systems, I determined Simplisafe would best suit my needs. The system arrived well packaged and component installation was easy and straightforward. Although I have not needed any additional support from Simpilsafe there has been a constant flow of emails asking me if I needed anything additional from their support personnel. As of this posting the system appears to be bulletproof. Really do like the smartphone app, you know the system's status at all times no matter where you travel and receive almost instantaneous updates whenever the system's status changes. Unless something catastrophic occurs, I would definitely purchase from Simplisafe again and recommend Simplisafe to anyone looking to secure their home with an alarm.

Reviews.Title: Trustworthy
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: In this day of hyperbolic advertising it is so nice to experience a company that lives up 100% to its advertisement. My highest grade for any company is "trustworthy", Simplisafe is just that. Everything they claim in their ad is true. It is reliable, easy, easy, easy to install and setup, and a much better value than my old alarm company which I had for nearly 20 years. Alarm systems for me are out of sight and out of mind so I never really investigated new ones until my monitoring service informed me my phone service was suddenly not compatible and they could not ensure a response. Of course for hundreds of dollars and a much increased monthly fee they could convert me over to a cell connection. Seemed outrageous to me and that is why I began my research. I tend to over analyze things so I'm told, but I am glad I did a thorough review of these new services because I found SimpliSafe. I am a satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up. Great instructions. Support was great for a small problem.
Reviews.Author: A. Hartwell "Hal 9000"
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend SimpliSafe to anyone. It was so easy to setup. The way you can remove the double sided tape to move an item is brilliant. Everything is well thought out.Only problem is the Android app. It allows me to view status, turn the alarm on/off as advertised. The problem is the app won't close. It's not a huge problem but something that should be fixed.

Reviews.Title: easy to install good price
Reviews.Author: fostersrt10svt
Reviews.Content: I was inpressed on how easy it was to set up and install . Only issue I had was keypad (out of range) had to move the base station to a diffrent spot. The  tech support was also well knowledged.

Reviews.Title: Easy to self install and no contract.
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Peters
Reviews.Content: The wife had been after me for some time to install a security system, but we were both surprised with the cost of advertised free systems or just $99.00.  There were always additional devises to buy to cover the house and then a 3 year contract with a $35 to $50 monthly charge for monitoring.  With SimpliSafe, I could choose my system to cover my needs, no contract and no monthly fee for monitoring unless I want it monitored, and then it is just $14.99 per month, and I can cancel that anytime without having to pay a cancellation charge.  Self installation is simple with the enclosed instructions.

Reviews.Title: System Works great!  A little bit of a challenge to install.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Schoolfield
Reviews.Content: This system works like it is designed-finally.  Initial installation was a breeze.  But, we had problems and SimpliSafe tech support determined that the Key Pad and the Base Station had problems.  They replaced them via FedEx overnight.  Now, the system works great.Had it not been for the two defective parts, I would have rated them 5 STARS.Their tech support was great in helping to correct the problems-in my mind, the sign of a great company!!!

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: James Garris
Reviews.Content: With a rash of recent break-ins in my area and I was one of them,  I found that I should have considered a security system for my home long ago.  I found out about SimpliSafe through a local resident that had also be burgerlized at his home. My wife and I decided it was little risk with purchasing a SimpliSafe system to protect us and our home and with such a low price.  I can't tell anybody enough that during the days in which we live a security system is the way to go.  I highly recommend SimpliSafe and the "peace of mind" it gives.  Even I had it installed in a few minutes.  lol!

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable!!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Prickett
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe Monitoring System was so easy to install. Luckily for me, another family member had already installed a system, but I could have done it without their help. In less than an hour, all sensors were self-installed and using the internet to setup the system - all was done efficiently and quickly! I now can set my alarm system from home or from my mobile device and receive text messages when any occurrences happen. I just returned from my insurance agency and received a very nice discount on my homeowners insurance for having this system! Everything was exactly as advertised! This system is wireless and very affordable. I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is SimpliAwesome
Reviews.Author: Timothy S.
Reviews.Content: I chose SimpliSafe after reading the reviews and checking out the other well known security systems.  They delivered what they promised and the support team is outstanding.The system was easy to install and set up.  I chose the full monitoring support, downloaded the mobile app which is awesome.I have recommended SimpliSafe to everyone I talk to and I have several friends that are investigating it on their own.There are some new features coming in 2014 that we will add to our system once available.  This is worth checking out for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Great, easy, safe, and secure
Reviews.Author: Brandon B.
Reviews.Content: I've recently switched from another monitored alarm system to the Simplisafe2. I was awestruck at the simple, yet robust, setup and system. I liked it so much I did a second purchase of sensors. My home has never been more secure.I only docked one star because I'd like a module that had a red LED on it for when the alarm is armed. This could be useful in my garage for a quick glance to know the alarm is armed, or in a bedroom at night to have a quick reference that all is secure. Perhaps two colors - Red = away, and Blue = home.Additionally, I wish their app had push notifications. Ideally, these would be customizable notifications.To me, these are the only areas that are lacking. Otherwise, I am happy I switched!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Technology equals Freedom
Reviews.Author: Mike Hazell
Reviews.Content: I have used Brinks (back when they were around), with their outrageous contract--you could only get out of once per year no matter how many years you had system; I have used ADT, with some intermittent components or a fire detector that went off on several barbecue occasions.  The freedom to control the components via my PC, to arm or disarm via my iPhone, the text or email alerts, the expandability, the low cost and no contracts...I LOVE this system!  Control panel could be a little sleeker and have a light so you can see it in the dark to disarm, but that is a minor inconvenience.  Would highly recommend the system.

Reviews.Title: So far so great
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I typically do not write a review unless what I have experienced is really great or really terrible. In the case of this alarm system and the service that I have received it has been great. I am able to sleep knowing that this system is watching over my home during the night. I was leery about having to complete the installation however, I did it! (All on my own) In short go with this system if you are an individual who needs flexibility of cost ( you can discontinue paying for the service whenever you need to and turn it back on when as your needs dictate) and understanding customer service.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for the Price
Reviews.Author: R. Bowlan
Reviews.Content: Installation was a breeze (45 minutes, tops).  The keychain remote is very handy.  I only wish the extra siren were louder (perhaps that is in the settings I have yet to explore).

Reviews.Title: Love it - Easy Set Up
Reviews.Author: Daniel Leman
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and I love the web and iphone interface along with no contract requirements, can't beat that!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe GIVES US PEACE OF MIND!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: After many weeks researching systems and reading many reviews we decided to go with SimpliSafe especially after reading that it was Clark Howard approved. Here is our experiences:Our daughter lives alone in a 2nd level Condo near a very high crime area. Recent activity in her complex was...Police stand off domestic dispute and a couple in her building died from leaving something cooking on the stove while they were in the bedroom.(So Sad) So we sent her the complete system with panic button, extra loud alarm and smoke detection. She installed it herself with just a little phone support from me. She was quick to thank us for such a gift and the sense of security she now feels. She signed up for the $25 a month plan as she wanted email notifications and the ability to control her system while away with her smartphone.We purchased a complete system with all the above for my brother and sister in law who just moved from the country into a high crime city where most homes have alarm systems with high monthly monitoring fees. They love SimpliSafe, feel more secure and are very happy with the $15. a month monitoring fee. They have also added a Qsee 8 video camera system similar to this. http://www.amazon.com/Q-See-QT5680-8E4-1-Security-Surveillance-High-Resolution/dp/B00DWFFC94/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid;=1390442563&sr;=8-1&keywords;=q-see+securityWe live in a very old secure neighborhood. Everyone knows each other and watches out for everyone but we realize that often crime occurs in such neighborhoods. We have noticed that when the neighbors are being interviewed by the TV news people after the crime. They often say "I just didn't expect that to happen in our neighborhood." We also purchased the complete system with the above added accessories we purchased for our relatives.Installation: Simple and easy about 1 hour. 15 windows and 2 doors entry sensors.We have the $15. a month monitoring plan and it's best feature besides quick response from dispatch is the free account web page that has the "Event Log" you can check online any time to see if and when your system was activated, deactivated etc.We as a family have had our systems for 7 months now.Just recently we have the flashing blue light and key pad with audio notification of "No contact With Dispatch!" Called customer service and instead of waiting I just left a message and was called back shortly. They are sending a Verizon cell module to replace the suddenly out of range T Mobile module free. Our experience with customer service has always been excellent! They have sent free 3 defective entry sensors and 3 replacements for their new defective smoke detectors. 1 for each of our 3 systems. Nothing is perfect but the quick and caring response of SimpliSafe customer service is proof of a company worth doing business with. They backup their warranty with out hoop jumping.We are considered very senior citizens and recommend SimpliSafe for that extra sense of security and peace of mind when something goes bump in the night. We keep the remote on the bed stand for the convenience of having the panic button on it nearby. Last night 3am the flashlight vibrated off the refrigerator with a loud thump on the trash can and then on the floor. It was comforting get up and check it out knowing no one was in the house since no entry sensor was tripped. Our system is set to instant alarm with no delay now especially after helping my brother with his system testing and realizing how long 30 seconds really is. When we are in Home mode and asleep I want an instant alarm that some perp has entered our home. Our plan is lock bedroom door and jump out the window (single story home).Our contact with the monitoring service has been great and we know they are subcontracted for SimpliSafe like most of the big companies. I purposely trip the door entry when arriving home very occasionally to test their respose time. Cell phone rings with in a few seconds. We have had wired systems in the past with their $30-$40 a month monitoring fees. Thank you SimpliSafe for helping us to feel safe and somewhat secure with your affordable system and a reasonable priced monitoring fee. Try it you will love it as my family will testify.

Reviews.Title: New Simplisafe user
Reviews.Author: Donald Adamsky
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use. Had a problem with a sensor error which I couldn't figure out. A call to customer support quickly identified the problem...I mistyped a sensor number during installation. Even had a minor reduction in my homeowners insurance.

Reviews.Title: Super Simple!
Reviews.Author: Sandra K. Young
Reviews.Content: The equipment arrived quickly.  The instructions were very clear.  We were impressed with the quality of the equipment, and how very quickly we were able to get everything up and running.  Can't say enough about the pleasant experience with making the buy decision all the way through to complete installation!!  Just buy it!  You won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: Dong Oh
Reviews.Content: I used to have ADT system. It was expensive and I had trouble with their service. They did not response my alarm and they said they did not get any signal. After some research and shopping, I decided to have Simplisafe system and I am very happy with the system so far. I have had for 2 weeks and their response is prompt and I can check all the events in my cellphone in real time. One complain is the devises, especially key pad is rather out fashioned even though it works OK. I would recommend this system to anybody. My son has Frontpoint system and he is thinking to change to SimpliSafe because monitoring fee is a lot cheaper.

Reviews.Title: My Favorite System So Far
Reviews.Author: Steve M Johnson
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up....great value for service...perfect iPhone/PC interface.....what more can I say?I have experience with two other monitored systems.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great service
Reviews.Author: Carlos Westling
Reviews.Content: EZE set up, just as advertised. I had to call support for a little problem and they were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Perfect System
Reviews.Author: Christopher R. Johns
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just bought a new house and we wanted a security system installed.  We weren't all that hot on a wired system and we wanted a system that we could easily understand and setup on our own.SimpliSafe was a product I had heard advertised on Dave Ramsey's radio show.  I performed some research and really liked how the setup videos demonstrated the easy installation.  I also really liked the add on options and ability to expand the system on our own terms.The best part, though, was the low cost of the system and the low price of the monitoring service.  Honestly, a home security system has one real purpose:  call the cops (and you) when a burgler smashes in your door.  This system does that for a fraction of the cost of other companies.

Reviews.Title: Value For Your Money
Reviews.Author: James W. Wright "Ripped Off By Amazon"
Reviews.Content: The system is easy (very) to install. The system works. Simplisafe does not trap you into any long term monitoring contracts. There is no need for a land line phone line for the system to work. The other security providers seem to want to ensnare me in long term exorbinent contracts.

Reviews.Title: Good Security System for Less
Reviews.Author: Brian Matthew Jones
Reviews.Content: I ordered this security system after reading a lot of reviews. I figured it has a 60 day return so why not? I got it within a week w/ 1 sensor missing but I called right away and they next day shipped it w/ no problems! So far the customer service has been great! I got 72 hours to play around w/ the system before the system went live w/ 24/7 monitoring. It was easy to install and seems like a pretty good system. So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Product
Reviews.Author: James V Mule'
Reviews.Content: Fantastically simple installation.  Works great!  I have recommended it to many of my friends who are in the process of purchasing it.I have not signed up for monitoring as of yet but might do so at a later date.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Safe
Reviews.Author: txvolfan
Reviews.Content: Their name ALMOST says it all:  The system is SIMPLE to install and the final result helps keep you SAFE but they left out one very important point ... it is VERY cost effective.

Reviews.Title: A must have!
Reviews.Author: Pamela J May
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a home security system that is easy, fast and makes you feel secure instantly, SimpliSafe is the answer. I wish I had bought it a long time ago!

Reviews.Title: Richard 01/15/2014
Reviews.Author: Linda Schechter-Grimaldi
Reviews.Content: Great system. It took me about 3 hours to set everything up. I had a problem that I created and customer service fixed it in no time. We use our cell phone a lot to arm and disarm the system which I find to be a great feature.I researched a number of systems and found this to be the most cost effective of them all.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Affordable
Reviews.Author: angela
Reviews.Content: Set up my system and activated the monitoring (all quite inexpensive, I might add) very easily. So far excited to have peace of mind with a solution we can take with us when we move.

Reviews.Title: Been There Done That. Doing it Again!!
Reviews.Author: k
Reviews.Content: Hey you guys. I want to feel safe, and know my pets are safe while we are out.We use Simplisafe and are so happy with it, we are using for a second location!Great product choices for all your needs. It is a cell phone so no need for a land line, it is wirelessso no more wires!Love it, great price if you go with monitoring.Signed,Done With Expensive Alarm Companies & Their Stupid Contracts

Reviews.Title: Installing!!!
Reviews.Author: John Oller
Reviews.Content: Im not quite thru installing the system yet!!!  I have C.O.P.D. so everything I do takes me alot longer to do then the normal person!!!  I should be thru installing my system by mid week!  I haven't had any problems installing this system yet!!!  I don't really understand the activation faze of the installation... I will contact by phone when I am ready to activate to make sure Im in understanding the proscess!!!  So fat this system seems to be all it is promised to be!!!

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: hford
Reviews.Content: We have a 1900 sq. ft. house. We did a lot of internet research as well as asking our friends about their security systems. We liked the fact that Simplisafe could be installed by us without any need for drilling/wires, etc. It was crazy-easy to install.  Also, most of our friends are paying $30-40 per month for the same level of service that we are getting for $15 per month through Simplisafe. We chose to purchase one additional entry sensor and one additional motion sensor.  They allow you to do a 'test run" in which the staff of Simplisafe call you after you trigger the alarm on purpose.  Their response time to the test was amazingly fast. I also accidentally set off the alarm this morning and the response time was equally fast.  My husband gave the person on the phone our "safe word" to indicate that we were fine and it was an accident.  I am really liking having a keychain remote that allows me to set the alarm and turn it off as I enter and exit the house. So far we are very happy with our decision.

Reviews.Title: Great idea I feel safe!
Reviews.Author: KingUrameshi
Reviews.Content: Wireless technology mixed with a very easy to use interface and setup give this system an advantage. 105 decibel alarm will get everyone's attention. Setup is no problem with 24/7 monitoring, great value with no contracts!.

Reviews.Title: Great system so far
Reviews.Author: Reddog15
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the system so far but have not tested the response time of the call center yet. The set-up of the system is super simple and the system is really easy to use. I enjoy their web site as well, very easy layout and all of the info that you need is there.

Reviews.Title: awsome system
Reviews.Author: Steve Wilson
Reviews.Content: for the basic no nonsense home security system so far this would be my top choice. I have had very expensive hardwired systems and can say they had better sensitivity with the motion sensors but were cubic $$$. This system is inexpensive, practical and very functional!If I have to move or make alterations to my home I can easily modify the system myself.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Product
Reviews.Author: Julia W. Carpenter-Hubin
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed with this product and the company. Installation is dead simple; there were no hitches. I bought a pretty complete system, with 13 entry sensors, but the cost of the system will be recouped in less than two years from the savings on the monthly monitoring. And, of course, were I to move, I could simply move the Simplisafe system with me. Furthermore, to get the remote access to my system through my smartphone, I would have had to upgrade my old system and pay even more. I think the traditional home security companies (I was with ADT) are counting on people just coasting on inertia, paying the monthly monitoring fee, and not rethinking their security system. I'm glad I stopped coasting and researched alternatives.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe home security installed very easily
Reviews.Author: Larry Reed
Reviews.Content: We are still on our three day trial period so we have no way to write a review on the service yet but the installation was a breeze. If all goes well, this system will save us approximately $600 the first year over our ADT system and doing away with our home phone line.

Reviews.Title: Modern Convenience
Reviews.Author: Douglas Person
Reviews.Content: This was easy to order and customize to my wants and needs, easy to install and activate.  No wires and no telephone line.  The addition of a smoke alarm gives me added piece of mind.  Ongoing monitoring is a great value.  I highly recommend SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Simpli-Painless!!
Reviews.Author: Joann
Reviews.Content: I set the system up myself ! I've never done anything like this before.The reason I chose this system is because its wireless. I would recommend SimpliSafe to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: Cornholio
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. I would make sure you clean the area that you are going to "stick" your sensors on. We added several sensors after it was up and running. Programming those were a snap. I put it into test mode and hand tested the sensors before I put them on the wall. My only gripe is the main station siren is not loud enough. I don't think you would hear it outside of a house or building 30' away. We probably will have to add a powered siren.All in all for the money I think it is a great value. I like that you can have monitoring one month and then not the next. Some towns may require a permit

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Alain D. Vulliet
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, very good product, would like to see adjustable heat thermostat and video cameras part of the packege?

Reviews.Title: Have only had system up & running for a few days.
Reviews.Author: Dawn L. Campbell "mammatomany"
Reviews.Content: I have only had the system up running for a few days but so far so good.I liked the fact that when I did the test  for emergency dispatch that I was called within seconds.Time will tell.Thank you for staying in touch,Norma Hudson

Reviews.Title: Excellent system for a DIY
Reviews.Author: P. Beason
Reviews.Content: Love the simplicity of the system and the ease of installing it myself. No need for tech to come out and charge additional fees and such.

Reviews.Title: a cinch to install and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mary S. Keegan
Reviews.Content: Thrilled with my alarm system so far...the price is right too.  The remote key fob makes setting the alarm and turning it off stress free.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Richard Whitehead
Reviews.Content: It's everything it's advertised.... Priced right, easy to set up, operate, & portable IF necessary.  I would highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A great alternative to expensive "contracted" systems.
Reviews.Author: G. G. Alexander "Jerry"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with a product. This system is easy to install and test, and the customer support is very responsive. I had a problem with the cellular signal strength used to connect to the Dispatch Center. SimpliSafe support personnel responded immediately to my concern and sent a replacement cellular module for the system. There was nothing wrong with the module that came with the equipment, but it used a cellular carrier whose signal in my area was weak. I bought this system as an alternative to a system installed by a security company, as well as the fact that I did not want to enter into any kind of a contract to support the system. With this system, you can have 24/7 Dispatch Center monitoring, or you can use it as a "local" alarm with no monitoring.

Reviews.Title: perfect system
Reviews.Author: james bullock
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is the perfect system for me. I am a do it yourself kind of guy and this allowed me to design my own systemto satisfy my particular needs. It is simple to install and works instantly. I would recommend your product to anyone who want's home security without the added cost.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe works great great value
Reviews.Author: T. Gray
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe works great. I live way out in the country and the cell phone in the tower works just fine way out here. Make sure you tell them what service you have before you order. 15 min. install and great customer service (they speak English) too.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Kristen Boatwright
Reviews.Content: I installed this alarm system myself and I am confident in the quality of the product!  I recommend this to every family

Reviews.Title: Simpli says it all
Reviews.Author: Michael J Hyde
Reviews.Content: Love the system. Very easy installation and easy to add additional sensors. Only negative is that the 'stickies' don't stick very well to certain surfaces like aluminum window frames. Suggest using the supplied screws instead.

Reviews.Title: This security system is wonderful and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Nancy Stevensen
Reviews.Content: This system only took minutes to install.  We did need Tech. Support for one problem and they were so nice and easy to work with.  The problem we had was corrected in minutes.  This system is so easy to expand which we are in the process of doing.  You are in complete control of all settings and the whole system itself.

Reviews.Title: What you need to know: (It's the best choice for DIY home security)
Reviews.Author: Michael S. DeHaven
Reviews.Content: Scenario:I live in a two-story row home just outside West Philadelphia.Front Door, Back Door, Garage with a door to the basement.Why I went with these guys:It was a hard choice because I am a major gadget guy.  ZWave based systems looked pretty cool.  Viper looked most attractive with it's flexibility and features.  But even if you aren't on a budget, the cellular base station and monitoring is very solid choice over Viper and similar systems.  Plus getting up and running was very simple and foolproof.  Others may say this system isn't as easy to setup as they advertise, but I thought it was.  The computer installation guide was crazy easy.Setup:For windows I utilize the motion sensor because the standard magnetic entry sensor wouldn't go off it someone just decided to break the window.My motion detector is facing the front two windows of my house because those are the closest to the ground.Because of where we are, the panic button with the extra siren is a safe choice.  Mount the siren outside under an overhang.  It's loud enough to get people running outside.The package I purchased came with a smoke alarm, we already have one so I put it in the basement near the steps.Didn't post the sign, no tips for intruders.Future Expansion:I am planning on getting 1 more motion detector for the basement.Freeze sensor for the basement to look after my old copper pipes.Things to get out of your head if security is the main concern:The keypad pretty lame looking compared to others but once I mounted it, it doesn't look antiquated at all.One stop shop for home automation is not worth the overhead.  Get dirty and piece together your setup.  I enjoy my Nest for thermostat.  They do it well and the app support is top notchFor video surveillance focus on app support like home monitor does an alright job.

Reviews.Title: Great system - easy set-up
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: This system does everything you need and more.  Set-up was so easy anyone could do it.  I definitely recommend this system and the company behind it.

Reviews.Title: Works well, easy to install and cheap monitoring
Reviews.Author: Todd Sturgeon
Reviews.Content: We were really shocked when we started looking that this product was recommended by Rush Limbaugh, Dave Ramsey, and Clark Howard.  We purchased the pieces we needed and were very pleased with the cost of the equipment as well as the monthly monitoring fee.  When the package arrived, it only took about an hour to setup everything physically.  Then we spent the next day or so thinking about some of the questions on the internet side of the setup to make sure my wife and I agreed on how we wanted it.  It has been fantastic. My 10 and 13 year old children have not had any problems with it and feel much more secure since we were robbed on Christmas eve.  We like that it is cellular based and wireless connectivity to the sensors.The only thing I would like to see that was not currently available, they are working on, is cameras in the same system.  Hopefully that will be there soon.I would still recommend without reservation.

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: kblamy
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install and set up. The system seems to be working great and I like the interactive features they provide.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe home system
Reviews.Author: Chris Harper
Reviews.Content: I have found the system to work quite well so far. It is easy to set up and is much less expensive than others Good support, too. I would recommend the system highly.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is a great system.
Reviews.Author: chris jones
Reviews.Content: This system is extremely easy to set up and works just as advertised.  You can realize a huge cost savings over the other security companies.I got a 7% discount on my homeowner's insurance for installing it.  That 7% discount will actually pay for 5.6 months worth of monitoring.Very pleased with this system.  I had concerns about communication between the sensors and the base station since I have 10" poured concrete walls and brick that this thing has to get signals through.  It works just fine and communicates well.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS E. VOGEL
Reviews.Content: Overall, the product came as expected, in the time that was initially stated.The product, in general, set up quite easily, but I did have two comments that I made on an earlier Simplisafe review:1.  Initially, the siren did not operate.  Customer service found that it had not been properly programmed and did guide me through the process of reprogramming it.2.  The location of the one adhesive backing on the motion sensors is such that if the units are mounted in the corner for full 90 degree coverage, the backing doesn't touch the wall.  The units need to be installed shifted to one side.  There should be two backings on units, or the one backing should be on the wall flat, not the corner flat.

Reviews.Title: Great economical choice of home security
Reviews.Author: C. Gallion
Reviews.Content: I choose Simplisafe for extra peace of mind. My first security is my bullmastiff, so this is secondary. The cost is great compared to many other systems, and we can easily take it with us when we move (which we do often). Installation was easy; my husband and I installed it within 30-45 minutes. We turned the motion detector upside down, so that it wouldn't detect our 110lb dog and so far it hasn't. The major drawback for me is that we are currently using it as a local alarm, and the speaker declares out load (to any would-be criminals) that we are not linked to a dispatcher. We are therefore forced to pay $14.99, which is cheap compared to many systems, but I still believe it to be a flaw to the alarm (for my personal use). I would still however choose to purchase the system again, and I will link the alarm to dispatcher.

Reviews.Title: Appears to be a great security system
Reviews.Author: Dennis Shea
Reviews.Content: I have not had an occasion where the system has gone off, but so far is is everything that the mfg. said that it was. It was easy to install and frankly, I hope that it never goes off.Dennis SheaAdvance, NC

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Sharon Stieffel
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install and works exactly like we were hoping for.  There was no problem with ordering and receiving.  Support was there if you needed it. Takes a little longer but I used the screws provided along with the tape.I have already told and suggested to friends.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Good value security system
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Wilson
Reviews.Content: I shopped around to find an affordable security system that would meet my needs to secure my family's home.  I found that SimpliSafe had the system I was looking for in the budget I desired.  The up front cost is more than some security systems but the monitoring expense is less than most.  In the long run the saving are there after the initial investment.  I like the fact that I could customize the system to suit my needs by purchasing additional components with an existing package.  This is not a few sizes fit all.  I like that I was able to install the system myself.  The set-up itself took longer than the company claims, but that does include finalizing all of the bells and whistles.  The set-up was very user friendly and about as easy as can be expected.  I also like the fact that I can add onto my security system in the future, as I plan to do.  So far, so good.  Thank you SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Should have followed the directions!
Reviews.Author: JShaw
Reviews.Content: I bought the system to install at a remote fishing cabin.  It appears to provide motion, entry, and noise to keep the local teenagers away from the temptations of an empty cabin all week.  Upon opening, I did not follow the directions and ignored the suggestion to plug  the flash drive into my computer, instead opting to just read and figure it out.  After struggling for 30 minutes, I plugged the supplied flash drive (also the remote) into the computer, followed the on screen directions and presto....five minutes later completely operational and already set up for use.Installation is basically putting the devices where you want them, running the test, and nothing else.  Sirens are loud, and running them through several test "panic" cycles lets everyone know the alarm is in and functional.Simple, functional, no strings, and great support for any questions, and additional sirens and motion detectors.  Highly impressed for the money.  Would recommend to anyone not wanting the long term commitment, plus only having to buy what you need.

Reviews.Title: High End/Low Cost Security
Reviews.Author: Michael Kay
Reviews.Content: I researched security systems for 6 months knowing I would be moving into a new home.  This system was incredibly easy to install and is the easiest system I've ever used.  I had one "hiccup" but the tech support was exceptional.  I have recommended this system to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: suzanne jones
Reviews.Content: This is a very good self install system for a beginner to put in. The cost for what you get is well worth it.As good if not better than some of the more expensive systems out there. Would recommend this to any one who wants a very safe alarm system for the home..

Reviews.Title: Best deal in alarm monitored home security
Reviews.Author: Arkansas Traveler
Reviews.Content: Very economical, great customer support, easy to install, only $15/month monitoring and completely wireless.  Only time will tell if all the wireless sensor/transmitters will hold up over time, and, if the monitoring folks respond quickly and efficiently in contacting the proper authorities.  The self install is a HUGE plus as all too often, the contractor who installs units is either the person who broke into your home or the person who received money from the person who broke into your home.  Licensed, insured and bonded mean nothing if you can't prove it v--- which, is usually the case as home break-ins and burglary are low priority items with most police forces.I am a retired Risk Management  professional, and I higly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed, exactly as promised
Reviews.Author: George Angus "Tumblemoose"
Reviews.Content: After hearing this system advertised on the radio the past few months, I went to their site and found out as much as I could about the system.  It was so inexpensive  - the system and the monthly monitoring - that I knew there had to be a catch. I mean, my Mom's system with V***** cost her hundreds of dollars, a fat contract and a fat monthly fee.I looked through the site and didn't find the "catch" I was looking for.So I ponied up for the system.It arrived in the timeframe expected. I pulled out the box and the first thing on top was the remote key chain device. As it turns out, it has a USB connector and you plug it in to your computer and Voila! it walks you step by step through the entire process. It literally took less than an hour to set it up completely. I didn't have to drill any holes and when tested, everything worked perfectly.Where I live, thievery has been rampant. I don't have a lot of fancy or expensive stuff but what I do have I've worked hard for and would like to keep. SimpliSafe is helping me do that in a way that is simple, inexpensive and I believe effective.If you are considering a home security system, this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Easy
Reviews.Author: Katherine Cowan
Reviews.Content: This system was easy to install and it is easy to use. I would however, change the window stickers so that they could in installed on the inside of the window.

Reviews.Title: very good system
Reviews.Author: Dave Walsh
Reviews.Content: I'm very please with this product. easy to install, good quality, price was great. Had to callcompany for some instructions regarding one part of the setup, had no problem reaching a person thatknew what to do.  Overall, I'm very pleased.Dave WalshUpstate NY

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: neil bress
Reviews.Content: So east to install and get into action. The unit talks to you when it's armed and disarmed. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: ntphuong
Reviews.Content: Just installed it two weeks ago. In brief, it is a decent wireless home security system. The instruction is clear. It is very easy to install. The test mode is useful.

Reviews.Title: Great Product-Excellent Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Jack Clevenger
Reviews.Content: This is a great service and their products are built well and operate as indicated on the website. I look forward to expanding my home security with more entry sensors and several fire alarms. The customer service is excellent and very friendly and helpful with any questions that one might have. Setting up the system is fun and absolutely simple and quick.

Reviews.Title: really happy with system
Reviews.Author: frig 32
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy installation and works as advertised.  BIG plus that I didn't have to sign a contract. Would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: We've been considering getting an alarm for quite some time after recent robberies in our neighborhood.  But most other companies would charge well over $1k for the type system we wanted and then another $30-$50/month to monitor.  Simplisafe had a package with everything we wanted, with optional monitoring and no contract.  System is very easy to setup and it is great that you can move sensors if you need to.  Motion sensors are great, better range than I would have thought.  Pet friendly- as long as small animal and keep 5 feet from sensor.  So far, very pleased with purchase and feel much safer.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system
Reviews.Author: Debra McGrath
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this product. Very easy to install , fool proof. I installed it in less than two hours start to finish

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe 8 piece review
Reviews.Author: Stephen Bettes
Reviews.Content: The system I purchased came just as detailed.  The instructions were clear but it took me a lot longer to set up than in the advertisment video.  I would have like the outside sign to be attached to its own post as I had to make and attach one.  So far it is working great and the added security Codes in case perpitator is at your side is awesome. Great product which allows you to save a bundle on monthly monitoring fees. Will recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: 5 days in, and it is as easy to install as described
Reviews.Author: PonyNoser "canalzone72"
Reviews.Content: (Note: I am not reviewing the monitoring service as I did not wish to subscribe to it at this time).I did a LOT of research before buying this system. Not to say it sounded like it was the single best system out there, but between simplicity, no-contract required, 24/7 monitoring IF and when I may want it (at a decently low cost), and available options (expansions, detectors, etc.), I went for it.It was very easy to install.  I am pleasantly surprised on how well the motion sensors are working. They were able to detect motion in other rooms through small openings in doors and hallways.Even when I improperly places a sensor and had to remove it and replace the double-stick tape (with extras which are included), it all went smooth.I'm hoping not to find any serious issues with this system, even so, I hope SimpliSafe will support and address any concerns and update the system as necessary.

Reviews.Title: on the fence?
Reviews.Author: MSY
Reviews.Content: installation - couldn't be easierconfiguration - already configured (base & sensors) when shipped.  i questioned why one of the sensors was giving a 'cannot be reached' error message and soon learned the base knew of the sensor but i had not yet activated it.online - nice feature.  allows setting and monitoring the system at their website.  event tracking is also nice.if i had two wish list items they are: (1) the keypad numeric buttons would backlight.  not a huge issue but a nice feature.  (2) the keypad alert tone would be louder.i've configured 26 sensors on the system with expansion to 41 possible.  doors, windows, temp alert, smoke detectors, water sensor, co monitors, panic button, key fobs, and keypads (3).recommend - yesADDITION:  tested my alarm today and received a call from central monitoring within 30 seconds.  very fast.  will run a test every three months.

Reviews.Title: Purhase of Simplisafe Home Security System
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: Components easy to installOperation easy to useCost of system is very reasonable and does not have to be monitored if you choose not to

Reviews.Title: Blinking blue light in tower
Reviews.Author: Dennis D.
Reviews.Content: Everythings working great except for when I tested my key chain panic button & the two other panic buttons. I was able to disarm the siren but the tower keeps blinking blue & the keypads message is "no link to dispatcher" Does this mean I'm not connected or what?

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Shawn R. Teal
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother's home. I was sold on the fact that it works without a phone line and keeps things secure during power outages. It was super easy to set up and she can take it with her if she moves. They hang with Command strips... so there is no messing up the drywall. The set up took about 30 minutes. I am so impressed that I may replace the existing system in my home.

Reviews.Title: I installed it myself....!
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Sturmer
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to buy Simplisafe, even bought extra sensors for all our windows (17).  He was at work & the system arrived, but I didn't want to wait to install the sensors & set up the system.The ease of the directions, the ease of installing all the sensors, the easy-to-follow instructions made it EASY for ME to set it all up!  The best part?  I called my husband to let him know I had done the installation, and he said GOOD as he hates doing that sort of thing!And, the system works....I hooked up the phone line, sent a test through the keypad to Simplisafe, & wallah, Simplisafe was activated for our home.It works EASY....all the way from ordering online, the instructions, the installation, and the final setup and activation.Great security for a very small investment of $$ and my time.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: hogman65
Reviews.Content: The system is very easy to install and works as stated !!!! I could certainly recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Easy
Reviews.Author: Randalyn MacDonald
Reviews.Content: The product was easy to install and set up.  The price and coverage are great. I needed to contact customer serve and was greeted by a friendly and help associate. It is very simple and easy to use and not a hassle.

Reviews.Title: Great easy to install
Reviews.Author: Travis Upton
Reviews.Content: I installed the entire system in about 30 minutes. I do recommend it. The support is very fast as well.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Security System - An Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Phillip E Bower
Reviews.Content: After 30 years, it was time to upgrade our home security system. I had heard some good things about SimpliSafe on radio ads and decided to check into it further. The website was great and gave complete information. The product was very easy to order online in the exact configuration that we wanted. Our system was delivered in a timely fashion with easy-to-follow instructions for installation. We found that everything was exactly as it had been represented. We have had no problems with the system and would recommend it to any homeowner.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Crouching Tiger
Reviews.Content: Just installed.  Only took 90 minutes including testing and I installed a couple of sensors backwards by not following instructions.  Just went live so no actual real use.  Will report on later after live test. Very nice

Reviews.Title: Easy to use system
Reviews.Author: Klatt Family
Reviews.Content: This is easy to setup and use! Very happy with the purchase. And not having to sign up for a 3 year contract which many others require.

Reviews.Title: so far no complaints
Reviews.Author: Hunter_41129
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this system as to ADT which was my previous security system and I had an experience with one sensor going off for no reason and they wanted to charge $25 service call and I was paying over $50 a month for service? don't think so! I will definitely be saving money with this system. very easy to set up as well. I highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great System!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie M. Miller
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install and easy to operate.  He had a neighbor come in and forget to turn off the system while we were gone and they called us instantly to let us know the alarm had been setup.  We called the neighbor and it has been 30 secs, which is quick for them to respond and call me to see if they needed to send anyone out.I am glad we did not go with ADT and went with SimpliSafe after hearing Glenn Beck talk about for about year before we purchased it as our family Christmas gift.  I feel much safer with this system and like the smoke alarm notification as well.

Reviews.Title: Installation couldn't be easier
Reviews.Author: B. Folmer
Reviews.Content: I purchased a SimpliSafe system a couple weeks ago and it has worked great since then. The installation was very easy and flexible, and the ability to expand or move the sensors is terrific. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: This is the One!
Reviews.Author: Easy Livin' in AR
Reviews.Content: Wow!!  What a great system, for a great price, and great Customer Support.  The system was delivered on time, and was as easy to set up as was explained in the feature description.  Sure, the initial hardware costs you more than some of the competitors, but the difference will generally be recovered within a year at the $14.99 per month monitoring fees vrs. the $40 to $50 fees for most of the others; and after the first year the savings is all money in the bank.  What's more, you don't have to sign a one, or two, year monitoring contract in order to buy the hardware at a discount.  You can stop and restart this monitoring any time you want with no penalty or 'restart' charges.Reliable equipment, easily self-installed, completely wireless, low cost monitoring with no long term contracts, and top notch Customer Support if you have any questions or concerns!  What could be better?

Reviews.Title: Simpli-Great
Reviews.Author: guatmom "guatmom"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of comparison - like everyone else - and took a shot with simplisafe2. After 2 weeks of use I have found this to be a great system. It was very easy to setup and use. I did take the time to thoroughly read the instructions and watch some videos and reviews so when it was time to install, it was pretty easy and familiar.I bought the 8-piece Plus package and have used all the sensors. I will buy more water sensors to avoid any problems there. I missed a slow leak for 2 months that flooded under my raised basement floor - never again!Suggestions - Use screws for the entry sensors. Don't just rely on the tape because those move.Would like even more features of course - especially being able to set the temperature on the temp sensor. I have faith they will come as this system seems rather updatable.Would also like the ability to hear the voice responses at other locations other than just the main station. It may be possible but I have not discovered that yet. Again, I'm sure it will come. They appear to be very customer satisfaction oriented.

Reviews.Title: Technical assistance
Reviews.Author: Gregory Hindle
Reviews.Content: Had some technical problems with initial installation and setup but with your technical staffs assistance it was all cleared up and I had the system operating in time to go away for the Christmas holidays knowing I was protected.  Thanks Rush for putting me on to SimpliSafeGreg Hindle.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Josephine C. Bloom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just moved to a retirement community and felt that we did not feel secure in our new home.  We heard of simplisafe from Glenn Beck and thought that we would try it out.  It was SO EASY to install and follow directions for use.  We both feel more secure now and would recommend this system to everyone.  JC Bloom

Reviews.Title: Great Move
Reviews.Author: Dan Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I moved away from ADT due to cost and unwillingness on their part to switch me over to a cell based system.  I had been a client for well over 25 years.  Their first offer was several hundred dollars and a raise in my monthly monitor rate to 44.99 per month, when I said cancel they suddenly offered to switch me to a cell based system for $125.00 but the same monthly cost.  I now have a system that included CO2 and a water sensor.  Very happy with the move and the money I save each month will pay off the system on less than 18 months.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: WAivalikles
Reviews.Content: I had ADT for 20 years and when  I had a problem with the equipment,they refused to repair the panel even though they caused the problem.Their lack of loyalty forced me to look for alternatives.Fortunately I found simplisafe and am very happy with the equipment and customer service.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: RLang
Reviews.Content: It was very simple to set up and the customer service was excellent. I had to wait a little while to get customer service though once connected they were very thorough.

Reviews.Title: This system is easy to install and the customer support is great!
Reviews.Author: Tom Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I chose this product because I wanted a wireless system and I didn't want to be tied into a long term monthly monitoring contract. It is very simple and easy to understand. It is also easy to expand and adjust to the amount of coverage one may want. I would highly recommend this system to others. Tom Zimmerman

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great.
Reviews.Author: Ricky L Singleton
Reviews.Content: Took less than 20 minutes to install and get operational.  It is very user friendly and I like the expandability.

Reviews.Title: just as advertised
Reviews.Author: BillK
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is simply the best security product I've encountered. easy to install, works as advertised, and very economical. I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SECURITY SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: SunShine
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED ANOTHER BRAND SECURITY SYSTEM BEFORE THIS ONE. FIRST OF ALL YOU COULDN'T BUY ANY ADDITIONAL PRODUCTS FOR THE SYSTEM. WHEN I PURCHASED EXTRA DOOR & WINDOW ALARMS (THEY'RE PRODUCTS) AND TRIED TO PROGRAM THEM IN THE SYSTEM, IT SCREWED UP THE WHOLE SYSTEM . HAD TO RETURN. THAT SYSTEM. THIS SYSTEM WAS EXTRA EASY TO SET UP AND YOU CAN BUY ANY ADDITIONS YOU WANT.YOU CAN ALSO HAVE IT MONITORED FOR A CHEAP PRICE OR DO WITHOUT PAYING A MONTHLY FEE. I AM GOING TO GET MONITORING AS SOON AS WE ARE SUREWE ARE USING IT PROPERLY. REALLY DON'T WANT EMERGENCY UNITS DISPATCHED FOR FALSE ALARMS.  I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS SECURITY SYSTEM!!!.

Reviews.Title: Slick System and Modest Long-term Cost
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This is one of those "works as advertised" systems.  It installed easily, and the few questions I had were answered very promptly.  The system communicates by radio signal, so placement of components should be done "by the book", with alternate locations in mind if needed.  The system test mode or a test alarm will get you an acknowledgement call from the monitors right now!  Also, I'm not in an expensive contract.  Chuck

Reviews.Title: No Contract, Easy to Install and It Works!
Reviews.Author: Marni Smith
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's simple to install and it's easy to operate.  It took me a little longer to set up because I bought  so many extra sensors.  I like that I paid a reasonable price for the equipment and now I own it and can move it if I relocate.  I am not a fan of the competitor offers of free equipment and then you're locked in with outrageous monthly monitoring fees and a long term contract.  SimpliSafe figured out what people want and delivered it.  What a concept!

Reviews.Title: Love the very simplified and yet very effective security system
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: I bought SimpliSafe after researching a few options. The lower price point, easy DIY installation and, most importantly, lack of contract sealed the deal for me. Installation was a breeze. I was a little apprehensive about their support as quite a few online reviewers were complaining about it. However, my experience was very pleasant. I ended up calling them three times and all three times someone very knowledgable answered the call and got my issues resolved right away. The max wait time for me was 10 mins. I have just activated the monitoring service. So I don't know about that part yet. Once I spend enough time using that, I will update this review.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: It comes pre-configured and easy directions for installation.  I installed mine in a 3 story 3700sqft house and had no issues with sensors getting signal to the base station.  Battery's look easy to replace and most sensors use 123's. Cheapest monitoring service $14.99 no contract.  Using the app on the key fob its easy to set up how you want your alarm to be tripped for while your at home or while your away.  Also has a duress code for silent alarm.  Extra alarm siren super loud.

Reviews.Title: Excellent system, great price, easy install
Reviews.Author: R. Dayton
Reviews.Content: This is a system that a friend has so I was able to see his before I bought my system. The wireless components and the 3M sticky tapes make it very easy to install. There are small screws with each part that are handy if you need to install a component on an uneven surface. Plus, it is easy to move a sensor if necessary. I moved one motion sensor to increase the sensing area. It did take a little while to get used to the features of each system setting, such as 'Home,' 'Away,' and 'Off.' I do like the audible 'ding' when a door or window is opened in 'Off' mode. Also, the USB key fob interface is easy to use when changing settings using my computer.We are currently using the basic monitoring system, which is only $14.99 per month. There is no long-term commitment required like some of the big name security companies. There are two higher levels of monitoring and perhaps in the future we will upgrade to one of those.Overall this system is a great value based on cost, installation, monitoring, and, of course, the security it provides.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe alarm system
Reviews.Author: richard meade
Reviews.Content: Great system easy to install our other system was old and couldn't get the needed part to fix it, went on line and looked at a lot of systems.  I'am sure I made the right choice the price was fair and the quality was very good.

Reviews.Title: Home security
Reviews.Author: Mark Clark
Reviews.Content: I work in a detention facility and after years of hearing about break ins I decided enough was enough and started researching home security systems. The well known and bigger companies were expensive and had hidden fees and extra costs associated with their product. I found Simplisafe. I read just about everything I could on their equipment and decided to go with them. Shipping was a little slower than I expected, however once the equipment arrived it was as promised. The set up was very easy and the instructions clear and easy to follow. I did need to order extra entry sensors and 2 more motion sensors to give the entire house (including every dooor and window) the full protection I wanted. Maybe a little bit of overkill, but my choice. The 72 hours given as practise mode was good as I set it off twice. You learn quickly how to operate the system and I am very happy with this product. The price of monitoring is more than reasonable compared to the big names also. Highly recomend this product if serious about home security without the huge price.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Gwen Wilson
Reviews.Content: Wireless and easy to install. I do not have a good cell signal where I live, so I'm not connected to the operator, but still a good setup.

Reviews.Title: Best value in home security!
Reviews.Author: compguy
Reviews.Content: I have used ADT for four years. was not the best experience. Anyway with this system I installed all by myself with only one call to tech support. Turns out the battery in my keychain remote was DOA. The representative sent me one overnight at no charge.I now about 1/2 the cost of the monthly monitoring rate compared to ADT. ADT offered $99 install and equipment. You got a central unit w/keypad. One motion sensor. One entry door or window sensor. Any extras you wanted, you had to purchase. Motion sensor was @$200. Entry sensor @$50 etc.Best change i made!

Reviews.Title: Great Value and East to Install!
Reviews.Author: pbelt
Reviews.Content: The Best Price, I have "owned" (never owned actually, "leased") other Brands of Security Systems!Simplisafe2 is By FAR the best value & Quality available!It's 21st Technology and Service combined

Reviews.Title: Happy new owner.
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. Montalbano
Reviews.Content: My order came promptly and and all items were correct.  From opening and ensuring that my order was correct, to reading all the instructions, planning sensor placements, and activating the system took about 3 hours.  The only thing that held me up was pairing the extra loud alarm with the system.  There was nothing in the instruction booklet or online instructions that mentioned the method or need to pair the alarm with the system.  I found the little piece of paper that had the instructions on it.  Once paired all worked as advertised.  I really like the way the base station would let me know when a device was detected.  I also like the home and away activation.  I am 68 and now feel much more secure.  Between my guns and the Simplisafe security system, I feel sorry for the perpetrator.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 in Texas
Reviews.Author: Cathy Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Even for those of us who are not technical gurus, we were able to install the system.  It took more time than we expected, but it was ok.  The 3-day learning/testing period gave us time to get comfortable with the system before going live.  Waiting to hear from our insurance if they will offer the discount as this was the first time they had encountered a "self installed" system.

Reviews.Title: Great system!
Reviews.Author: J. Russell Carlson
Reviews.Content: Easy to understand web site and to order.Very easy and fast to set up.Works great.I would recommend this to everyone.Russ

Reviews.Title: Through research, this appears to be the one!
Reviews.Author: BadgerFan
Reviews.Content: I've been reading reviews and will be getting Simplisafe. Before ordering I had a few questions and customer service responded back in one business day. Responses to my questions:1) "...window breakage sensors are in the works and should be available for sale early next year. Details are scarce at this point in time, but if you would like to receive updates on these, you can sign up for our newsletter here: [...] Until our glass break sensors are released, we are recommending our motion sensors in rooms with large windows or glass doors because these will pickup on an entrance to the area of the motion sensor."2) You can purchase the Amazon package and then still purchase extra components at their website. Customer service reassured me that their "systems purchased on Amazon will come with the same 3-year warranty (and same) ... customer support."3) "You can arm the windows in an open position, as well. What you would do is put the sensor on the window, running vertically, and the magnet on the frame, running vertically. When the window is shut, the magnet should line up with the sensor and be within 2 inches of it in order to arm that window in a closed position. Then, purchase a second magnet, and place it on the window frame at the height that you want to open the window to. Then, open the window so that the sensor on the window lines up with this second magnet. You can now arm the window in this open position, and opening or closing it will trigger the alarm. Extra magnets can be ordered here: [...]I also read elsewhere that their smartphone app now has a security code for an extra layer of security and peace of mind should you lose your phone.Seriously, I am actually excited to get this. I am SO happy I came across these detailed reviews (thank you everyone; thank you Amazon) before possibly signing a contract with another service. I am particularly comforted by my initial experience with their customer service but especially by the raves it receives from others.  I also love the fact that they allow you to go or not go with their monitoring services, as well as allow you to move freely between their different monitoring packages ($15, $20, $25), should your needs or financial situation change.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Jeffery Harper
Reviews.Content: It appears to be a nice system that was easy to install.  My only thing I would like to see available is a glass breakage detector

Reviews.Title: Another Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Linda L.
Reviews.Content: I first dropped by a local security company to get a price list.  Basically they told me they would have to come to the house and survey it and that I was too stupid to know what I needed and they would tell me.  They had no price list.  I then called another vendor and he said an install would be about $2,200.  He e-mailed me costs but did not seem to be too interested in the work.  I then heard the ad on Rush Limbaugh and read about SimpliSafe on-line and was impressed both with the customer satisfaction and the low cost.  Installed everything myself and it works fine.  When I received the package, I was impressed with the packaging, which was all cardboard.  Yesterday I showed my neighbor and he is going to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product!
Reviews.Author: John Kady
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe was even easier to set up than advertised and works flawlessly.  Web page interface makes changing pins and contacts very easy.

Reviews.Title: Great simple alarm system
Reviews.Author: Joseph R.
Reviews.Content: I really love this product. The setup was simple and intuitive.  The documentation was great. The system seems to work very well -- I haven't been robbed since I put it in.  And the iphone app for monitoring the system is fantastic. I have no idea if a really well-trained burglar could beat this security, but it's given me some good peace of mind for about $500 and about $25 a month, where competing systems were two or three times that cost and didn't give me the nifty app that allows me to control everything from my phone.This product is everything that Apple says it is, but really isn't.

Reviews.Title: Highly Reccomended
Reviews.Author: Phyllis A. Hines
Reviews.Content: My husband & I decided to purchase the Simplisafe security system after seeing it on DIY network. It works very well. We can leave our home now with peace of mind knowing our property is safe and secure. We highly recommend this security system.

Reviews.Title: Extremely easy to install
Reviews.Author: Royal Lohnes
Reviews.Content: The system installed just as easily as it showed in the videos.  Just peel the adhesive strips and install.  Everything worked well right out of the box and I don't have any regrets about this purchase at all.  Our home was robbed before we bought the system and I hope we never have to go through that again.  This gives us piece of mind when we're away from the house now.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: seldomshopper
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  System set up is simple and logical.  Remote monitoring gives control of system as if you were home.You can also toggle units to monitor 'Away' or 'Home' or change for different situations - simple key stroke or two.

Reviews.Title: Simple
Reviews.Author: James Meade
Reviews.Content: Great product, even better customer support.  Set it all up out of the box according to instructions and yet it wouldn't sync up to the call center like it was supposed to.  Gave them a call on X-mas Eve and they instantly answered (on hold for about 5 seconds), and walked me through what I needed to reboot the system and even waited for me to find a screw driver to remove the battery backup.  They stayed on with me for about 5 minutes when it was a 30 second fix, and then gave me an over the phone tutorial on the science of the system and answered all of my questions (which were more out of curiosity than out of need to know to use the system).  This thing is great and I highly recommend it.  You're being taken if you're paying for ADT or CPI or any of those other overpriced namebrands.  Bite the bullet for the upfront costs to make up the money in a year for the same service.

Reviews.Title: Top In Market
Reviews.Author: Robert Nibarger
Reviews.Content: Over the  years we have used both commercial and non-commercial security systems.  In an effort to reduce costs, I decided to purchase a Simplysafe2 Home security system.  The installation was less than 30 minutes and the set up was very easy.  The  functions and features are outstanding.  I would highly recommend this system.  No contracts are required but I did go a with a non-contract monthly monitoring.  Great value.  You cant go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install and Manage
Reviews.Author: Venkat S
Reviews.Content: It took me less than half an hour to install the system and was very easy.I am completely satisfied with the text messages I receive and the mobile app that lets me manage the system in addition to the very affordable monthly monitoring.Way to go Simplisafe!

Reviews.Title: easy set up
Reviews.Author: Chuck Anderson
Reviews.Content: Was pleasantly surprised at  how easy set up was.Online set up guide was helpful for questions we had.Only negative was range of signal trough metal pole barn. Barn was less than 150 ft. from base unit and could"t get it to response. Had to put motion  detector on window then it worked.  Overall ,very easy and we got it to worked.  would highly recommend  system.  chuck  from  south dakota

Reviews.Title: 100% as advertised
Reviews.Author: James T. Holder
Reviews.Content: I have learned over the years to assume that anything you purchase will be about 50% as good as advertised.  Additionally, I do not complete surveys.  This product resulted in exceptions on both fronts.  The SimpliSafe2 system was 100% as advertised, and thus I chose to complete a satisfaction survey. The Simplisafe2 wireless home security system had a lot to live up to, because they advertise a lot of benefits.  First is the ease of set up.  I am not a very handy person, and I was able to set the entire system up without any assistance.  We completely armed a 3,500 sq. ft. home in approximately 2 hours.  I think it could have been done more quickly, but I usually mess things up when I hurry, so I took my time.  Second is the quality of the equipment.  The sensors, the key pad, the smoke alarm and the base unit all worked as soon as the system was activated.  Third, the web site is very user friendly.  Activation was extremely easy.  In short, I recommend this product without qualification.  Jim H.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Chuck Hoelscher
Reviews.Content: I heard about Simplisafe on talk radio and other ads.  The system was easy to install and even easier to manage.  The blogs offered by e-mail once I received the product were great and helped me get the most out of the system.  I have expanded my system to cover additional areas and an out building.  The expansion was simple and the function has been perfect.  I knew wireless systems were the future of home security but Simplisafe is way beyond my expectations for sophistication and functionality.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to setup and deploy
Reviews.Author: TTippetts
Reviews.Content: Loved the ease of deployment I was able to set it up during my work day as I could get to without having to start over. I'd like to have it turn on a lamp of sorts in the room where the keypad is to be able to see the buttons to arm or disarm the system.

Reviews.Title: Quality Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Jack Johnston
Reviews.Content: I switched to SimpliSafe from another national firm due to a much less expensive monthly monitoring fee.  I reduced my monthly expense by 50% and still retained identical features without the need to enter into a lengthy service agreement.  Based on my calculations, my ROI for the equipment will be in 14 months.I like the fact you can upgrade/downgrade service and equipment easily, and the additional devices (entry sensors, etc.) are very reasonably priced.  I'm already planning to add a water sensor and additional motion sensors in the near future.There are just two minor issues that I encountered when compared to my previous home system that kept me from giving SimpliSafe 5-stars:  (1) the keys on the keypad are too small and too closely placed together.  When entering your PIN, extra care must be taken (and I do not have large fingers); (2) the wireless range is not as great as the GE Simon XT, as I had to move the SimpliSafe Base Station twice in order for two Entry Sensors to be recognized.Overall, though, I'm pleased with my purchase, and I do recommend this product to those looking for a quality home security system with great features that won't "break the bank".

Reviews.Title: Great Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Laura Schmidt
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with my choice to install my SimpliSafe system.  After almost 15yr with ADT, we moved to a new house and needed alarm equipment installed.  I shopped several monitored systems/services and found SimpliSafe to be the best value - about half the monthly cost of ADT basic monitoring, yet with far more features like the ability to view/control the alarm from anywhere via internet or iPhone app.  Installation was extremely easy, SimpliSafe programmed the system before shipping it to me.  All I had to do was open the box and "peel-n-stick" the sensors on the windows and doors.  It also saved me from having to go through the time and hassle of having an alarm specialist/sales person come to my home to assess it for an alarm installation.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy to install,very reliable and wireless. Easy set up and test procedure,  with 3 different optional monitoring choices. customize your own package to suit your needs.

Reviews.Title: Good home security System
Reviews.Author: Angela Boyd
Reviews.Content: Works well even for me in the middle of no where.Found out I needed to order more entry sensors than I originally thought and may add more options later. So maybe they could add more information on the web site when ordering.  But adding more options later is easy to do.Which the remote had them home option not just off and away mode.

Reviews.Title: Simpli-Excellent System!
Reviews.Author: John R. Nickdow
Reviews.Content: I originally found about this company because of Facebook. A friend 'Liked' this company. I was looking into a new system to replace  our system that was lost because of my house being flooded from Hurricane Sandy.  I would have had to have the other company come back and re-do everything, but I was not happy about having that done. After finding Simpisafe, I immediately checked into it with my son, who is very Hi-Tech. We ordered it right away. After it arrived, it was beyond simple to install it. It took all of about 20 minutes to put up all the sensors. The setup was very easy and we were up and running within the hour. We set up the monitoring along with the e-mail and text alerts. We also set up apps on our phones. It is exactly the type of system we had wanted since we lost our old system. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Home Security
Reviews.Author: Sameul
Reviews.Content: Read all the reviews and listened to my son who is a Simplisafe customer and decided to buy and install it myself. So easy, installed in less than an hour.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: alex prizont
Reviews.Content: I was looking for enexpencieve and efficiant security system and this one does it all. Eazy to install, no technitian needed, i am on the puls. So, i would recommend it to all my friends. Thanks for your service. Alex.P.S. I need couple more of window signs that i have your security in my home. Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for renters
Reviews.Author: Charles Ibis
Reviews.Content: I was pleased to finally find a security monitoring company with no contract.  All the big alarm companies that I contacted wanted a 3 year contract and would only work with the home owner. Their loss. This is an excellent system and it is priced perfectly for the rental market.Another good aspect of this is the built in communication with their home office. I'm not sure which carrier they are using but it works well for me in the Los Angeles area and I don't have to pay for a dedicated mobile phone number or have a land line for the alarm system (big savings). Since it is wireless, if the alarm goes off, the message has already gone out before an intruder has a chance to disable the unit.The range is good. I was able to set up an entry sensor in a back yard finished garage and it works fine with the base station in the main house.So far so good. I've had the unit for only a month but as far as I can tell, this is a good value.

Reviews.Title: So easy to install
Reviews.Author: Marvin L. Reeves
Reviews.Content: I just installed my SimpliSafe system, it was so simple to do, I would recommend it to anyone who wants the added protection for their home, I also have a shop which is located about 500 feet from my home and will order another system for it as well. I had a prior system for my home but it was wired in and when I had some windows replaced all the wires were cut, but with SimpiSafe wireless I will never have that issue again.Marvin Reeves, London, KY.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe simpli-great so far!
Reviews.Author: DavidK
Reviews.Content: I would have given SimpliSafe 5 stars, but I am a new user with only a week under my belt. So far the system has been simple, intuitive, easy to install, and easy to interact with remotely. I have not had any reason yet to alert the remote center, but if they are as helpful as the online technical support, SimpliSafe will have my five star recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: Very easy and quick installation. Directions for installation and monitoring set up easy to follow and well done. The price, of course, is right. A most excellent value for the system and monitoring.

Reviews.Title: So easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Blake Savidge
Reviews.Content: So far so good! we have had ours up and running for a couple of weeks now and we like it.So easy to install and the price is very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Watch out ADT, Ackerman and everyone else.....
Reviews.Author: Dennis Baker
Reviews.Content: Wow....I've never seen a system so easy to set up.
