I questioned whether or not I'd have any problems with the placement of my motion sensors, but after I activated the base and put it in test mode, I walked past each motion sensor and got a working conformation on each one the very first time.I will definitely be adding to this system as I develop more areas of my business and I HIGHLY recommend this system and will recommend it to all my friends.Thanks to everyone at SimpliSafe for all you do!

Reviews.Title: Monitoring service needs to report true and false alarms
Reviews.Author: Stephen B Woodward
Reviews.Content: Second time I've purchased a Home Security System for one of our properties and really find it what I want.But I have a couple of things I'd like to add. (1)  The Sensor tape twice has come undone in two separate properties and triggered alerts. Doesn't seem to adhere to metal doors. Just this Sunday at 3 AM I drove 30 miles one way to meet the police to see what happened.  Embarrassing and didn't enjoy the 60 mile round trip in the middle of the night only to find it was a false alarm due to the tape coming loose and to be chided by the police.(2) Connected to (1) above, the monitoring service only lets you know if there was a legitimate break in, not if there was a false alarm, as in the case Sunday morning.  Otherwise you sit, wait and hope that there was no problem for an hour until you guess that the police didn't call the monitoring service back and that it must have been a false alarm.I'll solve this problem by going to the police substation and leaving my telephone number with them.  But seems to me, if possible, that the both true and false alarms would be worth monitoring immediately. The monitoring service's "If I don't call you back..." leaves you in limbo for an undefined time.

Reviews.Title: IT'S A GREAT SYSTEM AND VERY SIMPLE TO INSTALL
Reviews.Author: Kathryn K Worz
Reviews.Content: SIMPLISAFE HAS THOUGHT OF ALMOST EVERYTHING TO MAKE THEIR SYSTEM VERY EASY TO INSTALL AND OPERATE.  I AM VERY PLEASED SO FAR.

Reviews.Title: Why the SimpliSafe System?  Why Not the SimpliSafe System!  It makes sense!
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: It was just what I needed and didn't cost a fortune, didn't require a contract, and the people were helpful when needed.  The equipment was easy to install and the directions were clear.  Wireless is the way to go.  Would highly recommend the Simplisafe Security System!  It's definitely worth checking out!  Will undoubtedly add more sensors as I get used to the system.  Plus, the Dashboard is really cool as it keeps you aware of what's going on in your house even if you're not there.

Reviews.Title: New User
Reviews.Author: Ken Hopkin
Reviews.Content: Just installed the system, so far, no problems, was a snap to set up. If I encounter any issues, I will report them.Made one call to tech support, am pleased with response.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We had our system up and running in no time with no calls on how to set it up.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: So far, excellent...
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I was skeptical when ordering the Simplisafe system. However after receiving the box, components made a good quality impression, all components had been pre-programmed and installing the system is as easy as claimed. Within 2 hours all was running and the base station was connected and registered with the monitoring service with a very automated verification process. The 72 hour trial period went by with not a single false alarm. I am considering to purchase a few more sensors which are easy to add. Minor concerns so far: 1) I have not so good experience with the brand of the batteries that come with all components; I would be very surprised to get the claimed four years of use out of them and expect an expensive battery exchange much earlier 2) I would prefer having an LED in each motion sensor to indicate sensor response (the build in test mode with acoustic feedback is a bit cumbersome). I recommend to buy and additional UPS backup power supply as used for PCs to extend operation during prolonged power outages.

Reviews.Title: It's everything they say it is!
Reviews.Author: Gerald T. Darnell
Reviews.Content: Excellent system, good price, great customer support, easy to install and operate. Far superior to my old hardwired system, and I can ditch the landline!

Reviews.Title: Delivered as promised and easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: mp0i
Reviews.Content: System was delivered as promised although the box was smashed pretty good.  All of the components were boxed individually inside so there was no damage.  The system went in easily.  The cell reception around my community is spotty but it appears to be getting a monitoring signal out.  The front yard sign is weak and I wonder about its longterm performance once it has been out in the weather, but oh well.  Initially,  I had some problems with the 105 dB siren working properly but once I actually read the directions I programmed it with the system and it worked fine.  A  separate instruction in the manual might be helpful.  It was only after I was trying to solve the problem that I found the single sheet of programming instructions in the separate siren box.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I purchased the Simlpisafe system
Reviews.Author: Andrew Vanderhegghen
Reviews.Content: I purchased Simplisafe after searching on line for the ratings of several others, the most appealing portion of your system is it is self installed and no wiring required, I did not want holes drilled into walls or having to 'fish' wires (or have anyone else do that). After initial set up I made a little mistake and could not get the menu to come up again to install my security code number, after calling your tech number I got the information I needed, reset the system and everything is working great.I especially  like the user friendly installation, the instructions, and the sleekness of the entire system, I have informed several of my friends about Simplisafe and they are interested. Also the cost for the system and the ability to customize and add on additional sensors is a big plus, overall I would recommend your system to anyone I know, they would enjoy the peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: The wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just got the system installed works great. Trying to get used to it. I like the notifications and power outage protection. Wish it had a camera syste.

Reviews.Title: One week in and happy!
Reviews.Author: tacoma1
Reviews.Content: This system was very easy to install and setup. The online Customer Service has been great and prompt. So far all is good and I would recommend this product. Hopefully the well behaved system will continue for a long time. Our system is only a standalone at the moment, so i cannot comment on the remote monitoring features.

Reviews.Title: Purchased Simplisafe package
Reviews.Author: Teresa Egan
Reviews.Content: Excellent package, very easy to install. All my questions were answered quickly and instructions were very easy to follow. We are very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 is fabulous1
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: The system is very easy to install. It took me 40 min as I had a lot of sensors. The siren is extremely loud.AND, if you move, you can take it with you. Monthly monitoring is not mandatory! Just a great system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe  is "simply easy"
Reviews.Author: janet
Reviews.Content: We purchased this system as it is extremely easy to install, has a variety of packages and/or pieces to choose from, and the 24/7 monitoring is reasonably priced. You can install and set up in less than 30 minutes! Love the keychain remote too.

Reviews.Title: Best system to set up, install and travel in security knowing they are protecting your home
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm in Canada and the system works here (except the cellular connection), it was simple to install, even easier to set up and when you want to make changes, insert your keyfob into your laptop, make the changes and then insert into the base station...it really does not get any easier.

Reviews.Title: Great value and a really good alarm system
Reviews.Author: David Yoder
Reviews.Content: I have been using SimpliSafe for about 90 days now and moved to it from a Guardian System that I had installed in 2007.  The installation of the system is so simple and is less obtrusive than my old alarm system was as I did have some wired devices.  I like SimpliSafe because they don't nickle and dime you for everything like a traditional alarm company will.  I have added a monitored smoke detector to my system which would have cost quite a bit to add with Guardian.My only real complaint w/ this system is that the Home mode doesn't allow for the addition of an exit delay.  There is a workaround to this (open the door before pressing Home) but it seems like an oversight that should be corrected.  I imagine that a lot of people would like to arm their system and exit w/ the motion detector disabled (leaving for work while wife and kids are still at home).ProsCost- $15/month basic monitoring for a cellular alarm (I was paying $30/month + $25/month for a phone line)Easy do-it-yourself installation and ability to add new componentsWireless- you can take it with you if you moveNo contracts or commitmentsConsSiren in base station isn't as loud as I would like- they have an additional siren you can addKeypad- buttons are too small and close togetherHome mode- see aboveAnyone that is thinking about getting a home alarm I highly recommend that you evaluate this system.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised.
Reviews.Author: sws763
Reviews.Content: I've just had it for 1 week and it appears to work as advertised. I used the screws to secure the sensors but used the adhesive tape for the magnets on the doors. I had to make one call to support since the wireless cellular connection didn't appear to connect. I talked to customer service, they had me reset the base station and all was well.It is simple to install and operate. The added comfort level of having the system is worth the initial price and small monthly fee.

Reviews.Title: Too early to tell
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Contey
Reviews.Content: We really haven't tested the system and ho[e we never have to.It was easy to set up but we couldn't get the USB  files to run.  They would download but wouldn't open.  The Customer Service folks tried but so far no luck.Price was good, installation simple. all-in-all good.Bob c

Reviews.Title: Clear and simple
Reviews.Author: Donald Furness
Reviews.Content: Very simple to install and operate. Offers protection at a reasonable price. I had some trouble locating a spot for base with contact to center and help by phone is first class

Reviews.Title: Simple is right
Reviews.Author: smars03
Reviews.Content: As a basic home security system, this would be hard to beat. The purchase price was reasonable. Installation was easy (very easy). Setup and testing was straight forward and the $14.99/ month to monitor is the best price I've seen. If the batteries last for the 5 years they promise, the SimpliSafe system is a definite winner.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Linda Verseman
Reviews.Content: Installs very  easily. Works great and easy to turn on. May need additional contacts. But great for a starter system.

Reviews.Title: Easy and effective
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It can't get any easier than this. And it was perfect for our rental, since we were only going to be in our home temporarily and then purchase again. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Shipping and customer service
Reviews.Author: JT Tortorelli
Reviews.Content: Purchased this unit 10 days ago and received it in less than 5 days from placement of order -- Customer service from this company so far has been beyond expectations -- They even contacted me today since I hadn't called to insure I had no questions on the install -- will be installing in a day or so -- if the system works anywhere close to the people that work for this company I will be an extremely happy customer...

Reviews.Title: 2nd System
Reviews.Author: William Rosswurm
Reviews.Content: I have a residence and a vacation getaway.  I bought one system 6 months ago to see if the Simplisafe system would work to my satisfaction. As a result of it working so well, its flexibility, and the expert monitor/dispatch, I just installed the 2nd system at my vacation getaway.Both systems were very easy to install, adding and removing sensors were a breeze, and testing the system is very easy.  I like the fact that I don't have to enter into a long term contract AND that I only have to pay $14.99 for professional monitoring.Last week at the getaway, I noticed on my internet report that the alarm was not talking to the dispatcher, I emailed tech support and they responded within one hour with the solution in easy to understand languageI have added smoke detectors onto both systems and now I get a discount on my home owners insurance!I am very happy with both of my systems and will definitely recommend Simplisafe to all of my friends.WR

Reviews.Title: Simply the best
Reviews.Author: Steven Iocco
Reviews.Content: The system is everything as advertised. Less than 60 Minutes and completely installed and fully functional. Would highly recommend this system to anyone

Reviews.Title: Extremely Easy to Install...
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mulhern
Reviews.Content: We wanted an alarm system that was flexible...didn't want to get involved in complicated operation...and maintenance.  This kit was perfect for our needs.  It was so easy to install and operates with options that the consumer can choose.  The only reason we give it four stars is that the base unit siren isn't as loud as we had expected.  You can purchase a separate siren that is supposedly extremely loud, but we haven't done so yet.Another point that we found interesting...we called the main operations number with a few questions prior to purchase.  While the person on the other end answered our questions, he was distracted by work he was doing on the computer while we spoke.  He didn't offer to take our order right then and there....seemed a bit strange to me since most customer service reps are anxious to help the customer in every way.  We felt that we interupted other business.  We ordered online and the unit came very well packaged and was working in our home within an hour.  So far...so good.  We would recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Product was as advertised
Reviews.Author: Carl M Malsack
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup - the system literally walks you through the process.  SimpliSafe is very responsive to questions - for peace of mind you can't beat this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Daniel Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Ease of purchase, installation,activation.  Everything went smoothly and I am satisfied with everything.  Customer service has been very helpful with all my questions and has offered tips on installation and operation of the system.

Reviews.Title: A Good Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Robert M Doyle
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality of all components. Very easy to setup. Easy to change component locations.No contract and the ability to change your plan at anytime is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package
Reviews.Author: Bradley Weakly
Reviews.Content: Like the no contract plans... like the cellular service... like the simplicity and flexibility... would really love a camera option!

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, use and to save $$$
Reviews.Author: Steven McArthur
Reviews.Content: I previously used a monitored alarm company where I had been a customer for 10+ years.  My rate was around $28/ month plus the cost of a phone line (~$20 per month).  By switching to SimpliSafe, I was able to save over $30/ month.  The setup was easy and was complete in about 30 - 40 mins.  We upgraded and purchased a second keypad, extra door sensors and an extra motion sensor.  All components came preprogrammed into the base unit.  It was literally "plug and play."I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Great System!
Reviews.Author: M. VOEKS "Just a regular person"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system to replace my existing ADT system that I had in place for several years.  The design and functionality of the Simplisafe system is superb.  I prefer it to the ADT system in convenience and appearance.The setup of the system is simple and straightforward and modifications are a breeze.The price and ongoing cost of service for the Simplisafe2 monitoring program is so much lower than the basic ADT service that the difference will pay for the system hardware in less than a year.  On top of that I have more monitors than I did with ADT.  And if I add more monitors (like the glass break sensor which they need to get to market... hint) it won't add to my monthly bill to have them.

Reviews.Title: A great system from ordering to installation to activation
Reviews.Author: Gerry Hebert
Reviews.Content: A very simple & easy way to get a security system installed.  Taking my time, I had everything done in an hour.  Everything worked.  The instruction USB even made the process enjoyable.  The whole process from order to delivery to install to activation was well thought out with the customers' "do it yourself" guidance process cannot be better, in my opinion.Gerry

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: What a customizable solution.  Pick the hardware you want, peel and stick and go.  Highly recommend to anyone looking for a home alarm system without the salesman involvement.

Reviews.Title: Works, super simple, component quality a little low.
Reviews.Author: Blake Roberts
Reviews.Content: Works great, easy setup. Dog safe motion detectors aren't. Overall, very nice and  inexpensive alarm solution. Wish the door/window switches were smaller.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is a great system!
Reviews.Author: Plugger#1 "Jim"
Reviews.Content: An easy to self-install system. Quality products. A super quick response from the monitoring group, which has a very reasonable monthly fee. SimpliSafe Tech Support are knowledgeable,helpful and quick to respond. I recommend SimpliSafe to anyone wanting a great and easy to install system.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup
Reviews.Author: CL
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and does what it says.  Only 2 weeks in but hopefully never need to be called.  I might get the extra siren and shut off the base siren so it won't be easily found.  Siren from the base isn't too loud anyways....

Reviews.Title: as adverised!
Reviews.Author: terry l. jorgensen
Reviews.Content: Product  completely as advertised.  Works very well and is simple to install.  Just as good as the much more expensive dealer installed systems.

Reviews.Title: Very easy and love no contract
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I installed myself, love that I can manage from my computer.  Monthly monitoring rate is very economical with no contract.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Kelley K. Pactwa
Reviews.Content: I installed the SimpliSafe system about 1 week ago and it has been great so far. Very easy to install using either the double sided tape or the screws provided. Everything came with the batteries already in each device. The sensors have a 2 inch give, so there was no issue on my beveled door casing. Easy to follow instructions, no false alarms, and you can change your settings using your computer. It's great! I have not used the monitoring as of yet, but I am considering it.

Reviews.Title: simplisafe is great
Reviews.Author: Terri Marlett
Reviews.Content: It is the simplicity that makes this the most elegant system ever.  Great to not be tied to horrible monitoring companies with old school business models, sensors, technicians etc.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLI WONDERFUL/ simplisafe
Reviews.Author: metanoia
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe is just as advertised.Easy to install, easy to operate.Time to install was 20 minutes. The wireless feature makes is very easy to insall

Reviews.Title: Wonderful System! Wonderful Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: CCC
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with the Simplisafe Wireless Home Security System that we installed.  When we were installing and had any questions, we called customer service and they "walked" us through every thing we needed to do.  We could not have been happier (we should have called them earlier instead of trying to figure it out ourselves :-)

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe 2
Reviews.Author: Griz
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe Home Security System did everything as advertised. The instructions were very easy to follow, we installed the System in about 30 minutes. The 3 day test mode worked without any issues. We tested and retested the door/window sensors and motion detectors. Again, it all worked as advertised with absolutely no problems. Since we went "live" everything has worked perfectly and there have been no false positives (even during some recent storms). I looked at my online log and noted the system is tested once a week which gives me added confidence. The best feature is having a monitored alarm for approximately $15/month, especially when compared to what some of my friends are paying. I urge anyone who buys the system to read the reviews. There is some good info in some of the reviews.

Reviews.Title: My Second Simplisafe System
Reviews.Author: Don R
Reviews.Content: I have just purchased my second Simplisafe system for a second home we purchased over the summer. I will be installing it at the end of the month. The first I installed in our main residence because we were going to be away for three months. The system is very easy to install, and works flawlessly. While we do not live in a 'high crime' area, we have been burglarized twice in the past. I would recommend this system to anyone- not just because of the price of the system and activation- but because it will protect you.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Security System
Reviews.Author: James S. Berish Jr.
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive security system for my small business and decided to try the SimpliSafe system. Ordering was easy, product came quickly, and installation was easy and took about an hour. Decided to try the stand alone system initially, may add monitoring at a later date. Considering getting a larger monitored SimpliSafe system for our home.

Reviews.Title: Simple Home Alarm System
Reviews.Author: M. Savell "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I ordered SimpliSafe based on a Dave Ramsey recommendation.  I wanted something easy to use,  Something that is wireless and battery operated.  Something that deter and will utilize the police if needed.  Set up has been extremely easy and the company checked in with me right away to see if I needed anything.

Reviews.Title: simplisafe
Reviews.Author: happyson
Reviews.Content: I bought this product online. It came after several days. It is easy to setup the system. And the monthly fee is cheap. Just one thing is that the alarm voice is little bit smaller than I expect. In general, I will recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Painless to install! This is the real deal in wireless security.
Reviews.Author: rayaboomboom
Reviews.Content: I have owned several residential and business alarms systems from the 70's to now. None of my previous systems were wireless and required running numerous wires back to the control panel. When the alarm sounded neighbors did not call the police until it became annoying, 30 minutes or more. When I asked why they didn't call they said they thought someone else would have, so no one did. Now, with the affordable cellular technology in this system I have a guaranteed response at a low price. This company had the least expensive central station monitoring I could find and no long term contract.

Reviews.Title: Easy, affordable, and works!  Quality product!
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: Easy, affordable, and works!  Quality product!After researching options for quality of products, price, and contracts, we decided to go with SimpliSafe and glad we did.1.  It is affordable with no contracts to sign and2.  It is easy to install (no wiring) and you can opt for additional motion sensors, door sensors, louder alarm, etc.3.  Customer service is courteous and answers calls within 5 minutes4.  No phone line needed (the tower has a "built-in cell phone" so intruders thinking they can cut outside phone lines are out of luckAdvise would be:  the video shown on their website has the outdoor (4 times louder) than the cell tower; so the sound you hear is that, not the tower.  When ordering the products, if you want the louder sound, make sure you have that on your order.  We didn't know that and have since ordered it; it was easy; picked up the phone and ordered it.also, they give VETS a free month of monitoring :)  Thank you for recognizing our VETS!One more thing; if you order the "yard signs" they do not come with the ground stakes (or poles) but you can buy one cheap at a Home Depot, Lowes, etc.That's it, keep life simple, order SimpliSafe!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Experience
Reviews.Author: Unkown
Reviews.Content: I have been so happy with my Simplisafe alarm.  The alarm works terrific and has met my needs in every way. More importantly the customer service at Simplisafe is terrific. Anytime I have had a question, need technical help, or a resolution to a problem, they are right there to help in a very timely manner. They are professional, kind, knowledgeable and prompt. I have especially had great service from Tara. I would recommend Simplisafe to anyone. The Customer Service cant be beat!!! Its a great product with great people to stand behind it!

Reviews.Title: Great Security System
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe Security system was recommended by friends and Dave Harvey, of course.  I found the ordering process very easy to navigate, the product arrived timely and was extremely easy to install.  A ladder, and about 45 minutes and my house was secure!  I like the simplicity of commands, the ability to use remote keychain fobs to arm and disarm the system.  Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Lottie O'Neal
Reviews.Content: It was extremely easy to install, truly installs in about 5-10 minutes. I have had it about a month. It is sooo easy to use and I feel safe with it set to home. I purchased it for my safety really and not to much to protect my stuff. So I got the panic button and keep it at my bedside. I love the key chain remote. It shipped fast, which was important to me since I decided i needed it when I divorced, so I needed it immediately. So far I am Super pleased with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone hunting an affordable system. Also excited about the fact that it will move with me when I decide I need to move!! Perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and manage
Reviews.Author: Zener
Reviews.Content: I really like the fact that I can install this system in 20 minutes or less and manage it myself on-line.  I own two systems now and manage both from a web browser.  Thankfully we haven't had to rely on the system yet but I'm confident that when the time comes, we have one of the best systems in place.  I especially like the panic buttons that I can place where I want them and not where the company thinks I need them.  I also like the customizable entry sensors that I can program to alert me text only when one is breached and not set off the alarm.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, works well, Great value!
Reviews.Author: matty "M"
Reviews.Content: I setup my system in around an hour, most of which was me simply deciding the best place to locate sensors for aesthetics. The system installed and setup with ease and works great. I love being able to arm the system from my phone and having an easily expandable system.

Reviews.Title: I have been considering and researching SimpliSafe for a few months now. I finally purchased and it is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: RevRon
Reviews.Content: SimpliSafe is so easy to install. I just figured out where everything would go and then got started. I'm a perfectionist and so it took me a little longer. About 45 minutes. I love it and it truly does the job of keeping my home safe. I love being able to control it with my iPhone app and I put the "tower" in my bedroom and what a great night light as well as knowing my alarm is set. I recommend it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Scott D. Rader
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  The wireless did not work at first.  I called support and they sent out a different module quickly.  Everything is working nicely now.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money!
Reviews.Author: Ernie D
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 4 because they don't have glass break sensors available and I need them.It was easy to install also.Just got finished with the practice mode and no false alarms with the motion sensors and the pets.Happy about that!

Reviews.Title: very anxious
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: hi love the system new customer but when I go to add my montering ordering service on online computer it says tower from serial numbernot recognize d  I need to get my monitoring hook up asap!!

Reviews.Title: Simpli Simple & Safe
Reviews.Author: RAYMOND LONG
Reviews.Content: The produdct was as described. Very inexpensive, easy to set up and I was impressed with the quality and the the monitoring capabilities.

Reviews.Title: This is a great system.
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I use this system in my office also. The install is so simple and yet it cover all the areas that a system costing thousands of dollars for equipment and installation. The monitoring is so economical and no contract.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System- Elite Package
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at how easy the installation was, just like the video said.  I attached the extra siren outside my home and it is exceptionally loud!  I recommend anyone who read this to buy this product.  It's better to be Simplisafe than sorry!

Reviews.Title: Excellent - Simple, effective and cost efficient
Reviews.Author: Chris Gallagher "Gallagher"
Reviews.Content: Excellent!Our last security system was a self install, wireless system that called our cell phones when the alarm was tripped. After 8 years with that system, I tried Simplisafe after hearing them endorsed by national radio personalities. I did my research and purchased the one best suited for my home and added a couple more sensors as well.Installation:The Simplisafe system arrived in one box with very simple instructions. Since is is wireless, you put the sensors wherever you want them with ease. The cellular base can be put anywhere you have an outlet, as opposed to our old system that have to have a land line. The installation took less than an hour.Service:The Simplisafe services is great. The ability to have no contracts, no commitments and the fact you own the equipment is the selling point for me. You can upgrade your service and downgrade your service at any time. The plans start at $14.99 a month, then $19.99 a month and lastly, $24.99 a month.Features:The system features are easy to understand, but the best feature is the mobile app. You can monitor your system from your location (as long as you have cell or wifi service). The ability to provide 4 additional pins for children or others is a great feature to use.Depending on your plan, the service will send you a text message and/or email when the alarm is armed or disarmed.Overall Views:Overall, the Simplisafe system is an excellent choice for our family. The set-up is simple (as the name says, Simplisafe) and the cost is excellent. I have already recommended this system to several people and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: Great product/company
Reviews.Author: MW
Reviews.Content: We tried one of these about six months ago and it would not connect.  SimpliSafe bent over backwards to get it to connect, but there just was not enough signal from T-Mobile at our home.  We sent it back for a full refund.  At that time they told me they were working on getting set up with other carriers.Fast forward to last week.  I was writing a theft report for my job as an insurance adjuster.  I mentioned that the claimant did not have an alarm, but has added one since their home was broken into (too late now!).  It reminded me to call and ask SimpliSafe if they had set up any new carriers for their cell based systems.  They told me they now had Verizon.  Since I was calling on a Verizon phone, I knew that would work, so I signed up.We installed the system and it works great now.Thanks SimpliSafe!

Reviews.Title: Quality equipment EASY INSTALL
Reviews.Author: MasterMechanic
Reviews.Content: I ADDED MORE SENSORS TO ORDER BY SCROLLING TO BOTTOM. System installed fairly easy, all components sensors keypads were pre installed on system as soon as battery is activated on each sensor the system acknowledged it.Well made electronics easy to attach or move to best location after testing system.Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package

Reviews.Title: The best security system out there for the money!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money with ADT, Guardian, etc. This is a quality security system at a great price.  Wireless cellular is the way to go.  Wired systems are going the way of the Dodo bird.  I installed the entire system in 20 min.  The base station talks you through the entire install.  Very easy.  Customer support is fantastic, and for $15 per month you just can't beat SimpliSafe.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Nice Easy to Use System
Reviews.Author: Kevin Wilson "Kevin Wilson"
Reviews.Content: I considered local alarm companies, but their online reviews were not so good. Simplisafe let me pick the equipment I wanted without some high-pressure salesman sitting in the room with me. I was able to fully protect my house for about $700. I appreciate the connected smoke detector, the water line break sensor, and the freeze sensor.  All of those were nice extras.  the system was easy to install and set up.  I opted for the enhanced monitoring which allows you to turn the system on and off from your iPhone or Android.  I liked the system so much, I bought a second system for a relative.  I've called their tech support line a couple of times and the agents have been very helpful and pleasant.  I highly recommend this product and service.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is a good value
Reviews.Author: countryboy
Reviews.Content: Ordering was simple and delivery was quick and complete. Everything arrived as described. Installation was very easy. The components all appear to be very well made. System setup and customization using the keychain remote USB is a snap. I have had my system over a month now and have had no problems. I am subscribed to the $15 per month monitoring service and it does work. I would recommend this company and product.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - all the features at very low cost
Reviews.Author: R C C
Reviews.Content: I needed a security system for an apartment with one entry door and was shocked at the cost of a "Starter System" from all of the major brands.  If you don't want to sign up for 3 years of monitoring - it is $450 for the system.SimpliSafe looked like a great alternative at $225 and it is.Everything shipped as and when promised, the instructions were very easy to follow and in 30 minutes I was installed and operational.  These guys thought of everything  including printing an alarm permit registration from my local police department and putting it in the box with the other instructions.  After monitoring was set up, it printed a certificate for my insurance company.  Wow - this was easy and the monthly monitoring is the best value in the indusrty.I guess the company can really save money when there is no salesman or installer to pay.  They pass this on to the consumer in the form of lower pricing.

Reviews.Title: Simplysafe is so easy to install and works great!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: We had many obstacles in order to get a security system into our home. We live in a remote area, so we have limited cellular reception. We also have no landline phone service. Our home is concrete block with vaulted ceilings which limited the other companies from getting wires to all of the doors and window openings in the home. We also have a detached garage that is 100 feet from the main home that needed security. After searching for a month for a security system for our home, SimplySafe was the perfect asnwer to all of our problems. We installed it ourselves in less than an hour. SimplySafe was the answer to all of our obstacles with no wires, no home phone line and it's working perfectly. Thank's SimplySafe for making a great and affordable product.

Reviews.Title: Could not be easier
Reviews.Author: Margaret Stouder
Reviews.Content: It really is true!Installation took me only about 20 minutes.When I needed a clarification after installing, the support people cold not have been more polite or helpful.This is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Justin B
Reviews.Content: I have only had the system installed for 7 days. But everything has been perfect so far. Install took about two hours, but that was because I order a lot of extra sensors. I ordered the Verizon unit which seems to get a perfect signal.

Reviews.Title: Immediate Response!
Reviews.Author: scottburden
Reviews.Content: So impressed! We've had SimpliSafe for almost two years, and I inadvertently set off our alarm yesterday - long story short, the police were dispatched and arrived at our house within 5 minutes. It is great to know that if the time comes when we truly need it, your service will get the good guys to our house very quickly! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: L. Bond
Reviews.Content: Easily installed. Will prob need more components but for a small home, affordable. Larger home you may want to go traditional. 15$: more with free installation may be less money Individual components are pretty pricey

Reviews.Title: No other alarm compares.
Reviews.Author: alien gazer "Joe"
Reviews.Content: This is a great alarm system and monitoring system. Have one at our beach house and another at our home.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Small Business Owner "NR Advocate"
Reviews.Content: We are a Property Management company. This product is great and does everything it should. It is easy to install and uninstall We put a system in all our vacant houses until they are rented or sold. We have not had a break in or loss from theft since we started using this product (we had 6 separate thefts in 2010 prior to purchasing this system. [...]

Reviews.Title: Good System
Reviews.Author: PATOLEAS
Reviews.Content: This is a very easy to setup system, every component works perfectlyfrom the first setup, I only had it for a week, I hope it keeps workingin the feture.The only problem is that since my house is a 2 story and 2800 SQ FTI can not hear the keypad or base unit unless I am near them.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ronald Wyllins
Reviews.Content: Best for the money and easy to set up !  Plus SimpliSafe only charges 14.99 for monthly monitoring. Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: tony Harding
Reviews.Content: Easy install great service had to order more sensors and more sign costumer support was great they even threw in a free sign

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Brian Dial
Reviews.Content: Loving it so far.  All the components were very easy to install and set up and I love the idea of being able to purchase additional components to expand the system.After dealing with the 3-letter alarm company that starts with an "A", I was ready for a system that I could have whatever I wanted, with a very, very reasonable monitoring fee of $14.99/month, with NO CONTRACT!

Reviews.Title: Works Great for me.
Reviews.Author: OneTreeMore
Reviews.Content: Very quick shipping, easy to install.  When the alarm goes off Simplisafe calls within minutes to verify the situation.  I am very satisfied because I now have complete control of my alarm system when I am away by using a smart phone.  Thank you Simplisafe for offering a fine product that does what it is suppose to do for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Home security is simple to install, and efficient in all respects
Reviews.Author: Donald Jandreau
Reviews.Content: I purchased the simplisafe2 wireless home security system on line, and added a few extra sensors and an additional siren. The price is competitive, and shipping was free. It arrived a couple of days later, and my wife and I began the installation. With a total of 15 sensors, outside siren, and a motion detector, we were completely installed in about one and a half hours! We tested the system according to the instruction, and signed up for the system to be monitored. The cost of monitoring was less than anyone else offered. We feel safe and secure with our new system in place. Our home is left vacant for a few months in the winter, and before installing the security system, we worried all the time we were gone. Thank you for offering this wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: My experience with Simpisafe
Reviews.Author: Royce
Reviews.Content: Although I am still learning about the system, I am amazed at the thought and planning that went into the design of something that is so complicated. Also, the patience of the people that are there to help is the greatest.  My own experience is a good example.  I was on hold for a very, very long time when Titus took my call and I was not in the best mood and didn't hide it. He calmed me down and helped me through all my problems explaining each and every solution.  I now have a pretty good idea of how your security system works and why.  Nobody has broken into my house yet but I know what will happen when they do.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I have tried other self install security systems in the past. Each one presented a different set of problems. The Simplisafe system was perfect from the start. System arrived quickly. Directions were excellent. Installation was as easy as advertised. I had one minor question and the customer service was also excellent. I have already recommended to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Brughelli
Reviews.Content: After installing your product and completing the setup, I find your system to be easy to install and the instructions to be simple and direct. Having had other systems they don't compare to SimpliSafe's ease of function.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service! Do feel safe buying from SimpliSafe.
Reviews.Author: Samantha Fiorra
Reviews.Content: Do feel safe buying from this company. SimpliSafe shipped the equipment fast, I read the instructions and it is a real simple installation and everything looks real modern and cool, much cooler looking than ADT's equipment. For no reasons having to do with SimpliSafe or the great deal they offer, I did wish to return it. I sat on doing this for way too long until I finally called them and asked to return the product and hopefully get a refund. No problems at all, they sent me a return shipping label via email while we were on the phone and they are going to give me a full refund. Thanks so much SimpliSafe! I hope this review makes at least 10 people feel secure in purchasing your product. Thanks for your generous business practices!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: WARREN L. POST
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the system.  The ease to install and set up is amazing!  The fact that you need no contract is even better.  I would recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: If you need an alarm..Look NO Further
Reviews.Content: I was burglarized 07/30/13. I put off getting an alarm until I needed one, DUMB??....you bet. "closing the gate after the horse is gone". I looked at every kind of an alarm system a person could get and sure enough, I always ended up back at Simplisafe. Believe what you read or download on their website. I did not get the security phone line yet. What I did is got the alarm, just to get started. I guess you might call it ala cart, get what you need. Just purchase the beginning alarm and go from there. If you need help, don't be afraid to call. I think I talked with everyone in purchasing and service department. Not one or two where nice but everyone helped me from logging on line support, to ordering. I was never hurried or pressured. In fact I ordered another set-up for another home and it too was ala cart. You can do it now or later but once you have had your life opened to a low-life you will do it then. I had no idea what a pain it would be getting numbers, prices, and quotes for items that were lost, for the insurance company. What I lost would have bought ten or more Simplisafe Alarms, that's not counting running here and there, on the phone with glass company's, police, insurance, jewelers, coin collector's, gun dealers etc.. Make your choice, NOW or wait....I WAITED!!!!!! TOO LATE, the horse is gone but I am ready for the next intruder. You can take that to the bank.

Reviews.Title: Minor issues
Reviews.Author: ovtim
Reviews.Content: Been using system about a year and two issues so far.  Keypad is way too quiet.  Should be at least doubled in volume.  The second issue is the base station siren wouldn't even scare a mouse.  Not very loud at all.  Otherwise the system works well and has a lot of nice features.

Reviews.Title: Alarm
Reviews.Author: DS
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised just waiting on permit to start monitoring, love the keychain remote, love just pushing a button and leaving. Little concerned the way technology is and this being a wireless system and the bad guys may already have a way to defeat the systemBest Regards, Don

Reviews.Title: Really impressed
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy and quick.  The online dashboard and Android app gives me a peace of mind knowing I can check on things any time of the day (or night).  And it was so affordable!  I would recommend this system to anyone I know.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Blluefrog
Reviews.Content: Easy to install!  Took maybe 30minutes.  Very easy to understand instructions.  Worked perfectly right out of the box.  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe2 Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Tim Smith
Reviews.Content: Very impressed so far! Easy installation! So simple to setup. Best feature is not having to sign a 3 year contract. I have already expanded my system with more sensors which is so easy to do! I would highly recommend the SimpliSafe system. Don't get locked into a contract when this system is available!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: J. Buck
Reviews.Content: The whole system was very easy to set up and activate. Using the adhesive, you can put the sensors anywhere in the house. The devices also come with screws if you would rather use that method. There are no contracts, which I really like since I got burned by a different security company some years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: CurtisServices
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system to test on a vacation home and found it to be absolutely excellent. It sets up quickly and without tools, mess or bother. I believe that they thought of everything. I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: The best system I have seen for the price
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I found it easy to install. I do have a problem with it not being to connect with the local cell service. I have tried everything. Had to go land line. 24 hour customer service would be a great help! The advertising leads you to believe you can get it all for the $15.99 monitoring.  I was surprised to see that the smart phone monitoring is extra. Not sure if that is worth the increased expense.

Reviews.Title: Secure now
Reviews.Author: Dennis D
Reviews.Content: Great product,heard about it on Glenn Beck show was as easy as described. Anyone wanting security at an affordable price should get this system.

Reviews.Title: One of the best items I have ever purchased.
Reviews.Author: Frank Cerone
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a complete alarm system with some extras for my daughter's house that she and four roommates have rented for their sophomore year away (700 miles away) at college.  We were nervous about this move for them and wanted to protect them.  Once they were moved in I handed the girls the box and had them set it up.  I installed the contacts on the windows and doors for them but they did everything else themselves and it could not have been easier.  It was absolutely the best designed and user friendly technology product of any kind that I have ever purchased.  I am in the construction business and have a close friend that is an alarm guy and he cannot come close to providing this product and service at this price.  I would highly recommend this product for anyone considering an alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Everything about this company seems great so far. My actual service just started. Everything is fairly easy to set up and I think the greatest things about this company are no contracts and the reasonable monthly rates.

Reviews.Title: Its all it says
Reviews.Author: Tom Winsor
Reviews.Content: Worked out of the box, without help.I placed motion sensors & to test, I was alone & could not get back to the receiverin time to hear it's response (got help later to do this)I have not set up the monitoring until I get permit from the police.I'm good with the set-up & It is great & just what I wantedPlus, I can move it to another location, What a plus that isTom Winsor

Reviews.Title: WOW!  So very easy to install.  I feel so secure now I may give up my missile launcher!!
Reviews.Author: Delta Dawn
Reviews.Content: I hope I never have to use it, but sure was simple to install.  Had a good laugh......after I plugged in the Control, I turned to walk away from it and heard this female voice behind me......."congratulations ........ Your security system is now.......I beat the woman's high jump record!  Never expected that.Only suggestion I have (I may have missed it, but just in case) the control needs to be installed close to the keypad so you can hear it.  That should be mentioned in the instructions.  No big deal.  It took me all of about 45 seconds to correct placement.  Is there a way to increase the sound?SimpliSafe is a wonderful company.  Great customer service.  I recommend at every opportunity.

Reviews.Title: Generally really good and easy to use
Reviews.Author: TJ in DC
Reviews.Content: We love SimpliSafe so far. My only gripe is that the sensors don't stick well to all surfaces with the adhesive pads they come with, and if they come unstuck that can cause the alarm to go off (perhaps at 1am when you're sound asleep). A little super glue easily fixes the problem, though.Overall- super easy to set up, intuitive interface for the control panel and online, and affordable!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: S. Franklin
Reviews.Content: I just LOVE  my new system! it is So easy to install and best of all, now I feel safe. this is the best item I have EVER bought and I would HIGHLY recommend it everyone! SimpliSafe is simply the BEST !

Reviews.Title: Amazing and Easy
Reviews.Author: Ju-Ju
Reviews.Content: Well,after we pulled it out of the box we were stunned at how easy it was to install. We utilized the manual and it took about an hour to install. It took us about another hour to set up our account with info that was needed. They programmed our additional purchases and it works great. The away countdown is great because everyone knows to hit the door fast and the brain is not in the box...neat idea. Alot cheaper than ADT and does the same job. If you're in an apartment grab one and live with a peace of mind! Then, when you move, snatch it up and take it with you!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: M. Park "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Highly reccomend. Easy set-up, works great. Much cheaper than the services that require a monthly fee. Definetely recommend to everybody.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: mike finley
Reviews.Content: Totally wireless. Very easy installation. Easy to use. Price was very affordable. No contact! Only $25 a month for deluxe monitoring. Adding and removing components is easy. You can take  it with you if you move.

Reviews.Title: Good, could be great
Reviews.Author: Sir K.P. Smith
Reviews.Content: This system is priced right and is simple enough to use.  It's pretty flexible.  We set it up in no time and have custom PINs for family members (so i know who disarmed the system).  My only complaints are the lack of sensors.The installation guide shows how to setup glass-break sensors, yet they don't sell them?  When I called support and said i checked the website and can't find them but the book shows how to install them I was told "we hope to have them available someday but don't currently sell them".  Suggestion: Remove them from your guide until you do actually sell them.A company rep for simplisafe (Ryan) stated on their website forums they'd have indoor cameras available in 2011.  When that came and passed they said in 2012.  Here we are more than half way through 2013 and still, no indoor cameras.  I really want indoor cameras.  Suggestion: If you don't know a date, don't give one.  Also, being off on your guess by over 3 years?  Yikes.Hopefully the introduction of indoor cameras will lead to outdoor cameras?  I'd really like to have some outdoor cameras tied to this system.

Reviews.Title: new system
Reviews.Author: gordon
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased system. It is easy to install, as advertised. A little more detail in the manual on how system functions and volume control on base station voice would be nice, but not crucial. I had a problem connecting to the monitoring service(because I live in a remote area where cell coverage is poor). But the Simplisafe support staff were very responsive and came up with an option to solve my problem.I really like the remote key and its function to link system info to computer. Also, main key pad is very user friendly. I would(will) recommend the system to friends and family.Note: I would suggest that if you live in a rural area with long response times that you consider purchasing the 105 db alarm with your system.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe self installed alarm
Reviews.Author: ChuckG
Reviews.Content: The Easy Setup Wizard provided by the Keychain Remote makes short work of installing the SimpliSafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package. Installation, Personal Settings, How to Use and Testing is accomplished in a minimum amount of time. I think it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent security system install experience
Reviews.Author: MarkF
Reviews.Content: I discovered SimpliSafe about a month ago while listening to the radio.  The low monitoring fee and no contract was why I took a look.  I was paying more than double the monitoring fee.  I ordered the system and it took about an hour to install everything.  It was very easy.  I tested each sensor and set the alarm for three practice days.  After the test, I received a call from the monitoring center very quickly.  The other company took a lot longer to call you back.  After the three test days, I was called again to notify me everything was working fine.  I wish I had done this sooner to save more money.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 alarm system
Reviews.Author: Daniel D. Lackner
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to install, comes with all the directions you might need. It took about a half hour start to finish. I like the monitoring options and the fact that you can receive a text message or email telling you of an activation.All it needs now is a wireless camera connection so you can identify a perpetrator breaking in. It could be as simple as connecting to an existing camera system.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Charles J. Jaep
Reviews.Content: I set it up, real easy and everything worked perfect. I wanted something without wires and this is it. What more could I ask.

Reviews.Title: Great Alarm System
Reviews.Author: W. Frank Cook
Reviews.Content: We have had an alarm for our home for over 25 years, and this is by far much superior.  First, we paid a bit over $2,300.00 for our first system.  The SimpliSafe system with a couple options, just over $300.00.  We love being able to go online to make any changes to our system, and then sync those changes to our control box.  It's so flexible, and easy to maintain.  The only negative is the fact the siren built into the main box isn't real loud, but the fix for that is to order the optional second siren.We would most definitely recommend the SimpliSafe system.

Reviews.Title: BEST HOME SECURITY SYSTEM EVER!!
Reviews.Author: terribaus
Reviews.Content: We are so happy with this system. Customer support was wonderful when I ran into some problems and they took care of everything with no questions asked about it no money exchanged.I researched before I committed to this system and it was the best thing I've done in a long time. Very easy install, had it all done in 3 or 4 hours! Now I feel safe!

Reviews.Title: Affordable security
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bill
Reviews.Content: This system is very easy to install...no tools needed. Just pull the adhesive strips and place on the wall. Plus the price of $14.99 per month is much cheaper than other monitored systems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome system~
Reviews.Author: Betsy Pitney
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus PackageWhat a great system for such an excellent value! Easy to install and such a secure feeling knowing we're safe. I love the key chain units. They'll make coming home much more comfortable. The 24/7 monitoring is a comfort. Best of all--home insurance discounts!! Thanks SimpliSafe! I highly recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install, a Cinch to Monitor System
Reviews.Author: KA
Reviews.Content: We were referred to SimpliSafe thanks to Dave Ramsey's endorsement.  We installed the system in about 10 minutes (base station, 4 entry units, 1 keypad, and 1 motion detector).  It was incredibly easy to set up and test.  We are paying half of what we were with ADT, and that was service without the incredible mobile access we now have.  I can literally set and unset the alarm (and so many other tasks) from my phone, ipad, office computer; where ever I am.  No longer do I have to call and notify the company when we are on our way to the airport for vacation; get to do it in 10 seconds online, but nice to know there is someone to call if we ever need it.  I cannot believe I ever signed up with the other guys.

Reviews.Title: Simpli-Save: Simple and Safe, yes!
Reviews.Author: GlixPix "GlixPix"
Reviews.Content: Delivery of the entire order was very swift. Instruction manual for installation and operations was very simple, to the point, and easily understandable for each stage of the installation. Operation is very easy; particularly, with the key-chain remote. Extra modules are easy to install and program at any time so one need not buy a complete system (meaning very elaborate) at once. Just add what seems to be needed or desired after the system is installed and working. I was able to completely cusomize my system including protection of an outlying studio building! Fourteen windows, four doors, two sirens, three motion detectors, all completely wireless and all completely installed and operating in a single day. Couldn't be easier!The monitoring services could not be more reasonable. That, among other things, is what convinced me to buy this system. Why spend thousands of dollars and be locked into iron-clad contracts when there is a much better alternative! And, if you move, take it with you - it's yours!

Reviews.Title: One peice missing
Reviews.Author: roadrunner
Reviews.Content: I like the Simpli Safe technology, and the ease of installation.The one peice missing is a glass breakage sensor.  I would like tosee a combination window sensor that would trigger the alarm on either entry, orglass breakage from the outside.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: George H.
Reviews.Content: After looking into other systems, all with much higher monthly costs, we decided to go with your system because we now own the equipment, it is a wireless system, great prices, both for the equipment and the monthly cost, and the support was fantastic. Setting up our system was easy and straight forward. We will expand our system in the near future. Thanks SimpliSafe.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: This product is very well engineered and affordable. I highly recommend it! Lots of great options and a company that stands behind their product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: IvanS
Reviews.Content: This was my second purchase of a simplisafe alarm.  I loved my first one and never had any issues with it.  I had to move and decided to leave my system to the new homeowners.  It is simply a great product that pays for itself over time.

Reviews.Title: Simpli Safe 2
Reviews.Author: Tim Hancock
Reviews.Content: This system is quite possibly the best and simplest system out there for home security. It took me 25 mins to install and test. It works perfectly and is very simple to use. Even if I had one of the "big companies'" system, I'd switch to Simplisafe2, a very inexpensive monitoring service is available and no contracts. It just doesn't get any better or easier!

Reviews.Title: I have my peace of mind back
Reviews.Author: GIdude
Reviews.Content: I installed my system and was very pleased to see that there is a Duress option for my keypad. Before purchasing this system I have been worried every night that someone, who knows I travel outside of the city a lot, might try to break in, now I have my peace of mind back and feel secure. This system looks small but it packs a punch! I have had it now for almost four hours and have already recommended to several of my friends and family members. Thank you SimpliSafe!It has now been 4 Days since my system was installed, I warned my neighbors that I would be testing it (I live in an apartment) and not to be alarmed (haha) if they hear it, the first question they all asked was "What are you afraid of?" my response was simple "Nothing, anymore thanks to SimpliSafe." Now I can hardly walk out of the door without someone asking me questions about SimpliSafe and they all want a system! I have never been so happy with a company before.When I opened the box to my system the first thing I seen was that SimpliSafe didn't have permit information regarding my city and the installation of their security system, after making a quick call to the City I learned that I wouldnt need a permit, and I called SimpliSafe to spread the word to them, I was greeted promptly and professionally, the agent I spoke with took her time to thank me for choosing them and welcomed me to the SimpliSafe Family.SimpliSafe, I am so glad I found you and soon my friends and family will be getting their own system."Alarm on, home. Enjoy having your peace of mind back."

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe alarm system
Reviews.Author: Tractor Man
Reviews.Content: I ordered the SimpliSafe Alarm system after an attempted break in at my residence. Three other neighbors were not so lucky to just have an attempted break in, some loosing thousands of dollars worth of items stolen from their garages and pole barns. I had already taken some precautions to make it harder to get in my garage doors and it seemed to work, this time. I decided to get an alarm system. I had heard the SimpliSafe system being advertised on the radio so I researched it and decided to make the purchase. Like the site says it is easy to install with no wires to run and no forced monitoring contracts. Peel and stick so no drilling or screws are needed. All my doors and windows now have sensors as well as all rooms have motion sensors. I also ordered 2 outside rated 105 decibel sirens so the whole neighborhood can hear if the alarm is tripped. My garage is not attached to the house so I was able to put a second Keypad out there along with the one in the house. Its a very modular system that is easy to add or subtract components as needed at a later date. This allows you to get a basic package and add more as you need without having to hire an installer do the installation "work". After seeing my system and how it performs, one of the robbed neighbors purchased the same system and they are happy as well. I would recommend this to anyone wanting a security system without the contracts and hassles.

Reviews.Title: The best purchase
Reviews.Author: mmhicks
Reviews.Content: We selected the SimpliSafe System from accolades heard on the radio.  What a great deal...simple to install and works great. The monitoring costs are reasonable and affordable. The peace of mind a monitored security system gives our family is priceless. Adding to the wireless system is effortless too.  You'll be very pleased with this product and service.

Reviews.Title: It just works!
Reviews.Author: Rashaan Griffith
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for an inexpensive and easy to install security system and I am very happy with Simplisafe.  I added 4 additional entry sensors to cover my first level and this was still cheaper than any other entry level self install system.  Setup and installation was a snap.  I could not be more happy with the results.  Thanks Dave Ramsey!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: snobiz
Reviews.Content: The items were shipped next day and came very quickly. I took my time installing but it was very easy and quick. Everything works including the entry to our work shop in the garage. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: Trailblazer
Reviews.Content: Well I ordered the middle tier system cause I didn't want to break 300.00 to try it out .All in all I like it I got 2 windows covered and my 2 doors , and it came with a motion sensor witch I put in the living room about 5 ft high .Theres no way if you were going to steal anything to keep from going in the living room or den witch it covers .Ive got robbed before and the big screen and x box etc. they cannot resist ,so if you go after my good stuff you will have to go within motion sensor range . I tried it out soon after I got it it took 3 min for dispacth to call after it went off so if they had to call a sheriff your looking at 5 min .Most people want hang around with the alarm blaring I'm thinking .Im sure after the 5min for the call to the cops prolly take a little while for them to get there cause from what I read its a low priority when no ones home . I'm hoping the siren will run em off . But it's alot better than nothing where they could have time too go through everything . I get text alert and e-mail alert on my phone so when I get a text I can (shoot) over there if I'm in town . But for 25 bucks a month I've got live dispacth and text alert perty cool . I'm planning on putting a siren outside for more attention when set off and prolly 7 more entry sensors . I like being able add on . Hope this helps someone forgive my spelling not a big writer .

Reviews.Title: Lives up to it's name
Reviews.Author: Dave, RN
Reviews.Content: This product lives up to it's name. Just pull out the battery strip, pull off the adhesive and mount anywhere. Nice that you can add sensors ala cart style at any time. Now they just need the ability to add cameras...

Reviews.Title: AWESOME SECURITY SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: HOPWCC
Reviews.Content: THE SYSTEM IS A GREAT ONE AND AT A GREAT PRICE. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS SECOND TO NONE!!!!! THE SYSTEM INSTALLS SEAMLESSLY AND THE APP IS JUST OUT OF THIS WORLD.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Retiree
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Easy to install and use.  In addition to the secutity of our home we are excited to have the freeze sensor and water sensor as we winter in another state.

Reviews.Title: Itbworks
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Richards
Reviews.Content: The system is very simple to install and works as . .advertised. I bought a wireless system from lowes and had to throw it away. It didn't work at all

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: Don P
Reviews.Content: An amazing product, amazing price and amazingly easy to install - read the manual and 15 minutes later it was up and running. My brother-in-law had the system installed when we visited a couple of weeks ago and I immediately ordered my own package. Now I am recommending it to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Happy Happy Happy
Reviews.Author: Glenn Farrell
Reviews.Content: System seems to do what it advertised.  About 15 minutes to read everything.  Another 15 minutes to watch the video and under 10 minutes to install it.  So far so good.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: ildefonso monteiro
Reviews.Content: Beat everyone in price and the system is great. Sensors r awesome and the key remote is my favorite item.

Reviews.Title: Not Without Issue
Reviews.Author: Kay Rice
Reviews.Content: We had a slight glitch in ordering our system, but that's what makes this review so good....Even when there was the slightest of problems it was worked out within a couple of days to our complete satisfaction.  Can't ask for more than that!  We originally purchased the system based on reviews from Clark Howard's website.  We are most please.  KRF

Reviews.Title: Jim's review of SimpliSafe.
Reviews.Author: James T. Miller
Reviews.Content: I wanted a system that had NO contract and thats what simplisafe did for me. The system took me 15 min to install,if I can do it anyone can.Jim Miller

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system
Reviews.Author: Steph
Reviews.Content: This alarm system is the best I could've bought. Perfect for my apartment. Super easy to install. Not too expensive and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: nora k.
Reviews.Content: This package is very well thought out, easy to install, easy to use, and relatively inexpensive, especially compared to traditional security systems. I like that we can install and upgrade on our own too.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe2 is a great value
Reviews.Author: anonymous-Idaho
Reviews.Content: After having ADT for over 10 years, dealing with salesmen, over priced equipment, 2 year contracts (55.00 a month) and aging equipment; I finally made the switch to SimpliSafe. Having the freedom to install your own system, and are able to add any component at anytime without needing to talk to a salesman, or get over charged for an item + install, sold it for me! I'm able to log onto my account from my Android smart phone, or computer, adjust settings, turn the alarm on/off, change pin numbers, name sensors etc. For SimpliSafe I pay 24.95 a month for all of the bells and whistles, 24 hour monitoring with NO contract. With out a doubt SimpliSafe is a top notch system, that would give the big name alarm companies/systems a run for their money! SimpliSafe is very affordable, a simple to install system that I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe is Simply Great!
Reviews.Author: Murrells Inlet Rick
Reviews.Content: Having moved from NY to SC, I was concerned that the security provider I used in NY did not provide service in SC and embarked on a quest to find one that provided service in SC as good as my previous provider in NY.  There were at least 4 local providers as well as a well known national service that I decided to give a try.  When the well known national provider came to my house to install the unit, they were not able to place keypads and other accessories in locations that I wanted them without significant drilling and wire routing as well as compromise on my part on exact locations.  At that point, I continued my research on services and thankfully discovered SimpliSafe.  This service provides everything that every other service does at a much better rate and allows me to place keypads, detectors, alarms, etc. anywhere I want.  I also have the capability to move units and/or expand capabilities any time I want.  Installation is a simple as it gets with no holes to drill or wires to route/locate.  I would strongly recommend the system to anyone who asks.  My only regret is that I didn't discover SimpliSafe sooner.  I would have used SimpliSafe in NY and saved a bundle on monitoring fees had I been aware of it!!!

Reviews.Title: No Problems Yet (knock on wood)
Reviews.Author: Man of Music
Reviews.Content: Our product arrived very quickly after we ordered it. Everything was intact, and setup was a breeze. I did get an error message because our package came with an extra sensor which we don't need, but it was easy enough to dismiss that message and make that sensor inactive. We've had no problems with it yet, but we haven't had anyone try to break into our house yet either...(knock on wood).From what I've seen and used of our SimpliSafe system so far, I definitely would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: J Man
Reviews.Content: Absolutely what I was looking for. Great that it works on a wireless phone signal rather than internet. Great features as well with online monitoring and smartphone apps. Easy to use and great price! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Review of Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: n10sity2000
Reviews.Content: I am approximately 93% satisfied with this product; the ONLY thing I don't like is that it takes over 60 seconds after a door is opened before the alarm sounds.  I would like to see MUCH less time lapse; a LOT can happen to a person in a minute!!

Reviews.Title: Great System, even better price!
Reviews.Author: Chad M Smith
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe home security system is easy enough for anyone to install.  I had mine installed and fully functional in about 30 minutes, even with the 2 additional entry sensors and 1 additional motion sensor I added to the system.  The only thing even close to being an issue was establishing a cellular signal, it took me three tries in different locations.  I would recommend this system to anyone looking for affordable home security!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is a great system
Reviews.Author: Peggy W. Yarnall
Reviews.Content: Our neighbors turned us on to Simplisafe, saying how quick and easy it was to set up. I had some questions that were quickly answered by email.I ordered a system and it arrived in just a few days. The instructions were clear and the system was set up and turned on in about an hour and a half, including drilling holes for the door sensors and keypad. Some reviews said the sticky tape was not strong enough so I used the screws provided. And I didn't have to run to the hardware store to buy anything extra. I am not much on running, so I would have had to drive! My point is that I didn't have to go.The system works great. It is easy to arm and disarm. Simplisafe has kept me informed about everything all along. There is an online event log that shows the time of every turn-on and turn-off, including which device was used. Arming is a single button push...either for Away or Home mode.We like the no-contract monitoring and the monthly fee is well worth it. We feel safer in our house and are very happy with Simplisafe.Chandler

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: ABFRob
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, easy set up, and great support. Had a software problem with the keychain, and they FedEx'd it overnight, and corrected the problem immediately.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Tyson
Reviews.Content: Recently purchases this system for a home we are renting. Install was easy as pie! We ran into an issue with the T-mobile module in the base station but after talking with customer support, a Verizon module was sent free of charge and arrived in only 3 days! The directions that came with the new module made installing it in the base station so simple! So far so good and hope it never has to have a reason to activate!

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: rodamano
Reviews.Content: I was suprised how easy this system was to install.  I have a garage door away from the house that I wanted to secure and the wired systems could not do it.  Then I saw Simplisafe and I was able to secure the garage door just by a sensor with no problem. I have had not problems and everything worked as stated.

Reviews.Title: Customer SupportSimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Gus
Reviews.Content: Simpli Safe provided the secure coverage we wanted without the long term contract.It also allowed us to customize our system to our specific requirements at a veryreasonable price. The customer support provided by Sinpli Safe Staffers wasoutstanding from initial requests for clarification during our planning processthrough the installation and activation.

Reviews.Title: great service and pricing
Reviews.Author: spippin
Reviews.Content: I want to thank you and your staff for the simplisafe product, what an awesome concept. You certainly filled a niche. Your staff was courtesy and prompt in answering all my questions,I have not been disappointed in the least.Thanks from Texas

Reviews.Title: A Vote for SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: tomj
Reviews.Content: Over the last few years, I've installed several security systems. This SimpliSafe system is - by far - the easiest to install. I got it all set up and working in less than an hour. And it worked perfectly right out of the box! I am very pleased with this purchase. In fact, I'm going to buy one for my business and toss that clunky old system that took hours to configure and requires me to refill the GSM subscription every few months.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best.
Reviews.Author: The Real BFlow
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use.  Love the iPhone app. Received my system within 2 days of it shipping. One missing component arrived within two days as well.  Installation went quickly and I am far from being handy around the house or technically.  Love the fact that I can add additional sensors without incurring horrendous fees. Have sent info on the system to 4 friends and I never do that.  Kudos Simplisafe.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding System!!!
Reviews.Author: mhibuy
Reviews.Content: We just installed SimpliSafe in our primary residence after it working great in our vacation home.This a great system and the customer support is excellent! Thank you for giving people an option besides paying the outrageous prices for the othersecurity companies. I have and will continue to recommend this system to anyone who needs security!

Reviews.Title: Simpli-Safe
Reviews.Author: Penny King
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Really easy to install, although the whole computerized set up was a bit taxing -- not difficult, just taxing.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system...
Reviews.Author: David Haygood
