Reviews.Content: I actually heard about this system from a coworker who loves his system.  This is a great system and very easy to set up.  My only thing I would like to see is simplisafe developing an entry sensor designed for garage doors.  That was the hardest part of this system.  Trying to make sure it is in the right position.  Great system, and I am spreading the word...  Neighbor ordered theirs a few days ago...

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Laureine
Reviews.Content: Great alarm system. It's really easy to install and use and it's not overbearing, but it makes me feel a lot safer. Love it

Reviews.Title: Simple setup
Reviews.Author: William W. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I've only had the system a few days, but setup was straight forward and intuitive. The USB keychain remote with the "Easy Setup Wizard" was the simplest way to finesse the system.  An added plus is the insurance discount for the water and freeze alerts. I love the online monitoring of the system. The cell phone hookup makes it ideal for remote locations. I'm thinking about buying a second system.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful alarm system
Reviews.Author: Bdgisme
Reviews.Content: The simplisafe alarm is absolutely wonderful. Extremely easy to set up and it "just works."  Nothing bad to say at all. Customer support is excellent. I highly recommend this alarm.

Reviews.Title: I feel much better knowing
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I don't have much experience with the new system since I've only had it for a week or so. I installed and tested it in our vacation house in under a couple hours taking my time and reading all the material. It might have taken a little longer than usual since I did not have a PC available to streamline the process. It was easy to install and was exactly what they advertised. Unfortunately, my vacation was over and we had to leave our vacation house shortly after installing the system. In the mean time I feel much better knowing that there is an alarm system in the house and that I'll know if anyone enters it.

Reviews.Title: very simple
Reviews.Author: scottgabert
Reviews.Content: very easy barely read instructions done in 20 minutes now all i have to do is cancel adt lol i will recomend to my friends and family

Reviews.Title: Finally, an alarm system for apartments!
Reviews.Author: Ross "Fiction Junkie"
Reviews.Content: I looked for an alarm system for my apartment years ago and couldn't find anything that fit my needs. I didn't want anything that had to be hardwired (it's not my building), broke the bank, or had tons of features I didn't want. Then other day, I googled again and found SimpliSafe - boy, was I excited! I installed the sensors in about 30 minutes, downloaded the app on my iPhone (love!), and configured my dispatch service in minutes. Everything attaches to the walls/doors with 3M adhesive strips I can remove and take with me wherever I live next. So far, there's nothing I don't love about this product. I think my parents will get a system for their house now, too!

Reviews.Title: easy, affordable, comforting
Reviews.Author: artemish85 "artie"
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus PackageThis is my first alarm system and it was a breeze to install, configure and test.  The people I bought my home from suggested I take over their 5 year contract on the alarm that was already installed for $50/month.  I decided to research elsewhere.  I see no drawbacks from using this system at $14.99/month with motion sensors, entry sensors, and no contract.  The only negative point is that they do not yet have glass break sensors.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe security system
Reviews.Author: Jack BW TX
Reviews.Content: We live in a rural area with slow response times from the County Sheriff due to the large size of our county.  We wanted a system with a loud exterior alarm.  The SimpliSafe gave us the flexibility to easily add that outer alarm.  Our closest neighbors are about a quarter mile away and they were easily able to hear the siren from their place during our installation.  The install process is very easy and the videos and tutorial on the key chain remote are very helpful.  I had one question that I needed to have answered, and the customer service (done via email from the website) was very quick and helpful.  Although we're unable to use the monitoring service due to poor cellular signal at our property, the system is just what we wanted.  I would recommend the system to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect system for an apartment!
Reviews.Author: KDS
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect system for my apartment. The whole system was installed and working in 15 minutes. No problems with the wireless signal, mounting, or setup. When I called Simplisafe to end practice mode they were very helpful and pleasant to talk to.

Reviews.Title: Floyd's Review
Reviews.Author: Floydo
Reviews.Content: I have just installed my system and am gathering responsive people's phone nos.  I am satisfied with the previous service and support. I have ordered add'l items to fill in the system

Reviews.Title: Wow that was easy!
Reviews.Author: David G Pierce
Reviews.Content: I install alarm systems professionally and this system may put people like me in the poor house!  I bought this system for my condo and it literally took less than 15 min to install and about 20 min more to fully configure.  If you can chew gum you can install this system. There is no calling the monitoring center to set up and no complicated sensors to program.  Just follow a few simple steps in the provided video (comes on a USB stick that integrated with the remote key fob) and you are done.  The iPhone app works great too.  Monitoring fees are market standard.  Best of all you OWN the system and if you move, take it with you.The thing that impressed me the most was they included the paperwork  to register the alarm in with my county and city.  No having to get it off the net and wonder what to do.This is the future of Alarm Systems.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to set up, and works as advertized
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Got this system after reviewing the bigger name competiion.  Sales support helped me decide on the best components for my needs and helped minimize the cost.It installed in minutes, and once I activated monitoring can now see the status of all sensors and alarm settings while traveling.  They also recommended how we could use the full $24.95/mo 24/7 monitoring while traveling, then next month drop back to less or no external monitoring when home.  Try that with a big name contract alarm system!First day of real monitoring, the alarm went off while we were away, and my wife got the call from the SS monitoring office.  We elected not to send police out, as this was our first day and knew it was likely to be our fault, not the system.  We saw an internal door with a sensor on it reported as the cause immediately on our cell phones, and knew it was unlikely to be an actual intruder. This proved true, my daughter returned home and found that door was unlatched and had blown open due to high winds through an open window.  Great to see in in action, and glad we stopped a police response, but clearly the system was doing what it should.Just had it a week or so, but love it so far.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Alarm Systems Gets An A+ In My Book
Reviews.Author: James S. Welles
Reviews.Content: The SimpliSafe alarms systems are an amazing and great improvement over the old hard-wired systems. I have the later kind that was built into my home, but the alarm no longer works. I'm sure it would have cost more to put the system back in good working order than it did to purchase the new and better SimpliSafe system. It is a 'no brainer' to install, even for this 74-old.The customer service and support also gets an A+. All of the few calls I've had to make to ask questions have been answered promptly, courteously, and comprehensively. Yesterday, I spoke with a fellow by the name of Dave who was exceptionally patient with my ignorance on the use of the key chain remote.I can't say enough about how well thought-out their Website is and the design of their system, not to mention the value received.

Reviews.Title: Works well so far
Reviews.Author: William Whitehouse
Reviews.Content: Though I have only had this system for a week it seems to work exactly as described. Setuo was a breeze. Tech support had long wait times but one they answered they were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I have been in the "low voltage" industry (security cameras, television, audio/video) for 15+ years and have installed a LOT of wire in homes and commercial buildings.  I even used to be an ADT authorized dealer... When it came time to install a home Security system, I started to do homework and honestly didn't want a long term contract or have to rewire my home.  I found Simplisafe and was impressed by the cost and low monthly monitoring. After receiving the system in the mail, it took about 15-20 minutes to install all of the components. All just "peel and stick" and the base instantly recognized everything. I had my 15 yr old help me with half of it and its truly no brainier!  Then about another 20 min online activating the system and testing and it was done.  THAT'S IT!I travel a lot and its really nice to see if the system is armed etc and to receive notices when and who arms and disarms the system.  VERY COOL and will recommend this to everyone looking for home security!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful system!
Reviews.Author: Pastryman
Reviews.Content: There have been several recent burglaries in my neighborhood. As a result my landlord and several of my fellow tenants have installed alarm systems using the company my landlord chose.  The system they installed has one motion sensor, one entry sensor, a keypad, requires a land line and has a 3 year contract with a  $45 monthly service charge! Not for me. I did some internet research and found SimpliSafe. I initially spent more but got a much more comprehensive system with smaller monthly charge and a system that is completely wireless and mobile. SimpliSafe - easy to install, many available components, wonderful customer support.  I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Security System easy setup & operation
Reviews.Author: john Salerno
Reviews.Content: The system was received quickly and was easy to install. I was able to reach Customer Service quickly when I had questions about programing some of the senors and and the monitoring options. I only have the system installed a short time but have no problems to date.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: My arrival at purchasing SimpliSafe began as I was looking for a system that allow me to arm/disarm remotely.  I contacted my current security company and they quoted me a price to upgrade to a newer system, plus an increase in monitoring costs.  The price worked out to be higher than that of purchasing a substantial kit from SimpliSafe, and their monitoring was also more expensive than SimpliSafe's most expensive plan.What sealed the deal for me was the upgrade would be tied to the house and not portable.I had been hearing SimpliSafe's advertisements for a while, but I'm pretty good at ignoring marketing until I'm ready to hear it.  As I was searching, I come across their website and was immediately engaged.  Everything looked like exactly what I needed, plus it would be portable if I ever moved.I ordered a kit and got it within a few days.  I ran into a few issues with the initial setup (bad cell signal), but both email and phone support were great in being able to quickly sort it out by helping me locate an ideal spot.  I did have one bad component that they immediately shipped overnight to replace it.When I called in phone support, I got someone in under a minute that knew EVERYTHING about the system.  Usually, I have to lead other tech support companies to what I think the problem may be and note everything I have tested, but that wasn't needed here.  The representative quickly was able to explain exactly what was going on and how to address it.While I got mine working, it is important to note that if you want to use the advanced monitoring/web features, you must be in a location that has a decent cell signal.  A landline backup will only send alarm notifications.The system works great - does exactly what I need.As far as the company goes, I am impressed - they are acting like a company that believes in their product should:Well trained customer supportQuick responses via email (business hours)No long wait time on the phoneOvernight replacements for faulty pieces60 day free trial (w/ free return shipping)They just expanded their customer support hours to include Sunday, now from Sunday - Friday from 9AM - 6PM.  The only gripe I have is extended hours would be nice for helping customers out those first few days.  They're a growing company, so that will likely change in the future.  But once you get your system set up, you really won't have a need to call them.

Reviews.Title: SimpliGreat
Reviews.Author: Dave Moeller
Reviews.Content: SimpliEasy to setup and use. This is the one to get. I was very skeptical on ordering this that it would be easy to setup and use. I quickly was a convert. I would suggest downloading the phone app -- again it is SimpliEasy to use. As for the only issues I had... It took a little more that the 30 minutes (about an hour or so) for the cell service to start in my area... not a big deal. The other issue is that I have moulding around my doors and the magnets required extra tape as the contours do not match... but again, not a big deal. I am VERY pleased with this and we feel that we can trust this for our security needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: P. Kelly
Reviews.Content: System was incredibly easy to set up and much cheaper than the competition.  The fact that no contract is required is just the icing on the cake!

Reviews.Title: Simply Safe describes it all.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's simple and safe.  I've had the system for about 2 weeks.  It is easy to install, easy to use and the price is right.  I will be adding more units as time goes on.  I think it's awesome how versatile the system is.  Smoke alarm, carbon monoxide alarm, flood alarm, freezing alarm, etc... Oh yeah, pet friendly for pets under 25 lbs. :)

Reviews.Title: best system out there!!!!
Reviews.Author: Creighton
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I have talked about getting a Security System for over a year now and finally made the decision after hearing about simplisafe on the radio and doing the research, it just made sense. We are very happy so far with our system, The ease of installation and the cost compared to other systems can't be beat.I think in the world we live in today it is imperative to have a Home Security System. Now we are not only more secure when at Home but the peace of mind we have when we are gone, well you really can't put a price tag on that.If you do the research I think you will find like we did, Simplisafe is absolutely the way to go!!!

Reviews.Title: Works great!!
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I've had the system for about a week now. Easy to install and works great!! I like that I have the option of having 24/7 monitoring or not.It does exactly what it says!The only problem I've had is my big dog will trip the motion sensor. Which isn't to much of a problem considering he's outside when I'm not home. The only thing It lacks is option for motion video cameras.

Reviews.Title: Happy With Our New Wireless Security System With Simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Craig Misuradze
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend the Simplisafe wireless home security system. Installation was super simple with clear, easy to follow instructions. We are very pleased with our new home security system.

Reviews.Title: How could they make this easier? They couldn't!
Reviews.Author: Candice Jean
Reviews.Content: I received my SimpliSafe in the mail. Powered up the base. A female voice told me what to do at every step. 20 minutes later I was done. 4 doors, 2 motion sensors, loud alarm, keypad.Tip #1: Make sure the wall is clean where you stick the sensors. Alcohol works here.Tip #2: Open sensors one at a time, and pull tabs to activate only 1 at a time. Then follow the guiding voice.Tip #3: The video on their website shows how to install the door sensors (they are 2 pieces - the magnet needs to be at MOST 2 inches from the sensor.)I installed on a Friday. Never called them, but did fill out info on website. Monday I was testing, and  10 seconds after testing system I received a call from the monitoring center. The SMS and email alerts come through faster. I live in WV. The built in cell monitoring works flawlessly.If you need protection for your home, this with the low cost monitoring service can't be beat. Of course you can leave out the monitoring, but for $15.00 a month peace of mind has never been cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Well conceived and great service
Reviews.Author: bangorboone
Reviews.Content: Being in my 70's and a bit cyber-challenged I'd been putting off installing an alarm system. We took the chance, and I became very impressed at the design and flexibility of the system. It was easy to set up, and the crew at Simplisafe was very polite, helpful and friendly on the couple of occasions we had to call them.  My only suggestion, not really a criticism, is when one orders a second key chain remote after the initial purchase there should be instructions on how one activates it...not by trying to insert it in the base station! All in all, a very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: Simply Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I had been considering a home security system for months and decided to investigate SimpliSafe based solely on Dave Ramsey's endorsement. After seeing the many positive reviews online I purchased the mid-tear hardware with an extra 105db siren which all arrived ahead of schedule.  After unpacking, I had the system mounted and installed in about 20mins.  I can not think of any way for them to make the self-installation any easier.  The key-chain remote that doubles as a USB drive with instructions is quite possibly the best set of instructions for any device I have ever used. I had previously called customer support to inquire about the out-of-stock smoke detectors; they answered quickly, were extremely polite, informed me when they would be back in stock, took my number to call me back when they were available, and offered to ship it for free.  Once it arrived I was able to add it to my existing setup in seconds... no problems.I have since activated the $15/month contract-free monitoring and have nothing but great things to say about SimpliSafe.  I wish all companies operated as they do... very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Happy Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: This alarm system is amazing. Took me 12 minutes to install the system. Worked great out of the box without any need to call tech support. It gives me great confidence to have such technology working in my favor. I like also that I can add devices if I need to in the future. Thank you Simplisafe....

Reviews.Title: The name says it all.
Reviews.Author: stp715
Reviews.Content: This system was really easy to set up. I was up and running in less then 20 minutes.I also like the choice I have in selecting my level of security, monitored or system only.

Reviews.Title: Very quick and easy install
Reviews.Author: Scott E. Fowler
Reviews.Content: After reviewing several do-it-yourself alarm offers, I decided on SimpliSafe and am very happy so far. The installation was very easy and the system allows you to test each device. You immediately know if it works correctly. The web site is easy to manage and activate your system.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe delivers what it promises!
Reviews.Author: J D Draper
Reviews.Content: I tend to be suspicious of glowing reviews, but we were leaving on an extended boating vacation for 2 weeks and I was feeling increasing unease about our home security. We have never been burglarized, but there is always a first time. The only systems I was remotely familiar with we're ADT and the X-Finity system that Comcast is pushing heavily. I was leaning toward that system until I reviewed all of the "free" stuff that was actually included and realized that it was grossly inadequate plus there was a 3-year security monitoring contract. ADT was no great shakes either when you came right down to it so I checked to see what Angie's List had to say about various home security systems.  I looked at all of them.  There were only a few reviews for SimpliSafe for they were very positive. The system was not free, but the price even with a few extra sensors did not seem exhorbitant. I was especially impressed that there was no built in monitoring contract. If I wanted it, fine, but I was not locked in plus the baseline monthly cost of $14.99 seemed like a bargain compared to what others were charging which was usually in the $30 plus range.  I also liked the idea that all,of the sensors communicated wirelessly with the base unit. No hardwiring required, but would it be some half-assed Mickey Mouse system?  Well I ordered it on a Thursday since they also guaranteed I could return it if not satisfied. It was delivered complete the next Tuesday. On Wednesday I looked it over and started working thru the installation procedure. I am an engineer so following complicated instructions is second nature; however, in this case there was nothing complicated about it. Everything was clearly explained and all of the sensors were placed and the system was operational in perhaps an hour. For right now I am not securing the sensors with anything other than the adhesive strips that were  attached , but since screws were included I may do that later. We left on vacation at noon the next day. I have been going online each day and confirming that no alarms have been triggered since we left. So far I am very pleased with the system. SimpliSafe delivered exactly what they promised me. I may add some additional glass breakage sensors & perhaps a fire/smoke alarm in the future. My insurance company has already reduced our annual premium by over $50 because of the security installation.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Jeff M
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install. The instructions were easy to follow. It took only 45 minutes to do the install. It worked as it was advertised. I had 2 concerns about the system, first on all of the door sensor installs, the tape adhesive did not hold fast. After installing 3 of the sensors, 2 of the sensors fell off the door. We ended up having to use the provided srcews to keep them attached to the door and the door molding. Second concern, I installed this on the weekend and I had a question concerning some of the details about the system. When I called the toll free number there was no one to answer my question on the weekend. But over all it works well and easy for anyone to install.

Reviews.Title: The perfect choice
Reviews.Author: William W. Meeks
Reviews.Content: I looked at several Home Security systems that were comparable to Simplisafe, and hands down, Simplisafe was the right choice! The system arrived quickly with all the products I ordered, and was very easy to install. I had a couple of questions, and customer service was excellent. Anyone who gives Simplisafe and its product a bad review must work for the competition. I initially had 2nd thoughts, but after my own personal experience, I could'nt be happier! C'mon on Burglars, bring it on!

Reviews.Title: Great Security System
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the SimpliSafe Home Security System and I am 100% satisfied.  The installation instructions were easy to follow and I had my system up and running in about 45 minutes.  I have researched many similar systems and found this one to be the easiest to install and the most affordable.  I have already recommended this system to several of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: bucki125
Reviews.Content: The Simplisafe system was very easy to install, even a "cave person" could do it.  Just stick the components on the doors, wall,etc.  I haven't signed up for monitoring yet because I wanted to get used to using if before I used monitoring so I don't get too many false alarms.  So far I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best system ever
Reviews.Author: lmneal1983
Reviews.Content: We love this system.  It was super easy to set up (my husband and I did it in less than 20 minutes), and everything has worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm, Awesome Price!
Reviews.Author: MattXPO
Reviews.Content: I've only had this alarm for a short while, but I'm loving it.  Installation was a breeze, and though the price was low, the quality seems fine.

Reviews.Title: Surpassed my expectations
Reviews.Author: GENIA C.
Reviews.Content: I ordered the system for my son.  It arrived in just a few days.  The set-up was easy and we were finished installing it in about an hour.  I ordered the big kit with all the bells and whistles and a few extra entry sensors (10 total)as well as two packs of window/door decals(10 decals total). The directions were quite easy to follow.  He took care of setting up the monitoring on-line while I finished installing.  He can monitor the system from his smart phone and receives text messages and emails about the system status.  Very impressive.  Also impressive is how easy it is to expand the system by adding additional components if desired. I may consider replacing my existing system in the future.  I can't rate their customer service because I haven't needed their assistance. He is very pleased and I am very envious. A excellent system.

Reviews.Title: FIRST CLASS
Reviews.Author: Dave H.
Reviews.Content: This alarm system was remarkably easy to install.  It took me less than one hour to complete the installation and it was so easy to activate I could hardly believe it.  It has a 3 day "practice period" before monitoring fully activates which allows us to get used to the system and hopefully avoid false alarms.  We are very pleased!

Reviews.Title: So easy!!!
Reviews.Author: flygal "flygal"
Reviews.Content: I love how easy it was to set it up!!  I child could do it!  I love it and the security I feel!

Reviews.Title: Easy, slick, effective. & inexpensive alarm system.
Reviews.Author: Five Mile Mom
Reviews.Content: We 'untethered' from ADT monitoring last year after yet another price increase just to monitor our out-of-date burglar alarm system. Although we disliked the lack of monitoring, the only options we knew about involved either purchase of a new system and paying off another long-term contract, or renewing the high monthly monitoring on our old, wired alarm system. Then we heard the SimpliSafe ad on several talk radio shows whose hosts we trust not to do business with shady companies. After much research, what seemed to be too good to be true turned out to be too good but actually true--state of the art, expandable, wireless burglar and fire monitoring with no contract requirements, low pricing, and great customer service. Wow!  Are we ever pleased with our decision to purchase the SimpliSafe home alarm with monitoring!  It works exactly as promised. Once the alarm system gains the ability to tie into video monitoring as an option, we will raise it up to five stars. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Simpli Safe alrm system
Reviews.Author: David T. Prows "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: The installation was just as easy as shown on the instructional video. The system is in place, is easy to set, and it works great. Kudos to the developer.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe Review
Reviews.Author: robcam817
Reviews.Content: Just installed the system a couple days ago.  Installation was easy and the instructions are thorough.  System is functioning as advertised.  I like it so much I recommended it to several of my family.

Reviews.Title: Review of Simplsafe System
Reviews.Author: Joseph M Kopper
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install,easy to set up,easy to program,and also easy to teach my wife how to use the system. I printed the certificate for my home owners insurance,and dropped it of to my agent. It took a couple days to get into a new routine to turn on and turn off the system, but we are fine with it now.It would appear to met all my needs for a system at a very low cost.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe easy install
Reviews.Author: J. Savage
Reviews.Content: We just received the Simplisafe alarm system and were amazed at the ease of set-up. When there was a problem linking our system to the 24 hour monitoring station, I called and got immediate help. (The problem was all mine - I had entered the wrong serial number online.)  So far, so good!

Reviews.Title: Great SIMPLE solution for home security
Reviews.Author: PKL226
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the system I purchased a year ago. The cost was approx $300 for my smaller 1,200 sq foot home; that's significantly cheaper than ANY of the competitors.Install was very easy; I took extra time to screw in my sensors as I don't plan to move them anytime soon. The system is easy to program using the provided USB stick -- insert it into the base station and follow instructions. Easy.My only concern is that I have large double-hung sliding windows, and they'll require a sensor at each end (essentially doubling the cost of a standard window). I'm okay with that because I used motion sensors in the rooms with many windows.I have had only one false alarm caused by my large golden retriever; perhaps she jumped on the sofa because SimpliSafe claims its system to be "pet friendly." If this were to remain a problem with the big dog, I could always flip the sensors upside down, they claim. Another time I got distracted and didn't enter my pin within the time allotted. Both times, a SimpliSafe representative called my cell within one minute. I am very satisfied with the prompt response.I plan to add sensors to my system. They now offer smoke and carbon monoxide detection. It all makes for a very comprehensive package that I have recommended to others.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Jersey
Reviews.Content: The system was here very fast and so easy to set up I had it done in less then 20 minutes. I called with a few questions a few days later they were answered quickly and completely. I'm recently widowed and my son works evenings the peace of mind when alone at night and going to bed in an empty house and coming home to an empty house knowing no one is in it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLI TERRIFIC
Reviews.Author: GENO
Reviews.Content: SIMPLI SAFE IS SIMPLI TERRIFIC!  GREAT INSTRUCTIONS, EASY TO INSTALL!  WE FEEL BETTER ABOUT LEAVING THE HOUSE AND EVEN WHEN WE ARE HOME AT NIGHT.  HOPE WE NEVER HAVE TO USE THE SYSTEM BUT BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY.  IN THE NEAR FUTURE WE WILL CONSIDER ADDING COMPONENTS.

Reviews.Title: Just Installed the "Safe" system.
Reviews.Author: P. Stevens "Oldharry"
Reviews.Content: Installation was a breeze and took a couple of hours with 14 sensors, two keypads, and two remotes. I love the access with our iPhones, and being able to update settings on the internet. The voice prompts on the base station are great feedback, especially when installing the sensors and testing them. The Wife likes the tones when doors are opened even when the system is off.One of the two main reasons for purchasing the system was being able to secure the shed which is more valuable than the garage, and the other was the ability to do it myself and customize what I wanted covered. The last system was a combination of wired and wireless, and was subcontracted by the alarm company. I had two sensors go bad and the system was down two weeks both times waiting for the company that installed it to come fix it.I contacted the Simplisafe customer service twice and they were great on answering my questions.....could I put lithium batteries in the remote siren and one about billing. The service agent was prompt and knowledgable.

Reviews.Title: SimpliSafe - Great Product - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Gary Stebbins
Reviews.Content: I selected SimpliSafe based on what I read about the product.  I had heard it mentioned by Rush and Hannity.  I searched the internet for negative (and positive reviews).  Everything I read was extremely positive about this product. There are other "DIY" systems on the market, but, unless you want to spend more money (not me) you still won't do any better than what you can purchase from SimpliSafe and install yourself. The system is extremely simple to install.  If you can use a screwdriver you can protect your home in less than 30 minutes. I added two smoke detectors and a CO detector to the system.  Be sure to check with your local Police Department and Fire Department for permit requirements.  You will also get a discount from most homeowner insurance companies when you install an alarm system.  The system I installed is currently protecting a home in Connecticut where my parent's lived until I can put it on the market for sale.  Then I will move the system to my home in Indiana.  I also like the fact that monitoring is only $15 a month for basic services.  If you want to control the system with a smart phone from anywhere the cost is $24.95 a month.  That is still less than what Honeywell and ADT charge.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer- Great Alarm System!
Reviews.Author: katherine
Reviews.Content: After months of doing research, and sleepless nights of reading reviews after reviews my husband suggested Simplisafe DIY alarm system that he heard from Sean Hannity radio show. So, I looked at their website and brought out my calculator and amazed how affordable it was compare to the ones I've looked at. I needed extra sensors, motion sensors and extra siren and it still cheaper than what I've planned to get. I love that there is no Conract and the freedom to turn the monthly monitoring On and Off without penalties.Set-up took about an hour for me.  Everything worked well. The extra siren is super loud and I highly recommend it! Because without it the base alarm sounds like an alarm clock going off Not loud enough to deter burglars.I wish that the yard sign came with a pole and the stickers are double sided but no biggie!I am excited for the glass break sensors  that's coming up!For those who are still skeptical, it's 60 day risk free money back guarantee. And you get 10% discount from Hannity! I am a satisfied costumer!

Reviews.Title: Great savings on DIY alarm system
Reviews.Author: Raybie "Raybie"
Reviews.Content: Per Dave Ramsey's recommendation we decided to give them a try.  Loved that the product came quickly and was easy to install and program.  Just wish the smartphone function wasn't only tied to the most expensive plan.  Also, customer service phone lines took 23 minutes to answer on a Sunday. But other than these inconveniences the product and services are outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery, Happy camper!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Justine
Reviews.Content: I received my order quickly. Though my order was a bit special (I added a couple of sensors in addition to one of the standard packages), it arrived promptly and in good condition.  All items were securely "double packaged" with each part in its own cocoon within the shipping box.  In my order, each sensor had already been "paired" with the base station and all I needed to do was pull the battery activation tabs and place the sensors per the installation manual. I tested each sensor as I installed (no tools necessary for install) and all functioned flawlessly.  There was but a single glitch during installation however it was not the fault of Simplisafe.  In my area there is very poor cellular reception and I was having trouble connecting to the base unit through the companies web interface. I called the Customer Service # and the nice tech walked me through finding a better orientation for the base station.  I am pleased with both the product's appearance, function, ease of installation, and especially the tech support.  I would recommend this security solution to any regular homeowner with an eye to budget and simplicity.  Thank you Simplisafe!!

Reviews.Title: The perfect solution for my home
Reviews.Author: Dubious 2
Reviews.Content: This product is exactly as advertised. Very affordable compared to wired solutions. Components function well together to create a blanket of safety for my family. And set-up was extraordinarily easy. They put some thought into this, and it shows. Do not worry in the least about setting up this system, it's a breeze. Imagine, a high-tech security system that I can take with me when I move! Perfect for renters.

Reviews.Title: Excellent System, Super Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are extremely pleased with the security system. We ordered the extra alarm and realized quickly that it was a great decision...when we accidently tripped the system, the noise was so loud I was worried the neighbors might call the police. We have two motion sensors, four entry sensors, the base unit and the remote keychain activator along with the extra alarm. It took us about 20 minutes to set it up. The instructions are fantastic. There have been quite a very break-ins around our community and we feel much more secure now when we leave for the workday. I have already recommended Simplisafe to friends and family members. It's a great price with no monitoring contract required.

Reviews.Title: Lewis L
Reviews.Author: Lewis Litt
Reviews.Content: Simpli safe took me 1 hour to install 16 sensors 2 motion. I couldn't be happier. All my dealing with support staff was excellent and complete. Great product even better pricing.Just but it.

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: Russell Goates
Reviews.Content: It was easy enough to install. Works as it is meant to. Love not having a contract. Customer service is great. Like that I can go online and see how it is monitored. Would buy again for sure

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is definitely the way to go!
Reviews.Author: dabu
Reviews.Content: I spent weeks looking at the different options in home security.  And, I'm a previous ADT customer (previous house); did not want to go through that again (expensive and 2yr contract)!  Simplisafe was perfect for me!  It comes already setup and ready to use.  You can literally take it out of the box and it works.  Setup the sensors, with sticky strips and/or screws, and your done.  It will literally take about 10-15 minutes total.  And it's easy enough that a 10 year old could do it.  There's a web interface (smart phone as well) that allows you to define different settings in detail.  You can even control the alarm remotely via the web interface.  So, if you're not sure you turned it on, go to the web interface and see.  If you didn't you can turn it on there, no matter where you are.  It will send emails, text messages and call the police.  And it's cellular, so no sniping of the phone lines to defeat it!  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Secure
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Simpisafe is as they say. Very easy to install and to operate. Every home needs something in this day and age. THIS IS THE ONE. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: The system shipped quickly, was priced right, and installed easily. I would recommend this product to anyone who is considering a home security system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Review
Reviews.Author: sloher
Reviews.Content: I have owned the system for about a week and I have had nothing but good experiences so far. The delivery was fast, the set up was quick and easy to understand, the system is quick to notify me (one minute or less) by text when there is any change in my system. So far this has been an excellent system that I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Took some tech support
Reviews.Author: Rhys Reese
Reviews.Content: System mounted easy enough. Instructions were good and it almost worked. The base never talked to dispatch and required a phone call to tech support in the final chapter. The system is working fine now although it sometimes hiccups, I think.The system is saving money for us because we do not have hard line phone or cable Internet. Simple system and the buttons are better than the old style numerical keypad systems. My wife has no,issues.

Reviews.Title: It really is simple and safe!
Reviews.Author: Concerned Niece
Reviews.Content: I bought this for an ill Aunt who was moving to a first floor apartment and had some security concerns.  My sister and I had the system up and working in 30 minutes - It could not have been easier.  We haven't activated the monitoring system yet because we want my Aunt and her caregivers to get used to using the system first - I really like that we can do that, too.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice system
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to use and the customer service was good. We are having a problem getting wireless service but they are trying to rectify the problem. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Alarm
Reviews.Author: Ellis Hugh
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Simplisafe Alarm system.  Installation was pretty easy, I did have a few problems getting the software to load on my computer.  The alarm has been up and running for 6 days now, and all seems well.  I can't give it a total thumbs up yet, but it certainly will not get a thumbs down. As of now I give it a 6 on a scale of 10, but probably would rate it a 8 or 9 if it continues to perform the way it should perform.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: LaserSailor
Reviews.Content: I just installed the system and it was easy. There is a computer program that helps. I've got a big house (6000 sf) and the wireless reached everywhere. The basic kit didn't contain enough sensors for all of my areas, so I immediately purchased more motion detectors, door detectors, smoke and carbon monoxide detectors. By the time you've got everything you need, it gets expensive. This was also true of the ADT. The intro teaser was cheap, but almost everyone needs more detectors. Having said that, I like it so far. In the past, I've have many problems with delayed detection of flooding in my finished basement. This system sends me a text if there is water in my laundry room. Very cool. It uses the cell system with battery operated units so power failures are not a problem. I also like the iphone app. I get alerts on my phone if there is entry, water, fire... you get it. There are three levels of central monitoring. Only the highest gives you the text alerts as things happen on your system. This level costs $25 per month. There is a more basic call the police or fire department option for $13 per month, but I like toys! The good thing is that you are not locked into a contract. I can change my level of service at any time.

Reviews.Title: Great system and great value
Reviews.Author: N. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I needed a system I could reasonably afford and with simplisafe that's possible.  The system shipped quickly to my home and is very simple to set up.  The system is very smart because it tells you what to do during installation and tests all equipment to ensure that everything is working correctly.  I noticed also that when contacting customer service they are friendly and very helpful with any need you have with the alarm system and, or service.  Its only 14.99 a month for 24/7 monitoring.  I would definatly recommend this product for the quality of the service and product.  I feel safer in my apartment knowing that someone is looking at for my safety.  Thank you simplisafe

Reviews.Title: Vera Oldham
Reviews.Author: Vera Oldham "equip2knit"
Reviews.Content: Upon hearing Glenn Beck, Rush Limbaugh & Dave Ramsey expound about SimpliSafe's ease of installation, lack of contract and affordability, my husband and I went to the SimpliSafe website and watched the short, informative video.  We were sold immediately.  Ordering couldn't have been easier.  Our kit arrived a week later and within an hour and a half our system was installed and running (in test mode--a very smart option).  It was necessary for me to contact their customer service department, online, and I received an answer promptly and courteously within 24 hours.  Well Done SimpliSafe!  I have already recommended your system to several of my friends and family members.  The one (and only) small issue would be this -- the booklet accompanying the kit contains references to a glass breaking sensor component -- I was unable to find this item online and was informed that I could obtain this later in the year. We ALMOST spent thousands of dollars for a security system that would have bound us contractually for three years.  Thank you SimpliSafe!  We hope we never need your services but are so glad to have your unit covering our home! Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System 8-piece Plus Package

Reviews.Title: very easy to install
Reviews.Author: arukish "ash"
Reviews.Content: we just installed this system in our small grocery store with 1 door sensor.placed a base near window.it worked fine.it didn't work 1st time since we placed the base far from window.after placing it in right spot,system seems to be working.Will cancel ADT .very happy.

Reviews.Title: easy enough to set up
Reviews.Author: Maxredline
Reviews.Content: We've been using ADT for a number of years, since the house was broken into. They're okay, but expensive - and our setup required a land-line. This is modular and wireless, and monitoring rates are about half those of ADT. So I bought an 8-component set, and found it easy to install - although the motion sensor didn't test the way the instructions said it would, it nonetheless works, which is what counts. We need a license from the police in our area, but no problem - when I called and told them I was changing to a different service provider, that was all I needed to do. If you need them, forms are included with their shipment, so if you need to change your license, they make it easy.

Reviews.Title: Easy install and setup
Reviews.Author: Russell A Stoneburg
Reviews.Content: Installed the system 6 days ago.  Installation and set-up was very easy, took under 2 hours.  All components are working correctly.  we are very happy with the system so far.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Alarm the wave to go
Reviews.Author: SeaGolfer
Reviews.Content: As a safety and security consultant with over 26 plus years in the industry. I would recommend Simplisafe wireless alarm system for the first-time users. Why because it is very simple to set up and install.Pros: The system is designed for a one bedroom to a three-bedroom home with simplicity in mind. It can be expanded to meet a larger home. They do sell additional devices to meet your needs like smoke detector, glass breaker, motion detector and extra magnets for the window and door sensors. The best part besides the easy setup, is the take it when you move from place to place.Con: It's not designed to integrate with any CCTV DVR systems. They do not tell you were to get the phone app to monitor your home. I had to google it to find it. Alarm key pad needs better lighting and could use amore sophisticated look. They sell the idea that it only cost $14.95 to monitor. But really there is two more monitoring cost depending on what type of monitor you're looking. I paid for the full monitor that cost me $24.95  p/month. Again, no contract which is a plus. However, it's well priced. I gave it a 4 Star for innovation, price and easy set up. Again, like anything else you buy. You get what you pay for and this is worth it cost.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: seattlestar
Reviews.Content: This is a really great home security system. Setting up was a breeze even with limited knowledge on security system. This is good buy for the same functionalities of competing brands. I love the no contract monitoring at $20 per month that includes SMS texting.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for ANYONE
Reviews.Author: AviElle'
Reviews.Content: I've been using SimpliSafe for almost a year now with just a few small problems. First, my base station wasn't sending me alerts but after a quick phone call, I was sent a replacement piece that has been fine ever since. Second, my panic button stopped working. I've been too busy to call and have it replaced, but besides that, I absolutely love the system!!! I get phone calls after my alarm has been set off (by the exterminator) and messages when my power goes out. It's a great system that works on my student budget!!

Reviews.Title: Great little system. Quick response to alarm
Reviews.Author: Jack B. Deaton
Reviews.Content: Extremely simple to install. And very dependable so far.Calls were answered extremely fast and impressed with how fast and courteous the staff was

Reviews.Title: Easy To Install User Friendly
Reviews.Author: M. Spencer
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Works great. I love the fact that no contract is required. Very user friendly. Love it that you can arm and disarm the system with a keychain. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great for those on a budget
Reviews.Author: ZrC
Reviews.Content: While there are better systems with more feature (home automation, security cameras, etc) nothing beats this system for the price. Since I have no need for the other bloated systems (already own a NEST thermostat and Belkin home automation system) I was in market for a basic security system to protect 2 doors and 2 windows. It was easy to install and setup within about 30 minutes total, great features like text alerts and mobile app to arm/disarm. I did have a problem with the keypad draining the batteries too fast but Simplisafe was quick to replace it no questions asked. So far it has been installed for a month and not a single false alarm or sensor falling off the wall.If you have a small place, and are looking for a quick setup no contract or hidden fees security system then this system is for you.

Reviews.Title: great price, super easy to install
Reviews.Author: steve m
Reviews.Content: three weeks ago installed simplisafe system.  very easy to install, can customize system by ordering door sensors, motion detectors and sirens.  great monthly monitoring price and very easy to use plus it talks to you!  would definately recommend!

Reviews.Title: Impressed with System
Reviews.Author: Michael  Bishop
Reviews.Content: The system was very easy to install and set up. I have since added components twice. I like the smoke alarms and the panic buttons. The on line monitoring and the messages being sent to my cell phone is also great. Very simple to add various components. The monitoring is also very good because the times I set the alarm off I am contacted within about 15 seconds.This system replaces one I had 10 years and so far this one is much easier to program and to use.I am very pleased with the system and would suggest that if you are looking for a system give it a try.It is also a good value for the money spent.

Reviews.Title: The best out there
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This company by far has the best customer service and products out there. And the cheapest monitoring rates out there!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Maranda M.
Reviews.Content: Only have had for a few weeks and so far I am really liking this product. i like that I am not stuck in contract and that I could install it myself. I would recomend this to friednds and family for sure.

Reviews.Title: Best system out there
Reviews.Author: Jimbo
Reviews.Content: I bought Simplisafe and completed the installation yesterday.  It is as simple as their video shows, really!  As part of my system I have several motion detectors and was worried about my 110lb large dog tripping them.  Using the advice of others, I installed them at about 5 feet off the floor and upside down.  Last night he wandered around the house without any problem.  When I walked in they detected my motion though.  I ordered an additional motion sensor the day after my original order and because of the timing, it was not "linked" or recognized by the base unit.  I called customer support and had it resolved in about 5 minutes, GREAT customer service.All in all, this is a solid security system that allows you to expand and will allow you to increase or decrease the monitoring options at will without penalty.  I will be getting systems for my children's homes very soon.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable System-Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: P.L.
Reviews.Content: This is a terrible alarm system.I did a few user initiated tests using the equipment they made me purchase and I was told by the equipment that it was not sending any signals to the dispatcher service.  I then call the following day to see if that was true.  Their customer service swore that the alarm was working and in fact that the dispatcher service was getting signals.I go home and then redo the tests that she asked me to do (moving their base station to, like, 6 different locations, restarting it for I don't know how many times), and get the same message.  At this point I call the dispatcher service who informs me that they have not been getting signals to my apartment at all, so if someone did break in then there was nothing to be done.To add to this, they only respond to calls and emails during business days, so I have no idea why they would insist that their service is working when it in fact is not, or how to get this problem fixed.

Reviews.Title: Not all that great
Reviews.Author: Shahboor
Reviews.Content: I purchased the system 6 month ago and I found it easy to install. With what I paid for the stsytem and the Monthly Monitoring service for $14.95. I figured the system would pay back for itself in 18 months. After setting up my system, I immedietly started to name all my sensors on line, which was a bog job since I allready installed the sensors. I thought that when an alarm goes off and I'm on the phone with the monitoring desk, they would be able to tell me which sensor activated. Well, it happend at 3 o'clock in the morning and I inmmedietly received a phone call from the company. When I asked which sensor activated, I was told that I needed to purchase the $24.95 plan to get that information. Is it imporatnt to know which sensor has been breached. Hell ya, specially when the cops are trying to figure out where to look. with the $24.95 plan, it would take 26 month for the system to pay off for itself, assuming non of the sensors would need to be replaced.

Reviews.Title: Not so "Simpli"
Reviews.Author: Dennis Young
Reviews.Content: Well I heard all the rave reviews and bought the system.  Everything went smoothly as far as getting the money and the shipment.  When I went to set it up my keypad said "out of range".....it still says that.  Now here is what i do not like - limited support hours.  This is a security company that deals with 24 hr protection and support closes at 5 pm CST.  So I had to leave a message by phone.......finally got a call back the next day and they told me what to and it did not solve it and the next night i left an email message because no ones there.  So now I'm waiting to hear back and wondering if I have a bad product how long will it take to get it replaced.  So the "simpli" in Simplisafe is not turning out to be so "simpli"  ......

Reviews.Title: BIG HYPE SMALL RESULT
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY R GERACI
Reviews.Content: ACTIVATION FAILED. TALKING TO SUPPORT IS HORRIBLE DUE TO BACKGROUND NOISE AND POOR MICROPHONES.TRYING TO GET A SIGNAL FROM THE BASE STATION  IT WAS DISCLOSED THAT THEY USE T MOBILE NETWORK,ONE OF THE WORST. NOW I NEED AN ADAPTER TO CONNECT TO VERIZON. ANOTHER CHEAP PRODUCT  TRYING TOUSE EVEN CHEAPER PROVIDERS.

Reviews.Title: Good basic system with low or no monthly fees.
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Carnes "Photostudent"
Reviews.Content: I hate monthly recurring bills and live in a really safe neighborhood so this system fits most of my needs. I can pay for monitoring when on vacation and turn off when I return and just use it as a noise maker; no expensive contract. A hardwired system installed on construction would be a lot better but most of us do not have that. If you have a lot of windows and you wanted a sensor on each one, this wireless system could get expensive fast. It is a quite advanced system with easy to understand voice prompts. I have installed it and it is working properly. I prefer ordering from Amazon but they did not stock components I needed to customize. However shipping was only three days direct from Simplisafe. I also ordered with the Verizion module as, like many people, I have poor T-Mobile coverage. My only major gripe is the keypad. It is not backlit which I understand would eat up too much battery power but the keys are small and system control keys are the same size and color as the numeric keypad. We both have to put on our reading glasses to disarm system. Also the LCD screen is not easily readable until a key is touched to turn it's backlight on. A simple blinking LED should be added to let one know the system is armed. Check out the keypad on Lowe's Iris system to see a good design. I have had no issues with sensors coming loose but screws are included if you want to use them. I would give at least four stars with a better designed keypadPros:-Cheaper than commercial system.-No contract-Low rates-No land line needed-Mine works fine.-easy to installCons:-Wireless not as secure as hard wired.-Poor keypad design.-Must have more expensive plan to get voice notifications.-No current video capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Easiest thing I have ever set up.
Reviews.Author: Brett J Arnold
Reviews.Content: The hardest part about setting up this alarm system was screwing in the screws with a screwdriver.  Once I started using my electric drill, everything went easy as pie!  It took me about an hour to set everything up.

Reviews.Title: Stand Alone is a pain in the butt
Reviews.Author: Jeff B "bassfish62"
Reviews.Content: I did not want a system that required a monitoring center.  This doesn't but it does not function as stated without one.  I keep getting messages on the keypad that the link is not established, which keeps the base station in problem mode.  Also, I got a long message from the base station when I set it up telling me that I needed to setup a link.  It would be nice if it would just send me a text message or call me on my cell phone.  I plan on returning it.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: First, it was easy to install and worked as stated, for 1 day. Ist the panic button went bad, next day one of 2 door alarms went.They are replacing and their custumer service was excellant. Does not change the fact that 2 devices are bad within 2 days and a lot of time consumed trying to remedy. Makes me woner how long it will even last

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Ace
Reviews.Content: Great Systems! Easy to install! I signed up for the $14/month security response. So much for affordable than any other system.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is simply not
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I purchased a simplisafe security system because it all sounded good and way cheaper than any other alarm company. it came in less than 5 days and we were so excited, however that was the best part of it all. we were trying to use motions and thats where we ran into trouble. the motions worked sometimes but not all the time. we would have to actually walk up to it and wave our hand right in front of it, even though it worked only a few minutes prior. we spent countless hours trying to re-figure where to put it so it would work all the time and finally after 2 days of frustration and trying, we decided we couldn't find complete confidence in the system and are boxing it up to send it back. sounds good, but you are better off spending the money for a regular system installed by the professionals..it's your family at risk

Reviews.Title: Customer Service or a Joke?!?
Reviews.Author: mtck01
Reviews.Content: I do not own the system, I simply called to ask questions and wanted to place an order after my basement was burglarized. Didn't start well, I called mid-day on a Friday and was hung up on 3 times. I then filled out the online form and received this email;"Our servers at our customer service office were temporarily down today"Hmmm, not a good start for an alarm company. I called again and this was the dialog;(Someone picks up and lot of laughter and noise in the background)me: Hello?Ed: Yes, hellome: Am I calling the alarm company, Simplisafe?Ed: Oh yeah, yup, name is Ed (cynical and rude)me: Sorry, I guess I wasn't sure if I dialed correctly since I didn't hear you say the company name.Ed: I guess I forgot to read my company manual for today (In a very snarky way)me: (I paused and was a bit taken back, at the same time hearing laughter from the other side) I will call someone else, thanks.Was this a joke, a rogue employee? I read all these great reviews about the product but not really sure I want to make the purchase when their staff is so unprofessional and their own telecom infrastructure so vulnerable. Any thoughts..?BTW, I verified and I did dial the correct number

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed by slow shipping and the answer I got from customer service so far.
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: I made a large order (over $1,000) through the factory rather than Amazon, which was probably a mistake. I should have just ordered through Amazon and got my prime shipping (which I love).I ordered on a Saturday, got an e-mail on the Sunday saying that Fedex was notified of the shipment at 10am on Sunday, and then nothing else.  I ordered fed-ex ground shipping which is 3-5 days and usually gets here in 3 days especially since Simplisafe is only a couple of states away.It's Thursday and I called to ask what was happening with my shipment since the tracking wasn't updated.I was told it hadn't even shipped out yet!I was told that Monday didn't count as a shipping day so as long as the order made it by next Monday it was still within the 5 business days, then I was told that since I was close by my order "wasn't a priority" and that they ship the further away orders as a priority.I don't care even if that is true, it's not something you should tell a customer who just spent over $1,000 with you!Priority should be to customers in line. I hope I don't have an issue with someone breaking in just to be told "we are dealing with customers who are further away as a priority!".Not a good start to a relationship where I already subscribed to their $25 a month plan and need to trust them with the well being of my home, work, and family.I will update this review as time goes to see if they get any better.

Reviews.Title: Best alarm system and company, hand's down - bar none.
Reviews.Author: M C
Reviews.Content: Upon moving in to my family's first new home in a beautiful, upscale and secure suburban neighborhood - a "safe" neighborhood - I knew that these are the types of homes that burglars target.  I needed an alarm system, but wasn't interested in spending a lot of money.  On the same hand, I wasn't going to buy junk.  I wanted a quality system.I also didn't want to drill holes in my walls, or pay for installation. I certainly wasn't going to sign any contracts. I researched and found a few wireless alarm systems and companies and began reading reviews and watching videos on YouTube.It seemed that if everything people were saying was true, SimpliSafe was the easy to install, convenient, quality system at the best price for the quality, (I think there was one or two a few bucks cheaper, but they seem to be low quality junk) and looking at SimplieSafe's Facebook page (which I always do before I choose a new company to do business with) it seemed like their service after the sale was good. That's very important to me. For the majority of my professional career I have led and managed customer service teams in various environments and can be highly critical of service organizations.  I know what great customer service looks like, so I can easily spot it when it's not there.Well, it turns out that SimpliSafe truly was everything I hoped it to be.  The system was priced really well.  I needed 8 door and window sensors and a couple of motion sensors and got a great deal.  I even got an extra keyfob to arm and disarm from my keychain. All at a great price.  Installing the entire system, every door and window sensor and doing the setup took less than 30 minutes and everything works flawlessly.  It is feature rich and high quality, but also very very simple to use. I feel secure when I am away, knowing that the extra loud siren which I also purchased is enough to scare off any intruder, and feel equally secure when I go to bed at night knowing if anyone tried to enter through my homes multiple points of entry, I'll know right away and more importantly - they'll know I know, and be gone.I've had to ask some questions of their service team a couple of times since purchase and had my questions answered cheerfully and quickly each time.I also like how, since their monitoring is "no contract", that I can turn it on if I ever choose, and then turn if off the next month if need be.  I don't feel as though I have a need for monitoring.  Maybe if I was in a higher crime neighborhood I would, but regardless I don't.  That being said, I like that if we are going on a week or two vacation in the summer, I can turn the monitoring on, and the next month turn it off if I want just like that.  Not to mention that the monitoring price is about the lowest in the industry and the reviews I've read of that particular service tell me all I need to know - they get the job done, notifying emergency services when appropriate - and at the end of the day, that's all that matters.All in all, I would recommend this system to anyone in the market for home security.  When it comes to a particular service, product, or company I ask this question: "Would I recommend it to my mother."  With SimpliSafe, I wouldn't hesitate.

Reviews.Title: Toy security system
Reviews.Author: devexpert
Reviews.Content: I bought this system from manufacturer directly and installed it which was very easy. However the installation method for sensors this system uses is completely flawed. The magnets that are placed on windows and doors are mounted using sticky tape only and there is no other option for mounting them. Even though I cleaned and let dry every single place with alcohol where these are installed almost every single one of them has fallen off within 30 days. Luckily I did not activate the system or police would be coming by every couple of days. This is simply inexcusable for security system. It is not reliable and after couple of false alarms you can bet your local police department will not be taking requests from your house seriously any more... Kind of anti-security system!Additionally 2 out of 12 sensors broke within 30 days as well. We returned the system.

Reviews.Title: unit arrived dead - Simplisafe stepped up and fixed my issues.
Reviews.Author: J. Haggard
Reviews.Content: So far it's a fail, and I haven't even started using it, here is the reason...I ordered this alarm system on Friday, I paid for the overnight saturday delivery option through Amazon and the system shipped and was delivered as promised and as paid for. I started to unbox the system and got stuck on step 1... remove the base unit from the box and remove the battery activation strip. The base unit I received had no battery activation strip. I plugged it in and the batteries were dead. These are rechargeable batteries but they thing even after left plugged in won't work and hold a charge.So at this point I have a bunch of pieces of plastic around the house and nothing to do with them.I tried to contact simplisafe via the customer service number and conveniently their offices are closed on Saturdays.Initial impressions, this is a bad system based on the fact I can't use it, at all. Now, if they "fix" my issues then perhaps things will turn around, but I expect reimbursement for my Saturday delivery and new batteries to be shipped to me before that happens.---UPDATE 12/2/13---I purchased new batteries at my local store and got the alarm working. Simplisafe believes that based upon that the power adapter is bad and not the batteries they shipped. They are overnighting me a new power adapter and have given me a free month of monitoring for the trouble. I'll do a full review update once the new adapter arrives.--UPDATE 12/30/13---I forgot to come back and update my review, my apologies! The new adapter arrived a few days after simplisafe shipped it (shipped it on a weekend so as expected took a few extra days). The new adapter fixed my issues and I have not had a single issue since. The sensors are mounted on my doors, I even was able to mount one to my garage door so when it opens it triggers the chime inside.Simplisafe stepped up and fixed my issue, diagnosed what I thought was dead batteries correctly as a dead power supply. They gave me credit for a month of service for the inconvenience and really have been a great company to have protecting my house. No complaints at all and I am working on getting more adapters from them to totally replace my old ADT system. Thanks Simplisafe for the great service and fixing a broken power adapter.

Reviews.Title: Simple Set-up, Great System
Reviews.Author: Gregory Meyer
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and use. Seems to be a great solution to our desire for a secure home, but we didn't want to pay the prices of the big name companies for set-up and monthly monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Feeling Safer Already
Reviews.Author: B. Hirsch
Reviews.Content: It took us a week to finally connect to the home base because we were out of range for good connection.We were impressed with the fast service and advise from the home base,  Quick. overnight delivery of the needed componentswas much appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Think carefully towards this Simplisafe alarm product
Reviews.Author: P. SHING
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished Simplisafe 2 alarm system at March 14, 2014  from their website since their supporting crew claimed it still offers the very same product warranty but at reduced prices.  I returned the entire system at April 14, 2014 through their prepaid label and collected 100% full refunds by April 24, 2014 without the 1st month monitoring service charges.  Here are the pros and cons of Simplisafe 2 alarm system based on my 3+ weeks usages.Pros1. All sensors are very easy to install which is no difference than other brands but their hardware setup utility, Microsoft window based , is very easy and friendly to use which is a big plus.  You can use the USB keyfob to program your system on the computer, then sync with base station which makes reconfigurations of your alarm system extremely easy.2. Door/window sensor is responsive and no false alarm ever occurred during the 3+ weeks usages3. Supporting crews are knowledgeable and responsive4. 60 days tryout is a plus and you will get 100% full refunds if you do not like your purchaseCons1. Very limited range allowed between base station and wireless keypad, say less than 15 feet and supporting crew confirmed this info.  If you have the sound enabled for your base station, then the base station becomes a easy target for intruders to locate once they knew smacking the keypad did not crash the alarm system.2. Very slow and environmental subjective motion sensor.  It will take 2 minutes to warm up and any warm bodies better be away during the warm up period in order not to affect the "decision" making of the motion sensor and I learned this through the supporting crew.  The problem is wireless window sensor is not suitable for bathroom window due to humidity issue and you will use the motion sensor instead.  It becomes a issue with this very environmental subjective motion sensor which heavily depends on where you place it since lights through the window might trigger it.3. SMS text alert provided by their monitoring service is highly questionable.  I experienced "no message, delayed by half day message, no message, delayed by 8 minutes, no message" during the 2+ weeks monitoring service period on my Samsung Note 3.  However, the message will be received at your smartphone within 40 seconds if it works properly.  Their crews only acknowledged the initial no message issue since due to their system but blamed the rest were caused by my ATT carrier.  However, my wife shared the very same ATT carrier with me and she only experienced "no message, delayed by half day message, delayed by 8 minutes" on her Apple 5S.  I highly doubts it is the ATT carrier.4. Smartphone APP is very bare bone which only allows user to arm/disarm and view event logs.  No real time sensor status at all.5. There will be no 3rd party monitor services available for Simplisafe proprietary alarm system.  So, you either go with their non-reliable monitoring service or no monitoring service at all.Note: item 3 and 5 are the main reasons for me to return the entire system since I would not mind paying the monthly service charges but the services need to be 100% reliable.6. Hardware costs are in par with other name brands but the system does not allow any future expansions of either video or home automations.ConclusionsIf you are in the market for very straight forward alarm system to install by yourself without worrying about the monitoring services, then Simplisafe might suit your needs.  But, if you are in the taste of future expansions of video, home automation, then the simplicity of Simplisafe product is at its cost.Will I recommend Simplisafe to anyone?  The answer is YES if user falls into these categories as such:1. Constantly on the move since the entire system allows you to carry around like other wireless alarm system2. No needs for professional monitoring services at all since why pays for non-reliable monitoring services3. Would not mind paying relatively same prices as other name brands alarm product but get no future expansion capability

Reviews.Title: Excellent System, and as named, Simple
Reviews.Author: David Landrum
Reviews.Content: Received the system exactly as purchased and fully operational. Easy installation and no problems with the wireless range. Several friends are planning to switch from their name brand security system to this one once they saw the wireless and no contract option. I'm protecting every door and window in the house with the ability to add sensors, and label all as to where they are located. I'm also impressed with the text and email alerts, as well as the apps for the smart phones we utilize. The cellular connection is also impressive as I'm in an area with sporadic coverage at best, and this unit stays connected. Being able to manage the entire system through the internet and sync with the base is a big plus also. Over all I am very impressed with the equipment and service, and more so with the price, and low monthly fee for the full monitoring, which I have also tested with a quick response time from the provider as soon as I placed the system in test mode. Great Product.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Itamar
Reviews.Content: Great stuff! Must have it at your home!! They are very fast to respond any of the alarm emeegency! I will buy one more to give as a gift!

Reviews.Title: Very Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I installed the system a few days ago and it was very easy to do. I used the double sided tape to secure the sensors and then permanently attached them with the correct fastener for the door or wall surface. I felt that over time the tape might lose it's adhesive and cause the alarm to go off, but that's my preference.The system I purchased came with a key fob that has the USB connection to access the settings through my computer, That makes adjusting the system easy, but most of the settings are also available through the keypadMy wife likes the security of having the alarm set at night when she's sleeping and I am traveling for work. We both like the door chime features for our three exterior doors. I plan to purchase more sensors for a couple of windows on our second floor.So far this is a very easy system to install, set-up and use. I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Very User Friendly and Affordable
Reviews.Author: S. Sato "Pastor Steph"
Reviews.Content: The video instructions seem overly simple but only because everything about the system is simple to understand and set up.  It's pretty hard to beat the price.  Most cities require a special permit.  That too is easy to handle in our city.  The main thing that you need to figure out before hand is the number of door and window sensors.  The packages have just a few sensors.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: norm guillory
Reviews.Content: So easy to instal . My only issue was that I could not believe HOW simple . Before I took each step I would think "wait a minute. It can't be this easy . I must have missed something." so I would go back and re-read the instructions, follow them and then be impressed again at how simply everything fell into place. It was like magic. Now that my system is up and running I love how easy it is to change my settings and install new devices.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: Brinda Copeland
Reviews.Content: It is as the name sugggests, simple, inexpensive and it works as advertised! We have no problem recommending this to our friends.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind, the simple way!
Reviews.Author: C. Spangler
Reviews.Content: We purchased this system for my mother to use when we are away. She is 85, and learned to use it in about ten minutes! Great price, quick delivery, installation in under an hour.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Safe
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: The alarm system was easy to install and activate. It was a great chose to protect my family and love ones

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: hmmm baby
Reviews.Content: easy to install and very straight forward.  I am saving $15 per month with this system and I don't have a contract I need to adhere to.

Reviews.Title: wasn't informed
Reviews.Author: Samuel D. Johnston "sammydean"
Reviews.Content: I will link to dispatch as soon as you enable sprint or cricket to use it. I wasn't told you only use T-mobile or Verizon for the linkage.

Reviews.Title: David 1  Goliath 0
Reviews.Author: Luna Felix
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived in good condition. Setup was a total no-brainer, as was the activation process. ADT should be getting very nervous about now!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Name - Perfect Product
Reviews.Author: joe rogers
Reviews.Content: Heard advertised on radio show noon till three ,that only promotes quality products !40 minutes to install , knowing I'd have the drop on an intruder, I sleep better.

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: Brenda Lawson
