Reviews.Content: After searching the internet and reading numerous reviews we decided to call the helpline and ask a few questions.  The answer desk is quite helpful and actually called me back.  Easy to install and I would recommend this system to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Don't Love It
Reviews.Author: Angela R. Bricker
Reviews.Content: First off we are still trying to install b/c each window checks individually, but the system keeps telling us there is an error.  When you put the blinds down on the windows it knocks the window unit off.  What is the point of having an alarm system that when you walk in the house it says not connected to dispatch?  Extremely frustrated!

Reviews.Title: It works but....
Reviews.Author: Gods Dingleberry
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe costumer service is great BUT the alarm monitoring service is horrible. I called the alarm service to let them know I was going to test my system. The first call I was on hold for 5 minutes and women said hello then instantly hung up. I called back and was put on hold after 6 minutes I was hung up on. Called back again and a man answered and I tried to explain what was happening and half way threw I was put on hold. I still have not tested my system.

Reviews.Title: Quite nice
Reviews.Author: Diane L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: The system was fairly easy to install but the testing and arranging the local response folks was somewhat daunting. I'm still not done but am hopeful to complete the work tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe Product Review
Reviews.Author: Mickey Blush
Reviews.Content: Dear Simplisafe  I am quite satisfied with the system. The installation was straight forward and simple. The system has operated just as good as Rush Limbaugh said it would be.  It does give a sense of peace and security that I have now. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and neighbors.  As of now, I don't need any help from your customer service department as everything is working perfectly well. Thank you for your product and your continued interest in my opinion!  MB

Reviews.Title: Great, easy set-up. No contract, no BS.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I selected what was right for my home, the plan that fit my needs.  The install took a bit, but was very easy (we have a lot of windows). I had to seek further instructions on how to pair the extra siren to the base- easy. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Review of Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Book lover
Reviews.Content: I chose the system because it was completely wireless, I could install it myself, it was very reasonably priced, and worked as stated.The only thing the company should have done was to ask at the time the order was submitted what wireless provider works in your area.  However, the remedy and assistance provided was easy and simple.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and use
Reviews.Author: Scott Boatfield
Reviews.Content: I have alway wanted to get a security system for my business but didn't want to deal with wires.  I love the wireless system and ease of use and being able to add products easily.

Reviews.Title: Works great , easy to install
Reviews.Author: Raymond Roda
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install , and works great. I have 2 cats and they don't set off the motion detectors. Good to know my home is secure.

Reviews.Title: Chimes on entry doors when system off.
Reviews.Author: Robert F.Rodgers
Reviews.Content: when system is off - how to turn off the chimes when a door is opened? Kind of annoying.Other than that, for now, system is ok.  Kind of early for an assessment.  Its our first alarm system.considering adding a couple more devices.thanksBob Rodgers

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: vladG
Reviews.Content: The system is easy to install.  It is very flexible.  The back strips are coming off the walls without the paint with it, so you can be confident in placing and replacing components.However, the components themselves are not of the top commercial quality.  The motion detectors do not react as I expected them to and ended up ordering more to cover the area that should've been covered with a single motion detector if it had "better" vision.  But overall the system seems to perform at the moment.  Hopefully it will continue to work for months and years.  I only had it for a week.

Reviews.Title: Entry sensors misread
Reviews.Author: Keith Goodman
Reviews.Content: The install process looks very easy on video, in actuality....not so much.  A couple of the "entry sensors" don't work, the key pad reads "2 entry sensors open", but they are installed as instructed.  Not enough entry sensors, should have ordered more but pricing for additional units seems excessive.  Blue light won't stop glowing on base, which only identifies it's location to a burglar and thus makes it easy for them to find and disable.  Can't make remote siren test positive.  Overall satisfaction level low.

Reviews.Title: Hardware works as advertised so far and monitoring is TBD.
Reviews.Author: steve stanfill
Reviews.Content: Custom hardware order was filled perfectly.  Simple to install and get running.  Support from the company is OUTSTANDING.  Regarding the monitoring, we accidentally tripped the alarm for the first time and never received a call.  Comment from support is that after 45 seconds the false alarm was cancelled by the master code entry. Which was true about the time line.  However, this system is in my parents house and my house is a hardwired DSC system (monitored for $10 per month and they always call within seconds, always, for a false alarm).  I have to say that until we have more experience with the monitoring service, for now, it is inferior to other monitoring services I have used and use today.  I will update this once we have more experience with the monitoring.  But keep in mind, the system itself it 10 times easier to use and install.  I guess you have to balance the good hardware with unknown monitoring quality.  However, if ordering a system, keep in mind that the keypad chime is so soft, people with a slight hearing loss won't be able to hear the beeps. Lots of forum complaints on this, so time will tell if this ever gets resolved.  Just order an extra siren for the $60 and put close to a key pad and have them chirp.

Reviews.Title: Not Ready to Rate
Reviews.Author: SS Brinson
Reviews.Content: I injured my knee, therefore I cannot install the security system yet.  I hope that I will be able to work on it in a week or two.  I did receive the package a couple of days late because of the winter storm but everything looks good.  I feel like I will be very satisfied with the SimpliSafe product depending how good the monitoring and respond time is.Thank You,Joseph Brunson

Reviews.Title: seems to be a good system
Reviews.Author: sandra p. riegel
Reviews.Content: have been pleased with the system and the support.  Still getting  use to  the mechanics but do not expect any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Rating after 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: Royce Nelson
Reviews.Content: Everything good so far. very easy to install.Reason only gave 4 star rating is -- this is very early in relationship. Let's see how things go far a while.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect!
Reviews.Author: M. Garinger
Reviews.Content: My system was shipped with a T-Mobile phone in it and I needed Verizon for it to work in my area. They had to send a module out which after some aggravation kept my system down an extra 4 days. I would think that SimpliSafe should have made sure the proper module is selected for the area in which you reside. They also did not package my yard signs with my order. While these little attention to details are concerning, don't let them stop you from buying this system. It works great and is super easy to install. A great product that would have gotten 5 stars from me if not for my service issues.

Reviews.Title: Good product but more expensive than direct competitors
Reviews.Author: Mark Anthony
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the security system and how easy it was to install. It works, and that's important. However, it's still expensive when you consider the other products and the features that they offer. IRIS home security for example, is almost half the initial price and it comes with more remote features than Simplisafe. Granted, though, there is a difference between these products and they are designed a little differently. The integrity of the security systems will also vary slightly. Where Simplisafe falls short is that other providers have features that Simplisafe doesn't offer. For example, email alerts and more customizable security functions.We are still within the 60 days money back guarantee and haven't decided if we'll switch to a different provider or not.With that said, Simplisafe does work and it works well. It's a clean product, and there has been a lot of thought put into the design. It's worth the money you pay, my only qualm is that there are other (very similar products) at cheaper prices with more features.My advice is to research a few other products and see what fits your needs before you buy.

Reviews.Title: My house and garage security that Mr Glen Beck has advertized
Reviews.Author: Larry Cooper
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating once I understood installation and operation. I was impressed how well it worked. All sensors functioned as described. Once Simplesafe security system install was completed and finally setting down in the evening, it was very comforting to know if any door was left open or someone has entered my home unlawfully......especiallay when sleepting. I will be looking into if homowners insurance policy annual cost savings will pay for the added monthly fee before adding the alarm monitoring system.

Reviews.Title: Just what I hoped to own.
Reviews.Author: Drdave
Reviews.Content: I shopped on the internet for what systems were reviewed as being very good, easy to install, inexpensive monthly fees and adaptable to the number of doors and windows I want to cover.  This system appears to be perfect.  It was very easy to install and activate, and the monthly charge is the lowest I have found.  Now I will test it out and see if it works as well as the expensive one I use at the office.

Reviews.Title: too early to tell
Reviews.Author: Chumlee
Reviews.Content: The system was easy to install but I have only had it up & running for a couple of days so I cannot comment on it totally. The instructions were helpful and easy to follow. One of the keycahin remotes did not work so I called in and the person who answered told me they would send me another one. The only negative aspect of my experience so far is the customer service phone system, it seems to take a very long time to get through to a live person.

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe2 Wireless Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Doran
Reviews.Content: I heard Rush advertise this system on his daily radio talk show.  Having owned and discontinued a nationality known system due to its high cost, I did some research on Simplisafe.  It seemed to be the ideal system for the typical homeowner, so I ordered it.  Everything arrived in 4 days and I easily had it installed and checked out in less than 1 hour!  It works perfectly and I can monitor it using my iPad from anywhere I can get an Internet connection.  This will provide me with a great piece of mind when my wife and I are on extended road trips (we're retired, senior citizens that enjoy the roadways).Don D.  Nebraska

Reviews.Title: Awesome product and so easy to install and operate
Reviews.Author: Mark R. Nelson "Mark N"
Reviews.Content: Wow, this is a great system.  I heard Dave Ramsey and Glen Beck discuss this product on their shows, so i called.  Talked with the rep and they sent me all of their information.  I reviewed the systems offered by Simplisafe and ordered the system that was right for me.  The alarm shipment came to my home within a few days and within 10 min. I was up and running.  So easy to install and so easy to operate.  I love the fact that if I move, I take the system with me.  As workingh in the public safety field for 30 years, I highly recommend this product.  Mark Nelson

Reviews.Title: I will be installing this product on my rental.
Reviews.Author: Mr. T
Reviews.Content: Though I have not installed it yet, I have no doubt this was a very wise investment. I haven't installed it yet because I am replacing doors and windows.

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: Treehugger "Thomas J"
Reviews.Content: I bought the system because I like the idea of not having to use a monitoring system, (neighbors live close by and we watch out for each other).So I ordered two more entry monitors, installed them and tested them. Now I show an entry port is open, NOT.The key pad does not show what entry port is open. Tested them all and everything is closed.I called their 1 800 number at 7:15 PM. It's closed, they will get back to me the next business day.Nice, I am heading for work and can't set the alarm.Is this the way they get you to spend the extra money on the monitoring system?

Reviews.Title: Simplisafe is simply easy to break
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe motions sensors are effective, if one is trying to protect themselves from an elephant or a bear that is not smart enough to know what a motion sensor is or what an alarm system does. If you put yourself in the eyes of a burglar, this system is easier to break even for a first timer. Simplisafe system is as easy to break it, as easy it is to install it.This is only good, just to have a burglar system for the sake of having it. Does it give the peace of mind that you are looking for after spending time and money, absolutely NO. In fact, I would advise not even advertising that there is a Simplisafe system through window and door decals. Any burglar who reads this review, will not only know how to break it through Simplisafe system, but will also target houses that have Simplisafe systems. So please do not make yourself an easy simplisafe target.Cons========1. Simplisafe Home mode can be set only from the key pad.2. Biggest flaw of the Simplisafe system: Motion Sensors--2a. Motion sensors are effective only in the direction they are facing and have to be within human height to detect motion.--2b. Motion sensors placed between 5" and 6" are easy to remove. Not only can they be removed, but also unpowered by removing the battery and the Simplisafe system will not recognize that.--2c. Motion detectors are effective only in the direction they are facing; hence one can come from the side and remove them, effectively making it useless.3. Base station, in spite of setting for NO voice alerts. Does give out voice alerts making it vulnerable to its location and a burglar can easily smash/break it from sending the signal.4. An alert activated by a control (motion or contact) will not send an SMS unless it is past the few seconds time (about 30 sec) when the alert signal is sent to the monitoring station.4. In continuation of the point 4. You will not know what control triggered an alert if the alarm system is switched off prior to sending an alert to the monitoring station.5. Alarm system gets activated, even when one of the door contacts is NOT in command mode, violating the basic principles of an alarm system.6. When in alert mode (home or away) the system still take time to activate the siren for any activation by motion sensor, again violating the basic principles of alarm system. Since it is an alert by a motion sensor that is usually inside a home, there should not be any time gap.7. No way to know, if the system is back up and running after an alert, unless you pay extra for online command.8. The siren is virtually sound less, if one puts a hand on it.9. No way to know specifically the order and which control triggered an alert when an alert does gets to the monitoring station. The system only says a generalized motion sensor or door control triggered the alarm.Pros=====1. Text alerts when subscribed are good2. Door contacts work effectively.3. Easy way to control through PC which control to put in away or home mode and control the time and pass codes.Overall: 1.5/5

Reviews.Title: Looks and sounds good but better for the $$ is out there
Reviews.Author: MB
Reviews.Content: This was our first security system. I bought it on trial because it was recommended by Dave Ramsey and many other trusted sources.It is very easy to setup..yes.The basic plan every month is very cheap...yes.There are no contracts....yes.Aside from that, the extremely bad feedback from users on IT'S FORUM, the Simplisafe forum, is extraordinarily unbelievable. It's alarming that they allow customers to put bad feedback on there last week, the week I got ours, and just let it go without defending or explaining. People were complaining about not getting texts until HOURS after the alarm had been tripped. Or not getting calls at all. Just really, really bad customer service from their one call center. I'm not going to pay someone to watch my house that can't even watch THEIR forum. It's going back. Yes, there are some diehard fans on there. But I've found other products that have better customer service AND products for just a little more money.I've went with another company that has better products (touch screen panel and better smoke detectors and alarms, more solid and not flimsy plastic. More industrial stick tape on back, not 3M. And the new company has 3 call centers so in case one like SS has went down, I still get coverage. And, they have chat support which SS doesn't have.Sidenote, I bought it through a Woot ad that Amazon sent in my email. I'm trying now to get my money back because it came with a '60 day' trial. Woot said they wouldn't honor that and suggested I sell it to a coworker ? lol. Amazon is working nicely with me to get my money back.So, in the end, buyer beware of Simplisafe AND Woot.I will say that I love having a security system in my home now. It's a great peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: review of simplisafe
Reviews.Author: Daniel W. Wilmot
Reviews.Content: I had trouble setting up one of the motion detectors.  They don't explain everything in the booklet.  Don't leave a message to the help team to call you back b/c it can take days!  I think that  I will like the system even better than my last one when I get used to it. I had to go to a hardware store to get more tapes for the detectors

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works OK but with significant limitations
Reviews.Author: Christine M Prosser
Reviews.Content: Our system was easy to install though the key pad sent wouldn't work.  They replaced it right away with no question.  However the system presets needed to be reset to work with the new key pad's specific ID.  Easy to do but if this happens to you its important you update the ID's of any new or changed our components.I have one significant issue with the system  I am not using Simplisafe alarm notification service.  When I bought the system I thought I would be able to get an alarm notification sent to either my phone or a neighbors w/o using their service. Other systems do this and in many cases its preferable to have a "neighborhood watch" or other local entity filter notifications to the police and avoid false alarms. This system does not appear to accommodate this and you are required to pay the monthly service fee of $20 to use their alarm notification service.  I would not have bought the system had I understood that I couldn't have alarm notifications sent to my own or neighbors email or text message address w/o using the Simplisafe service. The hardware exists within their system to do this and I suspect this is a business decision to force users to pay a monthly service charge.  Anyway I'll probably replace the Simplisafe system with a system that has this capability and use the system I purchased at another location where its better suited for a local alarm only appication.

Reviews.Title: called customer service...got an answering machine?
Reviews.Author: Kelly Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I ordered this system for my mother's house and had it shipped in 2 installments.  When I got there 3 weeks later (out of state), only one box was there.  OK, so I called the customer service number on a Saturday.  And got an answering machine stating that their offices were closed and to please leave a message.  What kind of bush league operation is this?  When I installed a Frontgate system in my own home, they answered on a Sunday morning and walked me through the setup.  I should have stuck with them.

Reviews.Title: System O.K. but changing your monitoring options difficult.
Reviews.Author: Robert Maier "Bob"
Reviews.Content: Simplisafe's system works well. However, they have made it impossible to change your monitoring plan online, and both email and voicemail messages had not gotten a response to our request to change our monitoring option.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jim C.
Reviews.Content: Have not gone anywhere as of yet and have not had to set system but all in great working order. Will be testing after I place the siren I purchased for outside wall. This is a great system for my needs and savings are GREAT. gave kit 4 stars only because I am an Amazon prime member and could have gotten free shipping but didn't realize until after buying that I could have went with Amazon and got free shipping....OH WELL!

Reviews.Title: Response for feedback
Reviews.Author: Charles Widup
Reviews.Content: Have not had it long enough to honestly reply.  I was unable to set up program via my computer so have not activated it yet.  I have not asked for technical assistance as I work throughout the day and unable to do such.  I only assume assistance is available throughout the day  Basic set up was smooth.  I also need to purchase 2 more entry units as well as request a couple of more window stickers.  I appreciate opportunity to take this survey.

Reviews.Title: keep looking
Reviews.Author: Michigan
Reviews.Content: I bought this system from manufacturer directly and installed it which was very easy.Not good stuff:T Mobile cellular signal did not work. And they have no other.The land line hookup did work, when my wife was not on the phone.The third method was a rotor adaptor witch they charge you 60 bucks more for(and there is no mention of this any were on there web page) and this to did not work.Tec support had a 10-15 minute wait.The alarm people spoke broken English (may be India?).It was a 3 week wast of my time.

Reviews.Title: I am still trying to get in touch with the Departments about the Permits, and the System is still in the box.
Reviews.Author: Super Splender
Reviews.Content: I was not told that I would need to check with the Police and Fire Departments about getting permits, which I am having a hard time getting to the right people. I want to install my Unit now, but I can't until I get in touch with these departments. Right now, I am feeling  disappointed. It's hard to rate it because it is still in the box.

Reviews.Title: I felt disconnected
Reviews.Author: ArcherL
Reviews.Content: Was hard to feel as connected with the base separate from the keypad. The base had to have its own space in which to sit, which proved difficult for us. Is a very affordable system...just not for us.

Reviews.Title: Extra Siren Faulty
Reviews.Author: Scott Amundson
Reviews.Content: I've had a Simplisafe alarm for almost 3 years.  I supplemented the basic kit with an Extra Siren that is mounted outside of the house so the neighbors (& the burglars) can be alerted.  Every once in a while, the Siren triggers after the alarm has been disabled and is difficult to silence.  My spouse refused to use the system until I disabled the Extra Siren.  Tech support has told me to move the system components around until they work (they can't say exactly what works).  I don't have a lot of freedom to move them from their convenient locations in my small house.  They refuse to give me a refund 60 days after the purchase (the 1st problem took more than that to show).  I feel they should warn customers about potential problems and shouldn't be selling a poorly designed Siren.  They've had two years to solve the problem and have failed.Recently they are selling a $10/month upgrade that includes texting and emails.  I feel those features will reduce calls to their emergency line and would actually save them money if they gave them away.  At any rate $120/year for that feature is unreasonable.Besides the above complaints, I've been happy with the system.  When the alarm has been triggered, they've been quick to respond.  However, shop around before you buy.  There may be better inexpensive solutions available now.

Reviews.Title: Bait and Switch on this one.
Reviews.Author: Steven E Nygren
Reviews.Content: The product claims to not need monitoring and then claims a $14.99/month.  Turns out if you want to name your sensors you need to pay $24.99/month!  Can you believe it?  When a sensor is tripped the keypad says "Sensor ^

Reviews.Title: my base station does not come on. It shows a red light
Reviews.Author: Sam Latimer
Reviews.Content: I have not been able to get the blue light to come except when I unplug the connection. I may need to enter a phone number into my microcell?Thanks  Sam Latimer

Reviews.Title: does not work they misrepresent service
Reviews.Author: gretchen
Reviews.Content: installed but it doesn't work without tmobile. they don't say that anywhere on their website or in their manual. After lots of money and time spent they are totally unapologetic and can offer no solution, even though I have a land line. worthless. save your money and get a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Crap!!!
Reviews.Author: Pissedoff
Reviews.Content: I got this system about two weeks ago. I paid over $850 for all of the equipment to protect my house. Since I installed it, I have had an error stating "no link to dispatch"  I called customer service and they said I am in a low cell service area. I asked, where is a good service area,( because i live in South Bend Indiana) They said a large city. Come on, South Bend is no LA, but its a good size town. This thing is the biggest piece of crap ever to waste my time. I would be better off getting a guard turtle! If you are thinking of getting this system, just open your window and throw the money out. You will have the same security. I signed up for text and email alerts (which is an extra $10 a month) and have never receive 1 text or email.  I gave them 1 star, only because there is not an option for negative 100 stars!Now I must go apply some preparation H.

Reviews.Title: just delivered today
Reviews.Author: Sharon Steffey
Reviews.Content: give me a few days to set it up , took 2 weeks to get it  can not rate till its hooked up

Reviews.Title: Sends solicitations for positive feedback on Amazon
Reviews.Author: PRN
Reviews.Content: I would be leery of these overly positive reviews. This item is maybe 3.5-4 star average, not 5. Over 900 reviews for this sales volume is suspect.

Reviews.Title: Chinese crap strikes again.
Reviews.Author: Dennis A Beaudry
Reviews.Content: The concept of SimpliSafe is good but that's where it ends. The advertising is somewhat deceptive in that the product really isn't intended to be a stand alone system but will nag you into the monitoring service by constant blinking even when the system is set to OFF, AWAY, or HOME. Besides, the system command module should be discreet instead of a bright blue light to tell an intruder that, "Here is the system control module". The key pad should not announce to the intruder that you don't have monitoring service. All of this is to get the owner to opt into a monitoring service. Kind of defeats the ad that says you don't have to have the monitoring service. And beyond all of that, the junk is made in China. When does this China thing stop? Shame on Rush Limbaugh for calling them ChiComs and yet sell products made there. Shame on Glenn Beck for singing the praises of America and American made and then sell Chinese junk. The box is ready and scheduled to be returned through FedEx on Tuesday.

Reviews.Title: MISLEADING ADVERTISING
Reviews.Author: jimbo57
Reviews.Content: I ordered the SimpliSafe Basic System plus additional entry sensors to install in a new property and to possibly replace an Alarm Force system in others. The Web site said to order and get a $25 gift free key fob. The Basic System shows 5 components including a Key Fob. So I had expected an extra Key Fob as the gift.When I received the system there was one only one keyfob and they claimed the Gift "free" keyfob was the one in the package.In order to address this I called their Customer Support and was placed on hold twice; once for 15 minutes and once for 20+ minutes; while anyone pressing the number for ordering a new system got immediate access.To me this shows an emphasis on sales using misleading advertising and a total lack of customer support.I have decided to continue with a competitor's system where I get what is advertised and much much better customer support response.In short I believe these people are pushing equipment sales of equipment made in China for 1/10th their cost without appropriate commitment to any support.

Reviews.Title: disappointed.
Reviews.Author: An Phuong Huynh
Reviews.Content: I don't have the yard sign. If I know there is no yard sign, I will not order it from amazon. Simplisafe.com include a yard sign in the 8 piece package with the same price.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support & Customer Service: Incompetent and Inappropriate
Reviews.Author: heyjude99
Reviews.Content: If given the choice by Amazon, this company would receive a ZERO rating from me!I have not been a SimpliSafe customer for more than a year, due to poorly functioning equipment and months of frustration with Tech Support.  Just this week I received a highly inappropriate voicemail message from a customer service rep.  He stated, "Your name out of the blue popped in my head.  Just calling to say hello and hope everything's going well.  Just figured I'd touch base and see how you're doing."  He concluded with, "Hope you're doing well.  Take care, Sweetie."  I was APPALLED: first, that I was called, no longer being a subscriber for so long, and most importantly, that the message was so personal, almost implying some kind of intimate relationship.  I was absolutely disgusted, and greatly offended. I urged the company that he be disciplined, receive mandated customer service retraining, and be closely supervised in his dealings with customers.  I highly recommend you avoid this company!  Save yourself the frustration and disrespect.  Check out other options available in your area.

Reviews.Title: Deceptive Business Pratice from SimpliSafe
Reviews.Author: Strawfoot
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are researching security alarms. We took the time to read numerous reviews of SimpliSafe. We still had questions.What do you get with the higher cost monitoring? Will you offer integrated cameras soon? We want an outdoor strobe light that activates when the alarm is tripped. Will you be offering that in the future?SimpliSafe sent us a reply. They sent us several replies. Only they were not replies at all. They were spam. Rather than answer a single question we asked, they placed us on their mailing list and we keep getting advertisements from them, signed Dave. I wonder if they read our questions at all.Now we will have to contact them by phone and request to be taken off their mailing list. They offer no way off the list by unsubscribing. This is not the type of experience we wanted when we began looking at SimpliSafe as an option. With so many dishonest security alarm companies out there, we had hoped to find a company with integrity. We will have to keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation
Reviews.Author: sk
Reviews.Content: The ordering process was easy to do and it was delivered quickly and correctly. Installation was straightforward and it took about an hour. Customer support via telephone was helpful after waiting an extended period of time (10 minutes). The agent was very knowledgeable and walked me through all the steps without any problems. I would recommend this service to others.
